</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="160"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="161"></td>
        <td id="LC161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my saying that I did not understand, she went on:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="162"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="254"></td>
        <td id="LC254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and so hasten the war which was always really at loading point.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="255"></td>
        <td id="LC255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="256"></td>
        <td id="LC256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Beyond the green swelling hills of the Mittel Land rose mighty slopes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="257"></td>
        <td id="LC257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of forest up to the lofty steeps of the Carpathians themselves. Right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="258"></td>
        <td id="LC258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and left of us they towered, with the afternoon sun falling full upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="259"></td>
        <td id="LC259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them and bringing out all the glorious colours of this beautiful range,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="260"></td>
        <td id="LC260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deep blue and purple in the shadows of the peaks, green and brown where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="261"></td>
        <td id="LC261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grass and rock mingled, and an endless perspective of jagged rock and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="262"></td>
        <td id="LC262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pointed crags, till these were themselves lost in the distance, where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="263"></td>
        <td id="LC263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the snowy peaks rose grandly. Here and there seemed mighty rifts in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="264"></td>
        <td id="LC264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mountains, through which, as the sun began to sink, we saw now and again</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="265"></td>
        <td id="LC265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the white gleam of falling water. One of my companions touched my arm as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="266"></td>
        <td id="LC266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we swept round the base of a hill and opened up the lofty, snow-covered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="267"></td>
        <td id="LC267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peak of a mountain, which seemed, as we wound on our serpentine way, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="268"></td>
        <td id="LC268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be right before us:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="269"></td>
        <td id="LC269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="270"></td>
        <td id="LC270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Look! Isten szek!&quot;--&quot;God&#39;s seat!&quot;--and he crossed himself reverently.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="271"></td>
        <td id="LC271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="272"></td>
        <td id="LC272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As we wound on our endless way, and the sun sank lower and lower behind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="273"></td>
        <td id="LC273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us, the shadows of the evening began to creep round us. This was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="274"></td>
        <td id="LC274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emphasised by the fact that the snowy mountain-top still held the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="275"></td>
        <td id="LC275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sunset, and seemed to glow out with a delicate cool pink. Here and there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="276"></td>
        <td id="LC276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we passed Cszeks and Slovaks, all in picturesque attire, but I noticed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="277"></td>
        <td id="LC277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that goitre was painfully prevalent. By the roadside were many crosses,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="278"></td>
        <td id="LC278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and as we swept by, my companions all crossed themselves. Here and there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="279"></td>
        <td id="LC279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a peasant man or woman kneeling before a shrine, who did not even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="280"></td>
        <td id="LC280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn round as we approached, but seemed in the self-surrender of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="281"></td>
        <td id="LC281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">devotion to have neither eyes nor ears for the outer world. There were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="282"></td>
        <td id="LC282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many things new to me: for instance, hay-ricks in the trees, and here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="283"></td>
        <td id="LC283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and there very beautiful masses of weeping birch, their white stems</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="284"></td>
        <td id="LC284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shining like silver through the delicate green of the leaves. Now and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="285"></td>
        <td id="LC285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again we passed a leiter-wagon--the ordinary peasant&#39;s cart--with its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="286"></td>
        <td id="LC286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long, snake-like vertebra, calculated to suit the inequalities of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="287"></td>
        <td id="LC287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">road. On this were sure to be seated quite a group of home-coming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="288"></td>
        <td id="LC288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peasants, the Cszeks with their white, and the Slovaks with their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="289"></td>
        <td id="LC289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coloured, sheepskins, the latter carrying lance-fashion their long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="290"></td>
        <td id="LC290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">staves, with axe at end. As the evening fell it began to get very cold,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="291"></td>
        <td id="LC291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the growing twilight seemed to merge into one dark mistiness the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="292"></td>
        <td id="LC292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloom of the trees, oak, beech, and pine, though in the valleys which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="293"></td>
        <td id="LC293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ran deep between the spurs of the hills, as we ascended through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="294"></td>
        <td id="LC294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pass, the dark firs stood out here and there against the background of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="295"></td>
        <td id="LC295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">late-lying snow. Sometimes, as the road was cut through the pine woods</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="296"></td>
        <td id="LC296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that seemed in the darkness to be closing down upon us, great masses of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="297"></td>
        <td id="LC297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greyness, which here and there bestrewed the trees, produced a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="298"></td>
        <td id="LC298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peculiarly weird and solemn effect, which carried on the thoughts and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="299"></td>
        <td id="LC299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grim fancies engendered earlier in the evening, when the falling sunset</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="300"></td>
        <td id="LC300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">threw into strange relief the ghost-like clouds which amongst the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="301"></td>
        <td id="LC301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Carpathians seem to wind ceaselessly through the valleys. Sometimes the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="302"></td>
        <td id="LC302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hills were so steep that, despite our driver&#39;s haste, the horses could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="303"></td>
        <td id="LC303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only go slowly. I wished to get down and walk up them, as we do at home,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="304"></td>
        <td id="LC304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but the driver would not hear of it. &quot;No, no,&quot; he said; &quot;you must not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="305"></td>
        <td id="LC305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">walk here; the dogs are too fierce&quot;; and then he added, with what he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="306"></td>
        <td id="LC306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidently meant for grim pleasantry--for he looked round to catch the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="307"></td>
        <td id="LC307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">approving smile of the rest--&quot;and you may have enough of such matters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="308"></td>
        <td id="LC308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before you go to sleep.&quot; The only stop he would make was a moment&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="309"></td>
        <td id="LC309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pause to light his lamps.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="310"></td>
        <td id="LC310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="311"></td>
        <td id="LC311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When it grew dark there seemed to be some excitement amongst the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="312"></td>
        <td id="LC312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passengers, and they kept speaking to him, one after the other, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="313"></td>
        <td id="LC313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though urging him to further speed. He lashed the horses unmercifully</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="314"></td>
        <td id="LC314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his long whip, and with wild cries of encouragement urged them on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="315"></td>
        <td id="LC315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to further exertions. Then through the darkness I could see a sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="316"></td>
        <td id="LC316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patch of grey light ahead of us, as though there were a cleft in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="317"></td>
        <td id="LC317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hills. The excitement of the passengers grew greater; the crazy coach</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="318"></td>
        <td id="LC318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rocked on its great leather springs, and swayed like a boat tossed on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="319"></td>
        <td id="LC319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stormy sea. I had to hold on. The road grew more level, and we appeared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="320"></td>
        <td id="LC320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to fly along. Then the mountains seemed to come nearer to us on each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="321"></td>
        <td id="LC321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side and to frown down upon us; we were entering on the Borgo Pass. One</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="322"></td>
        <td id="LC322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by one several of the passengers offered me gifts, which they pressed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="323"></td>
        <td id="LC323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon me with an earnestness which would take no denial; these were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="324"></td>
        <td id="LC324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainly of an odd and varied kind, but each was given in simple good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="325"></td>
        <td id="LC325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faith, with a kindly word, and a blessing, and that strange mixture of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="326"></td>
        <td id="LC326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear-meaning movements which I had seen outside the hotel at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="327"></td>
        <td id="LC327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bistritz--the sign of the cross and the guard against the evil eye.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="328"></td>
        <td id="LC328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, as we flew along, the driver leaned forward, and on each side the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="329"></td>
        <td id="LC329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passengers, craning over the edge of the coach, peered eagerly into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="330"></td>
        <td id="LC330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darkness. It was evident that something very exciting was either</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="331"></td>
        <td id="LC331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happening or expected, but though I asked each passenger, no one would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="332"></td>
        <td id="LC332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give me the slightest explanation. This state of excitement kept on for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="333"></td>
        <td id="LC333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some little time; and at last we saw before us the Pass opening out on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="334"></td>
        <td id="LC334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the eastern side. There were dark, rolling clouds overhead, and in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="335"></td>
        <td id="LC335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">air the heavy, oppressive sense of thunder. It seemed as though the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="336"></td>
        <td id="LC336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mountain range had separated two atmospheres, and that now we had got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="337"></td>
        <td id="LC337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the thunderous one. I was now myself looking out for the conveyance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="338"></td>
        <td id="LC338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was to take me to the Count. Each moment I expected to see the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="339"></td>
        <td id="LC339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glare of lamps through the blackness; but all was dark. The only light</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="340"></td>
        <td id="LC340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was the flickering rays of our own lamps, in which the steam from our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="341"></td>
        <td id="LC341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hard-driven horses rose in a white cloud. We could see now the sandy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="342"></td>
        <td id="LC342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">road lying white before us, but there was on it no sign of a vehicle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="343"></td>
        <td id="LC343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The passengers drew back with a sigh of gladness, which seemed to mock</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="344"></td>
        <td id="LC344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my own disappointment. I was already thinking what I had best do, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="345"></td>
        <td id="LC345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the driver, looking at his watch, said to the others something which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="346"></td>
        <td id="LC346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could hardly hear, it was spoken so quietly and in so low a tone; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="347"></td>
        <td id="LC347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought it was &quot;An hour less than the time.&quot; Then turning to me, he said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="348"></td>
        <td id="LC348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in German worse than my own:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="349"></td>
        <td id="LC349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="350"></td>
        <td id="LC350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There is no carriage here. The Herr is not expected after all. He will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="351"></td>
        <td id="LC351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now come on to Bukovina, and return to-morrow or the next day; better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="352"></td>
        <td id="LC352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the next day.&quot; Whilst he was speaking the horses began to neigh and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="353"></td>
        <td id="LC353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snort and plunge wildly, so that the driver had to hold them up. Then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="354"></td>
        <td id="LC354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amongst a chorus of screams from the peasants and a universal crossing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="355"></td>
        <td id="LC355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of themselves, a calèche, with four horses, drove up behind us, overtook</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="356"></td>
        <td id="LC356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us, and drew up beside the coach. I could see from the flash of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="357"></td>
        <td id="LC357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lamps, as the rays fell on them, that the horses were coal-black and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="358"></td>
        <td id="LC358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">splendid animals. They were driven by a tall man, with a long brown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="359"></td>
        <td id="LC359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beard and a great black hat, which seemed to hide his face from us. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="360"></td>
        <td id="LC360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could only see the gleam of a pair of very bright eyes, which seemed red</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="361"></td>
        <td id="LC361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the lamplight, as he turned to us. He said to the driver:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="362"></td>
        <td id="LC362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="363"></td>
        <td id="LC363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You are early to-night, my friend.&quot; The man stammered in reply:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="364"></td>
        <td id="LC364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="365"></td>
        <td id="LC365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The English Herr was in a hurry,&quot; to which the stranger replied:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="366"></td>
        <td id="LC366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="367"></td>
        <td id="LC367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That is why, I suppose, you wished him to go on to Bukovina. You cannot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="368"></td>
        <td id="LC368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deceive me, my friend; I know too much, and my horses are swift.&quot; As he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="369"></td>
        <td id="LC369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoke he smiled, and the lamplight fell on a hard-looking mouth, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="370"></td>
        <td id="LC370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very red lips and sharp-looking teeth, as white as ivory. One of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="371"></td>
        <td id="LC371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">companions whispered to another the line from Burger&#39;s &quot;Lenore&quot;:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="372"></td>
        <td id="LC372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="373"></td>
        <td id="LC373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    &quot;Denn die Todten reiten schnell&quot;--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="374"></td>
        <td id="LC374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    (&quot;For the dead travel fast.&quot;)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="375"></td>
        <td id="LC375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="376"></td>
        <td id="LC376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The strange driver evidently heard the words, for he looked up with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="377"></td>
        <td id="LC377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gleaming smile. The passenger turned his face away, at the same time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="378"></td>
        <td id="LC378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">putting out his two fingers and crossing himself. &quot;Give me the Herr&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="379"></td>
        <td id="LC379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">luggage,&quot; said the driver; and with exceeding alacrity my bags were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="380"></td>
        <td id="LC380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">handed out and put in the calèche. Then I descended from the side of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="381"></td>
        <td id="LC381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coach, as the calèche was close alongside, the driver helping me with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="382"></td>
        <td id="LC382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand which caught my arm in a grip of steel; his strength must have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="383"></td>
        <td id="LC383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prodigious. Without a word he shook his reins, the horses turned, and we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="384"></td>
        <td id="LC384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swept into the darkness of the Pass. As I looked back I saw the steam</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="385"></td>
        <td id="LC385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the horses of the coach by the light of the lamps, and projected</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="386"></td>
        <td id="LC386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against it the figures of my late companions crossing themselves. Then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="387"></td>
        <td id="LC387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the driver cracked his whip and called to his horses, and off they swept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="388"></td>
        <td id="LC388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on their way to Bukovina. As they sank into the darkness I felt a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="389"></td>
        <td id="LC389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strange chill, and a lonely feeling came over me; but a cloak was thrown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="390"></td>
        <td id="LC390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over my shoulders, and a rug across my knees, and the driver said in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="391"></td>
        <td id="LC391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excellent German:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="392"></td>
        <td id="LC392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="393"></td>
        <td id="LC393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The night is chill, mein Herr, and my master the Count bade me take all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="394"></td>
        <td id="LC394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">care of you. There is a flask of slivovitz (the plum brandy of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="395"></td>
        <td id="LC395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country) underneath the seat, if you should require it.&quot; I did not take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="396"></td>
        <td id="LC396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any, but it was a comfort to know it was there all the same. I felt a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="397"></td>
        <td id="LC397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little strangely, and not a little frightened. I think had there been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="398"></td>
        <td id="LC398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any alternative I should have taken it, instead of prosecuting that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="399"></td>
        <td id="LC399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unknown night journey. The carriage went at a hard pace straight along,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="400"></td>
        <td id="LC400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then we made a complete turn and went along another straight road. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="401"></td>
        <td id="LC401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed to me that we were simply going over and over the same ground</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="402"></td>
        <td id="LC402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again; and so I took note of some salient point, and found that this was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="403"></td>
        <td id="LC403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so. I would have liked to have asked the driver what this all meant, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="404"></td>
        <td id="LC404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I really feared to do so, for I thought that, placed as I was, any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="405"></td>
        <td id="LC405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">protest would have had no effect in case there had been an intention to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="406"></td>
        <td id="LC406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delay. By-and-by, however, as I was curious to know how time was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="407"></td>
        <td id="LC407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passing, I struck a match, and by its flame looked at my watch; it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="408"></td>
        <td id="LC408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">within a few minutes of midnight. This gave me a sort of shock, for I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="409"></td>
        <td id="LC409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suppose the general superstition about midnight was increased by my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="410"></td>
        <td id="LC410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recent experiences. I waited with a sick feeling of suspense.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="411"></td>
        <td id="LC411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="412"></td>
        <td id="LC412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then a dog began to howl somewhere in a farmhouse far down the road--a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="413"></td>
        <td id="LC413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long, agonised wailing, as if from fear. The sound was taken up by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="414"></td>
        <td id="LC414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another dog, and then another and another, till, borne on the wind which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="415"></td>
        <td id="LC415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now sighed softly through the Pass, a wild howling began, which seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="416"></td>
        <td id="LC416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to come from all over the country, as far as the imagination could grasp</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="417"></td>
        <td id="LC417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it through the gloom of the night. At the first howl the horses began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="418"></td>
        <td id="LC418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strain and rear, but the driver spoke to them soothingly, and they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="419"></td>
        <td id="LC419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quieted down, but shivered and sweated as though after a runaway from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="420"></td>
        <td id="LC420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sudden fright. Then, far off in the distance, from the mountains on each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="421"></td>
        <td id="LC421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side of us began a louder and a sharper howling--that of wolves--which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="422"></td>
        <td id="LC422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affected both the horses and myself in the same way--for I was minded to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="423"></td>
        <td id="LC423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jump from the calèche and run, whilst they reared again and plunged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="424"></td>
        <td id="LC424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">madly, so that the driver had to use all his great strength to keep them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="425"></td>
        <td id="LC425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from bolting. In a few minutes, however, my own ears got accustomed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="426"></td>
        <td id="LC426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sound, and the horses so far became quiet that the driver was able</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="427"></td>
        <td id="LC427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to descend and to stand before them. He petted and soothed them, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="428"></td>
        <td id="LC428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whispered something in their ears, as I have heard of horse-tamers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="429"></td>
        <td id="LC429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doing, and with extraordinary effect, for under his caresses they became</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="430"></td>
        <td id="LC430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite manageable again, though they still trembled. The driver again</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="431"></td>
        <td id="LC431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took his seat, and shaking his reins, started off at a great pace. This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="432"></td>
        <td id="LC432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, after going to the far side of the Pass, he suddenly turned down a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="433"></td>
        <td id="LC433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">narrow roadway which ran sharply to the right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="434"></td>
        <td id="LC434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="435"></td>
        <td id="LC435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Soon we were hemmed in with trees, which in places arched right over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="436"></td>
        <td id="LC436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">roadway till we passed as through a tunnel; and again great frowning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="437"></td>
        <td id="LC437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rocks guarded us boldly on either side. Though we were in shelter, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="438"></td>
        <td id="LC438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could hear the rising wind, for it moaned and whistled through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="439"></td>
        <td id="LC439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rocks, and the branches of the trees crashed together as we swept along.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="440"></td>
        <td id="LC440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It grew colder and colder still, and fine, powdery snow began to fall,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="441"></td>
        <td id="LC441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so that soon we and all around us were covered with a white blanket. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="442"></td>
        <td id="LC442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keen wind still carried the howling of the dogs, though this grew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="443"></td>
        <td id="LC443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fainter as we went on our way. The baying of the wolves sounded nearer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="444"></td>
        <td id="LC444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and nearer, as though they were closing round on us from every side. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="445"></td>
        <td id="LC445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grew dreadfully afraid, and the horses shared my fear. The driver,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="446"></td>
        <td id="LC446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, was not in the least disturbed; he kept turning his head to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="447"></td>
        <td id="LC447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left and right, but I could not see anything through the darkness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="448"></td>
        <td id="LC448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="449"></td>
        <td id="LC449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suddenly, away on our left, I saw a faint flickering blue flame. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="450"></td>
        <td id="LC450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">driver saw it at the same moment; he at once checked the horses, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="451"></td>
        <td id="LC451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jumping to the ground, disappeared into the darkness. I did not know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="452"></td>
        <td id="LC452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what to do, the less as the howling of the wolves grew closer; but while</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="453"></td>
        <td id="LC453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I wondered the driver suddenly appeared again, and without a word took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="454"></td>
        <td id="LC454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his seat, and we resumed our journey. I think I must have fallen asleep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="455"></td>
        <td id="LC455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and kept dreaming of the incident, for it seemed to be repeated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="456"></td>
        <td id="LC456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endlessly, and now looking back, it is like a sort of awful nightmare.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="457"></td>
        <td id="LC457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Once the flame appeared so near the road, that even in the darkness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="458"></td>
        <td id="LC458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">around us I could watch the driver&#39;s motions. He went rapidly to where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="459"></td>
        <td id="LC459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the blue flame arose--it must have been very faint, for it did not seem</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="460"></td>
        <td id="LC460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to illumine the place around it at all--and gathering a few stones,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="461"></td>
        <td id="LC461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">formed them into some device. Once there appeared a strange optical</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="462"></td>
        <td id="LC462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effect: when he stood between me and the flame he did not obstruct it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="463"></td>
        <td id="LC463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for I could see its ghostly flicker all the same. This startled me, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="464"></td>
        <td id="LC464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as the effect was only momentary, I took it that my eyes deceived me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="465"></td>
        <td id="LC465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">straining through the darkness. Then for a time there were no blue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="466"></td>
        <td id="LC466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flames, and we sped onwards through the gloom, with the howling of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="467"></td>
        <td id="LC467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wolves around us, as though they were following in a moving circle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="468"></td>
        <td id="LC468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="469"></td>
        <td id="LC469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At last there came a time when the driver went further afield than he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="470"></td>
        <td id="LC470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had yet gone, and during his absence, the horses began to tremble worse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="471"></td>
        <td id="LC471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than ever and to snort and scream with fright. I could not see any cause</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="472"></td>
        <td id="LC472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for it, for the howling of the wolves had ceased altogether; but just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="473"></td>
        <td id="LC473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then the moon, sailing through the black clouds, appeared behind the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="474"></td>
        <td id="LC474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jagged crest of a beetling, pine-clad rock, and by its light I saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="475"></td>
        <td id="LC475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">around us a ring of wolves, with white teeth and lolling red tongues,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="476"></td>
        <td id="LC476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with long, sinewy limbs and shaggy hair. They were a hundred times more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="477"></td>
        <td id="LC477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible in the grim silence which held them than even when they howled.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="478"></td>
        <td id="LC478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For myself, I felt a sort of paralysis of fear. It is only when a man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="479"></td>
        <td id="LC479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feels himself face to face with such horrors that he can understand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="480"></td>
        <td id="LC480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their true import.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="481"></td>
        <td id="LC481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="482"></td>
        <td id="LC482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All at once the wolves began to howl as though the moonlight had had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="483"></td>
        <td id="LC483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some peculiar effect on them. The horses jumped about and reared, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="484"></td>
        <td id="LC484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked helplessly round with eyes that rolled in a way painful to see;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="485"></td>
        <td id="LC485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but the living ring of terror encompassed them on every side; and they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="486"></td>
        <td id="LC486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had perforce to remain within it. I called to the coachman to come, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="487"></td>
        <td id="LC487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it seemed to me that our only chance was to try to break out through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="488"></td>
        <td id="LC488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ring and to aid his approach. I shouted and beat the side of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="489"></td>
        <td id="LC489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">calèche, hoping by the noise to scare the wolves from that side, so as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="490"></td>
        <td id="LC490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to give him a chance of reaching the trap. How he came there, I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="491"></td>
        <td id="LC491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not, but I heard his voice raised in a tone of imperious command, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="492"></td>
        <td id="LC492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking towards the sound, saw him stand in the roadway. As he swept his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="493"></td>
        <td id="LC493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long arms, as though brushing aside some impalpable obstacle, the wolves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="494"></td>
        <td id="LC494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fell back and back further still. Just then a heavy cloud passed across</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="495"></td>
        <td id="LC495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the face of the moon, so that we were again in darkness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="496"></td>
        <td id="LC496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="497"></td>
        <td id="LC497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I could see again the driver was climbing into the calèche, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="498"></td>
        <td id="LC498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wolves had disappeared. This was all so strange and uncanny that a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="499"></td>
        <td id="LC499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreadful fear came upon me, and I was afraid to speak or move. The time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="500"></td>
        <td id="LC500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed interminable as we swept on our way, now in almost complete</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="501"></td>
        <td id="LC501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darkness, for the rolling clouds obscured the moon. We kept on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="502"></td>
        <td id="LC502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ascending, with occasional periods of quick descent, but in the main</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="503"></td>
        <td id="LC503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always ascending. Suddenly, I became conscious of the fact that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="504"></td>
        <td id="LC504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">driver was in the act of pulling up the horses in the courtyard of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="505"></td>
        <td id="LC505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vast ruined castle, from whose tall black windows came no ray of light,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="506"></td>
        <td id="LC506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and whose broken battlements showed a jagged line against the moonlit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="507"></td>
        <td id="LC507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sky.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="508"></td>
        <td id="LC508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="509"></td>
        <td id="LC509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="510"></td>
        <td id="LC510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="511"></td>
        <td id="LC511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="512"></td>
        <td id="LC512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER II</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="513"></td>
        <td id="LC513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="514"></td>
        <td id="LC514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">JONATHAN HARKER&#39;S JOURNAL--_continued_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="515"></td>
        <td id="LC515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="516"></td>
        <td id="LC516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="517"></td>
        <td id="LC517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_5 May._--I must have been asleep, for certainly if I had been fully</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="518"></td>
        <td id="LC518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awake I must have noticed the approach of such a remarkable place. In</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="519"></td>
        <td id="LC519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gloom the courtyard looked of considerable size, and as several dark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="520"></td>
        <td id="LC520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ways led from it under great round arches, it perhaps seemed bigger than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="521"></td>
        <td id="LC521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it really is. I have not yet been able to see it by daylight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="522"></td>
        <td id="LC522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="523"></td>
        <td id="LC523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the calèche stopped, the driver jumped down and held out his hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="524"></td>
        <td id="LC524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to assist me to alight. Again I could not but notice his prodigious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="525"></td>
        <td id="LC525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strength. His hand actually seemed like a steel vice that could have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="526"></td>
        <td id="LC526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crushed mine if he had chosen. Then he took out my traps, and placed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="527"></td>
        <td id="LC527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them on the ground beside me as I stood close to a great door, old and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="528"></td>
        <td id="LC528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">studded with large iron nails, and set in a projecting doorway of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="529"></td>
        <td id="LC529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">massive stone. I could see even in the dim light that the stone was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="530"></td>
        <td id="LC530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">massively carved, but that the carving had been much worn by time and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="531"></td>
        <td id="LC531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weather. As I stood, the driver jumped again into his seat and shook the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="532"></td>
        <td id="LC532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reins; the horses started forward, and trap and all disappeared down one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="533"></td>
        <td id="LC533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the dark openings.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="534"></td>
        <td id="LC534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="535"></td>
        <td id="LC535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I stood in silence where I was, for I did not know what to do. Of bell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="536"></td>
        <td id="LC536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or knocker there was no sign; through these frowning walls and dark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="537"></td>
        <td id="LC537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window openings it was not likely that my voice could penetrate. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="538"></td>
        <td id="LC538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time I waited seemed endless, and I felt doubts and fears crowding upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="539"></td>
        <td id="LC539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. What sort of place had I come to, and among what kind of people?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="540"></td>
        <td id="LC540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What sort of grim adventure was it on which I had embarked? Was this a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="541"></td>
        <td id="LC541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">customary incident in the life of a solicitor&#39;s clerk sent out to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="542"></td>
        <td id="LC542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">explain the purchase of a London estate to a foreigner? Solicitor&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="543"></td>
        <td id="LC543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clerk! Mina would not like that. Solicitor--for just before leaving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="544"></td>
        <td id="LC544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">London I got word that my examination was successful; and I am now a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="545"></td>
        <td id="LC545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">full-blown solicitor! I began to rub my eyes and pinch myself to see if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="546"></td>
        <td id="LC546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I were awake. It all seemed like a horrible nightmare to me, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="547"></td>
        <td id="LC547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expected that I should suddenly awake, and find myself at home, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="548"></td>
        <td id="LC548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dawn struggling in through the windows, as I had now and again felt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="549"></td>
        <td id="LC549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the morning after a day of overwork. But my flesh answered the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="550"></td>
        <td id="LC550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pinching test, and my eyes were not to be deceived. I was indeed awake</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="551"></td>
        <td id="LC551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and among the Carpathians. All I could do now was to be patient, and to</td>

        <td id="LC552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wait the coming of the morning.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="553"></td>
        <td id="LC553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="554"></td>
        <td id="LC554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just as I had come to this conclusion I heard a heavy step approaching</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="555"></td>
        <td id="LC555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind the great door, and saw through the chinks the gleam of a coming</td>

        <td id="L556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="556"></td>
        <td id="LC556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light. Then there was the sound of rattling chains and the clanking of</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="560"></td>
        <td id="LC560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Within, stood a tall old man, clean shaven save for a long white</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moustache, and clad in black from head to foot, without a single speck</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="567"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="568"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="579"></td>

        <td id="L581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="581"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="582"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="583"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="599"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="613"></td>
        <td id="LC613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The light and warmth and the Count&#39;s courteous welcome seemed to have</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="614"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="615"></td>
        <td id="LC615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I discovered that I was half famished with hunger; so making a hasty</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="617"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="618"></td>
        <td id="LC618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I found supper already laid out. My host, who stood on one side of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="619"></td>
        <td id="LC619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great fireplace, leaning against the stonework, made a graceful wave of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="620"></td>
        <td id="LC620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his hand to the table, and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="621"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="622"></td>
        <td id="LC622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I pray you, be seated and sup how you please. You will, I trust, excuse</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me that I do not join you; but I have dined already, and I do not sup.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="624"></td>
