</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="625"></td>
        <td id="LC625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I handed to him the sealed letter which Mr. Hawkins had entrusted to me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="626"></td>
        <td id="LC626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He opened it and read it gravely; then, with a charming smile, he handed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="627"></td>
        <td id="LC627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it to me to read. One passage of it, at least, gave me a thrill of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="628"></td>
        <td id="LC628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="629"></td>
        <td id="LC629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="630"></td>
        <td id="LC630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I must regret that an attack of gout, from which malady I am a constant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="631"></td>
        <td id="LC631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sufferer, forbids absolutely any travelling on my part for some time to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="632"></td>
        <td id="LC632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come; but I am happy to say I can send a sufficient substitute, one in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="633"></td>
        <td id="LC633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom I have every possible confidence. He is a young man, full of energy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="634"></td>
        <td id="LC634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and talent in his own way, and of a very faithful disposition. He is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="635"></td>
        <td id="LC635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discreet and silent, and has grown into manhood in my service. He shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="636"></td>
        <td id="LC636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be ready to attend on you when you will during his stay, and shall take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="637"></td>
        <td id="LC637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your instructions in all matters.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="638"></td>
        <td id="LC638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="639"></td>
        <td id="LC639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Count himself came forward and took off the cover of a dish, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="640"></td>
        <td id="LC640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fell to at once on an excellent roast chicken. This, with some cheese</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="641"></td>
        <td id="LC641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a salad and a bottle of old Tokay, of which I had two glasses, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="642"></td>
        <td id="LC642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my supper. During the time I was eating it the Count asked me many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="643"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="644"></td>
        <td id="LC644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experienced.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="645"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="646"></td>
        <td id="LC646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By this time I had finished my supper, and by my host&#39;s desire had drawn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="647"></td>
        <td id="LC647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up a chair by the fire and begun to smoke a cigar which he offered me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="648"></td>
        <td id="LC648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the same time excusing himself that he did not smoke. I had now an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="649"></td>

        <td id="L650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="650"></td>
        <td id="LC650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">physiognomy.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="651"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="652"></td>
        <td id="LC652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His face was a strong--a very strong--aquiline, with high bridge of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="653"></td>
        <td id="LC653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thin nose and peculiarly arched nostrils; with lofty domed forehead, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="654"></td>
        <td id="LC654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hair growing scantily round the temples but profusely elsewhere. His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="655"></td>

        <td id="L657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="657"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="658"></td>

        <td id="L660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="660"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="661"></td>

        <td id="L662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="662"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="663"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="664"></td>
        <td id="LC664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hitherto I had noticed the backs of his hands as they lay on his knees</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="665"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="671"></td>
        <td id="LC671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horrible feeling of nausea came over me, which, do what I would, I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="672"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="673"></td>

        <td id="L674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="674"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="675"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="676"></td>
        <td id="LC676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window I saw the first dim streak of the coming dawn. There seemed a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="677"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="679"></td>
        <td id="LC679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gleamed, and he said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="680"></td>
        <td id="LC680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="681"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="682"></td>
        <td id="LC682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Seeing, I suppose, some expression in my face strange to him, he</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="685"></td>
        <td id="LC685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah, sir, you dwellers in the city cannot enter into the feelings of the</td>

        <td id="L687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="687"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="691"></td>
        <td id="LC691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself the door to the octagonal room, and I entered my bedroom....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="692"></td>
        <td id="LC692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="693"></td>
        <td id="LC693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am all in a sea of wonders. I doubt; I fear; I think strange things,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="694"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="697"></td>
        <td id="LC697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="698"></td>
        <td id="LC698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="699"></td>
        <td id="LC699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_7 May._--It is again early morning, but I have rested and enjoyed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="700"></td>
        <td id="LC700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last twenty-four hours. I slept till late in the day, and awoke of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="701"></td>
        <td id="LC701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own accord. When I had dressed myself I went into the room where we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="702"></td>
        <td id="LC702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supped, and found a cold breakfast laid out, with coffee kept hot by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="703"></td>
        <td id="LC703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pot being placed on the hearth. There was a card on the table, on which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="704"></td>
        <td id="LC704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was written:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="705"></td>
        <td id="LC705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="706"></td>
        <td id="LC706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have to be absent for a while. Do not wait for me.--D.&quot; I set to and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="707"></td>
        <td id="LC707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enjoyed a hearty meal. When I had done, I looked for a bell, so that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="708"></td>
        <td id="LC708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might let the servants know I had finished; but I could not find one.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="709"></td>
        <td id="LC709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There are certainly odd deficiencies in the house, considering the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="710"></td>
        <td id="LC710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extraordinary evidences of wealth which are round me. The table service</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="711"></td>
        <td id="LC711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is of gold, and so beautifully wrought that it must be of immense value.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="712"></td>
        <td id="LC712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The curtains and upholstery of the chairs and sofas and the hangings of</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="713"></td>
        <td id="LC713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my bed are of the costliest and most beautiful fabrics, and must have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="714"></td>
        <td id="LC714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been of fabulous value when they were made, for they are centuries old,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="715"></td>
        <td id="LC715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though in excellent order. I saw something like them in Hampton Court,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="716"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="717"></td>
        <td id="LC717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rooms is there a mirror. There is not even a toilet glass on my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="718"></td>
        <td id="LC718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">table, and I had to get the little shaving glass from my bag before I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="719"></td>
        <td id="LC719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could either shave or brush my hair. I have not yet seen a servant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="720"></td>
        <td id="LC720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anywhere, or heard a sound near the castle except the howling of wolves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="721"></td>
        <td id="LC721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Some time after I had finished my meal--I do not know whether to call it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="722"></td>
        <td id="LC722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breakfast or dinner, for it was between five and six o&#39;clock when I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="723"></td>
        <td id="LC723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it--I looked about for something to read, for I did not like to go about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="724"></td>
        <td id="LC724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the castle until I had asked the Count&#39;s permission. There was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="725"></td>
        <td id="LC725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absolutely nothing in the room, book, newspaper, or even writing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="726"></td>
        <td id="LC726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">materials; so I opened another door in the room and found a sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="727"></td>
        <td id="LC727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">library. The door opposite mine I tried, but found it locked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="728"></td>
        <td id="LC728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="729"></td>
        <td id="LC729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the library I found, to my great delight, a vast number of English</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="730"></td>
        <td id="LC730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">books, whole shelves full of them, and bound volumes of magazines and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="731"></td>
        <td id="LC731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">newspapers. A table in the centre was littered with English magazines</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="732"></td>
        <td id="LC732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and newspapers, though none of them were of very recent date. The books</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="733"></td>
        <td id="LC733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were of the most varied kind--history, geography, politics, political</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="734"></td>
        <td id="LC734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">economy, botany, geology, law--all relating to England and English life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="735"></td>
        <td id="LC735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and customs and manners. There were even such books of reference as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="736"></td>
        <td id="LC736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">London Directory, the &quot;Red&quot; and &quot;Blue&quot; books, Whitaker&#39;s Almanac, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="737"></td>
        <td id="LC737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Army and Navy Lists, and--it somehow gladdened my heart to see it--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="738"></td>
        <td id="LC738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Law List.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="739"></td>
        <td id="LC739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="740"></td>
        <td id="LC740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whilst I was looking at the books, the door opened, and the Count</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="741"></td>
        <td id="LC741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered. He saluted me in a hearty way, and hoped that I had had a good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="742"></td>
        <td id="LC742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night&#39;s rest. Then he went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="743"></td>
        <td id="LC743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="744"></td>
        <td id="LC744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am glad you found your way in here, for I am sure there is much that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="745"></td>
        <td id="LC745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will interest you. These companions&quot;--and he laid his hand on some of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="746"></td>
        <td id="LC746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the books--&quot;have been good friends to me, and for some years past, ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="747"></td>
        <td id="LC747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since I had the idea of going to London, have given me many, many hours</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="748"></td>
        <td id="LC748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of pleasure. Through them I have come to know your great England; and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="749"></td>
        <td id="LC749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know her is to love her. I long to go through the crowded streets of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="750"></td>
        <td id="LC750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your mighty London, to be in the midst of the whirl and rush of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="751"></td>
        <td id="LC751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">humanity, to share its life, its change, its death, and all that makes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="752"></td>
        <td id="LC752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it what it is. But alas! as yet I only know your tongue through books.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="753"></td>
        <td id="LC753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To you, my friend, I look that I know it to speak.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="754"></td>
        <td id="LC754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="755"></td>
        <td id="LC755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But, Count,&quot; I said, &quot;you know and speak English thoroughly!&quot; He bowed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="756"></td>
        <td id="LC756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gravely.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="757"></td>
        <td id="LC757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="758"></td>
        <td id="LC758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I thank you, my friend, for your all too-flattering estimate, but yet I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="759"></td>
        <td id="LC759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear that I am but a little way on the road I would travel. True, I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="760"></td>
        <td id="LC760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the grammar and the words, but yet I know not how to speak them.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="761"></td>
        <td id="LC761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="762"></td>
        <td id="LC762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Indeed,&quot; I said, &quot;you speak excellently.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="763"></td>
        <td id="LC763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="764"></td>
        <td id="LC764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Not so,&quot; he answered. &quot;Well, I know that, did I move and speak in your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="765"></td>
        <td id="LC765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">London, none there are who would not know me for a stranger. That is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="766"></td>
        <td id="LC766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough for me. Here I am noble; I am _boyar_; the common people know me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="767"></td>
        <td id="LC767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I am master. But a stranger in a strange land, he is no one; men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="768"></td>
        <td id="LC768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know him not--and to know not is to care not for. I am content if I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="769"></td>
        <td id="LC769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like the rest, so that no man stops if he see me, or pause in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="770"></td>
        <td id="LC770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speaking if he hear my words, &#39;Ha, ha! a stranger!&#39; I have been so long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="771"></td>
        <td id="LC771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">master that I would be master still--or at least that none other should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="772"></td>
        <td id="LC772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be master of me. You come to me not alone as agent of my friend Peter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="773"></td>
        <td id="LC773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hawkins, of Exeter, to tell me all about my new estate in London. You</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="774"></td>
        <td id="LC774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall, I trust, rest here with me awhile, so that by our talking I may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="775"></td>
        <td id="LC775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learn the English intonation; and I would that you tell me when I make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="776"></td>
        <td id="LC776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">error, even of the smallest, in my speaking. I am sorry that I had to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="777"></td>
        <td id="LC777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away so long to-day; but you will, I know, forgive one who has so many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="778"></td>
        <td id="LC778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">important affairs in hand.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="779"></td>
        <td id="LC779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="780"></td>
        <td id="LC780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of course I said all I could about being willing, and asked if I might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="781"></td>
        <td id="LC781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come into that room when I chose. He answered: &quot;Yes, certainly,&quot; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="782"></td>
        <td id="LC782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">added:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="783"></td>
        <td id="LC783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="784"></td>
        <td id="LC784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You may go anywhere you wish in the castle, except where the doors are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="785"></td>
        <td id="LC785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">locked, where of course you will not wish to go. There is reason that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="786"></td>
        <td id="LC786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all things are as they are, and did you see with my eyes and know with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="787"></td>
        <td id="LC787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my knowledge, you would perhaps better understand.&quot; I said I was sure of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="788"></td>
        <td id="LC788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this, and then he went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="789"></td>
        <td id="LC789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="790"></td>
        <td id="LC790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We are in Transylvania; and Transylvania is not England. Our ways are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="791"></td>
        <td id="LC791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not your ways, and there shall be to you many strange things. Nay, from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="792"></td>
        <td id="LC792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what you have told me of your experiences already, you know something of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="793"></td>
        <td id="LC793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what strange things there may be.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="794"></td>
        <td id="LC794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="795"></td>
        <td id="LC795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This led to much conversation; and as it was evident that he wanted to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="796"></td>
        <td id="LC796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talk, if only for talking&#39;s sake, I asked him many questions regarding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="797"></td>
        <td id="LC797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things that had already happened to me or come within my notice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="798"></td>
        <td id="LC798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sometimes he sheered off the subject, or turned the conversation by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="799"></td>
        <td id="LC799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pretending not to understand; but generally he answered all I asked most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="800"></td>
        <td id="LC800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frankly. Then as time went on, and I had got somewhat bolder, I asked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="801"></td>
        <td id="LC801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him of some of the strange things of the preceding night, as, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="802"></td>
        <td id="LC802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instance, why the coachman went to the places where he had seen the blue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="803"></td>
        <td id="LC803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flames. He then explained to me that it was commonly believed that on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="804"></td>
        <td id="LC804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain night of the year--last night, in fact, when all evil spirits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="805"></td>
        <td id="LC805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are supposed to have unchecked sway--a blue flame is seen over any place</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="806"></td>
        <td id="LC806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where treasure has been concealed. &quot;That treasure has been hidden,&quot; he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="807"></td>
        <td id="LC807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went on, &quot;in the region through which you came last night, there can be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="808"></td>
        <td id="LC808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but little doubt; for it was the ground fought over for centuries by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="809"></td>
        <td id="LC809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wallachian, the Saxon, and the Turk. Why, there is hardly a foot of soil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="810"></td>
        <td id="LC810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in all this region that has not been enriched by the blood of men,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="811"></td>
        <td id="LC811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patriots or invaders. In old days there were stirring times, when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="812"></td>
        <td id="LC812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Austrian and the Hungarian came up in hordes, and the patriots went out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="813"></td>
        <td id="LC813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to meet them--men and women, the aged and the children too--and waited</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="814"></td>
        <td id="LC814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their coming on the rocks above the passes, that they might sweep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="815"></td>
        <td id="LC815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destruction on them with their artificial avalanches. When the invader</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="816"></td>
        <td id="LC816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was triumphant he found but little, for whatever there was had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="817"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="904"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="905"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="906"></td>
        <td id="LC906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently, with an excuse, he left me, asking me to put all my papers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="907"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="908"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="909"></td>
        <td id="LC909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">England, as if that map had been much used. On looking at it I found in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="910"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1002"></td>
        <td id="LC1002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the forests.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1003"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1004"></td>
        <td id="LC1004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But I am not in heart to describe beauty, for when I had seen the view I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1005"></td>
        <td id="LC1005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">explored further; doors, doors, doors everywhere, and all locked and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1006"></td>
        <td id="LC1006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bolted. In no place save from the windows in the castle walls is there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1007"></td>
        <td id="LC1007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an available exit.</td>

        <td id="L1008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1008"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L1009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1009"></td>
        <td id="LC1009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The castle is a veritable prison, and I am a prisoner!</td>

        <td id="L1014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1014"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1015"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1016"></td>
        <td id="LC1016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">JONATHAN HARKER&#39;S JOURNAL--_continued_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1017"></td>
        <td id="LC1017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1018"></td>
        <td id="LC1018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1019"></td>
        <td id="LC1019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I found that I was a prisoner a sort of wild feeling came over me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1020"></td>
        <td id="LC1020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I rushed up and down the stairs, trying every door and peering out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1021"></td>
        <td id="LC1021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every window I could find; but after a little the conviction of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1022"></td>
        <td id="LC1022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">helplessness overpowered all other feelings. When I look back after a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1023"></td>
        <td id="LC1023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">few hours I think I must have been mad for the time, for I behaved much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1024"></td>
        <td id="LC1024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as a rat does in a trap. When, however, the conviction had come to me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1025"></td>
        <td id="LC1025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I was helpless I sat down quietly--as quietly as I have ever done</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1026"></td>
        <td id="LC1026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything in my life--and began to think over what was best to be done. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1027"></td>
        <td id="LC1027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am thinking still, and as yet have come to no definite conclusion. Of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1028"></td>
        <td id="LC1028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one thing only am I certain; that it is no use making my ideas known to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1029"></td>
        <td id="LC1029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Count. He knows well that I am imprisoned; and as he has done it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1030"></td>
        <td id="LC1030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself, and has doubtless his own motives for it, he would only deceive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1031"></td>
        <td id="LC1031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me if I trusted him fully with the facts. So far as I can see, my only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1032"></td>
        <td id="LC1032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plan will be to keep my knowledge and my fears to myself, and my eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1033"></td>
        <td id="LC1033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">open. I am, I know, either being deceived, like a baby, by my own fears,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1034"></td>
        <td id="LC1034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or else I am in desperate straits; and if the latter be so, I need, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1035"></td>
        <td id="LC1035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall need, all my brains to get through.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1036"></td>
        <td id="LC1036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1037"></td>
        <td id="LC1037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had hardly come to this conclusion when I heard the great door below</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1038"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1039"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1040"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1042"></td>
        <td id="LC1042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the chink of the hinges of the door laying the table in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1043"></td>
        <td id="LC1043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dining-room, I was assured of it; for if he does himself all these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC1044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">menial offices, surely it is proof that there is no one else to do them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1045"></td>
        <td id="LC1045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This gave me a fright, for if there is no one else in the castle, it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1046"></td>
        <td id="LC1046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must have been the Count himself who was the driver of the coach that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1047"></td>
        <td id="LC1047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought me here. This is a terrible thought; for if so, what does it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1048"></td>

        <td id="L1050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1050"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1063"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1065"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1066"></td>
        <td id="LC1066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Midnight._--I have had a long talk with the Count. I asked him a few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1067"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1068"></td>
        <td id="LC1068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonderfully. In his speaking of things and people, and especially of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1069"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1070"></td>
        <td id="LC1070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afterwards explained by saying that to a _boyar_ the pride of his house</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1071"></td>
        <td id="LC1071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and name is his own pride, that their glory is his glory, that their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1072"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and spoke almost in the plural, like a king speaking. I wish I could put</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1074"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1075"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1076"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1080"></td>
        <td id="LC1080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his race:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1081"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1082"></td>
        <td id="LC1082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We Szekelys have a right to be proud, for in our veins flows the blood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1083"></td>
        <td id="LC1083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of many brave races who fought as the lion fights, for lordship. Here,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1084"></td>
        <td id="LC1084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the whirlpool of European races, the Ugric tribe bore down from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1085"></td>
        <td id="LC1085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Iceland the fighting spirit which Thor and Wodin gave them, which their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1086"></td>
        <td id="LC1086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Berserkers displayed to such fell intent on the seaboards of Europe, ay,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1087"></td>
        <td id="LC1087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and of Asia and Africa too, till the peoples thought that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1088"></td>
        <td id="LC1088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were-wolves themselves had come. Here, too, when they came, they found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1089"></td>
        <td id="LC1089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Huns, whose warlike fury had swept the earth like a living flame,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1090"></td>
        <td id="LC1090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till the dying peoples held that in their veins ran the blood of those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1091"></td>
        <td id="LC1091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">old witches, who, expelled from Scythia had mated with the devils in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1092"></td>
        <td id="LC1092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desert. Fools, fools! What devil or what witch was ever so great as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1093"></td>
        <td id="LC1093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Attila, whose blood is in these veins?&quot; He held up his arms. &quot;Is it a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1094"></td>
        <td id="LC1094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonder that we were a conquering race; that we were proud; that when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1095"></td>
        <td id="LC1095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Magyar, the Lombard, the Avar, the Bulgar, or the Turk poured his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1096"></td>
        <td id="LC1096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thousands on our frontiers, we drove them back? Is it strange that when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1097"></td>
        <td id="LC1097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arpad and his legions swept through the Hungarian fatherland he found us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1098"></td>
        <td id="LC1098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here when he reached the frontier; that the Honfoglalas was completed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1099"></td>
        <td id="LC1099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there? And when the Hungarian flood swept eastward, the Szekelys were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1100"></td>
        <td id="LC1100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">claimed as kindred by the victorious Magyars, and to us for centuries</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1101"></td>
        <td id="LC1101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was trusted the guarding of the frontier of Turkey-land; ay, and more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1102"></td>
        <td id="LC1102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than that, endless duty of the frontier guard, for, as the Turks say,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1103"></td>
        <td id="LC1103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;water sleeps, and enemy is sleepless.&#39; Who more gladly than we</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1106"></td>
        <td id="LC1106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">redeemed that great shame of my nation, the shame of Cassova, when the</td>

        <td id="LC1107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flags of the Wallach and the Magyar went down beneath the Crescent? Who</td>

        <td id="L1108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1108"></td>
        <td id="LC1108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was it but one of my own race who as Voivode crossed the Danube and beat</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1109"></td>
        <td id="LC1109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Turk on his own ground? This was a Dracula indeed! Woe was it that</td>

</td>

        <td id="L1135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1135"></td>
        <td id="LC1135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_12 May._--Let me begin with facts--bare, meagre facts, verified by</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his room he began by asking me questions on legal matters and on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sequence; the knowledge may somehow or some time be useful to me.</td>

        <td id="L1145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1145"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1146"></td>
        <td id="LC1146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">First, he asked if a man in England might have two solicitors or more. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1147"></td>

        <td id="L1151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1151"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attend, say, to banking, and another to look after shipping, in case</td>

        <td id="L1153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1153"></td>
        <td id="LC1153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">local help were needed in a place far from the home of the banking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1154"></td>

        <td id="L1156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1156"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1157"></td>

        <td id="L1158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1158"></td>
        <td id="LC1158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the shadow of your beautiful cathedral at Exeter, which is far from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1159"></td>

        <td id="L1161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1161"></td>
        <td id="LC1161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sought the services of one so far off from London instead of some one</td>

        <td id="L1162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1162"></td>

        <td id="L1165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1165"></td>
        <td id="LC1165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seek my agent, whose labours should be only to my interest. Now, suppose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1166"></td>
        <td id="LC1166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I, who have much of affairs, wish to ship goods, say, to Newcastle, or</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L1174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1174"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1175"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1176"></td>
        <td id="LC1176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1177"></td>
        <td id="LC1177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Of course,&quot; I replied; and &quot;such is often done by men of business, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1178"></td>
        <td id="LC1178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do not like the whole of their affairs to be known by any one person.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1179"></td>
        <td id="LC1179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1180"></td>
        <td id="LC1180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good!&quot; he said, and then went on to ask about the means of making</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1181"></td>
        <td id="LC1181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consignments and the forms to be gone through, and of all sorts of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1182"></td>
        <td id="LC1182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficulties which might arise, but by forethought could be guarded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1183"></td>
        <td id="LC1183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against. I explained all these things to him to the best of my ability,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1184"></td>
        <td id="LC1184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he certainly left me under the impression that he would have made a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1185"></td>
        <td id="LC1185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonderful solicitor, for there was nothing that he did not think of or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1186"></td>
        <td id="LC1186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foresee. For a man who was never in the country, and who did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1187"></td>
        <td id="LC1187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidently do much in the way of business, his knowledge and acumen were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1188"></td>
        <td id="LC1188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonderful. When he had satisfied himself on these points of which he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1189"></td>
        <td id="LC1189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoken, and I had verified all as well as I could by the books</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1190"></td>
        <td id="LC1190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">available, he suddenly stood up and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1191"></td>
        <td id="LC1191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1192"></td>
        <td id="LC1192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Have you written since your first letter to our friend Mr. Peter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1193"></td>
        <td id="LC1193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hawkins, or to any other?&quot; It was with some bitterness in my heart that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1194"></td>
        <td id="LC1194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I answered that I had not, that as yet I had not seen any opportunity of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1195"></td>
        <td id="LC1195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sending letters to anybody.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1196"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1197"></td>
        <td id="LC1197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then write now, my young friend,&quot; he said, laying a heavy hand on my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1198"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1200"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1201"></td>
        <td id="LC1201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do you wish me to stay so long?&quot; I asked, for my heart grew cold at the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1202"></td>
        <td id="LC1202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1204"></td>

        <td id="L1205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1205"></td>
        <td id="LC1205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">employer, what you will, engaged that someone should come on his behalf,</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1209"></td>
        <td id="LC1209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What could I do but bow acceptance? It was Mr. Hawkins&#39;s interest, not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L1216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1216"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1217"></td>
        <td id="LC1217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I pray you, my good young friend, that you will not discourse of things</td>

        <td id="L1228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1228"></td>
        <td id="LC1228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did see it. When I had written my two letters I sat quiet, reading a</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1235"></td>

        <td id="L1236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1236"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1237"></td>

        <td id="LC1242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seat, having just had time to replace the letters as they had been and</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1246"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1247"></td>
        <td id="LC1247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I trust you will forgive me, but I have much work to do in private this</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1250"></td>
        <td id="LC1250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1251"></td>
        <td id="LC1251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Let me advise you, my dear young friend--nay, let me warn you with all</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1252"></td>
        <td id="LC1252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seriousness, that should you leave these rooms you will not by any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1253"></td>
        <td id="LC1253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chance go to sleep in any other part of the castle. It is old, and has</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warned! Should sleep now or ever overcome you, or be like to do, then</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1260"></td>

        <td id="L1261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1261"></td>

        <td id="L1262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1262"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1263"></td>
        <td id="LC1263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1264"></td>
        <td id="LC1264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1265"></td>
        <td id="LC1265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--I endorse the last words written, but this time there is no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1266"></td>
        <td id="LC1266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubt in question. I shall not fear to sleep in any place where he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1267"></td>
        <td id="LC1267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not. I have placed the crucifix over the head of my bed--I imagine that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1268"></td>
        <td id="LC1268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my rest is thus freer from dreams; and there it shall remain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1269"></td>
        <td id="LC1269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1270"></td>
        <td id="LC1270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When he left me I went to my room. After a little while, not hearing any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1271"></td>
        <td id="LC1271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sound, I came out and went up the stone stair to where I could look out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1272"></td>
        <td id="LC1272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards the South. There was some sense of freedom in the vast expanse,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1273"></td>
        <td id="LC1273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inaccessible though it was to me, as compared with the narrow darkness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1274"></td>
        <td id="LC1274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the courtyard. Looking out on this, I felt that I was indeed in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1275"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1365"></td>
        <td id="LC1365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nineteenth century up-to-date with a vengeance. And yet, unless my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1366"></td>
        <td id="LC1366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">senses deceive me, the old centuries had, and have, powers of their own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1367"></td>
        <td id="LC1367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which mere &quot;modernity&quot; cannot kill.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1368"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1371"></td>
        <td id="LC1371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later: the Morning of 16 May._--God preserve my sanity, for to this I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1372"></td>
        <td id="LC1372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am reduced. Safety and the assurance of safety are things of the past.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1373"></td>
        <td id="LC1373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whilst I live on here there is but one thing to hope for, that I may not</td>

        <td id="L1374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1374"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1456"></td>

        <td id="L1518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1518"></td>

        <td id="LC1537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_18 May._--I have been down to look at that room again in daylight, for</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1538"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1540"></td>
        <td id="LC1540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jamb that part of the woodwork was splintered. I could see that the bolt</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1541"></td>
        <td id="LC1541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the lock had not been shot, but the door is fastened from the inside.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1542"></td>
        <td id="LC1542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I fear it was no dream, and must act on this surmise.</td>
