</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1546"></td>
        <td id="LC1546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_19 May._--I am surely in the toils. Last night the Count asked me in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1547"></td>
        <td id="LC1547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the suavest tones to write three letters, one saying that my work here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1548"></td>
        <td id="LC1548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was nearly done, and that I should start for home within a few days,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1549"></td>
        <td id="LC1549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another that I was starting on the next morning from the time of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1550"></td>
        <td id="LC1550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter, and the third that I had left the castle and arrived at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1551"></td>
        <td id="LC1551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bistritz. I would fain have rebelled, but felt that in the present state</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1552"></td>
        <td id="LC1552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of things it would be madness to quarrel openly with the Count whilst I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1553"></td>
        <td id="LC1553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am so absolutely in his power; and to refuse would be to excite his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1554"></td>
        <td id="LC1554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspicion and to arouse his anger. He knows that I know too much, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1555"></td>
        <td id="LC1555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I must not live, lest I be dangerous to him; my only chance is to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1556"></td>
        <td id="LC1556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prolong my opportunities. Something may occur which will give me a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1557"></td>
        <td id="LC1557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chance to escape. I saw in his eyes something of that gathering wrath</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1558"></td>
        <td id="LC1558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was manifest when he hurled that fair woman from him. He explained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1559"></td>
        <td id="LC1559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me that posts were few and uncertain, and that my writing now would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1560"></td>
        <td id="LC1560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ensure ease of mind to my friends; and he assured me with so much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1561"></td>
        <td id="LC1561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impressiveness that he would countermand the later letters, which would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1562"></td>
        <td id="LC1562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be held over at Bistritz until due time in case chance would admit of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1563"></td>
        <td id="LC1563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prolonging my stay, that to oppose him would have been to create new</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1564"></td>
        <td id="LC1564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspicion. I therefore pretended to fall in with his views, and asked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1565"></td>
        <td id="LC1565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him what dates I should put on the letters. He calculated a minute, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1566"></td>
        <td id="LC1566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1567"></td>
        <td id="LC1567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1568"></td>
        <td id="LC1568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The first should be June 12, the second June 19, and the third June</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1569"></td>
        <td id="LC1569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">29.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1570"></td>
        <td id="LC1570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1571"></td>
        <td id="LC1571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I know now the span of my life. God help me!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1572"></td>
        <td id="LC1572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1573"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1574"></td>
        <td id="LC1574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1575"></td>
        <td id="LC1575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_28 May._--There is a chance of escape, or at any rate of being able to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1576"></td>
        <td id="LC1576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">send word home. A band of Szgany have come to the castle, and are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1577"></td>
        <td id="LC1577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">encamped in the courtyard. These Szgany are gipsies; I have notes of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1578"></td>
        <td id="LC1578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them in my book. They are peculiar to this part of the world, though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1579"></td>
        <td id="LC1579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allied to the ordinary gipsies all the world over. There are thousands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1580"></td>
        <td id="LC1580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them in Hungary and Transylvania, who are almost outside all law.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1581"></td>
        <td id="LC1581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They attach themselves as a rule to some great noble or _boyar_, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1582"></td>
        <td id="LC1582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">call themselves by his name. They are fearless and without religion,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1583"></td>
        <td id="LC1583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">save superstition, and they talk only their own varieties of the Romany</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1584"></td>
        <td id="LC1584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tongue.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1585"></td>
        <td id="LC1585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1586"></td>
        <td id="LC1586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall write some letters home, and shall try to get them to have them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1587"></td>
        <td id="LC1587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">posted. I have already spoken them through my window to begin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1588"></td>
        <td id="LC1588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquaintanceship. They took their hats off and made obeisance and many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1589"></td>
        <td id="LC1589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">signs, which, however, I could not understand any more than I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1590"></td>
        <td id="LC1590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their spoken language....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1591"></td>
        <td id="LC1591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1592"></td>
        <td id="LC1592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1593"></td>
        <td id="LC1593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1594"></td>
        <td id="LC1594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have written the letters. Mina&#39;s is in shorthand, and I simply ask Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1595"></td>
        <td id="LC1595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hawkins to communicate with her. To her I have explained my situation,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1596"></td>
        <td id="LC1596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but without the horrors which I may only surmise. It would shock and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1597"></td>
        <td id="LC1597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frighten her to death were I to expose my heart to her. Should the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1598"></td>
        <td id="LC1598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letters not carry, then the Count shall not yet know my secret or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1599"></td>
        <td id="LC1599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extent of my knowledge....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1600"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1601"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1602"></td>
        <td id="LC1602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1603"></td>
        <td id="LC1603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have given the letters; I threw them through the bars of my window</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1604"></td>
        <td id="LC1604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a gold piece, and made what signs I could to have them posted. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1605"></td>
        <td id="LC1605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man who took them pressed them to his heart and bowed, and then put them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1606"></td>
        <td id="LC1606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his cap. I could do no more. I stole back to the study, and began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1607"></td>
        <td id="LC1607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">read. As the Count did not come in, I have written here....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1608"></td>
        <td id="LC1608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1609"></td>
        <td id="LC1609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1610"></td>
        <td id="LC1610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1611"></td>
        <td id="LC1611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Count has come. He sat down beside me, and said in his smoothest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1612"></td>
        <td id="LC1612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voice as he opened two letters:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1613"></td>
        <td id="LC1613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1614"></td>
        <td id="LC1614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The Szgany has given me these, of which, though I know not whence they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1615"></td>
        <td id="LC1615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come, I shall, of course, take care. See!&quot;--he must have looked at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1616"></td>
        <td id="LC1616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it--&quot;one is from you, and to my friend Peter Hawkins; the other&quot;--here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1617"></td>
        <td id="LC1617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he caught sight of the strange symbols as he opened the envelope, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1618"></td>
        <td id="LC1618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dark look came into his face, and his eyes blazed wickedly--&quot;the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1619"></td>
        <td id="LC1619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other is a vile thing, an outrage upon friendship and hospitality! It is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1620"></td>
        <td id="LC1620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not signed. Well! so it cannot matter to us.&quot; And he calmly held letter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1621"></td>
        <td id="LC1621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and envelope in the flame of the lamp till they were consumed. Then he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1622"></td>
        <td id="LC1622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1623"></td>
        <td id="LC1623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1624"></td>
        <td id="LC1624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The letter to Hawkins--that I shall, of course, send on, since it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1625"></td>
        <td id="LC1625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yours. Your letters are sacred to me. Your pardon, my friend, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1626"></td>
        <td id="LC1626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unknowingly I did break the seal. Will you not cover it again?&quot; He held</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1627"></td>
        <td id="LC1627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out the letter to me, and with a courteous bow handed me a clean</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1628"></td>
        <td id="LC1628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">envelope. I could only redirect it and hand it to him in silence. When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1629"></td>
        <td id="LC1629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he went out of the room I could hear the key turn softly. A minute later</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1630"></td>
        <td id="LC1630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I went over and tried it, and the door was locked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1631"></td>
        <td id="LC1631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1632"></td>
        <td id="LC1632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When, an hour or two after, the Count came quietly into the room, his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1633"></td>
        <td id="LC1633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming awakened me, for I had gone to sleep on the sofa. He was very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1634"></td>
        <td id="LC1634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courteous and very cheery in his manner, and seeing that I had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1635"></td>
        <td id="LC1635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleeping, he said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1636"></td>
        <td id="LC1636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1637"></td>
        <td id="LC1637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;So, my friend, you are tired? Get to bed. There is the surest rest. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1638"></td>
        <td id="LC1638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may not have the pleasure to talk to-night, since there are many labours</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1639"></td>
        <td id="LC1639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me; but you will sleep, I pray.&quot; I passed to my room and went to bed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1640"></td>
        <td id="LC1640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, strange to say, slept without dreaming. Despair has its own calms.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1641"></td>
        <td id="LC1641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1642"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1644"></td>
        <td id="LC1644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_31 May._--This morning when I woke I thought I would provide myself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1645"></td>
        <td id="LC1645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with some paper and envelopes from my bag and keep them in my pocket, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1646"></td>
        <td id="LC1646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I might write in case I should get an opportunity, but again a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1647"></td>
        <td id="LC1647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surprise, again a shock!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1648"></td>
        <td id="LC1648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1649"></td>
        <td id="LC1649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every scrap of paper was gone, and with it all my notes, my memoranda,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1650"></td>
        <td id="LC1650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relating to railways and travel, my letter of credit, in fact all that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1651"></td>
        <td id="LC1651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might be useful to me were I once outside the castle. I sat and pondered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1652"></td>
        <td id="LC1652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awhile, and then some thought occurred to me, and I made search of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1653"></td>
        <td id="LC1653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">portmanteau and in the wardrobe where I had placed my clothes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1654"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1655"></td>
        <td id="LC1655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The suit in which I had travelled was gone, and also my overcoat and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1656"></td>
        <td id="LC1656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rug; I could find no trace of them anywhere. This looked like some new</td>

        <td id="LC1657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scheme of villainy....</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1661"></td>
        <td id="LC1661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_17 June._--This morning, as I was sitting on the edge of my bed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1662"></td>
        <td id="LC1662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cudgelling my brains, I heard without a cracking of whips and pounding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1663"></td>
        <td id="LC1663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and scraping of horses&#39; feet up the rocky path beyond the courtyard.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1664"></td>
        <td id="LC1664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With joy I hurried to the window, and saw drive into the yard two great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1665"></td>
        <td id="LC1665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leiter-wagons, each drawn by eight sturdy horses, and at the head of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1666"></td>
        <td id="LC1666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">each pair a Slovak, with his wide hat, great nail-studded belt, dirty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1667"></td>
        <td id="LC1667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sheepskin, and high boots. They had also their long staves in hand. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1668"></td>
        <td id="LC1668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ran to the door, intending to descend and try and join them through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1669"></td>
        <td id="LC1669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">main hall, as I thought that way might be opened for them. Again a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1670"></td>
        <td id="LC1670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shock: my door was fastened on the outside.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1671"></td>
        <td id="LC1671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1672"></td>
        <td id="LC1672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then I ran to the window and cried to them. They looked up at me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1673"></td>
        <td id="LC1673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stupidly and pointed, but just then the &quot;hetman&quot; of the Szgany came out,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1674"></td>
        <td id="LC1674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and seeing them pointing to my window, said something, at which they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1675"></td>
        <td id="LC1675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughed. Henceforth no effort of mine, no piteous cry or agonised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1676"></td>
        <td id="LC1676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entreaty, would make them even look at me. They resolutely turned away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1677"></td>
        <td id="LC1677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The leiter-wagons contained great, square boxes, with handles of thick</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1678"></td>
        <td id="LC1678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rope; these were evidently empty by the ease with which the Slovaks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1679"></td>
        <td id="LC1679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">handled them, and by their resonance as they were roughly moved. When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1680"></td>
        <td id="LC1680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were all unloaded and packed in a great heap in one corner of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1681"></td>
        <td id="LC1681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yard, the Slovaks were given some money by the Szgany, and spitting on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1682"></td>
        <td id="LC1682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it for luck, lazily went each to his horse&#39;s head. Shortly afterwards, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1683"></td>
        <td id="LC1683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard the cracking of their whips die away in the distance.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1684"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1685"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1687"></td>
        <td id="LC1687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_24 June, before morning._--Last night the Count left me early, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1688"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1689"></td>
        <td id="LC1689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">winding stair, and looked out of the window, which opened south. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1690"></td>
        <td id="LC1690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought I would watch for the Count, for there is something going on.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1691"></td>
        <td id="LC1691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Szgany are quartered somewhere in the castle and are doing work of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1692"></td>
        <td id="LC1692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some kind. I know it, for now and then I hear a far-away muffled sound</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1693"></td>
        <td id="LC1693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as of mattock and spade, and, whatever it is, it must be the end of some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1694"></td>
        <td id="LC1694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ruthless villainy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1695"></td>
        <td id="LC1695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1696"></td>
        <td id="LC1696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had been at the window somewhat less than half an hour, when I saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1697"></td>
        <td id="LC1697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something coming out of the Count&#39;s window. I drew back and watched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1698"></td>
        <td id="LC1698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carefully, and saw the whole man emerge. It was a new shock to me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1699"></td>
        <td id="LC1699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">find that he had on the suit of clothes which I had worn whilst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1700"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1701"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1702"></td>
        <td id="LC1702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in my garb, too! This, then, is his new scheme of evil: that he will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1703"></td>
        <td id="LC1703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allow others to see me, as they think, so that he may both leave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1704"></td>
        <td id="LC1704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidence that I have been seen in the towns or villages posting my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1705"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1706"></td>
        <td id="LC1706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people be attributed to me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1707"></td>
        <td id="LC1707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1708"></td>
        <td id="LC1708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It makes me rage to think that this can go on, and whilst I am shut up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1709"></td>
        <td id="LC1709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here, a veritable prisoner, but without that protection of the law which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1710"></td>
        <td id="LC1710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is even a criminal&#39;s right and consolation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1711"></td>
        <td id="LC1711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1712"></td>
        <td id="LC1712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I thought I would watch for the Count&#39;s return, and for a long time sat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1713"></td>
        <td id="LC1713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doggedly at the window. Then I began to notice that there were some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1714"></td>
        <td id="LC1714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quaint little specks floating in the rays of the moonlight. They were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1717"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1718"></td>
        <td id="LC1718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">embrasure in a more comfortable position, so that I could enjoy more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1719"></td>
        <td id="LC1719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fully the aërial gambolling.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1720"></td>
        <td id="LC1720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1721"></td>
        <td id="LC1721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Something made me start up, a low, piteous howling of dogs somewhere far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1722"></td>
        <td id="LC1722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">below in the valley, which was hidden from my sight. Louder it seemed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1723"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1724"></td>
        <td id="LC1724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sound as they danced in the moonlight. I felt myself struggling to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1725"></td>
        <td id="LC1725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awake to some call of my instincts; nay, my very soul was struggling,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1726"></td>
        <td id="LC1726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and my half-remembered sensibilities were striving to answer the call. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1727"></td>
        <td id="LC1727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was becoming hypnotised! Quicker and quicker danced the dust; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1728"></td>
        <td id="LC1728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moonbeams seemed to quiver as they went by me into the mass of gloom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1729"></td>
        <td id="LC1729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beyond. More and more they gathered till they seemed to take dim phantom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1730"></td>
        <td id="LC1730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shapes. And then I started, broad awake and in full possession of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1731"></td>
        <td id="LC1731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">senses, and ran screaming from the place. The phantom shapes, which were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1732"></td>
