        <td id="LC1915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you so suddenly desire it. Come!&quot; With a stately gravity, he, with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1916"></td>
        <td id="LC1916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lamp, preceded me down the stairs and along the hall. Suddenly he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1917"></td>
        <td id="LC1917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stopped.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1918"></td>
        <td id="LC1918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1919"></td>
        <td id="LC1919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hark!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1920"></td>
        <td id="LC1920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1921"></td>
        <td id="LC1921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Close at hand came the howling of many wolves. It was almost as if the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1922"></td>
        <td id="LC1922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sound sprang up at the rising of his hand, just as the music of a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1923"></td>
        <td id="LC1923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">orchestra seems to leap under the bâton of the conductor. After a pause</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1924"></td>
        <td id="LC1924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a moment, he proceeded, in his stately way, to the door, drew back</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1925"></td>
        <td id="LC1925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ponderous bolts, unhooked the heavy chains, and began to draw it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1926"></td>
        <td id="LC1926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">open.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1927"></td>
        <td id="LC1927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1928"></td>
        <td id="LC1928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To my intense astonishment I saw that it was unlocked. Suspiciously, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1929"></td>
        <td id="LC1929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked all round, but could see no key of any kind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1930"></td>
        <td id="LC1930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1931"></td>
        <td id="LC1931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the door began to open, the howling of the wolves without grew louder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1932"></td>
        <td id="LC1932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and angrier; their red jaws, with champing teeth, and their blunt-clawed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1933"></td>
        <td id="LC1933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feet as they leaped, came in through the opening door. I knew then that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1934"></td>
        <td id="LC1934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to struggle at the moment against the Count was useless. With such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1935"></td>
        <td id="LC1935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allies as these at his command, I could do nothing. But still the door</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1936"></td>
        <td id="LC1936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continued slowly to open, and only the Count&#39;s body stood in the gap.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1937"></td>
        <td id="LC1937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suddenly it struck me that this might be the moment and means of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1938"></td>
        <td id="LC1938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doom; I was to be given to the wolves, and at my own instigation. There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1939"></td>
        <td id="LC1939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a diabolical wickedness in the idea great enough for the Count, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1940"></td>
        <td id="LC1940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as a last chance I cried out:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1941"></td>
        <td id="LC1941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1942"></td>
        <td id="LC1942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Shut the door; I shall wait till morning!&quot; and covered my face with my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1943"></td>
        <td id="LC1943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands to hide my tears of bitter disappointment. With one sweep of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1944"></td>
        <td id="LC1944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">powerful arm, the Count threw the door shut, and the great bolts clanged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1945"></td>
        <td id="LC1945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and echoed through the hall as they shot back into their places.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1946"></td>
        <td id="LC1946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1947"></td>
        <td id="LC1947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In silence we returned to the library, and after a minute or two I went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1948"></td>
        <td id="LC1948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to my own room. The last I saw of Count Dracula was his kissing his hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1949"></td>
        <td id="LC1949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me; with a red light of triumph in his eyes, and with a smile that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1950"></td>
        <td id="LC1950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Judas in hell might be proud of.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1951"></td>
        <td id="LC1951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1952"></td>
        <td id="LC1952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I was in my room and about to lie down, I thought I heard a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1953"></td>
        <td id="LC1953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whispering at my door. I went to it softly and listened. Unless my ears</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1954"></td>
        <td id="LC1954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deceived me, I heard the voice of the Count:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1955"></td>
        <td id="LC1955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1956"></td>
        <td id="LC1956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Back, back, to your own place! Your time is not yet come. Wait! Have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1957"></td>
        <td id="LC1957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patience! To-night is mine. To-morrow night is yours!&quot; There was a low,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1958"></td>
        <td id="LC1958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sweet ripple of laughter, and in a rage I threw open the door, and saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1959"></td>
        <td id="LC1959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without the three terrible women licking their lips. As I appeared they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1960"></td>
        <td id="LC1960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all joined in a horrible laugh, and ran away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1961"></td>
        <td id="LC1961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1962"></td>
        <td id="LC1962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I came back to my room and threw myself on my knees. It is then so near</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1963"></td>
        <td id="LC1963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the end? To-morrow! to-morrow! Lord, help me, and those to whom I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1964"></td>
        <td id="LC1964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1965"></td>
        <td id="LC1965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1966"></td>
        <td id="LC1966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1967"></td>
        <td id="LC1967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1968"></td>
        <td id="LC1968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_30 June, morning._--These may be the last words I ever write in this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1969"></td>
        <td id="LC1969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">diary. I slept till just before the dawn, and when I woke threw myself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1970"></td>
        <td id="LC1970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on my knees, for I determined that if Death came he should find me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1971"></td>
        <td id="LC1971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ready.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1972"></td>
        <td id="LC1972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1973"></td>
        <td id="LC1973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At last I felt that subtle change in the air, and knew that the morning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1974"></td>
        <td id="LC1974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had come. Then came the welcome cock-crow, and I felt that I was safe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1975"></td>
        <td id="LC1975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With a glad heart, I opened my door and ran down to the hall. I had seen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1976"></td>
        <td id="LC1976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the door was unlocked, and now escape was before me. With hands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1977"></td>
        <td id="LC1977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that trembled with eagerness, I unhooked the chains and drew back the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1978"></td>
        <td id="LC1978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">massive bolts.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1979"></td>
        <td id="LC1979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1980"></td>
        <td id="LC1980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the door would not move. Despair seized me. I pulled, and pulled, at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1981"></td>
        <td id="LC1981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the door, and shook it till, massive as it was, it rattled in its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1982"></td>
        <td id="LC1982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">casement. I could see the bolt shot. It had been locked after I left the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1983"></td>
        <td id="LC1983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Count.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1984"></td>
        <td id="LC1984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1985"></td>
        <td id="LC1985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then a wild desire took me to obtain that key at any risk, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1986"></td>
        <td id="LC1986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determined then and there to scale the wall again and gain the Count&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1987"></td>
        <td id="LC1987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room. He might kill me, but death now seemed the happier choice of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1988"></td>
        <td id="LC1988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evils. Without a pause I rushed up to the east window, and scrambled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1989"></td>
        <td id="LC1989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down the wall, as before, into the Count&#39;s room. It was empty, but that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1990"></td>
        <td id="LC1990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was as I expected. I could not see a key anywhere, but the heap of gold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1991"></td>
        <td id="LC1991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remained. I went through the door in the corner and down the winding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1992"></td>
        <td id="LC1992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stair and along the dark passage to the old chapel. I knew now well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1993"></td>
        <td id="LC1993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough where to find the monster I sought.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1994"></td>
        <td id="LC1994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1995"></td>
        <td id="LC1995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The great box was in the same place, close against the wall, but the lid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1996"></td>
        <td id="LC1996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was laid on it, not fastened down, but with the nails ready in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1997"></td>
        <td id="LC1997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">places to be hammered home. I knew I must reach the body for the key, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1998"></td>
        <td id="LC1998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I raised the lid, and laid it back against the wall; and then I saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1999"></td>
        <td id="LC1999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something which filled my very soul with horror. There lay the Count,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2000"></td>
        <td id="LC2000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but looking as if his youth had been half renewed, for the white hair</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2001"></td>
        <td id="LC2001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and moustache were changed to dark iron-grey; the cheeks were fuller,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2002"></td>
        <td id="LC2002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the white skin seemed ruby-red underneath; the mouth was redder than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2003"></td>
        <td id="LC2003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever, for on the lips were gouts of fresh blood, which trickled from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2004"></td>
        <td id="LC2004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corners of the mouth and ran over the chin and neck. Even the deep,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2005"></td>
        <td id="LC2005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burning eyes seemed set amongst swollen flesh, for the lids and pouches</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2006"></td>
        <td id="LC2006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">underneath were bloated. It seemed as if the whole awful creature were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2007"></td>
        <td id="LC2007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">simply gorged with blood. He lay like a filthy leech, exhausted with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2008"></td>
        <td id="LC2008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repletion. I shuddered as I bent over to touch him, and every sense in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2009"></td>
        <td id="LC2009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me revolted at the contact; but I had to search, or I was lost. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2010"></td>
        <td id="LC2010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming night might see my own body a banquet in a similar way to those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2011"></td>
        <td id="LC2011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horrid three. I felt all over the body, but no sign could I find of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2012"></td>
        <td id="LC2012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">key. Then I stopped and looked at the Count. There was a mocking smile</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2013"></td>
        <td id="LC2013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the bloated face which seemed to drive me mad. This was the being I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2014"></td>
        <td id="LC2014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was helping to transfer to London, where, perhaps, for centuries to come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2015"></td>
        <td id="LC2015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he might, amongst its teeming millions, satiate his lust for blood, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2016"></td>
        <td id="LC2016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">create a new and ever-widening circle of semi-demons to batten on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2017"></td>
        <td id="LC2017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">helpless. The very thought drove me mad. A terrible desire came upon me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2018"></td>
        <td id="LC2018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to rid the world of such a monster. There was no lethal weapon at hand,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2019"></td>
        <td id="LC2019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but I seized a shovel which the workmen had been using to fill the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2020"></td>
        <td id="LC2020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cases, and lifting it high, struck, with the edge downward, at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2021"></td>
        <td id="LC2021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hateful face. But as I did so the head turned, and the eyes fell full</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2022"></td>
        <td id="LC2022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon me, with all their blaze of basilisk horror. The sight seemed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2023"></td>
        <td id="LC2023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">paralyse me, and the shovel turned in my hand and glanced from the face,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2024"></td>
        <td id="LC2024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">merely making a deep gash above the forehead. The shovel fell from my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2025"></td>
        <td id="LC2025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand across the box, and as I pulled it away the flange of the blade</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2026"></td>
        <td id="LC2026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">caught the edge of the lid which fell over again, and hid the horrid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2027"></td>
        <td id="LC2027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing from my sight. The last glimpse I had was of the bloated face,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2028"></td>
        <td id="LC2028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blood-stained and fixed with a grin of malice which would have held its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2029"></td>
        <td id="LC2029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own in the nethermost hell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2030"></td>
        <td id="LC2030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2031"></td>
        <td id="LC2031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I thought and thought what should be my next move, but my brain seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2032"></td>
        <td id="LC2032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on fire, and I waited with a despairing feeling growing over me. As I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2033"></td>
        <td id="LC2033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waited I heard in the distance a gipsy song sung by merry voices coming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2034"></td>
        <td id="LC2034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">closer, and through their song the rolling of heavy wheels and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2035"></td>
        <td id="LC2035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cracking of whips; the Szgany and the Slovaks of whom the Count had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2036"></td>
        <td id="LC2036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoken were coming. With a last look around and at the box which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2037"></td>
        <td id="LC2037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contained the vile body, I ran from the place and gained the Count&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2038"></td>
        <td id="LC2038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room, determined to rush out at the moment the door should be opened.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2039"></td>
        <td id="LC2039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With strained ears, I listened, and heard downstairs the grinding of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2040"></td>
        <td id="LC2040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">key in the great lock and the falling back of the heavy door. There must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2041"></td>
        <td id="LC2041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been some other means of entry, or some one had a key for one of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2042"></td>
        <td id="LC2042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the locked doors. Then there came the sound of many feet tramping and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2043"></td>
        <td id="LC2043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dying away in some passage which sent up a clanging echo. I turned to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2044"></td>
        <td id="LC2044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">run down again towards the vault, where I might find the new entrance;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2045"></td>
        <td id="LC2045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but at the moment there seemed to come a violent puff of wind, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2046"></td>
        <td id="LC2046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door to the winding stair blew to with a shock that set the dust from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2047"></td>
        <td id="LC2047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lintels flying. When I ran to push it open, I found that it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2048"></td>
        <td id="LC2048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hopelessly fast. I was again a prisoner, and the net of doom was closing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2049"></td>
        <td id="LC2049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round me more closely.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2050"></td>
        <td id="LC2050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2051"></td>
        <td id="LC2051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As I write there is in the passage below a sound of many tramping feet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2052"></td>
        <td id="LC2052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the crash of weights being set down heavily, doubtless the boxes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2053"></td>
        <td id="LC2053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with their freight of earth. There is a sound of hammering; it is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2054"></td>
        <td id="LC2054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">box being nailed down. Now I can hear the heavy feet tramping again</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2055"></td>
        <td id="LC2055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along the hall, with many other idle feet coming behind them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2056"></td>
        <td id="LC2056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2057"></td>
        <td id="LC2057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The door is shut, and the chains rattle; there is a grinding of the key</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2058"></td>
        <td id="LC2058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the lock; I can hear the key withdraw: then another door opens and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2059"></td>
        <td id="LC2059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shuts; I hear the creaking of lock and bolt.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2060"></td>
        <td id="LC2060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2061"></td>
        <td id="LC2061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hark! in the courtyard and down the rocky way the roll of heavy wheels,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2062"></td>
        <td id="LC2062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the crack of whips, and the chorus of the Szgany as they pass into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2063"></td>
        <td id="LC2063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2064"></td>
        <td id="LC2064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2065"></td>
        <td id="LC2065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am alone in the castle with those awful women. Faugh! Mina is a woman,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2066"></td>
        <td id="LC2066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and there is nought in common. They are devils of the Pit!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2067"></td>
        <td id="LC2067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2068"></td>
        <td id="LC2068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall not remain alone with them; I shall try to scale the castle wall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2069"></td>
        <td id="LC2069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">farther than I have yet attempted. I shall take some of the gold with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2070"></td>
        <td id="LC2070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, lest I want it later. I may find a way from this dreadful place.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2071"></td>
        <td id="LC2071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2072"></td>
        <td id="LC2072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And then away for home! away to the quickest and nearest train! away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2073"></td>
        <td id="LC2073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from this cursed spot, from this cursed land, where the devil and his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2074"></td>
        <td id="LC2074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children still walk with earthly feet!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2075"></td>
        <td id="LC2075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2076"></td>
        <td id="LC2076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At least God&#39;s mercy is better than that of these monsters, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2077"></td>
        <td id="LC2077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">precipice is steep and high. At its foot a man may sleep--as a man.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2078"></td>
        <td id="LC2078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Good-bye, all! Mina!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2079"></td>
        <td id="LC2079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2080"></td>
        <td id="LC2080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2081"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2082"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2083"></td>
        <td id="LC2083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER V</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2084"></td>
        <td id="LC2084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2085"></td>
        <td id="LC2085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter from Miss Mina Murray to Miss Lucy Westenra._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2086"></td>
        <td id="LC2086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2087"></td>
        <td id="LC2087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2088"></td>
        <td id="LC2088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_9 May._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2089"></td>
        <td id="LC2089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2090"></td>
        <td id="LC2090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dearest Lucy,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2091"></td>
        <td id="LC2091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2092"></td>
        <td id="LC2092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Forgive my long delay in writing, but I have been simply overwhelmed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2093"></td>
        <td id="LC2093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with work. The life of an assistant schoolmistress is sometimes trying.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2094"></td>
        <td id="LC2094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am longing to be with you, and by the sea, where we can talk together</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2095"></td>
        <td id="LC2095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freely and build our castles in the air. I have been working very hard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2096"></td>
        <td id="LC2096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lately, because I want to keep up with Jonathan&#39;s studies, and I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2097"></td>
        <td id="LC2097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been practising shorthand very assiduously. When we are married I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2098"></td>
        <td id="LC2098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be able to be useful to Jonathan, and if I can stenograph well enough I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2099"></td>
        <td id="LC2099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can take down what he wants to say in this way and write it out for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2100"></td>
        <td id="LC2100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him on the typewriter, at which also I am practising very hard. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2101"></td>
        <td id="LC2101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I sometimes write letters in shorthand, and he is keeping a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2102"></td>
        <td id="LC2102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stenographic journal of his travels abroad. When I am with you I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2103"></td>
        <td id="LC2103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall keep a diary in the same way. I don&#39;t mean one of those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2104"></td>
        <td id="LC2104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two-pages-to-the-week-with-Sunday-squeezed-in-a-corner diaries, but a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2105"></td>
        <td id="LC2105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sort of journal which I can write in whenever I feel inclined. I do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2106"></td>
        <td id="LC2106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suppose there will be much of interest to other people; but it is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2107"></td>
        <td id="LC2107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intended for them. I may show it to Jonathan some day if there is in it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2108"></td>
        <td id="LC2108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything worth sharing, but it is really an exercise book. I shall try</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2109"></td>
        <td id="LC2109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do what I see lady journalists do: interviewing and writing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2110"></td>
        <td id="LC2110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">descriptions and trying to remember conversations. I am told that, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2111"></td>
        <td id="LC2111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a little practice, one can remember all that goes on or that one hears</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2112"></td>
        <td id="LC2112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said during a day. However, we shall see. I will tell you of my little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2113"></td>
        <td id="LC2113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plans when we meet. I have just had a few hurried lines from Jonathan</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2114"></td>
        <td id="LC2114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from Transylvania. He is well, and will be returning in about a week. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2115"></td>
        <td id="LC2115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am longing to hear all his news. It must be so nice to see strange</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2116"></td>
        <td id="LC2116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countries. I wonder if we--I mean Jonathan and I--shall ever see them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2117"></td>
        <td id="LC2117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together. There is the ten o&#39;clock bell ringing. Good-bye.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2118"></td>
        <td id="LC2118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2119"></td>
        <td id="LC2119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Your loving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2120"></td>
        <td id="LC2120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2121"></td>
        <td id="LC2121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;MINA.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2122"></td>
        <td id="LC2122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2123"></td>
        <td id="LC2123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Tell me all the news when you write. You have not told me anything for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2124"></td>
        <td id="LC2124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a long time. I hear rumours, and especially of a tall, handsome,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2125"></td>
        <td id="LC2125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curly-haired man???&quot;</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2127"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2128"></td>
        <td id="LC2128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Lucy Westenra to Mina Murray_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2129"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2131"></td>
        <td id="LC2131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2132"></td>
        <td id="LC2132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_Wednesday_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2133"></td>
        <td id="LC2133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2134"></td>
        <td id="LC2134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dearest Mina,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2135"></td>
        <td id="LC2135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2136"></td>
        <td id="LC2136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I must say you tax me _very_ unfairly with being a bad correspondent. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2137"></td>
        <td id="LC2137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrote to you _twice_ since we parted, and your last letter was only your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2138"></td>
        <td id="LC2138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_second_. Besides, I have nothing to tell you. There is really nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2139"></td>
        <td id="LC2139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to interest you. Town is very pleasant just now, and we go a good deal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2140"></td>
        <td id="LC2140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to picture-galleries and for walks and rides in the park. As to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2141"></td>
        <td id="LC2141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tall, curly-haired man, I suppose it was the one who was with me at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2142"></td>
        <td id="LC2142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last Pop. Some one has evidently been telling tales. That was Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2143"></td>
        <td id="LC2143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmwood. He often comes to see us, and he and mamma get on very well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2144"></td>
        <td id="LC2144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together; they have so many things to talk about in common. We met some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2145"></td>
        <td id="LC2145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time ago a man that would just _do for you_, if you were not already</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2146"></td>
        <td id="LC2146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engaged to Jonathan. He is an excellent _parti_, being handsome, well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2147"></td>
        <td id="LC2147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off, and of good birth. He is a doctor and really clever. Just fancy! He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2148"></td>
        <td id="LC2148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is only nine-and-twenty, and he has an immense lunatic asylum all under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2149"></td>
        <td id="LC2149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his own care. Mr. Holmwood introduced him to me, and he called here to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2150"></td>
        <td id="LC2150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see us, and often comes now. I think he is one of the most resolute men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2151"></td>
        <td id="LC2151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I ever saw, and yet the most calm. He seems absolutely imperturbable. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2152"></td>
        <td id="LC2152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can fancy what a wonderful power he must have over his patients. He has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2153"></td>
        <td id="LC2153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a curious habit of looking one straight in the face, as if trying to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2154"></td>
        <td id="LC2154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">read one&#39;s thoughts. He tries this on very much with me, but I flatter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2155"></td>
        <td id="LC2155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself he has got a tough nut to crack. I know that from my glass. Do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2156"></td>
        <td id="LC2156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you ever try to read your own face? _I do_, and I can tell you it is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2157"></td>
        <td id="LC2157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a bad study, and gives you more trouble than you can well fancy if you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2158"></td>
        <td id="LC2158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have never tried it. He says that I afford him a curious psychological</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2159"></td>
        <td id="LC2159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">study, and I humbly think I do. I do not, as you know, take sufficient</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2160"></td>
        <td id="LC2160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest in dress to be able to describe the new fashions. Dress is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2161"></td>
        <td id="LC2161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bore. That is slang again, but never mind; Arthur says that every day.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2162"></td>
        <td id="LC2162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There, it is all out. Mina, we have told all our secrets to each other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2163"></td>
        <td id="LC2163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since we were _children_; we have slept together and eaten together, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2164"></td>
        <td id="LC2164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughed and cried together; and now, though I have spoken, I would like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2165"></td>
        <td id="LC2165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to speak more. Oh, Mina, couldn&#39;t you guess? I love him. I am blushing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2166"></td>
        <td id="LC2166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as I write, for although I _think_ he loves me, he has not told me so in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2167"></td>
        <td id="LC2167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words. But oh, Mina, I love him; I love him; I love him! There, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2168"></td>
        <td id="LC2168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">does me good. I wish I were with you, dear, sitting by the fire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2169"></td>
        <td id="LC2169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">undressing, as we used to sit; and I would try to tell you what I feel.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2170"></td>
        <td id="LC2170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not know how I am writing this even to you. I am afraid to stop,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2171"></td>
        <td id="LC2171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or I should tear up the letter, and I don&#39;t want to stop, for I _do_ so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2172"></td>
        <td id="LC2172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">want to tell you all. Let me hear from you _at once_, and tell me all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2173"></td>
        <td id="LC2173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that you think about it. Mina, I must stop. Good-night. Bless me in your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2174"></td>
        <td id="LC2174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prayers; and, Mina, pray for my happiness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2175"></td>
        <td id="LC2175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2176"></td>
        <td id="LC2176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;LUCY.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2177"></td>
        <td id="LC2177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2178"></td>
        <td id="LC2178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;P.S.--I need not tell you this is a secret. Good-night again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2179"></td>
        <td id="LC2179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2180"></td>
        <td id="LC2180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;L.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2181"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2182"></td>
        <td id="LC2182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Lucy Westenra to Mina Murray_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2183"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2184"></td>
        <td id="LC2184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_24 May_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2185"></td>
        <td id="LC2185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2186"></td>
        <td id="LC2186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dearest Mina,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2187"></td>
        <td id="LC2187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2188"></td>
        <td id="LC2188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Thanks, and thanks, and thanks again for your sweet letter. It was so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2189"></td>
        <td id="LC2189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nice to be able to tell you and to have your sympathy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2190"></td>
        <td id="LC2190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2191"></td>
        <td id="LC2191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear, it never rains but it pours. How true the old proverbs are.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2192"></td>
        <td id="LC2192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here am I, who shall be twenty in September, and yet I never had a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2193"></td>
        <td id="LC2193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proposal till to-day, not a real proposal, and to-day I have had three.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2194"></td>
        <td id="LC2194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just fancy! THREE proposals in one day! Isn&#39;t it awful! I feel sorry,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2195"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2373"></td>

        <td id="L2377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2377"></td>
        <td id="LC2377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morbidly excitable; periods of gloom, ending in some fixed idea which I</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2378"></td>

        <td id="L2379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2379"></td>
        <td id="LC2379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disturbing influence end in a mentally-accomplished finish; a possibly</td>

        <td id="L2380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2380"></td>
        <td id="LC2380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dangerous man, probably dangerous if unselfish. In selfish men caution</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2381"></td>
        <td id="LC2381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is as secure an armour for their foes as for themselves. What I think of</td>

        <td id="L2382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2382"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We&#39;ve told yarns by the camp-fire in the prairies; and dressed one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2395"></td>
        <td id="LC2395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another&#39;s wounds after trying a landing at the Marquesas; and drunk</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2396"></td>
        <td id="LC2396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">healths on the shore of Titicaca. There are more yarns to be told, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2397"></td>
        <td id="LC2397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other wounds to be healed, and another health to be drunk. Won&#39;t you let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2398"></td>
        <td id="LC2398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this be at my camp-fire to-morrow night? I have no hesitation in asking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2399"></td>
        <td id="LC2399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, as I know a certain lady is engaged to a certain dinner-party, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2400"></td>
        <td id="LC2400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that you are free. There will only be one other, our old pal at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2401"></td>
        <td id="LC2401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Korea, Jack Seward. He&#39;s coming, too, and we both want to mingle our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2402"></td>
        <td id="LC2402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weeps over the wine-cup, and to drink a health with all our hearts to</td>

        <td id="L2403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2403"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L2428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2428"></td>
        <td id="LC2428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">MINA MURRAY&#39;S JOURNAL</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2429"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2430"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2431"></td>
        <td id="LC2431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_24 July. Whitby._--Lucy met me at the station, looking sweeter and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2432"></td>
        <td id="LC2432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lovelier than ever, and we drove up to the house at the Crescent in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2433"></td>
        <td id="LC2433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which they have rooms. This is a lovely place. The little river, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2434"></td>
        <td id="LC2434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Esk, runs through a deep valley, which broadens out as it comes near the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2435"></td>
        <td id="LC2435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harbour. A great viaduct runs across, with high piers, through which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2436"></td>
        <td id="LC2436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">view seems somehow further away than it really is. The valley is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2437"></td>
        <td id="LC2437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beautifully green, and it is so steep that when you are on the high land</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2438"></td>
        <td id="LC2438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on either side you look right across it, unless you are near enough to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2439"></td>
        <td id="LC2439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see down. The houses of the old town--the side away from us--are all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2440"></td>
        <td id="LC2440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">red-roofed, and seem piled up one over the other anyhow, like the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2441"></td>
        <td id="LC2441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pictures we see of Nuremberg. Right over the town is the ruin of Whitby</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2442"></td>
        <td id="LC2442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Abbey, which was sacked by the Danes, and which is the scene of part of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2443"></td>
        <td id="LC2443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Marmion,&quot; where the girl was built up in the wall. It is a most noble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2444"></td>
        <td id="LC2444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ruin, of immense size, and full of beautiful and romantic bits; there is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2445"></td>
        <td id="LC2445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a legend that a white lady is seen in one of the windows. Between it and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2446"></td>
        <td id="LC2446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the town there is another church, the parish one, round which is a big</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2447"></td>
        <td id="LC2447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">graveyard, all full of tombstones. This is to my mind the nicest spot in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2448"></td>
        <td id="LC2448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whitby, for it lies right over the town, and has a full view of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2449"></td>
        <td id="LC2449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harbour and all up the bay to where the headland called Kettleness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2450"></td>
        <td id="LC2450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stretches out into the sea. It descends so steeply over the harbour that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2451"></td>
        <td id="LC2451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part of the bank has fallen away, and some of the graves have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2452"></td>
        <td id="LC2452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destroyed. In one place part of the stonework of the graves stretches</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2453"></td>
        <td id="LC2453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out over the sandy pathway far below. There are walks, with seats beside</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2454"></td>
        <td id="LC2454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, through the churchyard; and people go and sit there all day long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2455"></td>
        <td id="LC2455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking at the beautiful view and enjoying the breeze. I shall come and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2456"></td>
        <td id="LC2456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sit here very often myself and work. Indeed, I am writing now, with my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2457"></td>
        <td id="LC2457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">book on my knee, and listening to the talk of three old men who are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2458"></td>
        <td id="LC2458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sitting beside me. They seem to do nothing all day but sit up here and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2459"></td>
        <td id="LC2459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talk.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2460"></td>
        <td id="LC2460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2461"></td>
        <td id="LC2461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The harbour lies below me, with, on the far side, one long granite wall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2462"></td>
        <td id="LC2462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stretching out into the sea, with a curve outwards at the end of it, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2463"></td>
        <td id="LC2463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the middle of which is a lighthouse. A heavy sea-wall runs along outside</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2464"></td>
        <td id="LC2464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it. On the near side, the sea-wall makes an elbow crooked inversely,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2465"></td>
        <td id="LC2465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and its end too has a lighthouse. Between the two piers there is a</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2729"></td>
        <td id="LC2729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_19 July._--We are progressing. My friend has now a whole colony of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2730"></td>
        <td id="LC2730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sparrows, and his flies and spiders are almost obliterated. When I came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2731"></td>
        <td id="LC2731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in he ran to me and said he wanted to ask me a great favour--a very,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2732"></td>
        <td id="LC2732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very great favour; and as he spoke he fawned on me like a dog. I asked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2733"></td>
        <td id="LC2733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him what it was, and he said, with a sort of rapture in his voice and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2734"></td>
        <td id="LC2734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bearing:--</td>

</td>
