        <td id="L2822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2822"></td>
        <td id="LC2822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_26 July._--I am anxious, and it soothes me to express myself here; it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2823"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2824"></td>
        <td id="LC2824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is also something about the shorthand symbols that makes it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2825"></td>
        <td id="LC2825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">different from writing. I am unhappy about Lucy and about Jonathan. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2826"></td>
        <td id="LC2826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had not heard from Jonathan for some time, and was very concerned; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2827"></td>
        <td id="LC2827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yesterday dear Mr. Hawkins, who is always so kind, sent me a letter from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2828"></td>
        <td id="LC2828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. I had written asking him if he had heard, and he said the enclosed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2829"></td>
        <td id="LC2829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had just been received. It is only a line dated from Castle Dracula,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2830"></td>
        <td id="LC2830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and says that he is just starting for home. That is not like Jonathan;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2831"></td>
        <td id="LC2831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do not understand it, and it makes me uneasy. Then, too, Lucy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2832"></td>
        <td id="LC2832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">although she is so well, has lately taken to her old habit of walking in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2833"></td>
        <td id="LC2833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her sleep. Her mother has spoken to me about it, and we have decided</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2834"></td>
        <td id="LC2834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I am to lock the door of our room every night. Mrs. Westenra has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2835"></td>
        <td id="LC2835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got an idea that sleep-walkers always go out on roofs of houses and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2836"></td>
        <td id="LC2836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along the edges of cliffs and then get suddenly wakened and fall over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2837"></td>
        <td id="LC2837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a despairing cry that echoes all over the place. Poor dear, she is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2838"></td>
        <td id="LC2838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">naturally anxious about Lucy, and she tells me that her husband, Lucy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2839"></td>
        <td id="LC2839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father, had the same habit; that he would get up in the night and dress</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2840"></td>
        <td id="LC2840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself and go out, if he were not stopped. Lucy is to be married in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2841"></td>
        <td id="LC2841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">autumn, and she is already planning out her dresses and how her house is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2842"></td>
        <td id="LC2842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be arranged. I sympathise with her, for I do the same, only Jonathan</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2843"></td>
        <td id="LC2843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I will start in life in a very simple way, and shall have to try to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2844"></td>
        <td id="LC2844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make both ends meet. Mr. Holmwood--he is the Hon. Arthur Holmwood, only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2845"></td>
        <td id="LC2845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">son of Lord Godalming--is coming up here very shortly--as soon as he can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2846"></td>
        <td id="LC2846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leave town, for his father is not very well, and I think dear Lucy is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2847"></td>
        <td id="LC2847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">counting the moments till he comes. She wants to take him up to the seat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2848"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2850"></td>
        <td id="LC2850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrives.</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2885"></td>

        <td id="L2886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2886"></td>
        <td id="LC2886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hidden in thick clouds, high over Kettleness. Everything is grey--except</td>

        <td id="L2887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2887"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2890"></td>
        <td id="LC2890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is tumbling in over the shallows and the sandy flats with a roar,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2891"></td>
        <td id="LC2891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">muffled in the sea-mists drifting inland. The horizon is lost in a grey</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2894"></td>

        <td id="L2897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2897"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2900"></td>
        <td id="LC2900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2901"></td>
        <td id="LC2901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have been quite touched by the change in the poor old man. When he sat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2902"></td>
        <td id="LC2902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down beside me, he said in a very gentle way:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2903"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2904"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2905"></td>
        <td id="LC2905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so I took his poor old wrinkled hand in mine and asked him to speak</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2906"></td>
        <td id="LC2906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fully; so he said, leaving his hand in mine:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2907"></td>
        <td id="LC2907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2908"></td>
        <td id="LC2908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;m afraid, my deary, that I must have shocked you by all the wicked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2909"></td>
        <td id="LC2909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things I&#39;ve been sayin&#39; about the dead, and such like, for weeks past;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2910"></td>
        <td id="LC2910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but I didn&#39;t mean them, and I want ye to remember that when I&#39;m gone. We</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2911"></td>
        <td id="LC2911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aud folks that be daffled, and with one foot abaft the krok-hooal, don&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2912"></td>
        <td id="LC2912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">altogether like to think of it, and we don&#39;t want to feel scart of it;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2913"></td>
        <td id="LC2913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an&#39; that&#39;s why I&#39;ve took to makin&#39; light of it, so that I&#39;d cheer up my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2914"></td>
        <td id="LC2914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own heart a bit. But, Lord love ye, miss, I ain&#39;t afraid of dyin&#39;, not a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2915"></td>
        <td id="LC2915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bit; only I don&#39;t want to die if I can help it. My time must be nigh at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2916"></td>
        <td id="LC2916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand now, for I be aud, and a hundred years is too much for any man to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2917"></td>
        <td id="LC2917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expect; and I&#39;m so nigh it that the Aud Man is already whettin&#39; his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2918"></td>
        <td id="LC2918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scythe. Ye see, I can&#39;t get out o&#39; the habit of caffin&#39; about it all at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2919"></td>
        <td id="LC2919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once; the chafts will wag as they be used to. Some day soon the Angel of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2920"></td>
        <td id="LC2920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Death will sound his trumpet for me. But don&#39;t ye dooal an&#39; greet, my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2921"></td>
        <td id="LC2921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deary!&quot;--for he saw that I was crying--&quot;if he should come this very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2922"></td>
        <td id="LC2922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night I&#39;d not refuse to answer his call. For life be, after all, only a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2923"></td>
        <td id="LC2923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waitin&#39; for somethin&#39; else than what we&#39;re doin&#39;; and death be all that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2924"></td>
        <td id="LC2924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we can rightly depend on. But I&#39;m content, for it&#39;s comin&#39; to me, my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2925"></td>
        <td id="LC2925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deary, and comin&#39; quick. It may be comin&#39; while we be lookin&#39; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2926"></td>
        <td id="LC2926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonderin&#39;. Maybe it&#39;s in that wind out over the sea that&#39;s bringin&#39; with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2927"></td>
        <td id="LC2927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it loss and wreck, and sore distress, and sad hearts. Look! look!&quot; he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2928"></td>
        <td id="LC2928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cried suddenly. &quot;There&#39;s something in that wind and in the hoast beyont</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2929"></td>
        <td id="LC2929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that sounds, and looks, and tastes, and smells like death. It&#39;s in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2930"></td>
        <td id="LC2930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">air; I feel it comin&#39;. Lord, make me answer cheerful when my call</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2931"></td>
        <td id="LC2931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comes!&quot; He held up his arms devoutly, and raised his hat. His mouth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2932"></td>
        <td id="LC2932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moved as though he were praying. After a few minutes&#39; silence, he got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2933"></td>

        <td id="L2934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2934"></td>
        <td id="LC2934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off. It all touched me, and upset me very much.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2935"></td>
        <td id="LC2935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2936"></td>
        <td id="LC2936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was glad when the coastguard came along, with his spy-glass under his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2937"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2938"></td>
        <td id="LC2938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kept looking at a strange ship.</td>

        <td id="L2939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2939"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2940"></td>
        <td id="LC2940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I can&#39;t make her out,&quot; he said; &quot;she&#39;s a Russian, by the look of her;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2941"></td>
        <td id="LC2941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but she&#39;s knocking about in the queerest way. She doesn&#39;t know her mind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steered mighty strangely, for she doesn&#39;t mind the hand on the wheel;</td>

        <td id="L2945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2945"></td>
        <td id="LC2945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">changes about with every puff of wind. We&#39;ll hear more of her before</td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2960"></td>
        <td id="LC2960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Whitby_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2961"></td>
        <td id="LC2961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2962"></td>
        <td id="LC2962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One of the greatest and suddenest storms on record has just been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2963"></td>
        <td id="LC2963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experienced here, with results both strange and unique. The weather had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2964"></td>
        <td id="LC2964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been somewhat sultry, but not to any degree uncommon in the month of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2965"></td>
        <td id="LC2965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">August. Saturday evening was as fine as was ever known, and the great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2966"></td>
        <td id="LC2966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body of holiday-makers laid out yesterday for visits to Mulgrave Woods,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2967"></td>
        <td id="LC2967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Robin Hood&#39;s Bay, Rig Mill, Runswick, Staithes, and the various trips in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2968"></td>
        <td id="LC2968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the neighbourhood of Whitby. The steamers _Emma_ and _Scarborough_ made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2969"></td>
        <td id="LC2969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trips up and down the coast, and there was an unusual amount of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2970"></td>
        <td id="LC2970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;tripping&quot; both to and from Whitby. The day was unusually fine till the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2971"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2972"></td>
        <td id="LC2972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">churchyard, and from that commanding eminence watch the wide sweep of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2973"></td>
        <td id="LC2973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sea visible to the north and east, called attention to a sudden show of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2974"></td>
        <td id="LC2974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;mares&#39;-tails&quot; high in the sky to the north-west. The wind was then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2975"></td>
        <td id="LC2975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blowing from the south-west in the mild degree which in barometrical</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2976"></td>
        <td id="LC2976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">language is ranked &quot;No. 2: light breeze.&quot; The coastguard on duty at once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2977"></td>
        <td id="LC2977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made report, and one old fisherman, who for more than half a century has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2978"></td>
        <td id="LC2978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kept watch on weather signs from the East Cliff, foretold in an emphatic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2979"></td>
        <td id="LC2979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner the coming of a sudden storm. The approach of sunset was so very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2980"></td>
        <td id="LC2980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beautiful, so grand in its masses of splendidly-coloured clouds, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2981"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2983"></td>
        <td id="LC2983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mass of Kettleness, standing boldly athwart the western sky, its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2984"></td>
        <td id="LC2984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">downward way was marked by myriad clouds of every sunset-colour--flame,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2985"></td>
        <td id="LC2985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purple, pink, green, violet, and all the tints of gold; with here and</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2987"></td>
        <td id="LC2987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sorts of shapes, as well outlined as colossal silhouettes. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2988"></td>
        <td id="LC2988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experience was not lost on the painters, and doubtless some of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2989"></td>
        <td id="LC2989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sketches of the &quot;Prelude to the Great Storm&quot; will grace the R. A. and R.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2990"></td>
        <td id="LC2990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I. walls in May next. More than one captain made up his mind then and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2991"></td>
        <td id="LC2991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there that his &quot;cobble&quot; or his &quot;mule,&quot; as they term the different</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2992"></td>
        <td id="LC2992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">classes of boats, would remain in the harbour till the storm had passed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2993"></td>
        <td id="LC2993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wind fell away entirely during the evening, and at midnight there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2994"></td>
        <td id="LC2994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a dead calm, a sultry heat, and that prevailing intensity which, on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2995"></td>
        <td id="LC2995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the approach of thunder, affects persons of a sensitive nature. There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2996"></td>
        <td id="LC2996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were but few lights in sight at sea, for even the coasting steamers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2997"></td>
        <td id="LC2997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which usually &quot;hug&quot; the shore so closely, kept well to seaward, and but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2998"></td>
        <td id="LC2998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">few fishing-boats were in sight. The only sail noticeable was a foreign</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2999"></td>
        <td id="LC2999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">schooner with all sails set, which was seemingly going westwards. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3000"></td>
        <td id="LC3000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foolhardiness or ignorance of her officers was a prolific theme for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3001"></td>
        <td id="LC3001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comment whilst she remained in sight, and efforts were made to signal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3002"></td>
        <td id="LC3002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her to reduce sail in face of her danger. Before the night shut down she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3003"></td>
        <td id="LC3003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was seen with sails idly flapping as she gently rolled on the undulating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3004"></td>
        <td id="LC3004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swell of the sea,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3005"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3091"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3186"></td>
        <td id="LC3186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3187"></td>
        <td id="LC3187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--By the kindness of the Board of Trade inspector, I have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3188"></td>
        <td id="LC3188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">permitted to look over the log-book of the _Demeter_, which was in order</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3189"></td>
        <td id="LC3189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up to within three days, but contained nothing of special interest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3190"></td>
        <td id="LC3190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">except as to facts of missing men. The greatest interest, however, is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3191"></td>
        <td id="LC3191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with regard to the paper found in the bottle, which was to-day produced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3192"></td>
        <td id="LC3192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the inquest; and a more strange narrative than the two between them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3193"></td>
        <td id="LC3193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unfold it has not been my lot to come across. As there is no motive for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3194"></td>
        <td id="LC3194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concealment, I am permitted to use them, and accordingly send you a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3195"></td>
        <td id="LC3195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rescript, simply omitting technical details of seamanship and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3196"></td>
        <td id="LC3196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supercargo. It almost seems as though the captain had been seized with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3197"></td>
        <td id="LC3197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some kind of mania before he had got well into blue water, and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3198"></td>
        <td id="LC3198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this had developed persistently throughout the voyage. Of course my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3199"></td>
        <td id="LC3199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">statement must be taken _cum grano_, since I am writing from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3200"></td>
        <td id="LC3200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dictation of a clerk of the Russian consul, who kindly translated for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3201"></td>
        <td id="LC3201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, time being short.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3202"></td>
        <td id="LC3202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3203"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3209"></td>
        <td id="LC3209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accurate note henceforth till we land._</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3210"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3213"></td>
        <td id="LC3213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On 6 July we finished taking in cargo, silver sand and boxes of earth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3214"></td>
        <td id="LC3214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At noon set sail. East wind, fresh. Crew, five hands ... two mates,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3215"></td>
        <td id="LC3215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cook, and myself (captain).</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3219"></td>
        <td id="LC3219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On 11 July at dawn entered Bosphorus. Boarded by Turkish Customs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3220"></td>
        <td id="LC3220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">officers. Backsheesh. All correct. Under way at 4 p. m.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3221"></td>
        <td id="LC3221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3224"></td>
        <td id="LC3224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On 12 July through Dardanelles. More Customs officers and flagboat of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3225"></td>
        <td id="LC3225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guarding squadron. Backsheesh again. Work of officers thorough, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3226"></td>
        <td id="LC3226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quick. Want us off soon. At dark passed into Archipelago.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3227"></td>
        <td id="LC3227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L3229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3229"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3230"></td>
        <td id="LC3230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On 13 July passed Cape Matapan. Crew dissatisfied about something.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3231"></td>
        <td id="LC3231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Seemed scared, but would not speak out.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3232"></td>
        <td id="LC3232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3233"></td>
        <td id="LC3233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3234"></td>
        <td id="LC3234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3235"></td>
        <td id="LC3235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On 14 July was somewhat anxious about crew. Men all steady fellows, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3236"></td>
        <td id="LC3236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sailed with me before. Mate could not make out what was wrong; they only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3237"></td>
        <td id="LC3237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told him there was _something_, and crossed themselves. Mate lost temper</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3238"></td>
        <td id="LC3238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with one of them that day and struck him. Expected fierce quarrel, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3239"></td>
        <td id="LC3239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all was quiet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3240"></td>
        <td id="LC3240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3241"></td>
        <td id="LC3241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3242"></td>
        <td id="LC3242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3243"></td>
        <td id="LC3243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On 16 July mate reported in the morning that one of crew, Petrofsky, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3244"></td>
        <td id="LC3244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">missing. Could not account for it. Took larboard watch eight bells last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3245"></td>
        <td id="LC3245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night; was relieved by Abramoff, but did not go to bunk. Men more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3246"></td>
        <td id="LC3246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">downcast than ever. All said they expected something of the kind, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3247"></td>
        <td id="LC3247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would not say more than there was _something_ aboard. Mate getting very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3248"></td>
        <td id="LC3248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impatient with them; feared some trouble ahead.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3249"></td>
        <td id="LC3249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3250"></td>
        <td id="LC3250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3251"></td>
        <td id="LC3251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3252"></td>
        <td id="LC3252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On 17 July, yesterday, one of the men, Olgaren, came to my cabin, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3253"></td>
        <td id="LC3253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an awestruck way confided to me that he thought there was a strange man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3254"></td>
        <td id="LC3254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aboard the ship. He said that in his watch he had been sheltering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3255"></td>
        <td id="LC3255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind the deck-house, as there was a rain-storm, when he saw a tall,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3256"></td>
        <td id="LC3256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thin man, who was not like any of the crew, come up the companion-way,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3257"></td>
        <td id="LC3257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and go along the deck forward, and disappear. He followed cautiously,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3258"></td>
        <td id="LC3258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but when he got to bows found no one, and the hatchways were all closed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3259"></td>
        <td id="LC3259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was in a panic of superstitious fear, and I am afraid the panic may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3260"></td>
        <td id="LC3260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spread. To allay it, I shall to-day search entire ship carefully from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3261"></td>
        <td id="LC3261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stem to stern.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3262"></td>
        <td id="LC3262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3263"></td>
        <td id="LC3263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3264"></td>
        <td id="LC3264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3265"></td>
        <td id="LC3265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Later in the day I got together the whole crew, and told them, as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3266"></td>
        <td id="LC3266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidently thought there was some one in the ship, we would search from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3267"></td>
        <td id="LC3267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stem to stern. First mate angry; said it was folly, and to yield to such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3268"></td>
        <td id="LC3268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foolish ideas would demoralise the men; said he would engage to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3269"></td>
        <td id="LC3269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them out of trouble with a handspike. I let him take the helm, while the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3270"></td>
        <td id="LC3270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest began thorough search, all keeping abreast, with lanterns: we left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3271"></td>
        <td id="LC3271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no corner unsearched. As there were only the big wooden boxes, there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3272"></td>
        <td id="LC3272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were no odd corners where a man could hide. Men much relieved when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3273"></td>
        <td id="LC3273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">search over, and went back to work cheerfully. First mate scowled, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3274"></td>
        <td id="LC3274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said nothing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3275"></td>
        <td id="LC3275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3276"></td>
        <td id="LC3276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3277"></td>
        <td id="LC3277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3278"></td>
        <td id="LC3278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_22 July_.--Rough weather last three days, and all hands busy with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3279"></td>
        <td id="LC3279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sails--no time to be frightened. Men seem to have forgotten their dread.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3280"></td>
        <td id="LC3280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mate cheerful again, and all on good terms. Praised men for work in bad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3281"></td>
        <td id="LC3281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weather. Passed Gibralter and out through Straits. All well.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3282"></td>
        <td id="LC3282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3283"></td>
        <td id="LC3283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3284"></td>
        <td id="LC3284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3285"></td>
        <td id="LC3285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_24 July_.--There seems some doom over this ship. Already a hand short,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3286"></td>
        <td id="LC3286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and entering on the Bay of Biscay with wild weather ahead, and yet last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3287"></td>
        <td id="LC3287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night another man lost--disappeared. Like the first, he came off his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3288"></td>
        <td id="LC3288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watch and was not seen again. Men all in a panic of fear; sent a round</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3289"></td>
        <td id="LC3289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">robin, asking to have double watch, as they fear to be alone. Mate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3290"></td>
        <td id="LC3290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">angry. Fear there will be some trouble, as either he or the men will do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3291"></td>
        <td id="LC3291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some violence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3292"></td>
        <td id="LC3292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3293"></td>
        <td id="LC3293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3294"></td>
        <td id="LC3294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3295"></td>
        <td id="LC3295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_28 July_.--Four days in hell, knocking about in a sort of maelstrom,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3296"></td>
        <td id="LC3296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the wind a tempest. No sleep for any one. Men all worn out. Hardly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3297"></td>
        <td id="LC3297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know how to set a watch, since no one fit to go on. Second mate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3298"></td>
        <td id="LC3298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">volunteered to steer and watch, and let men snatch a few hours&#39; sleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3299"></td>
        <td id="LC3299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wind abating; seas still terrific, but feel them less, as ship is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3300"></td>
        <td id="LC3300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steadier.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3301"></td>
        <td id="LC3301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3302"></td>
        <td id="LC3302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3303"></td>
        <td id="LC3303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3304"></td>
        <td id="LC3304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_29 July_.--Another tragedy. Had single watch to-night, as crew too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3305"></td>
        <td id="LC3305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tired to double. When morning watch came on deck could find no one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3306"></td>
        <td id="LC3306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">except steersman. Raised outcry, and all came on deck. Thorough search,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3307"></td>
        <td id="LC3307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but no one found. Are now without second mate, and crew in a panic. Mate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3308"></td>
        <td id="LC3308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I agreed to go armed henceforth and wait for any sign of cause.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3309"></td>
        <td id="LC3309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3310"></td>
        <td id="LC3310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3311"></td>
        <td id="LC3311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3312"></td>
        <td id="LC3312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_30 July_.--Last night. Rejoiced we are nearing England. Weather fine,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3313"></td>
        <td id="LC3313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all sails set. Retired worn out; slept soundly; awaked by mate telling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3314"></td>
        <td id="LC3314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me that both man of watch and steersman missing. Only self and mate and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3315"></td>
        <td id="LC3315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two hands left to work ship.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3316"></td>
        <td id="LC3316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3317"></td>
        <td id="LC3317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3318"></td>
        <td id="LC3318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3319"></td>
        <td id="LC3319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_1 August_.--Two days of fog, and not a sail sighted. Had hoped when in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3320"></td>
        <td id="LC3320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the English Channel to be able to signal for help or get in somewhere.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3321"></td>
        <td id="LC3321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Not having power to work sails, have to run before wind. Dare not lower,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3322"></td>
        <td id="LC3322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as could not raise them again. We seem to be drifting to some terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3323"></td>
        <td id="LC3323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doom. Mate now more demoralised than either of men. His stronger nature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3324"></td>
        <td id="LC3324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seems to have worked inwardly against himself. Men are beyond fear,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3325"></td>
        <td id="LC3325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">working stolidly and patiently, with minds made up to worst. They are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3326"></td>
        <td id="LC3326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Russian, he Roumanian.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3327"></td>
        <td id="LC3327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3328"></td>
        <td id="LC3328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3329"></td>
        <td id="LC3329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3330"></td>
        <td id="LC3330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_2 August, midnight_.--Woke up from few minutes&#39; sleep by hearing a cry,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3331"></td>
        <td id="LC3331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemingly outside my port. Could see nothing in fog. Rushed on deck, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3332"></td>
        <td id="LC3332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ran against mate. Tells me heard cry and ran, but no sign of man on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3333"></td>
        <td id="LC3333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watch. One more gone. Lord, help us! Mate says we must be past Straits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3334"></td>
        <td id="LC3334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Dover, as in a moment of fog lifting he saw North Foreland, just as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3335"></td>
        <td id="LC3335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he heard the man cry out. If so we are now off in the North Sea, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3336"></td>
        <td id="LC3336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only God can guide us in the fog, which seems to move with us; and God</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3337"></td>
        <td id="LC3337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seems to have deserted us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3338"></td>
        <td id="LC3338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3339"></td>
        <td id="LC3339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3340"></td>
        <td id="LC3340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3341"></td>
        <td id="LC3341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_3 August_.--At midnight I went to relieve the man at the wheel, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3342"></td>
        <td id="LC3342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when I got to it found no one there. The wind was steady, and as we ran</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3343"></td>
        <td id="LC3343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before it there was no yawing. I dared not leave it, so shouted for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3344"></td>
        <td id="LC3344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mate. After a few seconds he rushed up on deck in his flannels. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3345"></td>
        <td id="LC3345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked wild-eyed and haggard, and I greatly fear his reason has given</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3346"></td>
        <td id="LC3346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way. He came close to me and whispered hoarsely, with his mouth to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3347"></td>
        <td id="LC3347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ear, as though fearing the very air might hear: &quot;_It_ is here; I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3348"></td>
        <td id="LC3348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, now. On the watch last night I saw It, like a man, tall and thin,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3349"></td>
        <td id="LC3349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and ghastly pale. It was in the bows, and looking out. I crept behind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3350"></td>
        <td id="LC3350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It, and gave It my knife; but the knife went through It, empty as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3351"></td>
        <td id="LC3351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">air.&quot; And as he spoke he took his knife and drove it savagely into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3352"></td>
        <td id="LC3352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">space. Then he went on: &quot;But It is here, and I&#39;ll find It. It is in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3353"></td>
        <td id="LC3353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hold, perhaps in one of those boxes. I&#39;ll unscrew them one by one and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3354"></td>
        <td id="LC3354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see. You work the helm.&quot; And, with a warning look and his finger on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3355"></td>
        <td id="LC3355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lip, he went below. There was springing up a choppy wind, and I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3356"></td>
        <td id="LC3356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not leave the helm. I saw him come out on deck again with a tool-chest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3357"></td>
        <td id="LC3357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a lantern, and go down the forward hatchway. He is mad, stark,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3358"></td>
        <td id="LC3358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">raving mad, and it&#39;s no use my trying to stop him. He can&#39;t hurt those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3359"></td>
        <td id="LC3359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">big boxes: they are invoiced as &quot;clay,&quot; and to pull them about is as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3360"></td>
        <td id="LC3360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harmless a thing as he can do. So here I stay, and mind the helm, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3361"></td>
        <td id="LC3361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">write these notes. I can only trust in God and wait till the fog clears.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3362"></td>
        <td id="LC3362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, if I can&#39;t steer to any harbour with the wind that is, I shall cut</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3363"></td>
        <td id="LC3363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down sails and lie by, and signal for help....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3364"></td>
        <td id="LC3364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3365"></td>
        <td id="LC3365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3366"></td>
        <td id="LC3366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3367"></td>
        <td id="LC3367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is nearly all over now. Just as I was beginning to hope that the mate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3368"></td>
        <td id="LC3368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would come out calmer--for I heard him knocking away at something in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3369"></td>
        <td id="LC3369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hold, and work is good for him--there came up the hatchway a sudden,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3370"></td>
        <td id="LC3370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">startled scream, which made my blood run cold, and up on the deck he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3371"></td>
        <td id="LC3371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came as if shot from a gun--a raging madman, with his eyes rolling and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3372"></td>
        <td id="LC3372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his face convulsed with fear. &quot;Save me! save me!&quot; he cried, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3373"></td>
        <td id="LC3373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked round on the blanket of fog. His horror turned to despair, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3374"></td>
        <td id="LC3374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a steady voice he said: &quot;You had better come too, captain, before it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3375"></td>
        <td id="LC3375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too late. _He_ is there. I know the secret now. The sea will save me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3376"></td>
        <td id="LC3376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from Him, and it is all that is left!&quot; Before I could say a word, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3377"></td>
        <td id="LC3377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">move forward to seize him, he sprang on the bulwark and deliberately</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3378"></td>
        <td id="LC3378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">threw himself into the sea. I suppose I know the secret too, now. It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3379"></td>
        <td id="LC3379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this madman who had got rid of the men one by one, and now he has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3380"></td>
        <td id="LC3380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">followed them himself. God help me! How am I to account for all these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3381"></td>
        <td id="LC3381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horrors when I get to port? _When_ I get to port! Will that ever be?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3385"></td>
        <td id="LC3385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_4 August._--Still fog, which the sunrise cannot pierce. I know there is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3386"></td>
        <td id="LC3386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sunrise because I am a sailor, why else I know not. I dared not go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3387"></td>
        <td id="LC3387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">below, I dared not leave the helm; so here all night I stayed, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3388"></td>
        <td id="LC3388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dimness of the night I saw It--Him! God forgive me, but the mate was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3389"></td>
        <td id="LC3389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right to jump overboard. It was better to die like a man; to die like a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3390"></td>
        <td id="LC3390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sailor in blue water no man can object. But I am captain, and I must not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3391"></td>
        <td id="LC3391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leave my ship. But I shall baffle this fiend or monster, for I shall tie</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3392"></td>
        <td id="LC3392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my hands to the wheel when my strength begins to fail, and along with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3393"></td>
        <td id="LC3393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them I shall tie that which He--It!--dare not touch; and then, come good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3394"></td>
        <td id="LC3394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wind or foul, I shall save my soul, and my honour as a captain. I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3395"></td>
        <td id="LC3395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">growing weaker, and the night is coming on. If He can look me in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3396"></td>
        <td id="LC3396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face again, I may not have time to act.... If we are wrecked, mayhap</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3397"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3420"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3422"></td>
        <td id="LC3422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_8 August._--Lucy was very restless all night, and I, too, could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3423"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chimney-pots, it made me shudder. When a sharp puff came it seemed to be</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3428"></td>

        <td id="LC3431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life.</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3433"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3439"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3445"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3451"></td>

        <td id="LC3452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it when the time came and saw everything. Poor Lucy seemed much upset.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3453"></td>
        <td id="LC3453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She was restless and uneasy all the time, and I cannot but think that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3454"></td>
        <td id="LC3454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her dreaming at night is telling on her. She is quite odd in one thing:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3455"></td>
        <td id="LC3455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she will not admit to me that there is any cause for restlessness; or if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3456"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3457"></td>
        <td id="LC3457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cause in that poor old Mr. Swales was found dead this morning on our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3458"></td>
        <td id="LC3458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seat, his neck being broken. He had evidently, as the doctor said,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3459"></td>
        <td id="LC3459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fallen back in the seat in some sort of fright, for there was a look of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3460"></td>
        <td id="LC3460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear and horror on his face that the men said made them shudder. Poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3461"></td>
        <td id="LC3461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear old man! Perhaps he had seen Death with his dying eyes! Lucy is so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3462"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3500"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3501"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3502"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3504"></td>
        <td id="LC3504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and frightened the wits out of us. I believe we forgot everything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3505"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3506"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3507"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3509"></td>

        <td id="L3513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3513"></td>
