        <td id="LC3551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the house are careful to lock the door every night, so I feared that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3552"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3553"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3641"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3642"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3732"></td>
        <td id="LC3732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sadness, for I was thinking of Jonathan. When coming home--it was then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3733"></td>
        <td id="LC3733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bright moonlight, so bright that, though the front of our part of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3734"></td>
        <td id="LC3734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Crescent was in shadow, everything could be well seen--I threw a glance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3735"></td>
        <td id="LC3735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up at our window, and saw Lucy&#39;s head leaning out. I thought that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3736"></td>
        <td id="LC3736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perhaps she was looking out for me, so I opened my handkerchief and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3737"></td>
        <td id="LC3737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waved it. She did not notice or make any movement whatever. Just then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3738"></td>
        <td id="LC3738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the moonlight crept round an angle of the building, and the light fell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3739"></td>
        <td id="LC3739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the window. There distinctly was Lucy with her head lying up against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3740"></td>
        <td id="LC3740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the side of the window-sill and her eyes shut. She was fast asleep, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3741"></td>
        <td id="LC3741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by her, seated on the window-sill, was something that looked like a</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3742"></td>
        <td id="LC3742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good-sized bird. I was afraid she might get a chill, so I ran upstairs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3743"></td>
        <td id="LC3743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but as I came into the room she was moving back to her bed, fast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asleep, and breathing heavily; she was holding her hand to her throat,</td>

        <td id="L3745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3745"></td>
        <td id="LC3745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as though to protect it from cold.</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3757"></td>

        <td id="L3759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3759"></td>
        <td id="LC3759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur&#39;s father is better, and wants the marriage to come off soon. Lucy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3760"></td>

        <td id="L3761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3761"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3762"></td>

        <td id="L3763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3763"></td>
        <td id="LC3763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">protect her. Poor dear, sweet lady! She confided to me that she has got</td>

        <td id="LC3764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her death-warrant. She has not told Lucy, and made me promise secrecy;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3765"></td>

        <td id="L3774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3774"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother&#39;s hours are numbering to a close. I do not understand Lucy&#39;s</td>

        <td id="L3777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3777"></td>

        <td id="L3778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3778"></td>
        <td id="LC3778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she gets weaker and more languid day by day; at night I hear her gasping</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3779"></td>

        <td id="LC3780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night, but she gets up and walks about the room, and sits at the open</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3781"></td>

        <td id="L3788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3788"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3799"></td>
        <td id="LC3799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dear Sirs,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3800"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3801"></td>
        <td id="LC3801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Herewith please receive invoice of goods sent by Great Northern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3802"></td>
        <td id="LC3802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Railway. Same are to be delivered at Carfax, near Purfleet, immediately</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3803"></td>
        <td id="LC3803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on receipt at goods station King&#39;s Cross. The house is at present empty,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3804"></td>
        <td id="LC3804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but enclosed please find keys, all of which are labelled.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3805"></td>
        <td id="LC3805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3806"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3807"></td>
        <td id="LC3807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consignment, in the partially ruined building forming part of the house</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3808"></td>

        <td id="L3809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3809"></td>
        <td id="LC3809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recognise the locality, as it is the ancient chapel of the mansion. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3810"></td>
        <td id="LC3810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">goods leave by the train at 9:30 to-night, and will be due at King&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3811"></td>
        <td id="LC3811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Cross at 4:30 to-morrow afternoon. As our client wishes the delivery</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3812"></td>
        <td id="LC3812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made as soon as possible, we shall be obliged by your having teams ready</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3813"></td>
        <td id="LC3813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at King&#39;s Cross at the time named and forthwith conveying the goods to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3814"></td>
        <td id="LC3814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destination. In order to obviate any delays possible through any routine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3815"></td>
        <td id="LC3815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">requirements as to payment in your departments, we enclose cheque</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3816"></td>
        <td id="LC3816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herewith for ten pounds (£10), receipt of which please acknowledge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3817"></td>
        <td id="LC3817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Should the charge be less than this amount, you can return balance; if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3818"></td>
        <td id="LC3818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greater, we shall at once send cheque for difference on hearing from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3819"></td>
        <td id="LC3819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you. You are to leave the keys on coming away in the main hall of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3820"></td>
        <td id="LC3820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house, where the proprietor may get them on his entering the house by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3821"></td>
        <td id="LC3821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">means of his duplicate key.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3822"></td>
        <td id="LC3822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3823"></td>
        <td id="LC3823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Pray do not take us as exceeding the bounds of business courtesy in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3824"></td>
        <td id="LC3824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pressing you in all ways to use the utmost expedition.</td>

        <td id="LC3852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Mina Murray&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3853"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3854"></td>
        <td id="LC3854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_18 August._--I am happy to-day, and write sitting on the seat in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3855"></td>
        <td id="LC3855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">churchyard. Lucy is ever so much better. Last night she slept well all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3856"></td>
        <td id="LC3856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night, and did not disturb me once. The roses seem coming back already</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3857"></td>
        <td id="LC3857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to her cheeks, though she is still sadly pale and wan-looking. If she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3858"></td>
        <td id="LC3858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were in any way anæmic I could understand it, but she is not. She is in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3859"></td>
        <td id="LC3859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gay spirits and full of life and cheerfulness. All the morbid reticence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3860"></td>
        <td id="LC3860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seems to have passed from her, and she has just reminded me, as if I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3861"></td>
        <td id="LC3861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">needed any reminding, of _that_ night, and that it was here, on this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3862"></td>
        <td id="LC3862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very seat, I found her asleep. As she told me she tapped playfully with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3863"></td>
        <td id="LC3863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the heel of her boot on the stone slab and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3864"></td>
        <td id="LC3864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3865"></td>
        <td id="LC3865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My poor little feet didn&#39;t make much noise then! I daresay poor old Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3866"></td>
        <td id="LC3866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Swales would have told me that it was because I didn&#39;t want to wake up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3867"></td>
        <td id="LC3867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Geordie.&quot; As she was in such a communicative humour, I asked her if she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3868"></td>
        <td id="LC3868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had dreamed at all that night. Before she answered, that sweet, puckered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3869"></td>
        <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">look came into her forehead, which Arthur--I call him Arthur from her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3870"></td>
        <td id="LC3870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">habit--says he loves; and, indeed, I don&#39;t wonder that he does. Then she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3871"></td>
        <td id="LC3871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went on in a half-dreaming kind of way, as if trying to recall it to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3872"></td>
        <td id="LC3872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3873"></td>
        <td id="LC3873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3874"></td>
        <td id="LC3874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I didn&#39;t quite dream; but it all seemed to be real. I only wanted to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3875"></td>
        <td id="LC3875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here in this spot--I don&#39;t know why, for I was afraid of something--I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3876"></td>
        <td id="LC3876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">don&#39;t know what. I remember, though I suppose I was asleep, passing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3877"></td>
        <td id="LC3877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the streets and over the bridge. A fish leaped as I went by, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3878"></td>
        <td id="LC3878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I leaned over to look at it, and I heard a lot of dogs howling--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3879"></td>
        <td id="LC3879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whole town seemed as if it must be full of dogs all howling at once--as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3880"></td>
        <td id="LC3880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I went up the steps. Then I had a vague memory of something long and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3881"></td>
        <td id="LC3881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dark with red eyes, just as we saw in the sunset, and something very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3882"></td>
        <td id="LC3882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sweet and very bitter all around me at once; and then I seemed sinking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3883"></td>
        <td id="LC3883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into deep green water, and there was a singing in my ears, as I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3884"></td>
        <td id="LC3884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard there is to drowning men; and then everything seemed passing away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3885"></td>
        <td id="LC3885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from me; my soul seemed to go out from my body and float about the air.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3886"></td>
        <td id="LC3886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I seem to remember that once the West Lighthouse was right under me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3887"></td>
        <td id="LC3887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and then there was a sort of agonising feeling, as if I were in an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3888"></td>
        <td id="LC3888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earthquake, and I came back and found you shaking my body. I saw you do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3889"></td>
        <td id="LC3889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it before I felt you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3890"></td>
        <td id="LC3890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3891"></td>
        <td id="LC3891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then she began to laugh. It seemed a little uncanny to me, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3892"></td>
        <td id="LC3892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">listened to her breathlessly. I did not quite like it, and thought it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3893"></td>
        <td id="LC3893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better not to keep her mind on the subject, so we drifted on to other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3894"></td>
        <td id="LC3894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subjects, and Lucy was like her old self again. When we got home the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3895"></td>
        <td id="LC3895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fresh breeze had braced her up, and her pale cheeks were really more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3896"></td>
        <td id="LC3896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rosy. Her mother rejoiced when she saw her, and we all spent a very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3897"></td>
        <td id="LC3897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happy evening together.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3898"></td>
        <td id="LC3898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3899"></td>
        <td id="LC3899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3900"></td>
        <td id="LC3900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3901"></td>
        <td id="LC3901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_19 August._--Joy, joy, joy! although not all joy. At last, news of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3902"></td>
        <td id="LC3902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan. The dear fellow has been ill; that is why he did not write. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3903"></td>
        <td id="LC3903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am not afraid to think it or say it, now that I know. Mr. Hawkins sent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3904"></td>
        <td id="LC3904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me on the letter, and wrote himself, oh, so kindly. I am to leave in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3905"></td>
        <td id="LC3905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning and go over to Jonathan, and to help to nurse him if necessary,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3906"></td>
        <td id="LC3906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to bring him home. Mr. Hawkins says it would not be a bad thing if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3907"></td>
        <td id="LC3907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we were to be married out there. I have cried over the good Sister&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3908"></td>
        <td id="LC3908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter till I can feel it wet against my bosom, where it lies. It is of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3909"></td>
        <td id="LC3909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan, and must be next my heart, for he is _in_ my heart. My journey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3910"></td>
        <td id="LC3910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is all mapped out, and my luggage ready. I am only taking one change of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3911"></td>
        <td id="LC3911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dress; Lucy will bring my trunk to London and keep it till I send for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3912"></td>
        <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, for it may be that ... I must write no more; I must keep it to say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3913"></td>
        <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Jonathan, my husband. The letter that he has seen and touched must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3914"></td>
        <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comfort me till we meet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3915"></td>
        <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3916"></td>
        <td id="LC3916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3917"></td>
        <td id="LC3917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Sister Agatha, Hospital of St. Joseph and Ste. Mary,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3918"></td>
        <td id="LC3918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Buda-Pesth, to Miss Wilhelmina Murray._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3919"></td>
        <td id="LC3919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3920"></td>
        <td id="LC3920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_12 August._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3921"></td>
        <td id="LC3921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3922"></td>
        <td id="LC3922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dear Madam,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3923"></td>
        <td id="LC3923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3924"></td>
        <td id="LC3924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I write by desire of Mr. Jonathan Harker, who is himself not strong</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3925"></td>
        <td id="LC3925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough to write, though progressing well, thanks to God and St. Joseph</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3926"></td>
        <td id="LC3926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Ste. Mary. He has been under our care for nearly six weeks,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3927"></td>
        <td id="LC3927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suffering from a violent brain fever. He wishes me to convey his love,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3928"></td>
        <td id="LC3928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to say that by this post I write for him to Mr. Peter Hawkins,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3929"></td>
        <td id="LC3929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Exeter, to say, with his dutiful respects, that he is sorry for his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3930"></td>
        <td id="LC3930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delay, and that all of his work is completed. He will require some few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3931"></td>
        <td id="LC3931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weeks&#39; rest in our sanatorium in the hills, but will then return. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3932"></td>
        <td id="LC3932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wishes me to say that he has not sufficient money with him, and that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3933"></td>
        <td id="LC3933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would like to pay for his staying here, so that others who need shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3934"></td>
        <td id="LC3934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not be wanting for help.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3935"></td>
        <td id="LC3935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3936"></td>
        <td id="LC3936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Believe me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3937"></td>
        <td id="LC3937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3938"></td>
        <td id="LC3938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yours, with sympathy and all blessings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3939"></td>
        <td id="LC3939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3940"></td>
        <td id="LC3940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;SISTER AGATHA.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3941"></td>
        <td id="LC3941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3942"></td>
        <td id="LC3942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;P. S.--My patient being asleep, I open this to let you know something</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3943"></td>
        <td id="LC3943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more. He has told me all about you, and that you are shortly to be his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3944"></td>
        <td id="LC3944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wife. All blessings to you both! He has had some fearful shock--so says</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3945"></td>
        <td id="LC3945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our doctor--and in his delirium his ravings have been dreadful; of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3946"></td>
        <td id="LC3946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wolves and poison and blood; of ghosts and demons; and I fear to say of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3947"></td>
        <td id="LC3947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what. Be careful with him always that there may be nothing to excite him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3948"></td>
        <td id="LC3948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of this kind for a long time to come; the traces of such an illness as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3949"></td>
        <td id="LC3949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his do not lightly die away. We should have written long ago, but we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3950"></td>
        <td id="LC3950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew nothing of his friends, and there was on him nothing that any one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3951"></td>
        <td id="LC3951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could understand. He came in the train from Klausenburg, and the guard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3952"></td>
        <td id="LC3952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was told by the station-master there that he rushed into the station</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3953"></td>
        <td id="LC3953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shouting for a ticket for home. Seeing from his violent demeanour that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3954"></td>
        <td id="LC3954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was English, they gave him a ticket for the furthest station on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3955"></td>
        <td id="LC3955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way thither that the train reached.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3956"></td>
        <td id="LC3956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3957"></td>
        <td id="LC3957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Be assured that he is well cared for. He has won all hearts by his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3958"></td>
        <td id="LC3958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sweetness and gentleness. He is truly getting on well, and I have no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3959"></td>
        <td id="LC3959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubt will in a few weeks be all himself. But be careful of him for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3960"></td>
        <td id="LC3960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">safety&#39;s sake. There are, I pray God and St. Joseph and Ste. Mary, many,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3961"></td>
        <td id="LC3961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many, happy years for you both.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3962"></td>
        <td id="LC3962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3963"></td>
        <td id="LC3963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3964"></td>
        <td id="LC3964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3965"></td>
        <td id="LC3965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3966"></td>
        <td id="LC3966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_19 August._--Strange and sudden change in Renfield last night. About</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3967"></td>
        <td id="LC3967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eight o&#39;clock he began to get excited and sniff about as a dog does when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3968"></td>
        <td id="LC3968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">setting. The attendant was struck by his manner, and knowing my interest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3969"></td>
        <td id="LC3969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in him, encouraged him to talk. He is usually respectful to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3970"></td>
        <td id="LC3970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attendant and at times servile; but to-night, the man tells me, he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3971"></td>
        <td id="LC3971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite haughty. Would not condescend to talk with him at all. All he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3972"></td>
        <td id="LC3972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would say was:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3973"></td>
        <td id="LC3973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3974"></td>
        <td id="LC3974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     &quot;I don&#39;t want to talk to you: you don&#39;t count now; the Master is at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3975"></td>
        <td id="LC3975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     hand.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3976"></td>
        <td id="LC3976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3977"></td>
        <td id="LC3977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The attendant thinks it is some sudden form of religious mania which has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3978"></td>
        <td id="LC3978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seized him. If so, we must look out for squalls, for a strong man with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3979"></td>
        <td id="LC3979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">homicidal and religious mania at once might be dangerous. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3980"></td>
        <td id="LC3980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">combination is a dreadful one. At nine o&#39;clock I visited him myself. His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3981"></td>
        <td id="LC3981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attitude to me was the same as that to the attendant; in his sublime</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3982"></td>
        <td id="LC3982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">self-feeling the difference between myself and attendant seemed to him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3983"></td>
        <td id="LC3983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as nothing. It looks like religious mania, and he will soon think that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3984"></td>
        <td id="LC3984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he himself is God. These infinitesimal distinctions between man and man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3985"></td>
        <td id="LC3985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are too paltry for an Omnipotent Being. How these madmen give themselves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3986"></td>
        <td id="LC3986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away! The real God taketh heed lest a sparrow fall; but the God created</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3987"></td>
        <td id="LC3987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from human vanity sees no difference between an eagle and a sparrow. Oh,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3988"></td>
        <td id="LC3988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if men only knew!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3989"></td>
        <td id="LC3989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3990"></td>
        <td id="LC3990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For half an hour or more Renfield kept getting excited in greater and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3991"></td>
        <td id="LC3991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greater degree. I did not pretend to be watching him, but I kept strict</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3992"></td>
        <td id="LC3992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observation all the same. All at once that shifty look came into his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3993"></td>
        <td id="LC3993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes which we always see when a madman has seized an idea, and with it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3994"></td>
        <td id="LC3994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the shifty movement of the head and back which asylum attendants come to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3995"></td>
        <td id="LC3995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know so well. He became quite quiet, and went and sat on the edge of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3996"></td>
        <td id="LC3996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed resignedly, and looked into space with lack-lustre eyes. I thought I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3997"></td>
        <td id="LC3997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would find out if his apathy were real or only assumed, and tried to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3998"></td>
        <td id="LC3998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lead him to talk of his pets, a theme which had never failed to excite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3999"></td>
        <td id="LC3999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his attention. At first he made no reply, but at length said testily:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4000"></td>
        <td id="LC4000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4001"></td>
        <td id="LC4001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Bother them all! I don&#39;t care a pin about them.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4002"></td>
        <td id="LC4002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4003"></td>
        <td id="LC4003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What?&quot; I said. &quot;You don&#39;t mean to tell me you don&#39;t care about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4004"></td>
        <td id="LC4004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spiders?&quot; (Spiders at present are his hobby and the note-book is filling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4005"></td>
        <td id="LC4005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up with columns of small figures.) To this he answered enigmatically:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4006"></td>
        <td id="LC4006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4007"></td>
        <td id="LC4007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The bride-maidens rejoice the eyes that wait the coming of the bride;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4008"></td>
        <td id="LC4008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but when the bride draweth nigh, then the maidens shine not to the eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4009"></td>
        <td id="LC4009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that are filled.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4010"></td>
        <td id="LC4010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4011"></td>
        <td id="LC4011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He would not explain himself, but remained obstinately seated on his bed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4012"></td>
        <td id="LC4012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the time I remained with him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4013"></td>
        <td id="LC4013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4014"></td>
        <td id="LC4014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am weary to-night and low in spirits. I cannot but think of Lucy, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4015"></td>
        <td id="LC4015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how different things might have been. If I don&#39;t sleep at once, chloral,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4016"></td>
        <td id="LC4016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the modern Morpheus--C_{2}HCl_{3}O. H_{2}O! I must be careful not to let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4017"></td>
        <td id="LC4017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it grow into a habit. No, I shall take none to-night! I have thought of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4018"></td>
        <td id="LC4018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucy, and I shall not dishonour her by mixing the two. If need be,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4019"></td>
        <td id="LC4019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to-night shall be sleepless....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4020"></td>
        <td id="LC4020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4021"></td>
        <td id="LC4021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4022"></td>
        <td id="LC4022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4023"></td>
        <td id="LC4023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--Glad I made the resolution; gladder that I kept to it. I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4024"></td>
        <td id="LC4024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lain tossing about, and had heard the clock strike only twice, when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4025"></td>
        <td id="LC4025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night-watchman came to me, sent up from the ward, to say that Renfield</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4026"></td>
        <td id="LC4026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had escaped. I threw on my clothes and ran down at once; my patient is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4027"></td>
        <td id="LC4027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too dangerous a person to be roaming about. Those ideas of his might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4028"></td>
        <td id="LC4028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work out dangerously with strangers. The attendant was waiting for me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4029"></td>
        <td id="LC4029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He said he had seen him not ten minutes before, seemingly asleep in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4030"></td>
        <td id="LC4030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed, when he had looked through the observation-trap in the door. His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4031"></td>
        <td id="LC4031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attention was called by the sound of the window being wrenched out. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4032"></td>
        <td id="LC4032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ran back and saw his feet disappear through the window, and had at once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4033"></td>
        <td id="LC4033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sent up for me. He was only in his night-gear, and cannot be far off.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4034"></td>
        <td id="LC4034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The attendant thought it would be more useful to watch where he should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4035"></td>
        <td id="LC4035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go than to follow him, as he might lose sight of him whilst getting out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4036"></td>
        <td id="LC4036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the building by the door. He is a bulky man, and couldn&#39;t get through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4037"></td>
        <td id="LC4037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the window. I am thin, so, with his aid, I got out, but feet foremost,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4038"></td>
        <td id="LC4038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, as we were only a few feet above ground, landed unhurt. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4039"></td>
        <td id="LC4039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attendant told me the patient had gone to the left, and had taken a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4040"></td>
        <td id="LC4040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">straight line, so I ran as quickly as I could. As I got through the belt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4041"></td>
        <td id="LC4041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of trees I saw a white figure scale the high wall which separates our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4042"></td>
        <td id="LC4042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grounds from those of the deserted house.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4043"></td>
        <td id="LC4043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4044"></td>
        <td id="LC4044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I ran back at once, told the watchman to get three or four men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4045"></td>
        <td id="LC4045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immediately and follow me into the grounds of Carfax, in case our friend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4046"></td>
        <td id="LC4046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might be dangerous. I got a ladder myself, and crossing the wall,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4047"></td>
        <td id="LC4047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dropped down on the other side. I could see Renfield&#39;s figure just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4048"></td>
        <td id="LC4048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disappearing behind the angle of the house, so I ran after him. On the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4049"></td>
        <td id="LC4049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far side of the house I found him pressed close against the old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4050"></td>
        <td id="LC4050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ironbound oak door of the chapel. He was talking, apparently to some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4051"></td>
        <td id="LC4051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one, but I was afraid to go near enough to hear what he was saying, lest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4052"></td>
        <td id="LC4052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I might frighten him, and he should run off. Chasing an errant swarm of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4053"></td>
        <td id="LC4053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bees is nothing to following a naked lunatic, when the fit of escaping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4054"></td>
        <td id="LC4054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is upon him! After a few minutes, however, I could see that he did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4055"></td>
        <td id="LC4055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take note of anything around him, and so ventured to draw nearer to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4056"></td>
        <td id="LC4056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him--the more so as my men had now crossed the wall and were closing him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4057"></td>
        <td id="LC4057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in. I heard him say:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4058"></td>
        <td id="LC4058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4059"></td>
        <td id="LC4059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am here to do Your bidding, Master. I am Your slave, and You will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4060"></td>
        <td id="LC4060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reward me, for I shall be faithful. I have worshipped You long and afar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4061"></td>
        <td id="LC4061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off. Now that You are near, I await Your commands, and You will not pass</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4062"></td>
        <td id="LC4062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me by, will You, dear Master, in Your distribution of good things?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4063"></td>
        <td id="LC4063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4064"></td>
        <td id="LC4064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He _is_ a selfish old beggar anyhow. He thinks of the loaves and fishes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4065"></td>
        <td id="LC4065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even when he believes he is in a Real Presence. His manias make a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4066"></td>
        <td id="LC4066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">startling combination. When we closed in on him he fought like a tiger.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4067"></td>
        <td id="LC4067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He is immensely strong, for he was more like a wild beast than a man. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4068"></td>
        <td id="LC4068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never saw a lunatic in such a paroxysm of rage before; and I hope I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4069"></td>
        <td id="LC4069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall not again. It is a mercy that we have found out his strength and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4070"></td>
        <td id="LC4070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his danger in good time. With strength and determination like his, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4071"></td>
        <td id="LC4071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might have done wild work before he was caged. He is safe now at any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4072"></td>
        <td id="LC4072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rate. Jack Sheppard himself couldn&#39;t get free from the strait-waistcoat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4073"></td>
        <td id="LC4073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that keeps him restrained, and he&#39;s chained to the wall in the padded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4074"></td>
        <td id="LC4074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room. His cries are at times awful, but the silences that follow are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4075"></td>
        <td id="LC4075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more deadly still, for he means murder in every turn and movement.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4076"></td>
        <td id="LC4076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4077"></td>
        <td id="LC4077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just now he spoke coherent words for the first time:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4078"></td>
        <td id="LC4078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4079"></td>
        <td id="LC4079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I shall be patient, Master. It is coming--coming--coming!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4080"></td>
        <td id="LC4080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4081"></td>
        <td id="LC4081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So I took the hint, and came too. I was too excited to sleep, but this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4082"></td>
        <td id="LC4082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">diary has quieted me, and I feel I shall get some sleep to-night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4083"></td>
        <td id="LC4083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4084"></td>
        <td id="LC4084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4085"></td>
        <td id="LC4085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4086"></td>
        <td id="LC4086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4087"></td>
        <td id="LC4087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER IX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4088"></td>
        <td id="LC4088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4089"></td>
        <td id="LC4089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4090"></td>
        <td id="LC4090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Mina Harker to Lucy Westenra._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4091"></td>
        <td id="LC4091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4092"></td>
        <td id="LC4092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_Buda-Pesth, 24 August._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4093"></td>
        <td id="LC4093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4094"></td>
        <td id="LC4094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dearest Lucy,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4095"></td>
        <td id="LC4095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4096"></td>
        <td id="LC4096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I know you will be anxious to hear all that has happened since we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4097"></td>
        <td id="LC4097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parted at the railway station at Whitby. Well, my dear, I got to Hull</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4098"></td>
        <td id="LC4098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all right, and caught the boat to Hamburg, and then the train on here. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4099"></td>
        <td id="LC4099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel that I can hardly recall anything of the journey, except that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4100"></td>
        <td id="LC4100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew I was coming to Jonathan, and, that as I should have to do some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4101"></td>
        <td id="LC4101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nursing, I had better get all the sleep I could.... I found my dear one,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4102"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4192"></td>
        <td id="LC4192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Lucy dear, do you know why I tell you all this? It is not only because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4193"></td>
        <td id="LC4193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is all sweet to me, but because you have been, and are, very dear to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4194"></td>
        <td id="LC4194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. It was my privilege to be your friend and guide when you came from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4195"></td>
        <td id="LC4195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the schoolroom to prepare for the world of life. I want you to see now,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4196"></td>
        <td id="LC4196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and with the eyes of a very happy wife, whither duty has led me; so that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4197"></td>
        <td id="LC4197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in your own married life you too may be all happy as I am. My dear,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4198"></td>
        <td id="LC4198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">please Almighty God, your life may be all it promises: a long day of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4199"></td>
        <td id="LC4199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sunshine, with no harsh wind, no forgetting duty, no distrust. I must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4200"></td>
        <td id="LC4200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not wish you no pain, for that can never be; but I do hope you will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4201"></td>
        <td id="LC4201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_always_ as happy as I am _now_. Good-bye, my dear. I shall post this at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4202"></td>
        <td id="LC4202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once, and, perhaps, write you very soon again. I must stop, for Jonathan</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4203"></td>
        <td id="LC4203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is waking--I must attend to my husband!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4204"></td>
        <td id="LC4204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4205"></td>
        <td id="LC4205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Your ever-loving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4206"></td>
        <td id="LC4206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4207"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L4210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4210"></td>
        <td id="LC4210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Lucy Westenra to Mina Harker._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4211"></td>
        <td id="LC4211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4212"></td>
        <td id="LC4212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_Whitby, 30 August._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4213"></td>
        <td id="LC4213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4214"></td>
        <td id="LC4214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dearest Mina,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4215"></td>
        <td id="LC4215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4216"></td>
        <td id="LC4216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oceans of love and millions of kisses, and may you soon be in your own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4217"></td>
        <td id="LC4217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">home with your husband. I wish you could be coming home soon enough to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4218"></td>
        <td id="LC4218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stay with us here. The strong air would soon restore Jonathan; it has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4219"></td>
        <td id="LC4219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite restored me. I have an appetite like a cormorant, am full of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4220"></td>
        <td id="LC4220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life, and sleep well. You will be glad to know that I have quite given</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4221"></td>
        <td id="LC4221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up walking in my sleep. I think I have not stirred out of my bed for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4222"></td>
        <td id="LC4222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">week, that is when I once got into it at night. Arthur says I am getting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4223"></td>
        <td id="LC4223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fat. By the way, I forgot to tell you that Arthur is here. We have such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4224"></td>
        <td id="LC4224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">walks and drives, and rides, and rowing, and tennis, and fishing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4225"></td>
        <td id="LC4225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together; and I love him more than ever. He _tells_ me that he loves me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4226"></td>
        <td id="LC4226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more, but I doubt that, for at first he told me that he couldn&#39;t love me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4227"></td>
        <td id="LC4227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more than he did then. But this is nonsense. There he is, calling to me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4228"></td>
        <td id="LC4228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So no more just at present from your loving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4229"></td>
        <td id="LC4229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4230"></td>

</td>
