        <td id="L4232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4232"></td>
        <td id="LC4232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;P. S.--Mother sends her love. She seems better, poor dear. &quot;P. P.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4233"></td>
        <td id="LC4233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">S.--We are to be married on 28 September.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4234"></td>
        <td id="LC4234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4235"></td>
        <td id="LC4235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4236"></td>
        <td id="LC4236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4237"></td>
        <td id="LC4237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4238"></td>
        <td id="LC4238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_20 August._--The case of Renfield grows even more interesting. He has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4239"></td>
        <td id="LC4239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now so far quieted that there are spells of cessation from his passion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4240"></td>
        <td id="LC4240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For the first week after his attack he was perpetually violent. Then one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4241"></td>
        <td id="LC4241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night, just as the moon rose, he grew quiet, and kept murmuring to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4242"></td>
        <td id="LC4242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself: &quot;Now I can wait; now I can wait.&quot; The attendant came to tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4243"></td>
        <td id="LC4243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, so I ran down at once to have a look at him. He was still in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4244"></td>
        <td id="LC4244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strait-waistcoat and in the padded room, but the suffused look had gone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4245"></td>
        <td id="LC4245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from his face, and his eyes had something of their old pleading--I might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4246"></td>
        <td id="LC4246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost say, &quot;cringing&quot;--softness. I was satisfied with his present</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4247"></td>
        <td id="LC4247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">condition, and directed him to be relieved. The attendants hesitated,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4248"></td>
        <td id="LC4248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but finally carried out my wishes without protest. It was a strange</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4249"></td>
        <td id="LC4249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing that the patient had humour enough to see their distrust, for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4250"></td>
        <td id="LC4250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming close to me, he said in a whisper, all the while looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4251"></td>
        <td id="LC4251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">furtively at them:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4252"></td>
        <td id="LC4252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4253"></td>
        <td id="LC4253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;They think I could hurt you! Fancy _me_ hurting _you_! The fools!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4254"></td>
        <td id="LC4254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4255"></td>
        <td id="LC4255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was soothing, somehow, to the feelings to find myself dissociated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4256"></td>
        <td id="LC4256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even in the mind of this poor madman from the others; but all the same I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4257"></td>
        <td id="LC4257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do not follow his thought. Am I to take it that I have anything in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4258"></td>
        <td id="LC4258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">common with him, so that we are, as it were, to stand together; or has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4259"></td>
        <td id="LC4259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he to gain from me some good so stupendous that my well-being is needful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4260"></td>
        <td id="LC4260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him? I must find out later on. To-night he will not speak. Even the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4261"></td>
        <td id="LC4261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offer of a kitten or even a full-grown cat will not tempt him. He will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4262"></td>
        <td id="LC4262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only say: &quot;I don&#39;t take any stock in cats. I have more to think of now,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4263"></td>
        <td id="LC4263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I can wait; I can wait.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4264"></td>
        <td id="LC4264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4265"></td>
        <td id="LC4265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a while I left him. The attendant tells me that he was quiet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4266"></td>
        <td id="LC4266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">until just before dawn, and that then he began to get uneasy, and at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4267"></td>
        <td id="LC4267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">length violent, until at last he fell into a paroxysm which exhausted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4268"></td>
        <td id="LC4268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him so that he swooned into a sort of coma.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4269"></td>
        <td id="LC4269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4270"></td>
        <td id="LC4270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4271"></td>
        <td id="LC4271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4272"></td>
        <td id="LC4272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">... Three nights has the same thing happened--violent all day then quiet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4273"></td>
        <td id="LC4273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from moonrise to sunrise. I wish I could get some clue to the cause. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4274"></td>
        <td id="LC4274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would almost seem as if there was some influence which came and went.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4275"></td>
        <td id="LC4275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Happy thought! We shall to-night play sane wits against mad ones. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4276"></td>
        <td id="LC4276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">escaped before without our help; to-night he shall escape with it. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4277"></td>
        <td id="LC4277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall give him a chance, and have the men ready to follow in case they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4278"></td>
        <td id="LC4278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are required....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4279"></td>
        <td id="LC4279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4280"></td>
        <td id="LC4280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4281"></td>
        <td id="LC4281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4282"></td>
        <td id="LC4282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_23 August._--&quot;The unexpected always happens.&quot; How well Disraeli knew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4283"></td>
        <td id="LC4283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life. Our bird when he found the cage open would not fly, so all our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4284"></td>
        <td id="LC4284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subtle arrangements were for nought. At any rate, we have proved one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4285"></td>
        <td id="LC4285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing; that the spells of quietness last a reasonable time. We shall in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4286"></td>
        <td id="LC4286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">future be able to ease his bonds for a few hours each day. I have given</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4287"></td>
        <td id="LC4287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">orders to the night attendant merely to shut him in the padded room,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4288"></td>
        <td id="LC4288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when once he is quiet, until an hour before sunrise. The poor soul&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4289"></td>
        <td id="LC4289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body will enjoy the relief even if his mind cannot appreciate it. Hark!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4290"></td>
        <td id="LC4290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The unexpected again! I am called; the patient has once more escaped.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4291"></td>
        <td id="LC4291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4292"></td>
        <td id="LC4292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4293"></td>
        <td id="LC4293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4294"></td>
        <td id="LC4294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--Another night adventure. Renfield artfully waited until the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4295"></td>
        <td id="LC4295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attendant was entering the room to inspect. Then he dashed out past him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4296"></td>
        <td id="LC4296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and flew down the passage. I sent word for the attendants to follow.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4297"></td>
        <td id="LC4297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Again he went into the grounds of the deserted house, and we found him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4298"></td>
        <td id="LC4298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the same place, pressed against the old chapel door. When he saw me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4299"></td>
        <td id="LC4299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he became furious, and had not the attendants seized him in time, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4300"></td>
        <td id="LC4300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would have tried to kill me. As we were holding him a strange thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4301"></td>
        <td id="LC4301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened. He suddenly redoubled his efforts, and then as suddenly grew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4302"></td>
        <td id="LC4302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">calm. I looked round instinctively, but could see nothing. Then I caught</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4303"></td>
        <td id="LC4303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the patient&#39;s eye and followed it, but could trace nothing as it looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4304"></td>
        <td id="LC4304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the moonlit sky except a big bat, which was flapping its silent and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4305"></td>
        <td id="LC4305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ghostly way to the west. Bats usually wheel and flit about, but this one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4306"></td>
        <td id="LC4306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed to go straight on, as if it knew where it was bound for or had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4307"></td>
        <td id="LC4307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some intention of its own. The patient grew calmer every instant, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4308"></td>
        <td id="LC4308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presently said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4309"></td>
        <td id="LC4309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4310"></td>
        <td id="LC4310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You needn&#39;t tie me; I shall go quietly!&quot; Without trouble we came back</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4311"></td>
        <td id="LC4311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the house. I feel there is something ominous in his calm, and shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4312"></td>
        <td id="LC4312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not forget this night....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4313"></td>
        <td id="LC4313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4314"></td>
        <td id="LC4314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4315"></td>
        <td id="LC4315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Lucy Westenra&#39;s Diary_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4316"></td>
        <td id="LC4316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4317"></td>
        <td id="LC4317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Hillingham, 24 August._--I must imitate Mina, and keep writing things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4318"></td>
        <td id="LC4318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down. Then we can have long talks when we do meet. I wonder when it will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4319"></td>
        <td id="LC4319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be. I wish she were with me again, for I feel so unhappy. Last night I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4320"></td>
        <td id="LC4320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed to be dreaming again just as I was at Whitby. Perhaps it is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4321"></td>
        <td id="LC4321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">change of air, or getting home again. It is all dark and horrid to me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4322"></td>
        <td id="LC4322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for I can remember nothing; but I am full of vague fear, and I feel so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4323"></td>
        <td id="LC4323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weak and worn out. When Arthur came to lunch he looked quite grieved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4324"></td>
        <td id="LC4324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he saw me, and I hadn&#39;t the spirit to try to be cheerful. I wonder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4325"></td>
        <td id="LC4325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if I could sleep in mother&#39;s room to-night. I shall make an excuse and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4326"></td>
        <td id="LC4326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">try.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4327"></td>
        <td id="LC4327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4328"></td>
        <td id="LC4328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4329"></td>
        <td id="LC4329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4330"></td>
        <td id="LC4330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_25 August._--Another bad night. Mother did not seem to take to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4331"></td>
        <td id="LC4331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proposal. She seems not too well herself, and doubtless she fears to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4332"></td>
        <td id="LC4332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worry me. I tried to keep awake, and succeeded for a while; but when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4333"></td>
        <td id="LC4333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clock struck twelve it waked me from a doze, so I must have been falling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4334"></td>
        <td id="LC4334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asleep. There was a sort of scratching or flapping at the window, but I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4335"></td>
        <td id="LC4335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did not mind it, and as I remember no more, I suppose I must then have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4336"></td>
        <td id="LC4336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fallen asleep. More bad dreams. I wish I could remember them. This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4337"></td>
        <td id="LC4337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning I am horribly weak. My face is ghastly pale, and my throat pains</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4338"></td>
        <td id="LC4338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. It must be something wrong with my lungs, for I don&#39;t seem ever to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4339"></td>
        <td id="LC4339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get air enough. I shall try to cheer up when Arthur comes, or else I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4340"></td>
        <td id="LC4340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know he will be miserable to see me so.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4341"></td>
        <td id="LC4341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4342"></td>
        <td id="LC4342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4343"></td>
        <td id="LC4343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Arthur Holmwood to Dr. Seward._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4344"></td>
        <td id="LC4344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4345"></td>
        <td id="LC4345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_Albemarle Hotel, 31 August._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4346"></td>
        <td id="LC4346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4347"></td>
        <td id="LC4347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear Jack,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4348"></td>
        <td id="LC4348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4349"></td>
        <td id="LC4349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I want you to do me a favour. Lucy is ill; that is, she has no special</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4350"></td>
        <td id="LC4350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disease, but she looks awful, and is getting worse every day. I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4351"></td>
        <td id="LC4351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asked her if there is any cause; I do not dare to ask her mother, for to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4352"></td>
        <td id="LC4352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disturb the poor lady&#39;s mind about her daughter in her present state of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4353"></td>
        <td id="LC4353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">health would be fatal. Mrs. Westenra has confided to me that her doom is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4354"></td>
        <td id="LC4354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoken--disease of the heart--though poor Lucy does not know it yet. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4355"></td>
        <td id="LC4355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am sure that there is something preying on my dear girl&#39;s mind. I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4356"></td>
        <td id="LC4356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost distracted when I think of her; to look at her gives me a pang. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4357"></td>
        <td id="LC4357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told her I should ask you to see her, and though she demurred at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4358"></td>
        <td id="LC4358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first--I know why, old fellow--she finally consented. It will be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4359"></td>
        <td id="LC4359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">painful task for you, I know, old friend, but it is for _her_ sake, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4360"></td>
        <td id="LC4360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I must not hesitate to ask, or you to act. You are to come to lunch at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4361"></td>
        <td id="LC4361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hillingham to-morrow, two o&#39;clock, so as not to arouse any suspicion in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4362"></td>
        <td id="LC4362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Westenra, and after lunch Lucy will take an opportunity of being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4363"></td>
        <td id="LC4363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alone with you. I shall come in for tea, and we can go away together; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4364"></td>
        <td id="LC4364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am filled with anxiety, and want to consult with you alone as soon as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4365"></td>
        <td id="LC4365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can after you have seen her. Do not fail!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4366"></td>
        <td id="LC4366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4367"></td>
        <td id="LC4367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;ARTHUR.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4368"></td>
        <td id="LC4368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4369"></td>
        <td id="LC4369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4370"></td>
        <td id="LC4370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Telegram, Arthur Holmwood to Seward._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4371"></td>
        <td id="LC4371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4372"></td>
        <td id="LC4372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_1 September._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4373"></td>
        <td id="LC4373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4374"></td>
        <td id="LC4374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Am summoned to see my father, who is worse. Am writing. Write me fully</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4375"></td>
        <td id="LC4375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by to-night&#39;s post to Ring. Wire me if necessary.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4376"></td>
        <td id="LC4376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4377"></td>
        <td id="LC4377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4378"></td>
        <td id="LC4378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter from Dr. Seward to Arthur Holmwood._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4379"></td>
        <td id="LC4379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4380"></td>
        <td id="LC4380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_2 September._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4381"></td>
        <td id="LC4381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4382"></td>
        <td id="LC4382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear old fellow,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4383"></td>
        <td id="LC4383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4384"></td>
        <td id="LC4384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;With regard to Miss Westenra&#39;s health I hasten to let you know at once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4385"></td>
        <td id="LC4385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that in my opinion there is not any functional disturbance or any malady</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4386"></td>
        <td id="LC4386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I know of. At the same time, I am not by any means satisfied with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4387"></td>
        <td id="LC4387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her appearance; she is woefully different from what she was when I saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4388"></td>
        <td id="LC4388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her last. Of course you must bear in mind that I did not have full</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4389"></td>
        <td id="LC4389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opportunity of examination such as I should wish; our very friendship</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4390"></td>
        <td id="LC4390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">makes a little difficulty which not even medical science or custom can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4391"></td>
        <td id="LC4391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bridge over. I had better tell you exactly what happened, leaving you to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4392"></td>
        <td id="LC4392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">draw, in a measure, your own conclusions. I shall then say what I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4393"></td>
        <td id="LC4393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done and propose doing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4394"></td>
        <td id="LC4394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4395"></td>
        <td id="LC4395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I found Miss Westenra in seemingly gay spirits. Her mother was present,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4396"></td>
        <td id="LC4396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in a few seconds I made up my mind that she was trying all she knew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4397"></td>
        <td id="LC4397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to mislead her mother and prevent her from being anxious. I have no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4398"></td>
        <td id="LC4398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubt she guesses, if she does not know, what need of caution there is.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4399"></td>
        <td id="LC4399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We lunched alone, and as we all exerted ourselves to be cheerful, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4400"></td>
        <td id="LC4400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got, as some kind of reward for our labours, some real cheerfulness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4401"></td>
        <td id="LC4401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amongst us. Then Mrs. Westenra went to lie down, and Lucy was left with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4402"></td>
        <td id="LC4402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. We went into her boudoir, and till we got there her gaiety remained,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4403"></td>
        <td id="LC4403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the servants were coming and going. As soon as the door was closed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4404"></td>
        <td id="LC4404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, the mask fell from her face, and she sank down into a chair</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4405"></td>
        <td id="LC4405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a great sigh, and hid her eyes with her hand. When I saw that her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4406"></td>
        <td id="LC4406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">high spirits had failed, I at once took advantage of her reaction to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4407"></td>
        <td id="LC4407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make a diagnosis. She said to me very sweetly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4408"></td>
        <td id="LC4408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4409"></td>
        <td id="LC4409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;&#39;I cannot tell you how I loathe talking about myself.&#39; I reminded her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4410"></td>
        <td id="LC4410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that a doctor&#39;s confidence was sacred, but that you were grievously</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4411"></td>
        <td id="LC4411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anxious about her. She caught on to my meaning at once, and settled that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4412"></td>
        <td id="LC4412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">matter in a word. &#39;Tell Arthur everything you choose. I do not care for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4413"></td>
        <td id="LC4413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself, but all for him!&#39; So I am quite free.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4414"></td>
        <td id="LC4414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4415"></td>
        <td id="LC4415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I could easily see that she is somewhat bloodless, but I could not see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4416"></td>
        <td id="LC4416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the usual anæmic signs, and by a chance I was actually able to test the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4417"></td>
        <td id="LC4417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quality of her blood, for in opening a window which was stiff a cord</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4418"></td>
        <td id="LC4418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave way, and she cut her hand slightly with broken glass. It was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4419"></td>
        <td id="LC4419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slight matter in itself, but it gave me an evident chance, and I secured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4420"></td>
        <td id="LC4420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a few drops of the blood and have analysed them. The qualitative</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4421"></td>
        <td id="LC4421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">analysis gives a quite normal condition, and shows, I should infer, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4422"></td>
        <td id="LC4422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">itself a vigorous state of health. In other physical matters I was quite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4423"></td>
        <td id="LC4423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfied that there is no need for anxiety; but as there must be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4424"></td>
        <td id="LC4424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cause somewhere, I have come to the conclusion that it must be something</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4425"></td>
        <td id="LC4425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mental. She complains of difficulty in breathing satisfactorily at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4426"></td>
        <td id="LC4426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">times, and of heavy, lethargic sleep, with dreams that frighten her, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4427"></td>
        <td id="LC4427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regarding which she can remember nothing. She says that as a child she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4428"></td>
        <td id="LC4428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">used to walk in her sleep, and that when in Whitby the habit came back,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4429"></td>
        <td id="LC4429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that once she walked out in the night and went to East Cliff, where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4430"></td>
        <td id="LC4430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Murray found her; but she assures me that of late the habit has not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4431"></td>
        <td id="LC4431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">returned. I am in doubt, and so have done the best thing I know of; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4432"></td>
        <td id="LC4432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have written to my old friend and master, Professor Van Helsing, of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4433"></td>
        <td id="LC4433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Amsterdam, who knows as much about obscure diseases as any one in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4434"></td>
        <td id="LC4434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world. I have asked him to come over, and as you told me that all things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4435"></td>
        <td id="LC4435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were to be at your charge, I have mentioned to him who you are and your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4436"></td>
        <td id="LC4436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relations to Miss Westenra. This, my dear fellow, is in obedience to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4437"></td>
        <td id="LC4437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your wishes, for I am only too proud and happy to do anything I can for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4438"></td>
        <td id="LC4438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her. Van Helsing would, I know, do anything for me for a personal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4439"></td>
        <td id="LC4439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reason, so, no matter on what ground he comes, we must accept his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4440"></td>
        <td id="LC4440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wishes. He is a seemingly arbitrary man, but this is because he knows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4441"></td>
        <td id="LC4441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what he is talking about better than any one else. He is a philosopher</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4442"></td>
        <td id="LC4442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a metaphysician, and one of the most advanced scientists of his day;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4443"></td>
        <td id="LC4443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he has, I believe, an absolutely open mind. This, with an iron</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4444"></td>
        <td id="LC4444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nerve, a temper of the ice-brook, an indomitable resolution,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4445"></td>
        <td id="LC4445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">self-command, and toleration exalted from virtues to blessings, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4446"></td>
        <td id="LC4446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kindliest and truest heart that beats--these form his equipment for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4447"></td>
        <td id="LC4447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noble work that he is doing for mankind--work both in theory and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4448"></td>
        <td id="LC4448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">practice, for his views are as wide as his all-embracing sympathy. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4449"></td>
        <td id="LC4449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tell you these facts that you may know why I have such confidence in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4450"></td>
        <td id="LC4450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. I have asked him to come at once. I shall see Miss Westenra</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4451"></td>
        <td id="LC4451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to-morrow again. She is to meet me at the Stores, so that I may not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4452"></td>
        <td id="LC4452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alarm her mother by too early a repetition of my call.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4453"></td>
        <td id="LC4453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4454"></td>
        <td id="LC4454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yours always,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4455"></td>
        <td id="LC4455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4456"></td>
        <td id="LC4456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;JOHN SEWARD.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4457"></td>
        <td id="LC4457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4458"></td>
        <td id="LC4458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4459"></td>
        <td id="LC4459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Abraham Van Helsing, M. D., D. Ph., D. Lit., etc., etc., to Dr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4460"></td>
        <td id="LC4460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Seward._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4461"></td>
        <td id="LC4461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4462"></td>
        <td id="LC4462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_2 September._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4463"></td>
        <td id="LC4463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4464"></td>
        <td id="LC4464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My good Friend,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4465"></td>
        <td id="LC4465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4466"></td>
        <td id="LC4466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;When I have received your letter I am already coming to you. By good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4467"></td>
        <td id="LC4467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortune I can leave just at once, without wrong to any of those who have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4468"></td>
        <td id="LC4468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trusted me. Were fortune other, then it were bad for those who have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4469"></td>
        <td id="LC4469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trusted, for I come to my friend when he call me to aid those he holds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4470"></td>
        <td id="LC4470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear. Tell your friend that when that time you suck from my wound so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4471"></td>
        <td id="LC4471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swiftly the poison of the gangrene from that knife that our other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4472"></td>
        <td id="LC4472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friend, too nervous, let slip, you did more for him when he wants my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4473"></td>
        <td id="LC4473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aids and you call for them than all his great fortune could do. But it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4474"></td>
        <td id="LC4474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is pleasure added to do for him, your friend; it is to you that I come.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4475"></td>
        <td id="LC4475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Have then rooms for me at the Great Eastern Hotel, so that I may be near</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4476"></td>
        <td id="LC4476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to hand, and please it so arrange that we may see the young lady not too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4477"></td>
        <td id="LC4477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">late on to-morrow, for it is likely that I may have to return here that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4478"></td>
        <td id="LC4478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night. But if need be I shall come again in three days, and stay longer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4479"></td>
        <td id="LC4479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if it must. Till then good-bye, my friend John.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4480"></td>
        <td id="LC4480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4481"></td>

        <td id="L4482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4482"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4483"></td>
