</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4484"></td>
        <td id="LC4484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Dr. Seward to Hon. Arthur Holmwood._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4485"></td>
        <td id="LC4485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4486"></td>
        <td id="LC4486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_3 September._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4487"></td>
        <td id="LC4487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4488"></td>
        <td id="LC4488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear Art,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4489"></td>
        <td id="LC4489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4490"></td>
        <td id="LC4490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Van Helsing has come and gone. He came on with me to Hillingham, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4491"></td>
        <td id="LC4491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found that, by Lucy&#39;s discretion, her mother was lunching out, so that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4492"></td>
        <td id="LC4492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we were alone with her. Van Helsing made a very careful examination of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4493"></td>
        <td id="LC4493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the patient. He is to report to me, and I shall advise you, for of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4494"></td>
        <td id="LC4494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course I was not present all the time. He is, I fear, much concerned,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4495"></td>
        <td id="LC4495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but says he must think. When I told him of our friendship and how you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4496"></td>
        <td id="LC4496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trust to me in the matter, he said: &#39;You must tell him all you think.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4497"></td>
        <td id="LC4497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tell him what I think, if you can guess it, if you will. Nay, I am not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4498"></td>
        <td id="LC4498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jesting. This is no jest, but life and death, perhaps more.&#39; I asked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4499"></td>
        <td id="LC4499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what he meant by that, for he was very serious. This was when we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4500"></td>
        <td id="LC4500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come back to town, and he was having a cup of tea before starting on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4501"></td>
        <td id="LC4501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">return to Amsterdam. He would not give me any further clue. You must not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4502"></td>
        <td id="LC4502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be angry with me, Art, because his very reticence means that all his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4503"></td>
        <td id="LC4503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brains are working for her good. He will speak plainly enough when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4504"></td>
        <td id="LC4504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time comes, be sure. So I told him I would simply write an account of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4505"></td>
        <td id="LC4505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our visit, just as if I were doing a descriptive special article for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4506"></td>
        <td id="LC4506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_The Daily Telegraph_. He seemed not to notice, but remarked that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4507"></td>
        <td id="LC4507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smuts in London were not quite so bad as they used to be when he was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4508"></td>
        <td id="LC4508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">student here. I am to get his report to-morrow if he can possibly make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4509"></td>
        <td id="LC4509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. In any case I am to have a letter.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4510"></td>
        <td id="LC4510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4511"></td>
        <td id="LC4511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, as to the visit. Lucy was more cheerful than on the day I first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4512"></td>
        <td id="LC4512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw her, and certainly looked better. She had lost something of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4513"></td>
        <td id="LC4513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ghastly look that so upset you, and her breathing was normal. She was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4514"></td>
        <td id="LC4514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very sweet to the professor (as she always is), and tried to make him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4515"></td>
        <td id="LC4515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel at ease; though I could see that the poor girl was making a hard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4516"></td>
        <td id="LC4516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struggle for it. I believe Van Helsing saw it, too, for I saw the quick</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4517"></td>
        <td id="LC4517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">look under his bushy brows that I knew of old. Then he began to chat of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4518"></td>
        <td id="LC4518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all things except ourselves and diseases and with such an infinite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4519"></td>
        <td id="LC4519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">geniality that I could see poor Lucy&#39;s pretense of animation merge into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4520"></td>
        <td id="LC4520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reality. Then, without any seeming change, he brought the conversation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4521"></td>
        <td id="LC4521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gently round to his visit, and suavely said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4522"></td>
        <td id="LC4522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4523"></td>
        <td id="LC4523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;&#39;My dear young miss, I have the so great pleasure because you are so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4524"></td>
        <td id="LC4524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much beloved. That is much, my dear, ever were there that which I do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4525"></td>
        <td id="LC4525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see. They told me you were down in the spirit, and that you were of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4526"></td>
        <td id="LC4526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ghastly pale. To them I say: &quot;Pouf!&quot;&#39; And he snapped his fingers at me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4527"></td>
        <td id="LC4527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and went on: &#39;But you and I shall show them how wrong they are. How can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4528"></td>
        <td id="LC4528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he&#39;--and he pointed at me with the same look and gesture as that with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4529"></td>
        <td id="LC4529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which once he pointed me out to his class, on, or rather after, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4530"></td>
        <td id="LC4530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular occasion which he never fails to remind me of--&#39;know anything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4531"></td>
        <td id="LC4531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a young ladies? He has his madams to play with, and to bring them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4532"></td>
        <td id="LC4532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back to happiness, and to those that love them. It is much to do, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4533"></td>
        <td id="LC4533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oh, but there are rewards, in that we can bestow such happiness. But the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4534"></td>
        <td id="LC4534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young ladies! He has no wife nor daughter, and the young do not tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4535"></td>
        <td id="LC4535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves to the young, but to the old, like me, who have known so many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4536"></td>
        <td id="LC4536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sorrows and the causes of them. So, my dear, we will send him away to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4537"></td>
        <td id="LC4537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smoke the cigarette in the garden, whiles you and I have little talk all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4538"></td>
        <td id="LC4538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to ourselves.&#39; I took the hint, and strolled about, and presently the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4539"></td>
        <td id="LC4539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">professor came to the window and called me in. He looked grave, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4540"></td>
        <td id="LC4540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said: &#39;I have made careful examination, but there is no functional</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4541"></td>
        <td id="LC4541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cause. With you I agree that there has been much blood lost; it has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4542"></td>
        <td id="LC4542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been, but is not. But the conditions of her are in no way anæmic. I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4543"></td>
        <td id="LC4543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asked her to send me her maid, that I may ask just one or two question,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4544"></td>
        <td id="LC4544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that so I may not chance to miss nothing. I know well what she will say.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4545"></td>
        <td id="LC4545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And yet there is cause; there is always cause for everything. I must go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4546"></td>
        <td id="LC4546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back home and think. You must send to me the telegram every day; and if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4547"></td>
        <td id="LC4547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there be cause I shall come again. The disease--for not to be all well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4548"></td>
        <td id="LC4548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a disease--interest me, and the sweet young dear, she interest me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4549"></td>
        <td id="LC4549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too. She charm me, and for her, if not for you or disease, I come.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4550"></td>
        <td id="LC4550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4551"></td>
        <td id="LC4551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;As I tell you, he would not say a word more, even when we were alone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4552"></td>
        <td id="LC4552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so now, Art, you know all I know. I shall keep stern watch. I trust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4553"></td>
        <td id="LC4553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your poor father is rallying. It must be a terrible thing to you, my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4554"></td>
        <td id="LC4554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear old fellow, to be placed in such a position between two people who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4555"></td>
        <td id="LC4555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are both so dear to you. I know your idea of duty to your father, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4556"></td>
        <td id="LC4556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you are right to stick to it; but, if need be, I shall send you word to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4557"></td>
        <td id="LC4557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come at once to Lucy; so do not be over-anxious unless you hear from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4558"></td>
        <td id="LC4558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4559"></td>
        <td id="LC4559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4560"></td>
        <td id="LC4560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4561"></td>
        <td id="LC4561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4562"></td>
        <td id="LC4562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4563"></td>
        <td id="LC4563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_4 September._--Zoöphagous patient still keeps up our interest in him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4564"></td>
        <td id="LC4564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had only one outburst and that was yesterday at an unusual time. Just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4565"></td>
        <td id="LC4565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the stroke of noon he began to grow restless. The attendant knew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4566"></td>
        <td id="LC4566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the symptoms, and at once summoned aid. Fortunately the men came at a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4567"></td>
        <td id="LC4567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">run, and were just in time, for at the stroke of noon he became so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4568"></td>
        <td id="LC4568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">violent that it took all their strength to hold him. In about five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4569"></td>
        <td id="LC4569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minutes, however, he began to get more and more quiet, and finally sank</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4570"></td>
        <td id="LC4570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into a sort of melancholy, in which state he has remained up to now. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4571"></td>
        <td id="LC4571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attendant tells me that his screams whilst in the paroxysm were really</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4572"></td>
        <td id="LC4572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appalling; I found my hands full when I got in, attending to some of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4573"></td>
        <td id="LC4573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other patients who were frightened by him. Indeed, I can quite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4574"></td>
        <td id="LC4574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understand the effect, for the sounds disturbed even me, though I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4575"></td>
        <td id="LC4575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some distance away. It is now after the dinner-hour of the asylum, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4576"></td>
        <td id="LC4576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as yet my patient sits in a corner brooding, with a dull, sullen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4577"></td>
        <td id="LC4577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woe-begone look in his face, which seems rather to indicate than to show</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4578"></td>
        <td id="LC4578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something directly. I cannot quite understand it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4579"></td>
        <td id="LC4579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4580"></td>
        <td id="LC4580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4581"></td>
        <td id="LC4581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4582"></td>
        <td id="LC4582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--Another change in my patient. At five o&#39;clock I looked in on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4583"></td>
        <td id="LC4583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, and found him seemingly as happy and contented as he used to be. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4584"></td>
        <td id="LC4584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was catching flies and eating them, and was keeping note of his capture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4585"></td>
        <td id="LC4585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by making nail-marks on the edge of the door between the ridges of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4586"></td>
        <td id="LC4586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">padding. When he saw me, he came over and apologised for his bad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4587"></td>
        <td id="LC4587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conduct, and asked me in a very humble, cringing way to be led back to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4588"></td>
        <td id="LC4588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his own room and to have his note-book again. I thought it well to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4589"></td>
        <td id="LC4589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">humour him: so he is back in his room with the window open. He has the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4590"></td>
        <td id="LC4590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sugar of his tea spread out on the window-sill, and is reaping quite a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4591"></td>
        <td id="LC4591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harvest of flies. He is not now eating them, but putting them into a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4592"></td>
        <td id="LC4592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">box, as of old, and is already examining the corners of his room to find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4593"></td>
        <td id="LC4593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a spider. I tried to get him to talk about the past few days, for any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4594"></td>
        <td id="LC4594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clue to his thoughts would be of immense help to me; but he would not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4595"></td>
        <td id="LC4595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rise. For a moment or two he looked very sad, and said in a sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4596"></td>
        <td id="LC4596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far-away voice, as though saying it rather to himself than to me:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4597"></td>
        <td id="LC4597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4598"></td>
        <td id="LC4598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;All over! all over! He has deserted me. No hope for me now unless I do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4599"></td>
        <td id="LC4599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it for myself!&quot; Then suddenly turning to me in a resolute way, he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4600"></td>
        <td id="LC4600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Doctor, won&#39;t you be very good to me and let me have a little more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4601"></td>
        <td id="LC4601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sugar? I think it would be good for me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4602"></td>
        <td id="LC4602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4603"></td>
        <td id="LC4603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And the flies?&quot; I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4604"></td>
        <td id="LC4604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4605"></td>
        <td id="LC4605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes! The flies like it, too, and I like the flies; therefore I like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4606"></td>
        <td id="LC4606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it.&quot; And there are people who know so little as to think that madmen do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4607"></td>
        <td id="LC4607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not argue. I procured him a double supply, and left him as happy a man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4608"></td>
        <td id="LC4608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as, I suppose, any in the world. I wish I could fathom his mind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4609"></td>
        <td id="LC4609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4610"></td>
        <td id="LC4610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4611"></td>
        <td id="LC4611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4612"></td>
        <td id="LC4612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Midnight._--Another change in him. I had been to see Miss Westenra,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4613"></td>
        <td id="LC4613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom I found much better, and had just returned, and was standing at our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4614"></td>
        <td id="LC4614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own gate looking at the sunset, when once more I heard him yelling. As</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4615"></td>
        <td id="LC4615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his room is on this side of the house, I could hear it better than in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4616"></td>
        <td id="LC4616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the morning. It was a shock to me to turn from the wonderful smoky</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4617"></td>
        <td id="LC4617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beauty of a sunset over London, with its lurid lights and inky shadows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4618"></td>
        <td id="LC4618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and all the marvellous tints that come on foul clouds even as on foul</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4619"></td>
        <td id="LC4619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water, and to realise all the grim sternness of my own cold stone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4620"></td>
        <td id="LC4620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">building, with its wealth of breathing misery, and my own desolate heart</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4621"></td>
        <td id="LC4621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to endure it all. I reached him just as the sun was going down, and from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4622"></td>
        <td id="LC4622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his window saw the red disc sink. As it sank he became less and less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4623"></td>
        <td id="LC4623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frenzied; and just as it dipped he slid from the hands that held him, an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4624"></td>
        <td id="LC4624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inert mass, on the floor. It is wonderful, however, what intellectual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4625"></td>
        <td id="LC4625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recuperative power lunatics have, for within a few minutes he stood up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4626"></td>
        <td id="LC4626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite calmly and looked around him. I signalled to the attendants not to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4627"></td>
        <td id="LC4627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hold him, for I was anxious to see what he would do. He went straight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4628"></td>
        <td id="LC4628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over to the window and brushed out the crumbs of sugar; then he took his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4629"></td>
        <td id="LC4629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fly-box, and emptied it outside, and threw away the box; then he shut</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4630"></td>
        <td id="LC4630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the window, and crossing over, sat down on his bed. All this surprised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4631"></td>
        <td id="LC4631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, so I asked him: &quot;Are you not going to keep flies any more?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4632"></td>
        <td id="LC4632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4633"></td>
        <td id="LC4633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No,&quot; said he; &quot;I am sick of all that rubbish!&quot; He certainly is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4634"></td>
        <td id="LC4634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonderfully interesting study. I wish I could get some glimpse of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4635"></td>
        <td id="LC4635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind or of the cause of his sudden passion. Stop; there may be a clue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4636"></td>
        <td id="LC4636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after all, if we can find why to-day his paroxysms came on at high noon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4637"></td>
        <td id="LC4637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and at sunset. Can it be that there is a malign influence of the sun at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4638"></td>
        <td id="LC4638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">periods which affects certain natures--as at times the moon does others?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4639"></td>
        <td id="LC4639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We shall see.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4640"></td>
        <td id="LC4640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4641"></td>
        <td id="LC4641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4642"></td>
        <td id="LC4642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Telegram, Seward, London, to Van Helsing, Amsterdam._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4643"></td>
        <td id="LC4643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4644"></td>
        <td id="LC4644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_4 September._--Patient still better to-day.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4645"></td>
        <td id="LC4645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4646"></td>
        <td id="LC4646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4647"></td>
        <td id="LC4647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Telegram, Seward, London, to Van Helsing, Amsterdam._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4648"></td>
        <td id="LC4648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4649"></td>
        <td id="LC4649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_5 September._--Patient greatly improved. Good appetite; sleeps</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4650"></td>
        <td id="LC4650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">naturally; good spirits; colour coming back.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4651"></td>
        <td id="LC4651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4652"></td>
        <td id="LC4652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4653"></td>
        <td id="LC4653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Telegram, Seward, London, to Van Helsing, Amsterdam._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4654"></td>
        <td id="LC4654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4655"></td>
        <td id="LC4655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_6 September._--Terrible change for the worse. Come at once; do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4656"></td>
        <td id="LC4656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lose an hour. I hold over telegram to Holmwood till have seen you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4657"></td>
        <td id="LC4657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4658"></td>
        <td id="LC4658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4659"></td>
        <td id="LC4659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4660"></td>
        <td id="LC4660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4661"></td>
        <td id="LC4661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER X</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4662"></td>
        <td id="LC4662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4663"></td>
        <td id="LC4663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4664"></td>
        <td id="LC4664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Dr. Seward to Hon. Arthur Holmwood._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4665"></td>
        <td id="LC4665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4666"></td>
        <td id="LC4666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_6 September._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4667"></td>
        <td id="LC4667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4668"></td>
        <td id="LC4668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear Art,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4669"></td>
        <td id="LC4669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4670"></td>
        <td id="LC4670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My news to-day is not so good. Lucy this morning had gone back a bit.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4671"></td>
        <td id="LC4671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is, however, one good thing which has arisen from it; Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4672"></td>
        <td id="LC4672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Westenra was naturally anxious concerning Lucy, and has consulted me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4673"></td>
        <td id="LC4673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">professionally about her. I took advantage of the opportunity, and told</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4674"></td>
        <td id="LC4674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her that my old master, Van Helsing, the great specialist, was coming to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4675"></td>
        <td id="LC4675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stay with me, and that I would put her in his charge conjointly with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4676"></td>
        <td id="LC4676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself; so now we can come and go without alarming her unduly, for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4677"></td>
        <td id="LC4677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shock to her would mean sudden death, and this, in Lucy&#39;s weak</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4678"></td>
        <td id="LC4678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">condition, might be disastrous to her. We are hedged in with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4679"></td>
        <td id="LC4679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficulties, all of us, my poor old fellow; but, please God, we shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4680"></td>
        <td id="LC4680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come through them all right. If any need I shall write, so that, if you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4681"></td>
        <td id="LC4681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do not hear from me, take it for granted that I am simply waiting for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4682"></td>
        <td id="LC4682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">news. In haste</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4683"></td>
        <td id="LC4683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4684"></td>
        <td id="LC4684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yours ever,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4685"></td>
        <td id="LC4685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4686"></td>
        <td id="LC4686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;JOHN SEWARD.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4687"></td>
        <td id="LC4687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4688"></td>
        <td id="LC4688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4689"></td>
        <td id="LC4689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4690"></td>
        <td id="LC4690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4691"></td>
        <td id="LC4691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_7 September._--The first thing Van Helsing said to me when we met at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4692"></td>
        <td id="LC4692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Liverpool Street was:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4693"></td>
        <td id="LC4693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4694"></td>
        <td id="LC4694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Have you said anything to our young friend the lover of her?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4695"></td>
        <td id="LC4695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4696"></td>
        <td id="LC4696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No,&quot; I said. &quot;I waited till I had seen you, as I said in my telegram. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4697"></td>
        <td id="LC4697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrote him a letter simply telling him that you were coming, as Miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4698"></td>
        <td id="LC4698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Westenra was not so well, and that I should let him know if need be.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4699"></td>
        <td id="LC4699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4700"></td>
        <td id="LC4700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Right, my friend,&quot; he said, &quot;quite right! Better he not know as yet;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4701"></td>
        <td id="LC4701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perhaps he shall never know. I pray so; but if it be needed, then he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4702"></td>
        <td id="LC4702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall know all. And, my good friend John, let me caution you. You deal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4703"></td>
        <td id="LC4703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the madmen. All men are mad in some way or the other; and inasmuch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4704"></td>
        <td id="LC4704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as you deal discreetly with your madmen, so deal with God&#39;s madmen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4705"></td>
        <td id="LC4705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too--the rest of the world. You tell not your madmen what you do nor why</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4706"></td>
        <td id="LC4706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you do it; you tell them not what you think. So you shall keep knowledge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4707"></td>
        <td id="LC4707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in its place, where it may rest--where it may gather its kind around it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4708"></td>
        <td id="LC4708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and breed. You and I shall keep as yet what we know here, and here.&quot; He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4709"></td>
        <td id="LC4709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">touched me on the heart and on the forehead, and then touched himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4710"></td>
        <td id="LC4710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same way. &quot;I have for myself thoughts at the present. Later I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4711"></td>
        <td id="LC4711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unfold to you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4712"></td>
        <td id="LC4712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4713"></td>
        <td id="LC4713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why not now?&quot; I asked. &quot;It may do some good; we may arrive at some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4714"></td>
        <td id="LC4714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">decision.&quot; He stopped and looked at me, and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4715"></td>
        <td id="LC4715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4716"></td>
        <td id="LC4716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My friend John, when the corn is grown, even before it has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4717"></td>
        <td id="LC4717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ripened--while the milk of its mother-earth is in him, and the sunshine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4718"></td>
        <td id="LC4718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has not yet begun to paint him with his gold, the husbandman he pull the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4719"></td>
        <td id="LC4719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ear and rub him between his rough hands, and blow away the green chaff,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4720"></td>
        <td id="LC4720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and say to you: &#39;Look! he&#39;s good corn; he will make good crop when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4721"></td>
        <td id="LC4721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time comes.&#39;&quot; I did not see the application, and told him so. For reply</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4722"></td>
        <td id="LC4722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he reached over and took my ear in his hand and pulled it playfully, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4723"></td>
        <td id="LC4723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he used long ago to do at lectures, and said: &quot;The good husbandman tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4724"></td>
        <td id="LC4724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you so then because he knows, but not till then. But you do not find the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4725"></td>
        <td id="LC4725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good husbandman dig up his planted corn to see if he grow; that is for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4726"></td>
        <td id="LC4726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the children who play at husbandry, and not for those who take it as of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4727"></td>
        <td id="LC4727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the work of their life. See you now, friend John? I have sown my corn,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4728"></td>
        <td id="LC4728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Nature has her work to do in making it sprout; if he sprout at all,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4729"></td>
        <td id="LC4729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there&#39;s some promise; and I wait till the ear begins to swell.&quot; He broke</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4730"></td>
        <td id="LC4730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off, for he evidently saw that I understood. Then he went on, and very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4731"></td>
        <td id="LC4731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gravely:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4732"></td>
        <td id="LC4732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4733"></td>
        <td id="LC4733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You were always a careful student, and your case-book was ever more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4734"></td>
        <td id="LC4734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">full than the rest. You were only student then; now you are master, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4735"></td>
        <td id="LC4735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I trust that good habit have not fail. Remember, my friend, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4736"></td>
        <td id="LC4736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge is stronger than memory, and we should not trust the weaker.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4737"></td>
        <td id="LC4737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Even if you have not kept the good practise, let me tell you that this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4738"></td>
        <td id="LC4738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">case of our dear miss is one that may be--mind, I say _may be_--of such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4739"></td>
        <td id="LC4739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest to us and others that all the rest may not make him kick the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4740"></td>
        <td id="LC4740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beam, as your peoples say. Take then good note of it. Nothing is too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4741"></td>
        <td id="LC4741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">small. I counsel you, put down in record even your doubts and surmises.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4742"></td>
        <td id="LC4742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hereafter it may be of interest to you to see how true you guess. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4743"></td>
        <td id="LC4743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learn from failure, not from success!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4744"></td>
        <td id="LC4744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4745"></td>
        <td id="LC4745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I described Lucy&#39;s symptoms--the same as before, but infinitely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4746"></td>
        <td id="LC4746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more marked--he looked very grave, but said nothing. He took with him a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4747"></td>
        <td id="LC4747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bag in which were many instruments and drugs, &quot;the ghastly paraphernalia</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4748"></td>
        <td id="LC4748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of our beneficial trade,&quot; as he once called, in one of his lectures, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4749"></td>
        <td id="LC4749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">equipment of a professor of the healing craft. When we were shown in,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4750"></td>
        <td id="LC4750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Westenra met us. She was alarmed, but not nearly so much as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4751"></td>
        <td id="LC4751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expected to find her. Nature in one of her beneficent moods has ordained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4752"></td>
        <td id="LC4752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that even death has some antidote to its own terrors. Here, in a case</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4753"></td>
        <td id="LC4753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where any shock may prove fatal, matters are so ordered that, from some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4754"></td>
        <td id="LC4754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cause or other, the things not personal--even the terrible change in her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4755"></td>
        <td id="LC4755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daughter to whom she is so attached--do not seem to reach her. It is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4756"></td>
        <td id="LC4756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something like the way Dame Nature gathers round a foreign body an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4757"></td>
        <td id="LC4757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">envelope of some insensitive tissue which can protect from evil that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4758"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4759"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4760"></td>

        <td id="L4762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4762"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4763"></td>
        <td id="LC4763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I used my knowledge of this phase of spiritual pathology, and laid down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4764"></td>
        <td id="LC4764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a rule that she should not be present with Lucy or think of her illness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4765"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4766"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L4786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4786"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4813"></td>

        <td id="L4818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4818"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4821"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4827"></td>

        <td id="L4828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4828"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4829"></td>

        <td id="LC4830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understand----&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4831"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4832"></td>
        <td id="LC4832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He stopped, with a sort of choke in his voice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4833"></td>
        <td id="LC4833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4834"></td>
        <td id="LC4834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good boy!&quot; said Van Helsing. &quot;In the not-so-far-off you will be happy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4835"></td>

        <td id="L4926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4926"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4927"></td>
        <td id="LC4927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We are the best nurses, you and I. You keep watch all night; see that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4928"></td>
        <td id="LC4928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she is well fed, and that nothing disturbs her. You must not sleep all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4929"></td>
        <td id="LC4929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the night. Later on we can sleep, you and I. I shall be back as soon as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4930"></td>
        <td id="LC4930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possible. And then we may begin.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4931"></td>
        <td id="LC4931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4932"></td>
        <td id="LC4932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;May begin?&quot; I said. &quot;What on earth do you mean?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4933"></td>
        <td id="LC4933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4934"></td>
        <td id="LC4934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We shall see!&quot; he answered, as he hurried out. He came back a moment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4935"></td>
        <td id="LC4935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">later and put his head inside the door and said with warning finger held</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4936"></td>
        <td id="LC4936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4937"></td>
        <td id="LC4937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4938"></td>
        <td id="LC4938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Remember, she is your charge. If you leave her, and harm befall, you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4939"></td>
        <td id="LC4939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall not sleep easy hereafter!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4940"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4941"></td>
