</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4942"></td>
        <td id="LC4942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary--continued._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4943"></td>
        <td id="LC4943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4944"></td>
        <td id="LC4944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_8 September._--I sat up all night with Lucy. The opiate worked itself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4945"></td>
        <td id="LC4945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off towards dusk, and she waked naturally; she looked a different being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4946"></td>
        <td id="LC4946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from what she had been before the operation. Her spirits even were good,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4947"></td>
        <td id="LC4947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and she was full of a happy vivacity, but I could see evidences of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4948"></td>
        <td id="LC4948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absolute prostration which she had undergone. When I told Mrs. Westenra</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4949"></td>
        <td id="LC4949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Dr. Van Helsing had directed that I should sit up with her she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4950"></td>
        <td id="LC4950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost pooh-poohed the idea, pointing out her daughter&#39;s renewed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4951"></td>
        <td id="LC4951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strength and excellent spirits. I was firm, however, and made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4952"></td>
        <td id="LC4952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preparations for my long vigil. When her maid had prepared her for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4953"></td>
        <td id="LC4953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night I came in, having in the meantime had supper, and took a seat by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4954"></td>
        <td id="LC4954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bedside. She did not in any way make objection, but looked at me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4955"></td>
        <td id="LC4955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gratefully whenever I caught her eye. After a long spell she seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4956"></td>
        <td id="LC4956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sinking off to sleep, but with an effort seemed to pull herself together</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4957"></td>
        <td id="LC4957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and shook it off. This was repeated several times, with greater effort</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4958"></td>
        <td id="LC4958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and with shorter pauses as the time moved on. It was apparent that she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4959"></td>
        <td id="LC4959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did not want to sleep, so I tackled the subject at once:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4960"></td>
        <td id="LC4960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4961"></td>
        <td id="LC4961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You do not want to go to sleep?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4962"></td>
        <td id="LC4962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4963"></td>
        <td id="LC4963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No; I am afraid.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4964"></td>
        <td id="LC4964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4965"></td>
        <td id="LC4965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Afraid to go to sleep! Why so? It is the boon we all crave for.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4966"></td>
        <td id="LC4966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4967"></td>
        <td id="LC4967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah, not if you were like me--if sleep was to you a presage of horror!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4968"></td>
        <td id="LC4968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4969"></td>
        <td id="LC4969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;A presage of horror! What on earth do you mean?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4970"></td>
        <td id="LC4970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4971"></td>
        <td id="LC4971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I don&#39;t know; oh, I don&#39;t know. And that is what is so terrible. All</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4972"></td>
        <td id="LC4972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this weakness comes to me in sleep; until I dread the very thought.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4973"></td>
        <td id="LC4973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4974"></td>
        <td id="LC4974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But, my dear girl, you may sleep to-night. I am here watching you, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4975"></td>
        <td id="LC4975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I can promise that nothing will happen.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4976"></td>
        <td id="LC4976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4977"></td>
        <td id="LC4977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah, I can trust you!&quot; I seized the opportunity, and said: &quot;I promise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4978"></td>
        <td id="LC4978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you that if I see any evidence of bad dreams I will wake you at once.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4979"></td>
        <td id="LC4979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4980"></td>
        <td id="LC4980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You will? Oh, will you really? How good you are to me. Then I will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4981"></td>
        <td id="LC4981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep!&quot; And almost at the word she gave a deep sigh of relief, and sank</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4982"></td>
        <td id="LC4982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back, asleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4983"></td>
        <td id="LC4983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4984"></td>
        <td id="LC4984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All night long I watched by her. She never stirred, but slept on and on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4985"></td>
        <td id="LC4985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a deep, tranquil, life-giving, health-giving sleep. Her lips were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4986"></td>
        <td id="LC4986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slightly parted, and her breast rose and fell with the regularity of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4987"></td>
        <td id="LC4987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pendulum. There was a smile on her face, and it was evident that no bad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4988"></td>
        <td id="LC4988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreams had come to disturb her peace of mind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4989"></td>
        <td id="LC4989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4990"></td>
        <td id="LC4990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the early morning her maid came, and I left her in her care and took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4991"></td>
        <td id="LC4991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself back home, for I was anxious about many things. I sent a short</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4992"></td>
        <td id="LC4992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wire to Van Helsing and to Arthur, telling them of the excellent result</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4993"></td>
        <td id="LC4993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the operation. My own work, with its manifold arrears, took me all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4994"></td>
        <td id="LC4994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">day to clear off; it was dark when I was able to inquire about my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4995"></td>
        <td id="LC4995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">zoöphagous patient. The report was good; he had been quite quiet for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4996"></td>
        <td id="LC4996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">past day and night. A telegram came from Van Helsing at Amsterdam whilst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4997"></td>
        <td id="LC4997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was at dinner, suggesting that I should be at Hillingham to-night, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4998"></td>
        <td id="LC4998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it might be well to be at hand, and stating that he was leaving by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4999"></td>
        <td id="LC4999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night mail and would join me early in the morning.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5000"></td>
        <td id="LC5000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5001"></td>
        <td id="LC5001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5002"></td>
        <td id="LC5002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5003"></td>
        <td id="LC5003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_9 September_.--I was pretty tired and worn out when I got to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5004"></td>
        <td id="LC5004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hillingham. For two nights I had hardly had a wink of sleep, and my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5005"></td>
        <td id="LC5005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brain was beginning to feel that numbness which marks cerebral</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5006"></td>
        <td id="LC5006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exhaustion. Lucy was up and in cheerful spirits. When she shook hands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5007"></td>
        <td id="LC5007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with me she looked sharply in my face and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5008"></td>
        <td id="LC5008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5009"></td>
        <td id="LC5009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No sitting up to-night for you. You are worn out. I am quite well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5010"></td>
        <td id="LC5010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again; indeed, I am; and if there is to be any sitting up, it is I who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5011"></td>
        <td id="LC5011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will sit up with you.&quot; I would not argue the point, but went and had my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5012"></td>
        <td id="LC5012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supper. Lucy came with me, and, enlivened by her charming presence, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5013"></td>
        <td id="LC5013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made an excellent meal, and had a couple of glasses of the more than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5014"></td>
        <td id="LC5014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excellent port. Then Lucy took me upstairs, and showed me a room next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5015"></td>
        <td id="LC5015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her own, where a cozy fire was burning. &quot;Now,&quot; she said, &quot;you must stay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5016"></td>
        <td id="LC5016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here. I shall leave this door open and my door too. You can lie on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5017"></td>
        <td id="LC5017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sofa for I know that nothing would induce any of you doctors to go to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5018"></td>
        <td id="LC5018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed whilst there is a patient above the horizon. If I want anything I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5019"></td>
        <td id="LC5019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall call out, and you can come to me at once.&quot; I could not but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5020"></td>
        <td id="LC5020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquiesce, for I was &quot;dog-tired,&quot; and could not have sat up had I tried.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5021"></td>
        <td id="LC5021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So, on her renewing her promise to call me if she should want anything,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5022"></td>
        <td id="LC5022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I lay on the sofa, and forgot all about everything.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5023"></td>
        <td id="LC5023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5024"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5025"></td>
        <td id="LC5025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Lucy Westenra&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5026"></td>
        <td id="LC5026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5027"></td>
        <td id="LC5027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_9 September._--I feel so happy to-night. I have been so miserably weak,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5028"></td>
        <td id="LC5028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that to be able to think and move about is like feeling sunshine after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5029"></td>
        <td id="LC5029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a long spell of east wind out of a steel sky. Somehow Arthur feels very,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5030"></td>
        <td id="LC5030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very close to me. I seem to feel his presence warm about me. I suppose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5031"></td>
        <td id="LC5031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is that sickness and weakness are selfish things and turn our inner</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5032"></td>
        <td id="LC5032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes and sympathy on ourselves, whilst health and strength give Love</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5033"></td>
        <td id="LC5033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rein, and in thought and feeling he can wander where he wills. I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5034"></td>
        <td id="LC5034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where my thoughts are. If Arthur only knew! My dear, my dear, your ears</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5035"></td>
        <td id="LC5035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must tingle as you sleep, as mine do waking. Oh, the blissful rest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5036"></td>
        <td id="LC5036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last night! How I slept, with that dear, good Dr. Seward watching me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5037"></td>
        <td id="LC5037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And to-night I shall not fear to sleep, since he is close at hand and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5038"></td>
        <td id="LC5038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">within call. Thank everybody for being so good to me! Thank God!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5039"></td>
        <td id="LC5039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Good-night, Arthur.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5040"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5042"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5044"></td>
        <td id="LC5044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_10 September._--I was conscious of the Professor&#39;s hand on my head, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5045"></td>
        <td id="LC5045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">started awake all in a second. That is one of the things that we learn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5046"></td>
        <td id="LC5046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in an asylum, at any rate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5047"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5048"></td>
        <td id="LC5048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And how is our patient?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5049"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5050"></td>
        <td id="LC5050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, when I left her, or rather when she left me,&quot; I answered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5051"></td>
        <td id="LC5051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5052"></td>
        <td id="LC5052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Come, let us see,&quot; he said. And together we went into the room.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5053"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5054"></td>
        <td id="LC5054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The blind was down, and I went over to raise it gently, whilst Van</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5055"></td>
        <td id="LC5055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helsing stepped, with his soft, cat-like tread, over to the bed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5056"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5057"></td>
        <td id="LC5057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As I raised the blind, and the morning sunlight flooded the room, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5058"></td>
        <td id="LC5058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard the Professor&#39;s low hiss of inspiration, and knowing its rarity, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5059"></td>
        <td id="LC5059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deadly fear shot through my heart. As I passed over he moved back, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5060"></td>
        <td id="LC5060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his exclamation of horror, &quot;Gott in Himmel!&quot; needed no enforcement from</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5062"></td>
        <td id="LC5062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">iron face was drawn and ashen white. I felt my knees begin to tremble.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5063"></td>
        <td id="LC5063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5064"></td>
        <td id="LC5064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There on the bed, seemingly in a swoon, lay poor Lucy, more horribly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5065"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5066"></td>
        <td id="LC5066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed to have shrunken back from the teeth, as we sometimes see in a</td>

        <td id="L5067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5067"></td>
        <td id="LC5067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corpse after a prolonged illness. Van Helsing raised his foot to stamp</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5068"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5071"></td>
        <td id="LC5071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He wetted the poor white lips with it, and together we rubbed palm and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5072"></td>

        <td id="L5073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5073"></td>
        <td id="LC5073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspense said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5074"></td>
        <td id="LC5074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5075"></td>
        <td id="LC5075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It is not too late. It beats, though but feebly. All our work is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5076"></td>
        <td id="LC5076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">undone; we must begin again. There is no young Arthur here now; I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5077"></td>
        <td id="LC5077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to call on you yourself this time, friend John.&quot; As he spoke, he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5078"></td>
        <td id="LC5078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dipping into his bag and producing the instruments for transfusion; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5079"></td>
        <td id="LC5079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had taken off my coat and rolled up my shirt-sleeve. There was no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5080"></td>
        <td id="LC5080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possibility of an opiate just at present, and no need of one; and so,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5081"></td>
        <td id="LC5081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without a moment&#39;s delay, we began the operation. After a time--it did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5082"></td>
        <td id="LC5082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not seem a short time either, for the draining away of one&#39;s blood, no</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5083"></td>
        <td id="LC5083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">matter how willingly it be given, is a terrible feeling--Van Helsing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5084"></td>
        <td id="LC5084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">held up a warning finger. &quot;Do not stir,&quot; he said, &quot;but I fear that with</td>

        <td id="L5085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5085"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5087"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5088"></td>
        <td id="LC5088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intent. The effect on Lucy was not bad, for the faint seemed to merge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5089"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC5091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cheeks and lips. No man knows, till he experiences it, what it is to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC5092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel his own life-blood drawn away into the veins of the woman he loves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5093"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5094"></td>
        <td id="LC5094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Professor watched me critically. &quot;That will do,&quot; he said. &quot;Already?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5095"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5096"></td>
        <td id="LC5096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smiled a sad sort of smile as he replied:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5097"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5098"></td>
        <td id="LC5098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;He is her lover, her _fiancé_. You have work, much work, to do for her</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5099"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5100"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5101"></td>
        <td id="LC5101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When we stopped the operation, he attended to Lucy, whilst I applied</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5102"></td>
        <td id="LC5102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">digital pressure to my own incision. I laid down, whilst I waited his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5103"></td>
        <td id="LC5103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leisure to attend to me, for I felt faint and a little sick. By-and-by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5104"></td>
        <td id="LC5104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he bound up my wound, and sent me downstairs to get a glass of wine for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5105"></td>
        <td id="LC5105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself. As I was leaving the room, he came after me, and half</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5106"></td>
        <td id="LC5106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whispered:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5107"></td>
        <td id="LC5107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5108"></td>
        <td id="LC5108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Mind, nothing must be said of this. If our young lover should turn up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5109"></td>
        <td id="LC5109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unexpected, as before, no word to him. It would at once frighten him and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5110"></td>
        <td id="LC5110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enjealous him, too. There must be none. So!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5111"></td>
        <td id="LC5111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5112"></td>
        <td id="LC5112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I came back he looked at me carefully, and then said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5113"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5114"></td>
        <td id="LC5114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You are not much the worse. Go into the room, and lie on your sofa, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5115"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5116"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5117"></td>
        <td id="LC5117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I followed out his orders, for I knew how right and wise they were. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5118"></td>
        <td id="LC5118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had done my part, and now my next duty was to keep up my strength. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5119"></td>
        <td id="LC5119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">felt very weak, and in the weakness lost something of the amazement at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5120"></td>
        <td id="LC5120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what had occurred. I fell asleep on the sofa, however, wondering over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5121"></td>
        <td id="LC5121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and over again how Lucy had made such a retrograde movement, and how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5122"></td>
        <td id="LC5122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she could have been drained of so much blood with no sign anywhere to</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC5124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleeping and waking, my thoughts always came back to the little</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5125"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5128"></td>
        <td id="LC5128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucy slept well into the day, and when she woke she was fairly well and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5129"></td>
        <td id="LC5129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strong, though not nearly so much so as the day before. When Van Helsing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5130"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5134"></td>
        <td id="LC5134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucy chatted with me freely, and seemed quite unconscious that anything</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC5135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had happened. I tried to keep her amused and interested. When her mother</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5140"></td>
        <td id="LC5140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must now take care not to overwork yourself. You are looking pale</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5144"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5145"></td>

        <td id="L5147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5147"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5148"></td>
        <td id="LC5148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing returned in a couple of hours, and presently said to me:</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5151"></td>
        <td id="LC5151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I must watch the case, and we must have none other to know. I have grave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5154"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5155"></td>
        <td id="LC5155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the hall two of the maids came to me, and asked if they or either of</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5160"></td>
        <td id="LC5160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am weak at present, and perhaps because it was on Lucy&#39;s account, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5161"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5168"></td>
        <td id="LC5168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_11 September._--This afternoon I went over to Hillingham. Found Van</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5169"></td>
        <td id="LC5169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helsing in excellent spirits, and Lucy much better. Shortly after I had</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5170"></td>
        <td id="LC5170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrived, a big parcel from abroad came for the Professor. He opened it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5171"></td>
        <td id="LC5171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with much impressment--assumed, of course--and showed a great bundle of</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5172"></td>
        <td id="LC5172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">white flowers.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5173"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5174"></td>
        <td id="LC5174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;These are for you, Miss Lucy,&quot; he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5175"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5176"></td>
        <td id="LC5176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;For me? Oh, Dr. Van Helsing!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5177"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5178"></td>
        <td id="LC5178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, my dear, but not for you to play with. These are medicines.&quot; Here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5179"></td>
        <td id="LC5179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucy made a wry face. &quot;Nay, but they are not to take in a decoction or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5180"></td>
        <td id="LC5180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in nauseous form, so you need not snub that so charming nose, or I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5181"></td>
        <td id="LC5181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">point out to my friend Arthur what woes he may have to endure in seeing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5182"></td>
        <td id="LC5182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so much beauty that he so loves so much distort. Aha, my pretty miss,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5183"></td>
        <td id="LC5183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that bring the so nice nose all straight again. This is medicinal, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5184"></td>
        <td id="LC5184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you do not know how. I put him in your window, I make pretty wreath, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5185"></td>
        <td id="LC5185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hang him round your neck, so that you sleep well. Oh yes! they, like the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5186"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5188"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5189"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5190"></td>
        <td id="LC5190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whilst he was speaking, Lucy had been examining the flowers and smelling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5191"></td>
        <td id="LC5191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them. Now she threw them down, saying, with half-laughter, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5192"></td>
        <td id="LC5192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half-disgust:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5193"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5194"></td>
        <td id="LC5194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, Professor, I believe you are only putting up a joke on me. Why,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5195"></td>
        <td id="LC5195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these flowers are only common garlic.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5196"></td>
        <td id="LC5196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5197"></td>
        <td id="LC5197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To my surprise, Van Helsing rose up and said with all his sternness, his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5198"></td>
        <td id="LC5198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">iron jaw set and his bushy eyebrows meeting:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5199"></td>
        <td id="LC5199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5200"></td>
        <td id="LC5200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No trifling with me! I never jest! There is grim purpose in all I do;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5201"></td>
        <td id="LC5201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I warn you that you do not thwart me. Take care, for the sake of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5202"></td>
        <td id="LC5202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others if not for your own.&quot; Then seeing poor Lucy scared, as she might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5203"></td>
        <td id="LC5203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well be, he went on more gently: &quot;Oh, little miss, my dear, do not fear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5204"></td>
        <td id="LC5204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. I only do for your good; but there is much virtue to you in those so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5205"></td>
        <td id="LC5205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">common flowers. See, I place them myself in your room. I make myself the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5206"></td>
        <td id="LC5206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wreath that you are to wear. But hush! no telling to others that make so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5207"></td>
        <td id="LC5207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inquisitive questions. We must obey, and silence is a part of obedience;</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5208"></td>
        <td id="LC5208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and obedience is to bring you strong and well into loving arms that wait</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5209"></td>
        <td id="LC5209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for you. Now sit still awhile. Come with me, friend John, and you shall</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5210"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5214"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5215"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5263"></td>
        <td id="LC5263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_12 September._--How good they all are to me. I quite love that dear Dr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5264"></td>
        <td id="LC5264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing. I wonder why he was so anxious about these flowers. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5265"></td>
        <td id="LC5265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">positively frightened me, he was so fierce. And yet he must have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5266"></td>
        <td id="LC5266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right, for I feel comfort from them already. Somehow, I do not dread</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5267"></td>
        <td id="LC5267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being alone to-night, and I can go to sleep without fear. I shall not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5268"></td>
        <td id="LC5268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind any flapping outside the window. Oh, the terrible struggle that I</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5269"></td>
        <td id="LC5269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have had against sleep so often of late; the pain of the sleeplessness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5270"></td>
        <td id="LC5270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or the pain of the fear of sleep, with such unknown horrors as it has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5271"></td>
        <td id="LC5271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for me! How blessed are some people, whose lives have no fears, no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5272"></td>
        <td id="LC5272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreads; to whom sleep is a blessing that comes nightly, and brings</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5274"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC5275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strewments.&quot; I never liked garlic before, but to-night it is delightful!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5276"></td>
        <td id="LC5276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is peace in its smell; I feel sleep coming already. Good-night,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5277"></td>
        <td id="LC5277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everybody.</td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5280"></td>
        <td id="LC5280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5281"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5282"></td>
        <td id="LC5282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_13 September._--Called at the Berkeley and found Van Helsing, as usual,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5283"></td>
        <td id="LC5283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up to time. The carriage ordered from the hotel was waiting. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5284"></td>
        <td id="LC5284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor took his bag, which he always brings with him now.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5285"></td>
        <td id="LC5285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5286"></td>
        <td id="LC5286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let all be put down exactly. Van Helsing and I arrived at Hillingham at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5287"></td>
        <td id="LC5287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eight o&#39;clock. It was a lovely morning; the bright sunshine and all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5288"></td>
        <td id="LC5288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fresh feeling of early autumn seemed like the completion of nature&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5289"></td>
        <td id="LC5289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">annual work. The leaves were turning to all kinds of beautiful colours,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5290"></td>
        <td id="LC5290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but had not yet begun to drop from the trees. When we entered we met</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5291"></td>
        <td id="LC5291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Westenra coming out of the morning room. She is always an early</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5292"></td>
        <td id="LC5292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">riser. She greeted us warmly and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5293"></td>
        <td id="LC5293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5294"></td>
        <td id="LC5294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You will be glad to know that Lucy is better. The dear child is still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5295"></td>
        <td id="LC5295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asleep. I looked into her room and saw her, but did not go in, lest I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5296"></td>
        <td id="LC5296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should disturb her.&quot; The Professor smiled, and looked quite jubilant. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5297"></td>
        <td id="LC5297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rubbed his hands together, and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5298"></td>
        <td id="LC5298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5299"></td>
        <td id="LC5299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Aha! I thought I had diagnosed the case. My treatment is working,&quot; to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5300"></td>
        <td id="LC5300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which she answered:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5301"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5302"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5304"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5305"></td>
        <td id="LC5305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How you do mean, ma&#39;am?&quot; asked the Professor.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5306"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5307"></td>
        <td id="LC5307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, I was anxious about the dear child in the night, and went into</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5308"></td>
        <td id="LC5308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her room. She was sleeping soundly--so soundly that even my coming did</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5309"></td>

        <td id="L5310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5310"></td>
        <td id="LC5310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horrible, strong-smelling flowers about everywhere, and she had actually</td>

        <td id="L5311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5311"></td>
        <td id="LC5311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a bunch of them round her neck. I feared that the heavy odour would be</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5312"></td>
        <td id="LC5312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too much for the dear child in her weak state, so I took them all away</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5313"></td>
        <td id="LC5313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and opened a bit of the window to let in a little fresh air. You will be</td>

        <td id="L5314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5314"></td>
        <td id="LC5314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleased with her, I am sure.&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5315"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5316"></td>
        <td id="LC5316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She moved off into her boudoir, where she usually breakfasted early. As</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="L5323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5323"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5324"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC5332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pagan world of old, that such things must be, and in such way? This poor</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5342"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5360"></td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5370"></td>
        <td id="LC5370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What does it all mean? I am beginning to wonder if my long habit of life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5371"></td>
        <td id="LC5371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amongst the insane is beginning to tell upon my own brain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5372"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5373"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5374"></td>
        <td id="LC5374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Lucy Westenra&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5375"></td>
        <td id="LC5375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5376"></td>
        <td id="LC5376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_17 September._--Four days and nights of peace. I am getting so strong</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5377"></td>
        <td id="LC5377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again that I hardly know myself. It is as if I had passed through some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5378"></td>
        <td id="LC5378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long nightmare, and had just awakened to see the beautiful sunshine and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5379"></td>
        <td id="LC5379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel the fresh air of the morning around me. I have a dim</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5380"></td>
        <td id="LC5380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half-remembrance of long, anxious times of waiting and fearing; darkness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5381"></td>
        <td id="LC5381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in which there was not even the pain of hope to make present distress</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5382"></td>
        <td id="LC5382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more poignant: and then long spells of oblivion, and the rising back to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5383"></td>
        <td id="LC5383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life as a diver coming up through a great press of water. Since,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5384"></td>
        <td id="LC5384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, Dr. Van Helsing has been with me, all this bad dreaming seems</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5385"></td>
        <td id="LC5385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have passed away; the noises that used to frighten me out of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5386"></td>
        <td id="LC5386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wits--the flapping against the windows, the distant voices which seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5387"></td>
        <td id="LC5387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so close to me, the harsh sounds that came from I know not where and</td>

        <td id="L5389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5389"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5655"></td>

        <td id="L5660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5660"></td>
        <td id="LC5660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_18 September._--Just off for train to London. The arrival of Van</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5661"></td>
        <td id="LC5661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helsing&#39;s telegram filled me with dismay. A whole night lost, and I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5662"></td>
        <td id="LC5662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by bitter experience what may happen in a night. Of course it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5663"></td>
        <td id="LC5663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possible that all may be well, but what _may_ have happened? Surely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5664"></td>
        <td id="LC5664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is some horrible doom hanging over us that every possible accident</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5665"></td>
        <td id="LC5665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should thwart us in all we try to do. I shall take this cylinder with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5666"></td>
        <td id="LC5666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, and then I can complete my entry on Lucy&#39;s phonograph.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5667"></td>
        <td id="LC5667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">

</td>

        <td id="L5671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5671"></td>
        <td id="LC5671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_17 September. Night._--I write this and leave it to be seen, so that no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5672"></td>
        <td id="LC5672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one may by any chance get into trouble through me. This is an exact</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5673"></td>
        <td id="LC5673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">record of what took place to-night. I feel I am dying of weakness, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5674"></td>
        <td id="LC5674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have barely strength to write, but it must be done if I die in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5675"></td>
        <td id="LC5675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5676"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5677"></td>
        <td id="LC5677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I went to bed as usual, taking care that the flowers were placed as Dr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5678"></td>
        <td id="LC5678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing directed, and soon fell asleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5679"></td>
        <td id="LC5679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5680"></td>
        <td id="LC5680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was waked by the flapping at the window, which had begun after that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5681"></td>
        <td id="LC5681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep-walking on the cliff at Whitby when Mina saved me, and which now I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5682"></td>
        <td id="LC5682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know so well. I was not afraid, but I did wish that Dr. Seward was in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5683"></td>
        <td id="LC5683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the next room--as Dr. Van Helsing said he would be--so that I might have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5684"></td>
        <td id="LC5684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called him. I tried to go to sleep, but could not. Then there came to me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5685"></td>
        <td id="LC5685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the old fear of sleep, and I determined to keep awake. Perversely sleep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5686"></td>
        <td id="LC5686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would try to come then when I did not want it; so, as I feared to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5687"></td>
        <td id="LC5687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alone, I opened my door and called out: &quot;Is there anybody there?&quot; There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5688"></td>
        <td id="LC5688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was no answer. I was afraid to wake mother, and so closed my door again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5689"></td>
        <td id="LC5689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then outside in the shrubbery I heard a sort of howl like a dog&#39;s, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5690"></td>

      <tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5700"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5710"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5711"></td>
        <td id="LC5711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aperture of the broken panes there was the head of a great, gaunt grey</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5712"></td>
        <td id="LC5712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wolf. Mother cried out in a fright, and struggled up into a sitting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5713"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5715"></td>
        <td id="LC5715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">insisted on my wearing round my neck, and tore it away from me. For a</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L5727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5727"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5728"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5734"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5736"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5741"></td>
        <td id="LC5741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to go to the dining-room and have each a glass of wine. The door flew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5742"></td>
