      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5743"></td>
        <td id="LC5743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a body to the dining-room; and I laid what flowers I had on my dear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5744"></td>
        <td id="LC5744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother&#39;s breast. When they were there I remembered what Dr. Van Helsing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5745"></td>
        <td id="LC5745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had told me, but I didn&#39;t like to remove them, and, besides, I would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5746"></td>
        <td id="LC5746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have some of the servants to sit up with me now. I was surprised that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5747"></td>
        <td id="LC5747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the maids did not come back. I called them, but got no answer, so I went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5748"></td>
        <td id="LC5748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the dining-room to look for them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5749"></td>
        <td id="LC5749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5750"></td>
        <td id="LC5750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My heart sank when I saw what had happened. They all four lay helpless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5751"></td>
        <td id="LC5751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the floor, breathing heavily. The decanter of sherry was on the table</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5752"></td>
        <td id="LC5752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half full, but there was a queer, acrid smell about. I was suspicious,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5753"></td>
        <td id="LC5753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and examined the decanter. It smelt of laudanum, and looking on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5754"></td>
        <td id="LC5754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sideboard, I found that the bottle which mother&#39;s doctor uses for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5755"></td>
        <td id="LC5755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her--oh! did use--was empty. What am I to do? what am I to do? I am back</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5756"></td>
        <td id="LC5756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the room with mother. I cannot leave her, and I am alone, save for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5757"></td>
        <td id="LC5757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sleeping servants, whom some one has drugged. Alone with the dead! I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5758"></td>
        <td id="LC5758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dare not go out, for I can hear the low howl of the wolf through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5759"></td>
        <td id="LC5759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broken window.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5760"></td>
        <td id="LC5760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5761"></td>
        <td id="LC5761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The air seems full of specks, floating and circling in the draught from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5762"></td>
        <td id="LC5762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the window, and the lights burn blue and dim. What am I to do? God</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5763"></td>
        <td id="LC5763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shield me from harm this night! I shall hide this paper in my breast,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5764"></td>
        <td id="LC5764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where they shall find it when they come to lay me out. My dear mother</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5765"></td>
        <td id="LC5765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gone! It is time that I go too. Good-bye, dear Arthur, if I should not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5766"></td>
        <td id="LC5766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">survive this night. God keep you, dear, and God help me!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5767"></td>
        <td id="LC5767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5768"></td>
        <td id="LC5768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5769"></td>
        <td id="LC5769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5770"></td>
        <td id="LC5770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5771"></td>
        <td id="LC5771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5772"></td>
        <td id="LC5772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5773"></td>
        <td id="LC5773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">DR. SEWARD&#39;S DIARY</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5774"></td>
        <td id="LC5774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5775"></td>
        <td id="LC5775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5776"></td>
        <td id="LC5776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_18 September._--I drove at once to Hillingham and arrived early.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5777"></td>
        <td id="LC5777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Keeping my cab at the gate, I went up the avenue alone. I knocked gently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5778"></td>
        <td id="LC5778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and rang as quietly as possible, for I feared to disturb Lucy or her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5779"></td>
        <td id="LC5779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother, and hoped to only bring a servant to the door. After a while,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5780"></td>
        <td id="LC5780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finding no response, I knocked and rang again; still no answer. I cursed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5781"></td>
        <td id="LC5781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the laziness of the servants that they should lie abed at such an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5782"></td>
        <td id="LC5782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hour--for it was now ten o&#39;clock--and so rang and knocked again, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5783"></td>
        <td id="LC5783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more impatiently, but still without response. Hitherto I had blamed only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5784"></td>
        <td id="LC5784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the servants, but now a terrible fear began to assail me. Was this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5785"></td>
        <td id="LC5785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desolation but another link in the chain of doom which seemed drawing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5786"></td>
        <td id="LC5786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tight around us? Was it indeed a house of death to which I had come, too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5787"></td>
        <td id="LC5787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">late? I knew that minutes, even seconds of delay, might mean hours of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5788"></td>
        <td id="LC5788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">danger to Lucy, if she had had again one of those frightful relapses;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5789"></td>
        <td id="LC5789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I went round the house to try if I could find by chance an entry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5790"></td>
        <td id="LC5790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anywhere.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5791"></td>
        <td id="LC5791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5792"></td>
        <td id="LC5792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could find no means of ingress. Every window and door was fastened and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5793"></td>
        <td id="LC5793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">locked, and I returned baffled to the porch. As I did so, I heard the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5794"></td>
        <td id="LC5794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rapid pit-pat of a swiftly driven horse&#39;s feet. They stopped at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5795"></td>
        <td id="LC5795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gate, and a few seconds later I met Van Helsing running up the avenue.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5796"></td>
        <td id="LC5796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When he saw me, he gasped out:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5797"></td>
        <td id="LC5797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5798"></td>
        <td id="LC5798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then it was you, and just arrived. How is she? Are we too late? Did you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5799"></td>
        <td id="LC5799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not get my telegram?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5800"></td>
        <td id="LC5800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5801"></td>
        <td id="LC5801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I answered as quickly and coherently as I could that I had only got his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5802"></td>
        <td id="LC5802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">telegram early in the morning, and had not lost a minute in coming here,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5803"></td>
        <td id="LC5803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that I could not make any one in the house hear me. He paused and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5804"></td>
        <td id="LC5804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">raised his hat as he said solemnly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5805"></td>
        <td id="LC5805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5806"></td>
        <td id="LC5806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then I fear we are too late. God&#39;s will be done!&quot; With his usual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5807"></td>
        <td id="LC5807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recuperative energy, he went on: &quot;Come. If there be no way open to get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5808"></td>
        <td id="LC5808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in, we must make one. Time is all in all to us now.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5809"></td>
        <td id="LC5809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5810"></td>
        <td id="LC5810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We went round to the back of the house, where there was a kitchen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5811"></td>
        <td id="LC5811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window. The Professor took a small surgical saw from his case, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5812"></td>
        <td id="LC5812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">handing it to me, pointed to the iron bars which guarded the window. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5813"></td>
        <td id="LC5813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attacked them at once and had very soon cut through three of them. Then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5814"></td>
        <td id="LC5814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a long, thin knife we pushed back the fastening of the sashes and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5815"></td>
        <td id="LC5815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opened the window. I helped the Professor in, and followed him. There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5816"></td>
        <td id="LC5816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was no one in the kitchen or in the servants&#39; rooms, which were close at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5817"></td>
        <td id="LC5817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand. We tried all the rooms as we went along, and in the dining-room,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5818"></td>
        <td id="LC5818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dimly lit by rays of light through the shutters, found four</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5819"></td>
        <td id="LC5819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">servant-women lying on the floor. There was no need to think them dead,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5820"></td>
        <td id="LC5820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for their stertorous breathing and the acrid smell of laudanum in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5821"></td>
        <td id="LC5821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room left no doubt as to their condition. Van Helsing and I looked at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5822"></td>
        <td id="LC5822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">each other, and as we moved away he said: &quot;We can attend to them later.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5823"></td>
        <td id="LC5823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then we ascended to Lucy&#39;s room. For an instant or two we paused at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5824"></td>
        <td id="LC5824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door to listen, but there was no sound that we could hear. With white</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5825"></td>
        <td id="LC5825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faces and trembling hands, we opened the door gently, and entered the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5826"></td>
        <td id="LC5826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5827"></td>
        <td id="LC5827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5828"></td>
        <td id="LC5828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How shall I describe what we saw? On the bed lay two women, Lucy and her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5829"></td>
        <td id="LC5829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother. The latter lay farthest in, and she was covered with a white</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5830"></td>
        <td id="LC5830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sheet, the edge of which had been blown back by the draught through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5831"></td>
        <td id="LC5831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broken window, showing the drawn, white face, with a look of terror</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5832"></td>
        <td id="LC5832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fixed upon it. By her side lay Lucy, with face white and still more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5833"></td>
        <td id="LC5833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drawn. The flowers which had been round her neck we found upon her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5834"></td>
        <td id="LC5834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother&#39;s bosom, and her throat was bare, showing the two little wounds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5835"></td>
        <td id="LC5835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which we had noticed before, but looking horribly white and mangled.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5836"></td>
        <td id="LC5836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Without a word the Professor bent over the bed, his head almost touching</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5837"></td>
        <td id="LC5837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor Lucy&#39;s breast; then he gave a quick turn of his head, as of one who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L6020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6020"></td>

        <td id="L6112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6112"></td>
        <td id="LC6112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were shortened. Arthur&#39;s presence, however, seemed to act as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6113"></td>
        <td id="LC6113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stimulant; she rallied a little, and spoke to him more brightly than she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6114"></td>
        <td id="LC6114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had done since we arrived. He too pulled himself together, and spoke as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6115"></td>
        <td id="LC6115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cheerily as he could, so that the best was made of everything.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6116"></td>
        <td id="LC6116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6117"></td>
        <td id="LC6117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was now nearly one o&#39;clock, and he and Van Helsing are sitting with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6118"></td>
        <td id="LC6118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her. I am to relieve them in a quarter of an hour, and I am entering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6119"></td>
        <td id="LC6119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this on Lucy&#39;s phonograph. Until six o&#39;clock they are to try to rest. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6120"></td>
        <td id="LC6120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear that to-morrow will end our watching, for the shock has been too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6121"></td>
        <td id="LC6121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great; the poor child cannot rally. God help us all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6122"></td>
        <td id="LC6122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6123"></td>
        <td id="LC6123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6124"></td>
        <td id="LC6124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Mina Harker to Lucy Westenra._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6125"></td>
        <td id="LC6125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6126"></td>
        <td id="LC6126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(Unopened by her.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6127"></td>
        <td id="LC6127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6128"></td>
        <td id="LC6128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_17 September._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6129"></td>
        <td id="LC6129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6130"></td>
        <td id="LC6130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dearest Lucy,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6131"></td>
        <td id="LC6131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6132"></td>
        <td id="LC6132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It seems _an age_ since I heard from you, or indeed since I wrote. You</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6133"></td>
        <td id="LC6133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will pardon me, I know, for all my faults when you have read all my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6134"></td>
        <td id="LC6134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">budget of news. Well, I got my husband back all right; when we arrived</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6135"></td>
        <td id="LC6135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at Exeter there was a carriage waiting for us, and in it, though he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6136"></td>
        <td id="LC6136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an attack of gout, Mr. Hawkins. He took us to his house, where there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6137"></td>
        <td id="LC6137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were rooms for us all nice and comfortable, and we dined together. After</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6138"></td>
        <td id="LC6138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dinner Mr. Hawkins said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6139"></td>
        <td id="LC6139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6140"></td>
        <td id="LC6140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;&#39;My dears, I want to drink your health and prosperity; and may every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6141"></td>
        <td id="LC6141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blessing attend you both. I know you both from children, and have, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6142"></td>
        <td id="LC6142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">love and pride, seen you grow up. Now I want you to make your home here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6143"></td>
        <td id="LC6143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with me. I have left to me neither chick nor child; all are gone, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6144"></td>
        <td id="LC6144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my will I have left you everything.&#39; I cried, Lucy dear, as Jonathan and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6145"></td>
        <td id="LC6145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the old man clasped hands. Our evening was a very, very happy one.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6146"></td>
        <td id="LC6146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6147"></td>
        <td id="LC6147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;So here we are, installed in this beautiful old house, and from both my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6148"></td>
        <td id="LC6148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bedroom and the drawing-room I can see the great elms of the cathedral</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6149"></td>
        <td id="LC6149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">close, with their great black stems standing out against the old yellow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6150"></td>
        <td id="LC6150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stone of the cathedral and I can hear the rooks overhead cawing and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6151"></td>
        <td id="LC6151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cawing and chattering and gossiping all day, after the manner of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6152"></td>
        <td id="LC6152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rooks--and humans. I am busy, I need not tell you, arranging things and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6153"></td>
        <td id="LC6153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">housekeeping. Jonathan and Mr. Hawkins are busy all day; for, now that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6154"></td>
        <td id="LC6154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan is a partner, Mr. Hawkins wants to tell him all about the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6155"></td>
        <td id="LC6155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clients.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6156"></td>
        <td id="LC6156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6157"></td>
        <td id="LC6157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How is your dear mother getting on? I wish I could run up to town for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6158"></td>
        <td id="LC6158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">day or two to see you, dear, but I dare not go yet, with so much on my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6159"></td>
        <td id="LC6159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shoulders; and Jonathan wants looking after still. He is beginning to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6160"></td>
        <td id="LC6160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put some flesh on his bones again, but he was terribly weakened by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6161"></td>
        <td id="LC6161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long illness; even now he sometimes starts out of his sleep in a sudden</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6162"></td>
        <td id="LC6162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way and awakes all trembling until I can coax him back to his usual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6163"></td>
        <td id="LC6163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">placidity. However, thank God, these occasions grow less frequent as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6164"></td>
        <td id="LC6164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">days go on, and they will in time pass away altogether, I trust. And now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6165"></td>
        <td id="LC6165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have told you my news, let me ask yours. When are you to be married,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6166"></td>
        <td id="LC6166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and where, and who is to perform the ceremony, and what are you to wear,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6167"></td>
        <td id="LC6167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and is it to be a public or a private wedding? Tell me all about it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6168"></td>
        <td id="LC6168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear; tell me all about everything, for there is nothing which interests</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6169"></td>
        <td id="LC6169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you which will not be dear to me. Jonathan asks me to send his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6170"></td>
        <td id="LC6170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;respectful duty,&#39; but I do not think that is good enough from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6171"></td>
        <td id="LC6171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">junior partner of the important firm Hawkins &amp; Harker; and so, as you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6172"></td>
        <td id="LC6172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">love me, and he loves me, and I love you with all the moods and tenses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6173"></td>
        <td id="LC6173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the verb, I send you simply his &#39;love&#39; instead. Good-bye, my dearest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6174"></td>
        <td id="LC6174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucy, and all blessings on you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6175"></td>
        <td id="LC6175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6176"></td>
        <td id="LC6176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yours,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6177"></td>
        <td id="LC6177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6178"></td>
        <td id="LC6178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;MINA HARKER.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6179"></td>
        <td id="LC6179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6180"></td>
        <td id="LC6180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6181"></td>
        <td id="LC6181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Report from Patrick Hennessey, M. D., M. R. C. S. L. K. Q. C. P. I.,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6182"></td>
        <td id="LC6182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">etc., etc., to John Seward, M. D._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6183"></td>
        <td id="LC6183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6184"></td>
        <td id="LC6184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_20 September._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6185"></td>
        <td id="LC6185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6186"></td>
        <td id="LC6186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear Sir,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6187"></td>
        <td id="LC6187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6188"></td>
        <td id="LC6188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;In accordance with your wishes, I enclose report of the conditions of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6189"></td>
        <td id="LC6189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything left in my charge.... With regard to patient, Renfield, there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6190"></td>
        <td id="LC6190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is more to say. He has had another outbreak, which might have had a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6191"></td>
        <td id="LC6191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreadful ending, but which, as it fortunately happened, was unattended</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6192"></td>
        <td id="LC6192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with any unhappy results. This afternoon a carrier&#39;s cart with two men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6193"></td>
        <td id="LC6193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made a call at the empty house whose grounds abut on ours--the house to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6194"></td>
        <td id="LC6194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, you will remember, the patient twice ran away. The men stopped at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6195"></td>
        <td id="LC6195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our gate to ask the porter their way, as they were strangers. I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6196"></td>
        <td id="LC6196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself looking out of the study window, having a smoke after dinner, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6197"></td>
        <td id="LC6197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw one of them come up to the house. As he passed the window of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6198"></td>
        <td id="LC6198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Renfield&#39;s room, the patient began to rate him from within, and called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6199"></td>
        <td id="LC6199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him all the foul names he could lay his tongue to. The man, who seemed a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6200"></td>
        <td id="LC6200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">decent fellow enough, contented himself by telling him to &quot;shut up for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6201"></td>
        <td id="LC6201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foul-mouthed beggar,&quot; whereon our man accused him of robbing him and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6202"></td>
        <td id="LC6202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanting to murder him and said that he would hinder him if he were to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6203"></td>
        <td id="LC6203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swing for it. I opened the window and signed to the man not to notice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6204"></td>
        <td id="LC6204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so he contented himself after looking the place over and making up his</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6205"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6206"></td>
        <td id="LC6206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yer, sir, I wouldn&#39;t mind what was said to me in a bloomin&#39; madhouse. I</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC6209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where the gate of the empty house was; he went away, followed by threats</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6276"></td>
        <td id="LC6276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6277"></td>
        <td id="LC6277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dearest Lucy,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6278"></td>
        <td id="LC6278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6279"></td>
        <td id="LC6279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Such a sad blow has befallen us. Mr. Hawkins has died very suddenly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6280"></td>
        <td id="LC6280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Some may not think it so sad for us, but we had both come to so love him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6281"></td>
        <td id="LC6281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that it really seems as though we had lost a father. I never knew either</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6282"></td>
        <td id="LC6282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father or mother, so that the dear old man&#39;s death is a real blow to me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6283"></td>
        <td id="LC6283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan is greatly distressed. It is not only that he feels sorrow,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6284"></td>
        <td id="LC6284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deep sorrow, for the dear, good man who has befriended him all his life,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6285"></td>
        <td id="LC6285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and now at the end has treated him like his own son and left him a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6286"></td>
        <td id="LC6286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortune which to people of our modest bringing up is wealth beyond the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6287"></td>
        <td id="LC6287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dream of avarice, but Jonathan feels it on another account. He says the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6288"></td>
        <td id="LC6288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amount of responsibility which it puts upon him makes him nervous. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6289"></td>
        <td id="LC6289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begins to doubt himself. I try to cheer him up, and _my_ belief in _him_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6290"></td>
        <td id="LC6290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">helps him to have a belief in himself. But it is here that the grave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6291"></td>
        <td id="LC6291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shock that he experienced tells upon him the most. Oh, it is too hard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6292"></td>
        <td id="LC6292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that a sweet, simple, noble, strong nature such as his--a nature which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6293"></td>
        <td id="LC6293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enabled him by our dear, good friend&#39;s aid to rise from clerk to master</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6294"></td>
        <td id="LC6294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a few years--should be so injured that the very essence of its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6295"></td>
        <td id="LC6295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strength is gone. Forgive me, dear, if I worry you with my troubles in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6296"></td>
        <td id="LC6296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the midst of your own happiness; but, Lucy dear, I must tell some one,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6297"></td>
        <td id="LC6297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the strain of keeping up a brave and cheerful appearance to Jonathan</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6298"></td>
        <td id="LC6298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tries me, and I have no one here that I can confide in. I dread coming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6299"></td>
        <td id="LC6299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up to London, as we must do the day after to-morrow; for poor Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6300"></td>
        <td id="LC6300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hawkins left in his will that he was to be buried in the grave with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6301"></td>
        <td id="LC6301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father. As there are no relations at all, Jonathan will have to be chief</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6302"></td>
        <td id="LC6302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mourner. I shall try to run over to see you, dearest, if only for a few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6303"></td>
        <td id="LC6303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minutes. Forgive me for troubling you. With all blessings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6304"></td>
        <td id="LC6304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6305"></td>
        <td id="LC6305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Your loving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6306"></td>
        <td id="LC6306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6307"></td>
        <td id="LC6307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;MINA HARKER.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6308"></td>
        <td id="LC6308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6309"></td>
        <td id="LC6309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6310"></td>
        <td id="LC6310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6311"></td>
        <td id="LC6311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6312"></td>
        <td id="LC6312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_20 September._--Only resolution and habit can let me make an entry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6313"></td>
        <td id="LC6313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to-night. I am too miserable, too low-spirited, too sick of the world</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6314"></td>
        <td id="LC6314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and all in it, including life itself, that I would not care if I heard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6315"></td>
        <td id="LC6315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this moment the flapping of the wings of the angel of death. And he has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6316"></td>
        <td id="LC6316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been flapping those grim wings to some purpose of late--Lucy&#39;s mother</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6317"></td>
        <td id="LC6317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Arthur&#39;s father, and now.... Let me get on with my work.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6318"></td>
        <td id="LC6318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6319"></td>
        <td id="LC6319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I duly relieved Van Helsing in his watch over Lucy. We wanted Arthur to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6320"></td>
        <td id="LC6320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go to rest also, but he refused at first. It was only when I told him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6321"></td>
        <td id="LC6321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that we should want him to help us during the day, and that we must not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6322"></td>
        <td id="LC6322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all break down for want of rest, lest Lucy should suffer, that he agreed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6323"></td>
        <td id="LC6323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to go. Van Helsing was very kind to him. &quot;Come, my child,&quot; he said;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6324"></td>
        <td id="LC6324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;come with me. You are sick and weak, and have had much sorrow and much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6325"></td>
        <td id="LC6325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mental pain, as well as that tax on your strength that we know of. You</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6326"></td>
        <td id="LC6326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must not be alone; for to be alone is to be full of fears and alarms.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6327"></td>
        <td id="LC6327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Come to the drawing-room, where there is a big fire, and there are two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6328"></td>
        <td id="LC6328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sofas. You shall lie on one, and I on the other, and our sympathy will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6329"></td>
        <td id="LC6329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be comfort to each other, even though we do not speak, and even if we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6330"></td>
        <td id="LC6330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep.&quot; Arthur went off with him, casting back a longing look on Lucy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6331"></td>
        <td id="LC6331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face, which lay in her pillow, almost whiter than the lawn. She lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6332"></td>
        <td id="LC6332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite still, and I looked round the room to see that all was as it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6333"></td>
        <td id="LC6333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be. I could see that the Professor had carried out in this room,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6334"></td>
        <td id="LC6334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as in the other, his purpose of using the garlic; the whole of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6335"></td>
        <td id="LC6335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window-sashes reeked with it, and round Lucy&#39;s neck, over the silk</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6336"></td>
        <td id="LC6336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">handkerchief which Van Helsing made her keep on, was a rough chaplet of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6337"></td>
        <td id="LC6337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same odorous flowers. Lucy was breathing somewhat stertorously, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6338"></td>
        <td id="LC6338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her face was at its worst, for the open mouth showed the pale gums. Her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6339"></td>
        <td id="LC6339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">teeth, in the dim, uncertain light, seemed longer and sharper than they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6340"></td>
        <td id="LC6340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been in the morning. In particular, by some trick of the light, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6341"></td>
        <td id="LC6341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">canine teeth looked longer and sharper than the rest. I sat down by her,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6342"></td>
        <td id="LC6342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and presently she moved uneasily. At the same moment there came a sort</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6343"></td>
        <td id="LC6343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of dull flapping or buffeting at the window. I went over to it softly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6344"></td>
        <td id="LC6344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and peeped out by the corner of the blind. There was a full moonlight,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6345"></td>
        <td id="LC6345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I could see that the noise was made by a great bat, which wheeled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6346"></td>
        <td id="LC6346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round--doubtless attracted by the light, although so dim--and every now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6347"></td>
        <td id="LC6347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and again struck the window with its wings. When I came back to my seat,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6348"></td>
        <td id="LC6348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I found that Lucy had moved slightly, and had torn away the garlic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6349"></td>
        <td id="LC6349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flowers from her throat. I replaced them as well as I could, and sat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6350"></td>
        <td id="LC6350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watching her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6351"></td>
        <td id="LC6351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6352"></td>
        <td id="LC6352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently she woke, and I gave her food, as Van Helsing had prescribed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6353"></td>
        <td id="LC6353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She took but a little, and that languidly. There did not seem to be with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6354"></td>
        <td id="LC6354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her now the unconscious struggle for life and strength that had hitherto</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6355"></td>
        <td id="LC6355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so marked her illness. It struck me as curious that the moment she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6356"></td>
        <td id="LC6356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">became conscious she pressed the garlic flowers close to her. It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6357"></td>
        <td id="LC6357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainly odd that whenever she got into that lethargic state, with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6358"></td>
        <td id="LC6358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stertorous breathing, she put the flowers from her; but that when she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6359"></td>
        <td id="LC6359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waked she clutched them close. There was no possibility of making any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6360"></td>
        <td id="LC6360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mistake about this, for in the long hours that followed, she had many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6361"></td>
        <td id="LC6361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spells of sleeping and waking and repeated both actions many times.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6362"></td>
        <td id="LC6362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6363"></td>
        <td id="LC6363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At six o&#39;clock Van Helsing came to relieve me. Arthur had then fallen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6364"></td>
        <td id="LC6364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into a doze, and he mercifully let him sleep on. When he saw Lucy&#39;s face</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6365"></td>
        <td id="LC6365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could hear the sissing indraw of his breath, and he said to me in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6366"></td>
        <td id="LC6366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sharp whisper: &quot;Draw up the blind; I want light!&quot; Then he bent down,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6367"></td>
        <td id="LC6367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, with his face almost touching Lucy&#39;s, examined her carefully. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6368"></td>
        <td id="LC6368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">removed the flowers and lifted the silk handkerchief from her throat. As</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6369"></td>
        <td id="LC6369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he did so he started back, and I could hear his ejaculation, &quot;Mein</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6370"></td>
        <td id="LC6370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gott!&quot; as it was smothered in his throat. I bent over and looked, too,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6371"></td>
        <td id="LC6371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and as I noticed some queer chill came over me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6372"></td>
        <td id="LC6372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6373"></td>
        <td id="LC6373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wounds on the throat had absolutely disappeared.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6374"></td>
        <td id="LC6374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6375"></td>
        <td id="LC6375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For fully five minutes Van Helsing stood looking at her, with his face</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6376"></td>
        <td id="LC6376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at its sternest. Then he turned to me and said calmly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6377"></td>
        <td id="LC6377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6378"></td>
        <td id="LC6378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;She is dying. It will not be long now. It will be much difference, mark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6379"></td>
        <td id="LC6379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, whether she dies conscious or in her sleep. Wake that poor boy, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6380"></td>
        <td id="LC6380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">let him come and see the last; he trusts us, and we have promised him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6381"></td>
        <td id="LC6381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6382"></td>
        <td id="LC6382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I went to the dining-room and waked him. He was dazed for a moment, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6383"></td>
        <td id="LC6383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he saw the sunlight streaming in through the edges of the shutters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6384"></td>
        <td id="LC6384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he thought he was late, and expressed his fear. I assured him that Lucy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6385"></td>
        <td id="LC6385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was still asleep, but told him as gently as I could that both Van</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6386"></td>
        <td id="LC6386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helsing and I feared that the end was near. He covered his face with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6387"></td>
        <td id="LC6387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands, and slid down on his knees by the sofa, where he remained,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6388"></td>
        <td id="LC6388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perhaps a minute, with his head buried, praying, whilst his shoulders</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6389"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6390"></td>
        <td id="LC6390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, &quot;my dear old fellow, summon all your fortitude: it will be best</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6391"></td>

        <td id="L6392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6392"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6393"></td>
        <td id="LC6393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When we came into Lucy&#39;s room I could see that Van Helsing had, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6394"></td>
        <td id="LC6394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his usual forethought, been putting matters straight and making</td>

        <td id="L6395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6395"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6404"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC6407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breast heaved softly, and her breath came and went like a tired child&#39;s.</td>

        <td id="L6408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6408"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6409"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6410"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6420"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6433"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6434"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6450"></td>

        <td id="L6451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6451"></td>
        <td id="LC6451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ceased.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6453"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6455"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6456"></td>
        <td id="LC6456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sat down, and covered his face with his hands, sobbing in a way that</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6459"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6460"></td>
        <td id="LC6460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his face was sterner than ever. Some change had come over her body.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6461"></td>
        <td id="LC6461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Death had given back part of her beauty, for her brow and cheeks had</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6470"></td>
        <td id="LC6470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I stood beside Van Helsing, and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6471"></td>
        <td id="LC6471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6472"></td>
        <td id="LC6472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah, well, poor girl, there is peace for her at last. It is the end!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6473"></td>
        <td id="LC6473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6474"></td>
        <td id="LC6474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He turned to me, and said with grave solemnity:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6475"></td>
        <td id="LC6475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6476"></td>
        <td id="LC6476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Not so; alas! not so. It is only the beginning!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6477"></td>
        <td id="LC6477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6478"></td>
        <td id="LC6478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I asked him what he meant, he only shook his head and answered:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6479"></td>
        <td id="LC6479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6480"></td>
        <td id="LC6480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We can do nothing as yet. Wait and see.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6481"></td>
        <td id="LC6481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6482"></td>
        <td id="LC6482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6483"></td>
        <td id="LC6483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6484"></td>
