</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6485"></td>
        <td id="LC6485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6486"></td>
        <td id="LC6486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6487"></td>
        <td id="LC6487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">DR. SEWARD&#39;S DIARY--_continued_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6488"></td>
        <td id="LC6488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6489"></td>
        <td id="LC6489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6490"></td>
        <td id="LC6490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The funeral was arranged for the next succeeding day, so that Lucy and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6491"></td>
        <td id="LC6491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her mother might be buried together. I attended to all the ghastly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6492"></td>
        <td id="LC6492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">formalities, and the urbane undertaker proved that his staff were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6493"></td>
        <td id="LC6493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afflicted--or blessed--with something of his own obsequious suavity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6494"></td>
        <td id="LC6494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Even the woman who performed the last offices for the dead remarked to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6495"></td>
        <td id="LC6495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, in a confidential, brother-professional way, when she had come out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6496"></td>
        <td id="LC6496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the death-chamber:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6497"></td>
        <td id="LC6497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6498"></td>
        <td id="LC6498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;She makes a very beautiful corpse, sir. It&#39;s quite a privilege to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6499"></td>
        <td id="LC6499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attend on her. It&#39;s not too much to say that she will do credit to our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6500"></td>
        <td id="LC6500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">establishment!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6501"></td>
        <td id="LC6501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6502"></td>
        <td id="LC6502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I noticed that Van Helsing never kept far away. This was possible from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6503"></td>
        <td id="LC6503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the disordered state of things in the household. There were no relatives</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6504"></td>
        <td id="LC6504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at hand; and as Arthur had to be back the next day to attend at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6505"></td>
        <td id="LC6505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father&#39;s funeral, we were unable to notify any one who should have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6506"></td>
        <td id="LC6506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bidden. Under the circumstances, Van Helsing and I took it upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6507"></td>
        <td id="LC6507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ourselves to examine papers, etc. He insisted upon looking over Lucy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6508"></td>
        <td id="LC6508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">papers himself. I asked him why, for I feared that he, being a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6509"></td>
        <td id="LC6509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foreigner, might not be quite aware of English legal requirements, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6510"></td>
        <td id="LC6510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so might in ignorance make some unnecessary trouble. He answered me:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6511"></td>
        <td id="LC6511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6512"></td>
        <td id="LC6512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I know; I know. You forget that I am a lawyer as well as a doctor. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6513"></td>
        <td id="LC6513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this is not altogether for the law. You knew that, when you avoided the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6514"></td>
        <td id="LC6514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coroner. I have more than him to avoid. There may be papers more--such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6515"></td>
        <td id="LC6515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as this.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6516"></td>
        <td id="LC6516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6517"></td>
        <td id="LC6517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As he spoke he took from his pocket-book the memorandum which had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6518"></td>
        <td id="LC6518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in Lucy&#39;s breast, and which she had torn in her sleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6519"></td>
        <td id="LC6519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6520"></td>
        <td id="LC6520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;When you find anything of the solicitor who is for the late Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6521"></td>
        <td id="LC6521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Westenra, seal all her papers, and write him to-night. For me, I watch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6522"></td>
        <td id="LC6522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here in the room and in Miss Lucy&#39;s old room all night, and I myself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6523"></td>
        <td id="LC6523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">search for what may be. It is not well that her very thoughts go into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6524"></td>
        <td id="LC6524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hands of strangers.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6525"></td>
        <td id="LC6525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6526"></td>
        <td id="LC6526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I went on with my part of the work, and in another half hour had found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6527"></td>
        <td id="LC6527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the name and address of Mrs. Westenra&#39;s solicitor and had written to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6528"></td>
        <td id="LC6528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. All the poor lady&#39;s papers were in order; explicit directions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6529"></td>
        <td id="LC6529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regarding the place of burial were given. I had hardly sealed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6530"></td>
        <td id="LC6530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter, when, to my surprise, Van Helsing walked into the room,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6531"></td>
        <td id="LC6531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6532"></td>
        <td id="LC6532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6533"></td>
        <td id="LC6533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Can I help you, friend John? I am free, and if I may, my service is to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6534"></td>
        <td id="LC6534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6535"></td>
        <td id="LC6535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6536"></td>
        <td id="LC6536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Have you got what you looked for?&quot; I asked, to which he replied:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6537"></td>
        <td id="LC6537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6538"></td>
        <td id="LC6538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I did not look for any specific thing. I only hoped to find, and find I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6539"></td>
        <td id="LC6539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have, all that there was--only some letters and a few memoranda, and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6540"></td>
        <td id="LC6540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">diary new begun. But I have them here, and we shall for the present say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6541"></td>
        <td id="LC6541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing of them. I shall see that poor lad to-morrow evening, and, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6542"></td>
        <td id="LC6542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his sanction, I shall use some.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6543"></td>
        <td id="LC6543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6544"></td>
        <td id="LC6544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When we had finished the work in hand, he said to me:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6545"></td>
        <td id="LC6545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6546"></td>
        <td id="LC6546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And now, friend John, I think we may to bed. We want sleep, both you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6547"></td>
        <td id="LC6547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I, and rest to recuperate. To-morrow we shall have much to do, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6548"></td>
        <td id="LC6548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the to-night there is no need of us. Alas!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6549"></td>
        <td id="LC6549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6550"></td>
        <td id="LC6550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Before turning in we went to look at poor Lucy. The undertaker had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6551"></td>
        <td id="LC6551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainly done his work well, for the room was turned into a small</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6552"></td>
        <td id="LC6552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_chapelle ardente_. There was a wilderness of beautiful white flowers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6553"></td>
        <td id="LC6553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and death was made as little repulsive as might be. The end of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6554"></td>
        <td id="LC6554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">winding-sheet was laid over the face; when the Professor bent over and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6555"></td>
        <td id="LC6555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned it gently back, we both started at the beauty before us, the tall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6556"></td>
        <td id="LC6556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wax candles showing a sufficient light to note it well. All Lucy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6557"></td>
        <td id="LC6557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loveliness had come back to her in death, and the hours that had passed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6558"></td>
        <td id="LC6558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instead of leaving traces of &quot;decay&#39;s effacing fingers,&quot; had but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6559"></td>
        <td id="LC6559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">restored the beauty of life, till positively I could not believe my eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6560"></td>
        <td id="LC6560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I was looking at a corpse.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6561"></td>
        <td id="LC6561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6562"></td>
        <td id="LC6562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Professor looked sternly grave. He had not loved her as I had, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6563"></td>
        <td id="LC6563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was no need for tears in his eyes. He said to me: &quot;Remain till I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6564"></td>
        <td id="LC6564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">return,&quot; and left the room. He came back with a handful of wild garlic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6565"></td>
        <td id="LC6565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the box waiting in the hall, but which had not been opened, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6566"></td>
        <td id="LC6566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">placed the flowers amongst the others on and around the bed. Then he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6567"></td>
        <td id="LC6567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took from his neck, inside his collar, a little gold crucifix, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6568"></td>
        <td id="LC6568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">placed it over the mouth. He restored the sheet to its place, and we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6569"></td>
        <td id="LC6569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6570"></td>
        <td id="LC6570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6571"></td>
        <td id="LC6571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was undressing in my own room, when, with a premonitory tap at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6572"></td>
        <td id="LC6572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door, he entered, and at once began to speak:--</td>

        <td id="L6664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6664"></td>
