        <td id="LC6755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coffin had to be prepared; so he went back and took her dead hand in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6756"></td>
        <td id="LC6756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and kissed it, and bent over and kissed her forehead. He came away,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6757"></td>
        <td id="LC6757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fondly looking back over his shoulder at her as he came.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6758"></td>
        <td id="LC6758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6759"></td>
        <td id="LC6759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I left him in the drawing-room, and told Van Helsing that he had said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6760"></td>
        <td id="LC6760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good-bye; so the latter went to the kitchen to tell the undertaker&#39;s men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6761"></td>
        <td id="LC6761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to proceed with the preparations and to screw up the coffin. When he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6762"></td>
        <td id="LC6762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came out of the room again I told him of Arthur&#39;s question, and he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6763"></td>
        <td id="LC6763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">replied:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6764"></td>
        <td id="LC6764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6765"></td>
        <td id="LC6765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am not surprised. Just now I doubted for a moment myself!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6766"></td>
        <td id="LC6766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6767"></td>
        <td id="LC6767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We all dined together, and I could see that poor Art was trying to make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6768"></td>
        <td id="LC6768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the best of things. Van Helsing had been silent all dinner-time; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6769"></td>
        <td id="LC6769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when we had lit our cigars he said--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6770"></td>
        <td id="LC6770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6771"></td>
        <td id="LC6771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Lord----&quot;; but Arthur interrupted him:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6772"></td>
        <td id="LC6772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6773"></td>
        <td id="LC6773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, no, not that, for God&#39;s sake! not yet at any rate. Forgive me, sir:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6774"></td>
        <td id="LC6774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I did not mean to speak offensively; it is only because my loss is so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6775"></td>
        <td id="LC6775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recent.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6776"></td>
        <td id="LC6776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6777"></td>
        <td id="LC6777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Professor answered very sweetly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6778"></td>
        <td id="LC6778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6779"></td>
        <td id="LC6779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I only used that name because I was in doubt. I must not call you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6780"></td>
        <td id="LC6780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Mr.,&#39; and I have grown to love you--yes, my dear boy, to love you--as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6781"></td>
        <td id="LC6781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6782"></td>
        <td id="LC6782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6783"></td>
        <td id="LC6783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur held out his hand, and took the old man&#39;s warmly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6784"></td>
        <td id="LC6784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6785"></td>
        <td id="LC6785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Call me what you will,&quot; he said. &quot;I hope I may always have the title of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6786"></td>
        <td id="LC6786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a friend. And let me say that I am at a loss for words to thank you for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6787"></td>
        <td id="LC6787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your goodness to my poor dear.&quot; He paused a moment, and went on: &quot;I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6788"></td>
        <td id="LC6788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that she understood your goodness even better than I do; and if I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6789"></td>
        <td id="LC6789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rude or in any way wanting at that time you acted so--you remember&quot;--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6790"></td>
        <td id="LC6790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor nodded--&quot;you must forgive me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6791"></td>
        <td id="LC6791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6792"></td>
        <td id="LC6792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He answered with a grave kindness:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6793"></td>
        <td id="LC6793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6794"></td>
        <td id="LC6794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I know it was hard for you to quite trust me then, for to trust such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6795"></td>
        <td id="LC6795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">violence needs to understand; and I take it that you do not--that you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6796"></td>
        <td id="LC6796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot--trust me now, for you do not yet understand. And there may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6797"></td>
        <td id="LC6797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more times when I shall want you to trust when you cannot--and may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6798"></td>
        <td id="LC6798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not--and must not yet understand. But the time will come when your trust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6799"></td>
        <td id="LC6799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall be whole and complete in me, and when you shall understand as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6800"></td>
        <td id="LC6800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though the sunlight himself shone through. Then you shall bless me from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6801"></td>
        <td id="LC6801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first to last for your own sake, and for the sake of others and for her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6802"></td>
        <td id="LC6802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear sake to whom I swore to protect.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6803"></td>
        <td id="LC6803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6804"></td>
        <td id="LC6804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And, indeed, indeed, sir,&quot; said Arthur warmly, &quot;I shall in all ways</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6805"></td>
        <td id="LC6805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trust you. I know and believe you have a very noble heart, and you are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6806"></td>
        <td id="LC6806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jack&#39;s friend, and you were hers. You shall do what you like.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6807"></td>
        <td id="LC6807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6808"></td>
        <td id="LC6808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Professor cleared his throat a couple of times, as though about to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6809"></td>
        <td id="LC6809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speak, and finally said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6810"></td>
        <td id="LC6810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6811"></td>
        <td id="LC6811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;May I ask you something now?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6812"></td>
        <td id="LC6812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6813"></td>
        <td id="LC6813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Certainly.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6814"></td>
        <td id="LC6814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6815"></td>
        <td id="LC6815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You know that Mrs. Westenra left you all her property?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6816"></td>
        <td id="LC6816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6817"></td>
        <td id="LC6817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, poor dear; I never thought of it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6818"></td>
        <td id="LC6818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6819"></td>
        <td id="LC6819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And as it is all yours, you have a right to deal with it as you will. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6820"></td>
        <td id="LC6820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">want you to give me permission to read all Miss Lucy&#39;s papers and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6821"></td>
        <td id="LC6821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letters. Believe me, it is no idle curiosity. I have a motive of which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6822"></td>
        <td id="LC6822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be sure, she would have approved. I have them all here. I took them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6823"></td>
        <td id="LC6823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before we knew that all was yours, so that no strange hand might touch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6824"></td>
        <td id="LC6824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them--no strange eye look through words into her soul. I shall keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6825"></td>
        <td id="LC6825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, if I may; even you may not see them yet, but I shall keep them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6826"></td>
        <td id="LC6826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">safe. No word shall be lost; and in the good time I shall give them back</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6827"></td>
        <td id="LC6827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to you. It&#39;s a hard thing I ask, but you will do it, will you not, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6828"></td>
        <td id="LC6828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucy&#39;s sake?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6829"></td>
        <td id="LC6829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6830"></td>
        <td id="LC6830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur spoke out heartily, like his old self:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6831"></td>
        <td id="LC6831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6832"></td>
        <td id="LC6832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dr. Van Helsing, you may do what you will. I feel that in saying this I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6833"></td>
        <td id="LC6833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am doing what my dear one would have approved. I shall not trouble you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6834"></td>
        <td id="LC6834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with questions till the time comes.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6835"></td>
        <td id="LC6835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6836"></td>
        <td id="LC6836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The old Professor stood up as he said solemnly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6837"></td>
        <td id="LC6837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6838"></td>
        <td id="LC6838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And you are right. There will be pain for us all; but it will not be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6839"></td>
        <td id="LC6839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all pain, nor will this pain be the last. We and you too--you most of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6840"></td>
        <td id="LC6840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all, my dear boy--will have to pass through the bitter water before we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6841"></td>
        <td id="LC6841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reach the sweet. But we must be brave of heart and unselfish, and do our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6842"></td>
        <td id="LC6842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">duty, and all will be well!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6843"></td>
        <td id="LC6843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6844"></td>
        <td id="LC6844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I slept on a sofa in Arthur&#39;s room that night. Van Helsing did not go to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6845"></td>
        <td id="LC6845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed at all. He went to and fro, as if patrolling the house, and was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6846"></td>
        <td id="LC6846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never out of sight of the room where Lucy lay in her coffin, strewn with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6847"></td>
        <td id="LC6847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wild garlic flowers, which sent, through the odour of lily and rose,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6848"></td>
        <td id="LC6848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a heavy, overpowering smell into the night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6849"></td>
        <td id="LC6849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6850"></td>
        <td id="LC6850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6851"></td>
        <td id="LC6851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Mina Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6852"></td>
        <td id="LC6852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6853"></td>
        <td id="LC6853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_22 September._--In the train to Exeter. Jonathan sleeping.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6854"></td>
        <td id="LC6854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6855"></td>
        <td id="LC6855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It seems only yesterday that the last entry was made, and yet how much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6856"></td>
        <td id="LC6856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between then, in Whitby and all the world before me, Jonathan away and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6857"></td>
        <td id="LC6857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no news of him; and now, married to Jonathan, Jonathan a solicitor, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6858"></td>
        <td id="LC6858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">partner, rich, master of his business, Mr. Hawkins dead and buried, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6859"></td>
        <td id="LC6859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan with another attack that may harm him. Some day he may ask me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6860"></td>
        <td id="LC6860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about it. Down it all goes. I am rusty in my shorthand--see what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6861"></td>
        <td id="LC6861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unexpected prosperity does for us--so it may be as well to freshen it up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6862"></td>
        <td id="LC6862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again with an exercise anyhow....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6863"></td>
        <td id="LC6863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6864"></td>
        <td id="LC6864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The service was very simple and very solemn. There were only ourselves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6865"></td>
        <td id="LC6865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the servants there, one or two old friends of his from Exeter, his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6866"></td>
        <td id="LC6866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">London agent, and a gentleman representing Sir John Paxton, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6867"></td>
        <td id="LC6867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">President of the Incorporated Law Society. Jonathan and I stood hand in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6868"></td>
        <td id="LC6868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand, and we felt that our best and dearest friend was gone from us....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6869"></td>
        <td id="LC6869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6870"></td>
        <td id="LC6870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We came back to town quietly, taking a &#39;bus to Hyde Park Corner.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6871"></td>
        <td id="LC6871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan thought it would interest me to go into the Row for a while, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6872"></td>
        <td id="LC6872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we sat down; but there were very few people there, and it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6873"></td>
        <td id="LC6873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sad-looking and desolate to see so many empty chairs. It made us think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6874"></td>
        <td id="LC6874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the empty chair at home; so we got up and walked down Piccadilly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6875"></td>
        <td id="LC6875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan was holding me by the arm, the way he used to in old days</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6876"></td>
        <td id="LC6876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before I went to school. I felt it very improper, for you can&#39;t go on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6877"></td>
        <td id="LC6877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for some years teaching etiquette and decorum to other girls without the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6878"></td>
        <td id="LC6878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pedantry of it biting into yourself a bit; but it was Jonathan, and he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6879"></td>
        <td id="LC6879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was my husband, and we didn&#39;t know anybody who saw us--and we didn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6880"></td>
        <td id="LC6880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">care if they did--so on we walked. I was looking at a very beautiful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6881"></td>
        <td id="LC6881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girl, in a big cart-wheel hat, sitting in a victoria outside Guiliano&#39;s,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6882"></td>
        <td id="LC6882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when I felt Jonathan clutch my arm so tight that he hurt me, and he said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6883"></td>
        <td id="LC6883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under his breath: &quot;My God!&quot; I am always anxious about Jonathan, for I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6884"></td>
        <td id="LC6884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear that some nervous fit may upset him again; so I turned to him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6885"></td>
        <td id="LC6885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quickly, and asked him what it was that disturbed him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6886"></td>
        <td id="LC6886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6887"></td>
        <td id="LC6887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was very pale, and his eyes seemed bulging out as, half in terror and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6888"></td>
        <td id="LC6888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half in amazement, he gazed at a tall, thin man, with a beaky nose and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6889"></td>
        <td id="LC6889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">black moustache and pointed beard, who was also observing the pretty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6890"></td>
        <td id="LC6890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girl. He was looking at her so hard that he did not see either of us,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6891"></td>
        <td id="LC6891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and so I had a good view of him. His face was not a good face; it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6892"></td>
        <td id="LC6892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hard, and cruel, and sensual, and his big white teeth, that looked all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6893"></td>
        <td id="LC6893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the whiter because his lips were so red, were pointed like an animal&#39;s.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6894"></td>
        <td id="LC6894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan kept staring at him, till I was afraid he would notice. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6895"></td>
        <td id="LC6895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feared he might take it ill, he looked so fierce and nasty. I asked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6896"></td>
        <td id="LC6896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan why he was disturbed, and he answered, evidently thinking that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6897"></td>
        <td id="LC6897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I knew as much about it as he did: &quot;Do you see who it is?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6898"></td>
        <td id="LC6898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6899"></td>
        <td id="LC6899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, dear,&quot; I said; &quot;I don&#39;t know him; who is it?&quot; His answer seemed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6900"></td>
        <td id="LC6900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shock and thrill me, for it was said as if he did not know that it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6901"></td>
        <td id="LC6901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me, Mina, to whom he was speaking:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6902"></td>
        <td id="LC6902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6903"></td>
        <td id="LC6903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It is the man himself!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6904"></td>
        <td id="LC6904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6905"></td>
        <td id="LC6905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The poor dear was evidently terrified at something--very greatly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6906"></td>
        <td id="LC6906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrified; I do believe that if he had not had me to lean on and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6907"></td>
        <td id="LC6907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">support him he would have sunk down. He kept staring; a man came out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6908"></td>
        <td id="LC6908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the shop with a small parcel, and gave it to the lady, who then drove</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6909"></td>
        <td id="LC6909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off. The dark man kept his eyes fixed on her, and when the carriage</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6910"></td>
        <td id="LC6910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moved up Piccadilly he followed in the same direction, and hailed a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6911"></td>
        <td id="LC6911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hansom. Jonathan kept looking after him, and said, as if to himself:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6912"></td>
        <td id="LC6912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6913"></td>
        <td id="LC6913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I believe it is the Count, but he has grown young. My God, if this be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6914"></td>
        <td id="LC6914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so! Oh, my God! my God! If I only knew! if I only knew!&quot; He was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6915"></td>
        <td id="LC6915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distressing himself so much that I feared to keep his mind on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6916"></td>
        <td id="LC6916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subject by asking him any questions, so I remained silent. I drew him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6917"></td>
        <td id="LC6917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away quietly, and he, holding my arm, came easily. We walked a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6918"></td>
        <td id="LC6918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">further, and then went in and sat for a while in the Green Park. It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6919"></td>
        <td id="LC6919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a hot day for autumn, and there was a comfortable seat in a shady place.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6920"></td>
        <td id="LC6920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a few minutes&#39; staring at nothing, Jonathan&#39;s eyes closed, and he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6921"></td>
        <td id="LC6921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went quietly into a sleep, with his head on my shoulder. I thought it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6922"></td>
        <td id="LC6922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was the best thing for him, so did not disturb him. In about twenty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6923"></td>
        <td id="LC6923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minutes he woke up, and said to me quite cheerfully:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6924"></td>
        <td id="LC6924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6925"></td>
        <td id="LC6925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, Mina, have I been asleep! Oh, do forgive me for being so rude.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6926"></td>
        <td id="LC6926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Come, and we&#39;ll have a cup of tea somewhere.&quot; He had evidently forgotten</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6927"></td>
        <td id="LC6927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all about the dark stranger, as in his illness he had forgotten all that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6928"></td>
        <td id="LC6928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this episode had reminded him of. I don&#39;t like this lapsing into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6929"></td>
        <td id="LC6929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forgetfulness; it may make or continue some injury to the brain. I must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6930"></td>
        <td id="LC6930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not ask him, for fear I shall do more harm than good; but I must somehow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6931"></td>
        <td id="LC6931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learn the facts of his journey abroad. The time is come, I fear, when I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6932"></td>
        <td id="LC6932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must open that parcel, and know what is written. Oh, Jonathan, you will,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6933"></td>
        <td id="LC6933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I know, forgive me if I do wrong, but it is for your own dear sake.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6934"></td>
        <td id="LC6934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6935"></td>
        <td id="LC6935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6936"></td>
        <td id="LC6936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6937"></td>
        <td id="LC6937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--A sad home-coming in every way--the house empty of the dear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6938"></td>
        <td id="LC6938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soul who was so good to us; Jonathan still pale and dizzy under a slight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6939"></td>
        <td id="LC6939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relapse of his malady; and now a telegram from Van Helsing, whoever he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6940"></td>
        <td id="LC6940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6941"></td>
        <td id="LC6941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6942"></td>
        <td id="LC6942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You will be grieved to hear that Mrs. Westenra died five days ago, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6943"></td>
        <td id="LC6943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Lucy died the day before yesterday. They were both buried to-day.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6944"></td>
        <td id="LC6944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6945"></td>
        <td id="LC6945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Oh, what a wealth of sorrow in a few words! Poor Mrs. Westenra! poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6946"></td>
        <td id="LC6946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucy! Gone, gone, never to return to us! And poor, poor Arthur, to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6947"></td>
        <td id="LC6947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lost such sweetness out of his life! God help us all to bear our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6948"></td>
        <td id="LC6948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">troubles.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6949"></td>
        <td id="LC6949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6950"></td>
        <td id="LC6950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6951"></td>
        <td id="LC6951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6952"></td>
        <td id="LC6952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6953"></td>
        <td id="LC6953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_22 September._--It is all over. Arthur has gone back to Ring, and has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6954"></td>
        <td id="LC6954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taken Quincey Morris with him. What a fine fellow is Quincey! I believe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6955"></td>
        <td id="LC6955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my heart of hearts that he suffered as much about Lucy&#39;s death as any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6956"></td>
        <td id="LC6956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of us; but he bore himself through it like a moral Viking. If America</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6957"></td>
        <td id="LC6957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can go on breeding men like that, she will be a power in the world</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6958"></td>
        <td id="LC6958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indeed. Van Helsing is lying down, having a rest preparatory to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6959"></td>
        <td id="LC6959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">journey. He goes over to Amsterdam to-night, but says he returns</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6960"></td>
        <td id="LC6960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to-morrow night; that he only wants to make some arrangements which can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6961"></td>
        <td id="LC6961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only be made personally. He is to stop with me then, if he can; he says</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6962"></td>
        <td id="LC6962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he has work to do in London which may take him some time. Poor old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6963"></td>
        <td id="LC6963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fellow! I fear that the strain of the past week has broken down even his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6964"></td>
        <td id="LC6964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">iron strength. All the time of the burial he was, I could see, putting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6965"></td>
        <td id="LC6965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some terrible restraint on himself. When it was all over, we were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6966"></td>
        <td id="LC6966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">standing beside Arthur, who, poor fellow, was speaking of his part in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6967"></td>
        <td id="LC6967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the operation where his blood had been transfused to his Lucy&#39;s veins; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6968"></td>
        <td id="LC6968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could see Van Helsing&#39;s face grow white and purple by turns. Arthur was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6969"></td>
        <td id="LC6969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying that he felt since then as if they two had been really married</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6970"></td>
        <td id="LC6970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that she was his wife in the sight of God. None of us said a word of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6971"></td>
        <td id="LC6971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other operations, and none of us ever shall. Arthur and Quincey went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6972"></td>
        <td id="LC6972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away together to the station, and Van Helsing and I came on here. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6973"></td>
        <td id="LC6973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment we were alone in the carriage he gave way to a regular fit of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6974"></td>
        <td id="LC6974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hysterics. He has denied to me since that it was hysterics, and insisted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6975"></td>
        <td id="LC6975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that it was only his sense of humour asserting itself under very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6976"></td>
        <td id="LC6976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible conditions. He laughed till he cried, and I had to draw down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6977"></td>
        <td id="LC6977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the blinds lest any one should see us and misjudge; and then he cried,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6978"></td>
        <td id="LC6978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till he laughed again; and laughed and cried together, just as a woman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6979"></td>
        <td id="LC6979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">does. I tried to be stern with him, as one is to a woman under the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6980"></td>
        <td id="LC6980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circumstances; but it had no effect. Men and women are so different in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6981"></td>
        <td id="LC6981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manifestations of nervous strength or weakness! Then when his face grew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6982"></td>
        <td id="LC6982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grave and stern again I asked him why his mirth, and why at such a time.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6983"></td>
        <td id="LC6983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His reply was in a way characteristic of him, for it was logical and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6984"></td>
        <td id="LC6984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forceful and mysterious. He said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6985"></td>
        <td id="LC6985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6986"></td>
        <td id="LC6986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah, you don&#39;t comprehend, friend John. Do not think that I am not sad,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6987"></td>
        <td id="LC6987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though I laugh. See, I have cried even when the laugh did choke me. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6988"></td>
        <td id="LC6988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no more think that I am all sorry when I cry, for the laugh he come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6989"></td>
        <td id="LC6989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just the same. Keep it always with you that laughter who knock at your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6990"></td>
        <td id="LC6990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door and say, &#39;May I come in?&#39; is not the true laughter. No! he is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6991"></td>
        <td id="LC6991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">king, and he come when and how he like. He ask no person; he choose no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6992"></td>
        <td id="LC6992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time of suitability. He say, &#39;I am here.&#39; Behold, in example I grieve my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6993"></td>
        <td id="LC6993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart out for that so sweet young girl; I give my blood for her, though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6994"></td>
        <td id="LC6994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am old and worn; I give my time, my skill, my sleep; I let my other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6995"></td>
        <td id="LC6995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sufferers want that so she may have all. And yet I can laugh at her very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6996"></td>
        <td id="LC6996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grave--laugh when the clay from the spade of the sexton drop upon her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6997"></td>
        <td id="LC6997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coffin and say &#39;Thud! thud!&#39; to my heart, till it send back the blood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6998"></td>
        <td id="LC6998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from my cheek. My heart bleed for that poor boy--that dear boy, so of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6999"></td>
        <td id="LC6999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the age of mine own boy had I been so blessed that he live, and with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7000"></td>
        <td id="LC7000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hair and eyes the same. There, you know now why I love him so. And yet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7001"></td>
        <td id="LC7001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he say things that touch my husband-heart to the quick, and make my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7002"></td>
        <td id="LC7002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father-heart yearn to him as to no other man--not even to you, friend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7003"></td>
        <td id="LC7003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">John, for we are more level in experiences than father and son--yet even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7004"></td>
        <td id="LC7004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at such moment King Laugh he come to me and shout and bellow in my ear,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7005"></td>
        <td id="LC7005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Here I am! here I am!&#39; till the blood come dance back and bring some of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7006"></td>
        <td id="LC7006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sunshine that he carry with him to my cheek. Oh, friend John, it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7007"></td>
        <td id="LC7007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a strange world, a sad world, a world full of miseries, and woes, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7008"></td>
        <td id="LC7008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">troubles; and yet when King Laugh come he make them all dance to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7009"></td>
        <td id="LC7009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tune he play. Bleeding hearts, and dry bones of the churchyard, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7010"></td>
        <td id="LC7010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tears that burn as they fall--all dance together to the music that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7011"></td>
        <td id="LC7011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make with that smileless mouth of him. And believe me, friend John, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7012"></td>
        <td id="LC7012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is good to come, and kind. Ah, we men and women are like ropes drawn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7013"></td>
        <td id="LC7013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tight with strain that pull us different ways. Then tears come; and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7014"></td>
        <td id="LC7014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like the rain on the ropes, they brace us up, until perhaps the strain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7015"></td>
        <td id="LC7015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">become too great, and we break. But King Laugh he come like the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7016"></td>
        <td id="LC7016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sunshine, and he ease off the strain again; and we bear to go on with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7017"></td>
        <td id="LC7017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our labour, what it may be.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7018"></td>
        <td id="LC7018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7019"></td>
        <td id="LC7019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I did not like to wound him by pretending not to see his idea; but, as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7020"></td>
        <td id="LC7020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did not yet understand the cause of his laughter, I asked him. As he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7021"></td>
        <td id="LC7021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered me his face grew stern, and he said in quite a different</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7022"></td>
        <td id="LC7022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tone:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7023"></td>
        <td id="LC7023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7024"></td>
        <td id="LC7024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, it was the grim irony of it all--this so lovely lady garlanded with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7025"></td>
        <td id="LC7025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flowers, that looked so fair as life, till one by one we wondered if she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7026"></td>
        <td id="LC7026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were truly dead; she laid in that so fine marble house in that lonely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7027"></td>
        <td id="LC7027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">churchyard, where rest so many of her kin, laid there with the mother</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7028"></td>
        <td id="LC7028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who loved her, and whom she loved; and that sacred bell going &#39;Toll!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7029"></td>
        <td id="LC7029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">toll! toll!&#39; so sad and slow; and those holy men, with the white</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L7123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7123"></td>

        <td id="L7127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7127"></td>
        <td id="LC7127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                         THE HAMPSTEAD HORROR.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7128"></td>
        <td id="LC7128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7129"></td>
        <td id="LC7129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                         ANOTHER CHILD INJURED.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7130"></td>
        <td id="LC7130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7131"></td>
        <td id="LC7131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                         _The &quot;Bloofer Lady.&quot;_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7132"></td>
        <td id="LC7132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7133"></td>
        <td id="LC7133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We have just received intelligence that another child, missed last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7134"></td>
        <td id="LC7134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night, was only discovered late in the morning under a furze bush at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7135"></td>
        <td id="LC7135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Shooter&#39;s Hill side of Hampstead Heath, which is, perhaps, less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7136"></td>
        <td id="LC7136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frequented than the other parts. It has the same tiny wound in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7137"></td>
        <td id="LC7137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throat as has been noticed in other cases. It was terribly weak, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7138"></td>
        <td id="LC7138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked quite emaciated. It too, when partially restored, had the common</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7139"></td>
        <td id="LC7139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">story to tell of being lured away by the &quot;bloofer lady.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7140"></td>
        <td id="LC7140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7141"></td>
        <td id="LC7141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7142"></td>
        <td id="LC7142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7143"></td>
