</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7144"></td>
        <td id="LC7144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XIV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7145"></td>
        <td id="LC7145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7146"></td>
        <td id="LC7146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">MINA HARKER&#39;S JOURNAL</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7147"></td>
        <td id="LC7147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7148"></td>
        <td id="LC7148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7149"></td>
        <td id="LC7149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_23 September_.--Jonathan is better after a bad night. I am so glad that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7150"></td>
        <td id="LC7150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he has plenty of work to do, for that keeps his mind off the terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7151"></td>
        <td id="LC7151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things; and oh, I am rejoiced that he is not now weighed down with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7152"></td>
        <td id="LC7152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">responsibility of his new position. I knew he would be true to himself,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7153"></td>
        <td id="LC7153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and now how proud I am to see my Jonathan rising to the height of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7154"></td>
        <td id="LC7154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advancement and keeping pace in all ways with the duties that come upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7155"></td>
        <td id="LC7155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. He will be away all day till late, for he said he could not lunch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7156"></td>
        <td id="LC7156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at home. My household work is done, so I shall take his foreign journal,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7157"></td>
        <td id="LC7157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and lock myself up in my room and read it....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7158"></td>
        <td id="LC7158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7159"></td>
        <td id="LC7159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7160"></td>
        <td id="LC7160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_24 September_.--I hadn&#39;t the heart to write last night; that terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7161"></td>
        <td id="LC7161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">record of Jonathan&#39;s upset me so. Poor dear! How he must have suffered,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7162"></td>
        <td id="LC7162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether it be true or only imagination. I wonder if there is any truth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7163"></td>
        <td id="LC7163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in it at all. Did he get his brain fever, and then write all those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7164"></td>
        <td id="LC7164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible things, or had he some cause for it all? I suppose I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7165"></td>
        <td id="LC7165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never know, for I dare not open the subject to him.... And yet that man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7166"></td>
        <td id="LC7166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we saw yesterday! He seemed quite certain of him.... Poor fellow! I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7167"></td>
        <td id="LC7167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suppose it was the funeral upset him and sent his mind back on some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7168"></td>
        <td id="LC7168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">train of thought.... He believes it all himself. I remember how on our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7169"></td>
        <td id="LC7169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wedding-day he said: &quot;Unless some solemn duty come upon me to go back to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7170"></td>
        <td id="LC7170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bitter hours, asleep or awake, mad or sane.&quot; There seems to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7171"></td>
        <td id="LC7171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through it all some thread of continuity.... That fearful Count was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7172"></td>
        <td id="LC7172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming to London.... If it should be, and he came to London, with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7173"></td>
        <td id="LC7173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">teeming millions.... There may be a solemn duty; and if it come we must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7174"></td>
        <td id="LC7174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not shrink from it.... I shall be prepared. I shall get my typewriter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7175"></td>
        <td id="LC7175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this very hour and begin transcribing. Then we shall be ready for other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7176"></td>
        <td id="LC7176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes if required. And if it be wanted; then, perhaps, if I am ready,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7177"></td>
        <td id="LC7177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor Jonathan may not be upset, for I can speak for him and never let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7178"></td>
        <td id="LC7178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him be troubled or worried with it at all. If ever Jonathan quite gets</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7179"></td>
        <td id="LC7179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over the nervousness he may want to tell me of it all, and I can ask him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7180"></td>
        <td id="LC7180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">questions and find out things, and see how I may comfort him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7181"></td>
        <td id="LC7181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7182"></td>
        <td id="LC7182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7183"></td>
        <td id="LC7183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Van Helsing to Mrs. Harker._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7184"></td>
        <td id="LC7184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7185"></td>
        <td id="LC7185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_24 September._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7186"></td>
        <td id="LC7186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7187"></td>
        <td id="LC7187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(_Confidence_)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7188"></td>
        <td id="LC7188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7189"></td>
        <td id="LC7189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dear Madam,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7190"></td>
        <td id="LC7190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7191"></td>
        <td id="LC7191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I pray you to pardon my writing, in that I am so far friend as that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7192"></td>
        <td id="LC7192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sent to you sad news of Miss Lucy Westenra&#39;s death. By the kindness of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7193"></td>
        <td id="LC7193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lord Godalming, I am empowered to read her letters and papers, for I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7194"></td>
        <td id="LC7194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deeply concerned about certain matters vitally important. In them I find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7195"></td>
        <td id="LC7195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some letters from you, which show how great friends you were and how you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7196"></td>
        <td id="LC7196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">love her. Oh, Madam Mina, by that love, I implore you, help me. It is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7197"></td>
        <td id="LC7197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for others&#39; good that I ask--to redress great wrong, and to lift much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7198"></td>
        <td id="LC7198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and terrible troubles--that may be more great than you can know. May it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7199"></td>
        <td id="LC7199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be that I see you? You can trust me. I am friend of Dr. John Seward and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7200"></td>
        <td id="LC7200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Lord Godalming (that was Arthur of Miss Lucy). I must keep it private</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7201"></td>
        <td id="LC7201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the present from all. I should come to Exeter to see you at once if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7202"></td>
        <td id="LC7202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you tell me I am privilege to come, and where and when. I implore your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7203"></td>
        <td id="LC7203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pardon, madam. I have read your letters to poor Lucy, and know how good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7204"></td>
        <td id="LC7204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you are and how your husband suffer; so I pray you, if it may be,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7205"></td>
        <td id="LC7205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enlighten him not, lest it may harm. Again your pardon, and forgive me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7206"></td>
        <td id="LC7206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7207"></td>
        <td id="LC7207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;VAN HELSING.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7208"></td>
        <td id="LC7208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7209"></td>
        <td id="LC7209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7210"></td>
        <td id="LC7210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Telegram, Mrs. Harker to Van Helsing._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7211"></td>
        <td id="LC7211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7212"></td>
        <td id="LC7212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_25 September._--Come to-day by quarter-past ten train if you can catch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7213"></td>
        <td id="LC7213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. Can see you any time you call.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7214"></td>
        <td id="LC7214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7215"></td>
        <td id="LC7215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;WILHELMINA HARKER.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7216"></td>
        <td id="LC7216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7400"></td>
        <td id="LC7400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which led to his brain fever.&quot; And here the whole thing seemed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7401"></td>
        <td id="LC7401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overwhelm me in a rush. The pity for Jonathan, the horror which he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7402"></td>
        <td id="LC7402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experienced, the whole fearful mystery of his diary, and the fear that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7403"></td>
        <td id="LC7403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has been brooding over me ever since, all came in a tumult. I suppose I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7404"></td>
        <td id="LC7404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was hysterical, for I threw myself on my knees and held up my hands to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7405"></td>
        <td id="LC7405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, and implored him to make my husband well again. He took my hands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7406"></td>
        <td id="LC7406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and raised me up, and made me sit on the sofa, and sat by me; he held my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7407"></td>
        <td id="LC7407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand in his, and said to me with, oh, such infinite sweetness:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7408"></td>
        <td id="LC7408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7409"></td>
        <td id="LC7409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My life is a barren and lonely one, and so full of work that I have not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7410"></td>
        <td id="LC7410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had much time for friendships; but since I have been summoned to here by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7411"></td>
        <td id="LC7411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my friend John Seward I have known so many good people and seen such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7412"></td>
        <td id="LC7412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nobility that I feel more than ever--and it has grown with my advancing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7413"></td>
        <td id="LC7413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years--the loneliness of my life. Believe, me, then, that I come here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7414"></td>
        <td id="LC7414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">full of respect for you, and you have given me hope--hope, not in what I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7415"></td>
        <td id="LC7415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am seeking of, but that there are good women still left to make life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7416"></td>
        <td id="LC7416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happy--good women, whose lives and whose truths may make good lesson for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7417"></td>
        <td id="LC7417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the children that are to be. I am glad, glad, that I may here be of some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7418"></td>
        <td id="LC7418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">use to you; for if your husband suffer, he suffer within the range of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7419"></td>
        <td id="LC7419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">study and experience. I promise you that I will gladly do _all_ for him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7420"></td>
        <td id="LC7420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I can--all to make his life strong and manly, and your life a happy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7421"></td>
        <td id="LC7421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one. Now you must eat. You are overwrought and perhaps over-anxious.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7422"></td>
        <td id="LC7422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Husband Jonathan would not like to see you so pale; and what he like not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7423"></td>
        <td id="LC7423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where he love, is not to his good. Therefore for his sake you must eat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7424"></td>
        <td id="LC7424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and smile. You have told me all about Lucy, and so now we shall not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7425"></td>
        <td id="LC7425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speak of it, lest it distress. I shall stay in Exeter to-night, for I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7426"></td>
        <td id="LC7426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">want to think much over what you have told me, and when I have thought I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7427"></td>
        <td id="LC7427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will ask you questions, if I may. And then, too, you will tell me of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7428"></td>
        <td id="LC7428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husband Jonathan&#39;s trouble so far as you can, but not yet. You must eat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7429"></td>
        <td id="LC7429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now; afterwards you shall tell me all.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7430"></td>
        <td id="LC7430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7431"></td>
        <td id="LC7431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After lunch, when we went back to the drawing-room, he said to me:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7432"></td>
        <td id="LC7432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7433"></td>
        <td id="LC7433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And now tell me all about him.&quot; When it came to speaking to this great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7434"></td>
        <td id="LC7434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learned man, I began to fear that he would think me a weak fool, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7435"></td>
        <td id="LC7435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan a madman--that journal is all so strange--and I hesitated to go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7436"></td>
        <td id="LC7436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on. But he was so sweet and kind, and he had promised to help, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7437"></td>
        <td id="LC7437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trusted him, so I said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7438"></td>
        <td id="LC7438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7439"></td>
        <td id="LC7439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dr. Van Helsing, what I have to tell you is so queer that you must not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7440"></td>
        <td id="LC7440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laugh at me or at my husband. I have been since yesterday in a sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7441"></td>
        <td id="LC7441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fever of doubt; you must be kind to me, and not think me foolish that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7442"></td>
        <td id="LC7442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have even half believed some very strange things.&quot; He reassured me by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7443"></td>
        <td id="LC7443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his manner as well as his words when he said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7444"></td>
        <td id="LC7444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7445"></td>
        <td id="LC7445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, my dear, if you only know how strange is the matter regarding which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7446"></td>
        <td id="LC7446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am here, it is you who would laugh. I have learned not to think little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7447"></td>
        <td id="LC7447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of any one&#39;s belief, no matter how strange it be. I have tried to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7448"></td>
        <td id="LC7448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an open mind; and it is not the ordinary things of life that could close</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7449"></td>
        <td id="LC7449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, but the strange things, the extraordinary things, the things that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7450"></td>
        <td id="LC7450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make one doubt if they be mad or sane.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7451"></td>
        <td id="LC7451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7452"></td>
        <td id="LC7452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Thank you, thank you, a thousand times! You have taken a weight off my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7453"></td>
        <td id="LC7453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind. If you will let me, I shall give you a paper to read. It is long,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7454"></td>
        <td id="LC7454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but I have typewritten it out. It will tell you my trouble and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7455"></td>
        <td id="LC7455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan&#39;s. It is the copy of his journal when abroad, and all that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7456"></td>
        <td id="LC7456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened. I dare not say anything of it; you will read for yourself and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7457"></td>
        <td id="LC7457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judge. And then when I see you, perhaps, you will be very kind and tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7458"></td>
        <td id="LC7458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me what you think.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7459"></td>
        <td id="LC7459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7460"></td>
        <td id="LC7460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I promise,&quot; he said as I gave him the papers; &quot;I shall in the morning,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7461"></td>
        <td id="LC7461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so soon as I can, come to see you and your husband, if I may.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7462"></td>
        <td id="LC7462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7463"></td>
        <td id="LC7463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Jonathan will be here at half-past eleven, and you must come to lunch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7464"></td>
        <td id="LC7464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with us and see him then; you could catch the quick 3:34 train, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7465"></td>
        <td id="LC7465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will leave you at Paddington before eight.&quot; He was surprised at my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7466"></td>
        <td id="LC7466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge of the trains off-hand, but he does not know that I have made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7467"></td>
        <td id="LC7467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up all the trains to and from Exeter, so that I may help Jonathan in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7468"></td>
        <td id="LC7468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">case he is in a hurry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7469"></td>
        <td id="LC7469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7470"></td>
        <td id="LC7470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So he took the papers with him and went away, and I sit here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7471"></td>
        <td id="LC7471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thinking--thinking I don&#39;t know what.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7472"></td>
        <td id="LC7472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7473"></td>
        <td id="LC7473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
