</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7475"></td>
        <td id="LC7475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter (by hand), Van Helsing to Mrs. Harker._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7476"></td>
        <td id="LC7476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7477"></td>
        <td id="LC7477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_25 September, 6 o&#39;clock._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7478"></td>
        <td id="LC7478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7479"></td>
        <td id="LC7479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dear Madam Mina,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7480"></td>
        <td id="LC7480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7481"></td>
        <td id="LC7481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have read your husband&#39;s so wonderful diary. You may sleep without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7482"></td>
        <td id="LC7482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubt. Strange and terrible as it is, it is _true_! I will pledge my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7483"></td>
        <td id="LC7483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life on it. It may be worse for others; but for him and you there is no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7484"></td>
        <td id="LC7484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dread. He is a noble fellow; and let me tell you from experience of men,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7485"></td>
        <td id="LC7485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that one who would do as he did in going down that wall and to that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7486"></td>
        <td id="LC7486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room--ay, and going a second time--is not one to be injured in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7487"></td>
        <td id="LC7487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">permanence by a shock. His brain and his heart are all right; this I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7488"></td>
        <td id="LC7488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swear, before I have even seen him; so be at rest. I shall have much to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7489"></td>
        <td id="LC7489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ask him of other things. I am blessed that to-day I come to see you, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7490"></td>
        <td id="LC7490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have learn all at once so much that again I am dazzle--dazzle more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7491"></td>
        <td id="LC7491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than ever, and I must think.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7492"></td>
        <td id="LC7492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7493"></td>
        <td id="LC7493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yours the most faithful,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7494"></td>
        <td id="LC7494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7495"></td>
        <td id="LC7495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;ABRAHAM VAN HELSING.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7496"></td>
        <td id="LC7496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7497"></td>
        <td id="LC7497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7498"></td>
        <td id="LC7498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Letter, Mrs. Harker to Van Helsing._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7499"></td>
        <td id="LC7499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7500"></td>
        <td id="LC7500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_25 September, 6:30 p. m._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7501"></td>
        <td id="LC7501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7502"></td>
        <td id="LC7502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear Dr. Van Helsing,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7503"></td>
        <td id="LC7503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7504"></td>
        <td id="LC7504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;A thousand thanks for your kind letter, which has taken a great weight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7505"></td>
        <td id="LC7505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off my mind. And yet, if it be true, what terrible things there are in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7506"></td>
        <td id="LC7506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the world, and what an awful thing if that man, that monster, be really</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7507"></td>
        <td id="LC7507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in London! I fear to think. I have this moment, whilst writing, had a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7508"></td>
        <td id="LC7508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wire from Jonathan, saying that he leaves by the 6:25 to-night from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7509"></td>
        <td id="LC7509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Launceston and will be here at 10:18, so that I shall have no fear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7510"></td>
        <td id="LC7510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to-night. Will you, therefore, instead of lunching with us, please come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7511"></td>
        <td id="LC7511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to breakfast at eight o&#39;clock, if this be not too early for you? You can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7512"></td>
        <td id="LC7512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get away, if you are in a hurry, by the 10:30 train, which will bring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7513"></td>
        <td id="LC7513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you to Paddington by 2:35. Do not answer this, as I shall take it that,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7514"></td>
        <td id="LC7514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if I do not hear, you will come to breakfast.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7515"></td>
        <td id="LC7515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7516"></td>
        <td id="LC7516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Believe me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7517"></td>
        <td id="LC7517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7518"></td>
        <td id="LC7518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Your faithful and grateful friend,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7519"></td>
        <td id="LC7519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7520"></td>
        <td id="LC7520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;MINA HARKER.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7521"></td>
        <td id="LC7521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7522"></td>
        <td id="LC7522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7523"></td>
        <td id="LC7523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Jonathan Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7524"></td>
        <td id="LC7524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7525"></td>
        <td id="LC7525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_26 September._--I thought never to write in this diary again, but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7526"></td>
        <td id="LC7526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time has come. When I got home last night Mina had supper ready, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7527"></td>
        <td id="LC7527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when we had supped she told me of Van Helsing&#39;s visit, and of her having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7528"></td>
        <td id="LC7528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">given him the two diaries copied out, and of how anxious she has been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7529"></td>
        <td id="LC7529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about me. She showed me in the doctor&#39;s letter that all I wrote down was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7530"></td>
        <td id="LC7530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">true. It seems to have made a new man of me. It was the doubt as to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7531"></td>
        <td id="LC7531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reality of the whole thing that knocked me over. I felt impotent, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7532"></td>
        <td id="LC7532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dark, and distrustful. But, now that I _know_, I am not afraid, even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7533"></td>
        <td id="LC7533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Count. He has succeeded after all, then, in his design in getting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7534"></td>
        <td id="LC7534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to London, and it was he I saw. He has got younger, and how? Van Helsing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7535"></td>
        <td id="LC7535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the man to unmask him and hunt him out, if he is anything like what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7536"></td>
        <td id="LC7536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mina says. We sat late, and talked it all over. Mina is dressing, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7537"></td>
        <td id="LC7537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall call at the hotel in a few minutes and bring him over....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7538"></td>
        <td id="LC7538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7539"></td>
        <td id="LC7539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was, I think, surprised to see me. When I came into the room where he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7540"></td>
        <td id="LC7540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was, and introduced myself, he took me by the shoulder, and turned my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7541"></td>
        <td id="LC7541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face round to the light, and said, after a sharp scrutiny:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7542"></td>
        <td id="LC7542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7543"></td>
        <td id="LC7543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But Madam Mina told me you were ill, that you had had a shock.&quot; It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7544"></td>
        <td id="LC7544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so funny to hear my wife called &quot;Madam Mina&quot; by this kindly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7545"></td>
        <td id="LC7545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strong-faced old man. I smiled, and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7546"></td>
        <td id="LC7546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7547"></td>
        <td id="LC7547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I _was_ ill, I _have_ had a shock; but you have cured me already.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7548"></td>
        <td id="LC7548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7549"></td>
        <td id="LC7549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And how?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7550"></td>
        <td id="LC7550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7551"></td>
        <td id="LC7551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;By your letter to Mina last night. I was in doubt, and then everything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7552"></td>
        <td id="LC7552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took a hue of unreality, and I did not know what to trust, even the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7553"></td>
        <td id="LC7553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidence of my own senses. Not knowing what to trust, I did not know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7554"></td>
        <td id="LC7554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what to do; and so had only to keep on working in what had hitherto been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7555"></td>
        <td id="LC7555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the groove of my life. The groove ceased to avail me, and I mistrusted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7556"></td>
        <td id="LC7556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself. Doctor, you don&#39;t know what it is to doubt everything, even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7557"></td>
        <td id="LC7557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yourself. No, you don&#39;t; you couldn&#39;t with eyebrows like yours.&quot; He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7558"></td>
        <td id="LC7558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed pleased, and laughed as he said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7559"></td>
        <td id="LC7559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7560"></td>
        <td id="LC7560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;So! You are physiognomist. I learn more here with each hour. I am with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7561"></td>
        <td id="LC7561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so much pleasure coming to you to breakfast; and, oh, sir, you will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7562"></td>
        <td id="LC7562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pardon praise from an old man, but you are blessed in your wife.&quot; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7563"></td>
        <td id="LC7563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would listen to him go on praising Mina for a day, so I simply nodded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7564"></td>
        <td id="LC7564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and stood silent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7565"></td>
        <td id="LC7565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7566"></td>
        <td id="LC7566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;She is one of God&#39;s women, fashioned by His own hand to show us men and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7567"></td>
        <td id="LC7567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other women that there is a heaven where we can enter, and that its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7568"></td>
        <td id="LC7568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light can be here on earth. So true, so sweet, so noble, so little an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7569"></td>
        <td id="LC7569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">egoist--and that, let me tell you, is much in this age, so sceptical and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7570"></td>
        <td id="LC7570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">selfish. And you, sir--I have read all the letters to poor Miss Lucy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7571"></td>
        <td id="LC7571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and some of them speak of you, so I know you since some days from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7572"></td>
        <td id="LC7572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowing of others; but I have seen your true self since last night. You</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7573"></td>
        <td id="LC7573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will give me your hand, will you not? And let us be friends for all our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7574"></td>
        <td id="LC7574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lives.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7575"></td>
        <td id="LC7575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7576"></td>
        <td id="LC7576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We shook hands, and he was so earnest and so kind that it made me quite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7577"></td>
        <td id="LC7577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">choky.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7578"></td>
        <td id="LC7578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7579"></td>
        <td id="LC7579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And now,&quot; he said, &quot;may I ask you for some more help? I have a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7580"></td>
        <td id="LC7580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">task to do, and at the beginning it is to know. You can help me here.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7581"></td>
        <td id="LC7581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Can you tell me what went before your going to Transylvania? Later on I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7582"></td>
        <td id="LC7582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may ask more help, and of a different kind; but at first this will do.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7583"></td>
        <td id="LC7583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7584"></td>
        <td id="LC7584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Look here, sir,&quot; I said, &quot;does what you have to do concern the Count?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7585"></td>
        <td id="LC7585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7586"></td>
        <td id="LC7586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It does,&quot; he said solemnly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7587"></td>
        <td id="LC7587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7588"></td>
        <td id="LC7588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then I am with you heart and soul. As you go by the 10:30 train, you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7589"></td>
        <td id="LC7589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will not have time to read them; but I shall get the bundle of papers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7590"></td>
        <td id="LC7590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You can take them with you and read them in the train.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7591"></td>
        <td id="LC7591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7592"></td>
        <td id="LC7592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After breakfast I saw him to the station. When we were parting he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7593"></td>
        <td id="LC7593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7594"></td>
        <td id="LC7594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7595"></td>
        <td id="LC7595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Perhaps you will come to town if I send to you, and take Madam Mina</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7596"></td>
        <td id="LC7596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7597"></td>
        <td id="LC7597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7598"></td>
        <td id="LC7598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We shall both come when you will,&quot; I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7599"></td>
        <td id="LC7599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7600"></td>
        <td id="LC7600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had got him the morning papers and the London papers of the previous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7601"></td>
        <td id="LC7601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night, and while we were talking at the carriage window, waiting for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7602"></td>
        <td id="LC7602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">train to start, he was turning them over. His eyes suddenly seemed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7603"></td>
        <td id="LC7603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">catch something in one of them, &quot;The Westminster Gazette&quot;--I knew it by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7604"></td>
        <td id="LC7604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the colour--and he grew quite white. He read something intently,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7605"></td>
        <td id="LC7605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">groaning to himself: &quot;Mein Gott! Mein Gott! So soon! so soon!&quot; I do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7606"></td>
        <td id="LC7606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think he remembered me at the moment. Just then the whistle blew, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7607"></td>
        <td id="LC7607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the train moved off. This recalled him to himself, and he leaned out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7608"></td>
        <td id="LC7608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the window and waved his hand, calling out: &quot;Love to Madam Mina; I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7609"></td>
        <td id="LC7609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">write so soon as ever I can.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7610"></td>
        <td id="LC7610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7611"></td>
        <td id="LC7611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7612"></td>
        <td id="LC7612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7613"></td>
        <td id="LC7613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7614"></td>
        <td id="LC7614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_26 September._--Truly there is no such thing as finality. Not a week</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7615"></td>
        <td id="LC7615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since I said &quot;Finis,&quot; and yet here I am starting fresh again, or rather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7616"></td>
        <td id="LC7616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going on with the same record. Until this afternoon I had no cause to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7617"></td>
        <td id="LC7617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think of what is done. Renfield had become, to all intents, as sane as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7618"></td>
        <td id="LC7618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he ever was. He was already well ahead with his fly business; and he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7619"></td>
        <td id="LC7619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just started in the spider line also; so he had not been of any trouble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7620"></td>
        <td id="LC7620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me. I had a letter from Arthur, written on Sunday, and from it I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7621"></td>
        <td id="LC7621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gather that he is bearing up wonderfully well. Quincey Morris is with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7622"></td>
        <td id="LC7622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, and that is much of a help, for he himself is a bubbling well of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7623"></td>
        <td id="LC7623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good spirits. Quincey wrote me a line too, and from him I hear that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7624"></td>
        <td id="LC7624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur is beginning to recover something of his old buoyancy; so as to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7625"></td>
        <td id="LC7625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them all my mind is at rest. As for myself, I was settling down to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7626"></td>
        <td id="LC7626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work with the enthusiasm which I used to have for it, so that I might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7627"></td>
        <td id="LC7627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fairly have said that the wound which poor Lucy left on me was becoming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7628"></td>
        <td id="LC7628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cicatrised. Everything is, however, now reopened; and what is to be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7629"></td>
        <td id="LC7629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">end God only knows. I have an idea that Van Helsing thinks he knows,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7630"></td>
        <td id="LC7630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too, but he will only let out enough at a time to whet curiosity. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7631"></td>
        <td id="LC7631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went to Exeter yesterday, and stayed there all night. To-day he came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7632"></td>
        <td id="LC7632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back, and almost bounded into the room at about half-past five o&#39;clock,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7633"></td>
        <td id="LC7633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and thrust last night&#39;s &quot;Westminster Gazette&quot; into my hand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7634"></td>
        <td id="LC7634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7635"></td>
        <td id="LC7635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What do you think of that?&quot; he asked as he stood back and folded his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7636"></td>
        <td id="LC7636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arms.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7637"></td>
        <td id="LC7637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7638"></td>
        <td id="LC7638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I looked over the paper, for I really did not know what he meant; but he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7639"></td>
        <td id="LC7639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took it from me and pointed out a paragraph about children being decoyed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7640"></td>
        <td id="LC7640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away at Hampstead. It did not convey much to me, until I reached a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7641"></td>
        <td id="LC7641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passage where it described small punctured wounds on their throats. An</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7642"></td>
        <td id="LC7642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">idea struck me, and I looked up. &quot;Well?&quot; he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7643"></td>
        <td id="LC7643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7644"></td>
        <td id="LC7644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It is like poor Lucy&#39;s.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7645"></td>
        <td id="LC7645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7646"></td>
        <td id="LC7646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And what do you make of it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7647"></td>
        <td id="LC7647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7648"></td>
        <td id="LC7648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Simply that there is some cause in common. Whatever it was that injured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7649"></td>
        <td id="LC7649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her has injured them.&quot; I did not quite understand his answer:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7650"></td>
        <td id="LC7650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7651"></td>
        <td id="LC7651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That is true indirectly, but not directly.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7652"></td>
        <td id="LC7652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7653"></td>
        <td id="LC7653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How do you mean, Professor?&quot; I asked. I was a little inclined to take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7654"></td>
        <td id="LC7654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his seriousness lightly--for, after all, four days of rest and freedom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7655"></td>
        <td id="LC7655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from burning, harrowing anxiety does help to restore one&#39;s spirits--but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7656"></td>
        <td id="LC7656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when I saw his face, it sobered me. Never, even in the midst of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7657"></td>
        <td id="LC7657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">despair about poor Lucy, had he looked more stern.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7658"></td>
        <td id="LC7658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7659"></td>
        <td id="LC7659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Tell me!&quot; I said. &quot;I can hazard no opinion. I do not know what to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7660"></td>
        <td id="LC7660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think, and I have no data on which to found a conjecture.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7661"></td>
        <td id="LC7661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7662"></td>
        <td id="LC7662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do you mean to tell me, friend John, that you have no suspicion as to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7663"></td>
        <td id="LC7663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what poor Lucy died of; not after all the hints given, not only by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7664"></td>
        <td id="LC7664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">events, but by me?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7665"></td>
        <td id="LC7665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7666"></td>
        <td id="LC7666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Of nervous prostration following on great loss or waste of blood.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7667"></td>
        <td id="LC7667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7668"></td>
        <td id="LC7668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And how the blood lost or waste?&quot; I shook my head. He stepped over and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7669"></td>
        <td id="LC7669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sat down beside me, and went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7670"></td>
        <td id="LC7670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7671"></td>
        <td id="LC7671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You are clever man, friend John; you reason well, and your wit is bold;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7672"></td>
        <td id="LC7672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but you are too prejudiced. You do not let your eyes see nor your ears</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7673"></td>
        <td id="LC7673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hear, and that which is outside your daily life is not of account to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7674"></td>
        <td id="LC7674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you. Do you not think that there are things which you cannot understand,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7675"></td>
        <td id="LC7675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and yet which are; that some people see things that others cannot? But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7676"></td>

        <td id="L7767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7767"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7951"></td>
        <td id="LC7951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That is good logic,&quot; he said, &quot;so far as it goes. But how do you--how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7952"></td>
        <td id="LC7952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can you--account for it not being there?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7953"></td>
        <td id="LC7953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7954"></td>
        <td id="LC7954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Perhaps a body-snatcher,&quot; I suggested. &quot;Some of the undertaker&#39;s people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7955"></td>
        <td id="LC7955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may have stolen it.&quot; I felt that I was speaking folly, and yet it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7956"></td>
        <td id="LC7956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the only real cause which I could suggest. The Professor sighed. &quot;Ah</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7957"></td>
        <td id="LC7957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well!&quot; he said, &quot;we must have more proof. Come with me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7958"></td>
        <td id="LC7958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7959"></td>
        <td id="LC7959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He put on the coffin-lid again, gathered up all his things and placed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7960"></td>
        <td id="LC7960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them in the bag, blew out the light, and placed the candle also in the</td>

        <td id="L7961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7961"></td>
        <td id="LC7961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bag. We opened the door, and went out. Behind us he closed the door and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7962"></td>
        <td id="LC7962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">locked it. He handed me the key, saying: &quot;Will you keep it? You had</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7979"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC7995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No,&quot; I said, in a way that I felt was aggressive.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7996"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L8012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8012"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8013"></td>
        <td id="LC8013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We had now to decide what we were to do with the child, and so consulted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L8015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8015"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8018"></td>
        <td id="LC8018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard a policeman coming, would leave it where he could not fail to find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8019"></td>
        <td id="LC8019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it; we would then seek our way home as quickly as we could. All fell out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8020"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8022"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8024"></td>
        <td id="LC8024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cab near the &quot;Spaniards,&quot; and drove to town.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8025"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8026"></td>
        <td id="LC8026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I cannot sleep, so I make this entry. But I must try to get a few hours&#39;</td>

</td>

        <td id="L8030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8030"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8031"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8032"></td>
        <td id="LC8032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_27 September._--It was two o&#39;clock before we found a suitable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8033"></td>
        <td id="LC8033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opportunity for our attempt. The funeral held at noon was all completed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8034"></td>
        <td id="LC8034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the last stragglers of the mourners had taken themselves lazily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8035"></td>
        <td id="LC8035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away, when, looking carefully from behind a clump of alder-trees, we saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8036"></td>
        <td id="LC8036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sexton lock the gate after him. We knew then that we were safe till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8037"></td>
        <td id="LC8037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning did we desire it; but the Professor told me that we should not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8038"></td>
        <td id="LC8038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">want more than an hour at most. Again I felt that horrid sense of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8039"></td>
        <td id="LC8039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reality of things, in which any effort of imagination seemed out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8040"></td>
        <td id="LC8040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place; and I realised distinctly the perils of the law which we were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8041"></td>
        <td id="LC8041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incurring in our unhallowed work. Besides, I felt it was all so useless.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8042"></td>
        <td id="LC8042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Outrageous as it was to open a leaden coffin, to see if a woman dead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8134"></td>
        <td id="LC8134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good-bye as he ought; and he may think that in some more mistaken idea</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8135"></td>
        <td id="LC8135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this woman was buried alive; and that in most mistake of all we have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8136"></td>
        <td id="LC8136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">killed her. He will then argue back that it is we, mistaken ones, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8137"></td>
        <td id="LC8137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have killed her by our ideas; and so he will be much unhappy always. Yet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8138"></td>
        <td id="LC8138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he never can be sure; and that is the worst of all. And he will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8139"></td>
        <td id="LC8139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sometimes think that she he loved was buried alive, and that will paint</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8140"></td>
        <td id="LC8140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his dreams with horrors of what she must have suffered; and again, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8141"></td>
        <td id="LC8141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will think that we may be right, and that his so beloved was, after all,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8142"></td>
        <td id="LC8142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an Un-Dead. No! I told him once, and since then I learn much. Now, since</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8143"></td>
        <td id="LC8143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I know it is all true, a hundred thousand times more do I know that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8144"></td>
        <td id="LC8144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must pass through the bitter waters to reach the sweet. He, poor fellow,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8145"></td>
        <td id="LC8145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must have one hour that will make the very face of heaven grow black to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8146"></td>
        <td id="LC8146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him; then we can act for good all round and send him peace. My mind is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8147"></td>
        <td id="LC8147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made up. Let us go. You return home for to-night to your asylum, and see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8148"></td>
        <td id="LC8148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that all be well. As for me, I shall spend the night here in this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8149"></td>
        <td id="LC8149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">churchyard in my own way. To-morrow night you will come to me to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8150"></td>
        <td id="LC8150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Berkeley Hotel at ten of the clock. I shall send for Arthur to come too,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8151"></td>
        <td id="LC8151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and also that so fine young man of America that gave his blood. Later we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8152"></td>
        <td id="LC8152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall all have work to do. I come with you so far as Piccadilly and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8153"></td>
        <td id="LC8153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there dine, for I must be back here before the sun set.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8154"></td>
        <td id="LC8154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8155"></td>
        <td id="LC8155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So we locked the tomb and came away, and got over the wall of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8156"></td>
        <td id="LC8156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">churchyard, which was not much of a task, and drove back to Piccadilly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8157"></td>
        <td id="LC8157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8158"></td>
        <td id="LC8158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8159"></td>
        <td id="LC8159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Note left by Van Helsing in his portmanteau, Berkeley Hotel directed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8160"></td>
        <td id="LC8160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">John Seward, M. D._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8161"></td>
        <td id="LC8161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8162"></td>
        <td id="LC8162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(Not delivered.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8163"></td>
        <td id="LC8163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8164"></td>
        <td id="LC8164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_27 September._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8165"></td>
        <td id="LC8165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8166"></td>
        <td id="LC8166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Friend John,--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8167"></td>
        <td id="LC8167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8168"></td>
        <td id="LC8168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I write this in case anything should happen. I go alone to watch in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8169"></td>
        <td id="LC8169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that churchyard. It pleases me that the Un-Dead, Miss Lucy, shall not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8170"></td>
        <td id="LC8170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leave to-night, that so on the morrow night she may be more eager.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8171"></td>
        <td id="LC8171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Therefore I shall fix some things she like not--garlic and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8172"></td>
        <td id="LC8172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crucifix--and so seal up the door of the tomb. She is young as Un-Dead,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8173"></td>
        <td id="LC8173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and will heed. Moreover, these are only to prevent her coming out; they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8174"></td>
        <td id="LC8174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may not prevail on her wanting to get in; for then the Un-Dead is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8175"></td>
        <td id="LC8175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desperate, and must find the line of least resistance, whatsoever it may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8176"></td>
        <td id="LC8176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be. I shall be at hand all the night from sunset till after the sunrise,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8177"></td>
        <td id="LC8177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and if there be aught that may be learned I shall learn it. For Miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8178"></td>
        <td id="LC8178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucy or from her, I have no fear; but that other to whom is there that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8179"></td>
        <td id="LC8179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she is Un-Dead, he have now the power to seek her tomb and find shelter.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8180"></td>
        <td id="LC8180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He is cunning, as I know from Mr. Jonathan and from the way that all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8181"></td>
        <td id="LC8181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along he have fooled us when he played with us for Miss Lucy&#39;s life, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8182"></td>
        <td id="LC8182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we lost; and in many ways the Un-Dead are strong. He have always the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8183"></td>
        <td id="LC8183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strength in his hand of twenty men; even we four who gave our strength</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8184"></td>
        <td id="LC8184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Miss Lucy it also is all to him. Besides, he can summon his wolf and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8185"></td>
        <td id="LC8185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I know not what. So if it be that he come thither on this night he shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8186"></td>
        <td id="LC8186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">find me; but none other shall--until it be too late. But it may be that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8187"></td>
        <td id="LC8187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he will not attempt the place. There is no reason why he should; his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8188"></td>
        <td id="LC8188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hunting ground is more full of game than the churchyard where the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8189"></td>
        <td id="LC8189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Un-Dead woman sleep, and the one old man watch.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8190"></td>
        <td id="LC8190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8191"></td>
        <td id="LC8191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Therefore I write this in case.... Take the papers that are with this,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8192"></td>
        <td id="LC8192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the diaries of Harker and the rest, and read them, and then find this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8193"></td>
        <td id="LC8193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great Un-Dead, and cut off his head and burn his heart or drive a stake</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8194"></td>
        <td id="LC8194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through it, so that the world may rest from him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8195"></td>
        <td id="LC8195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8196"></td>
        <td id="LC8196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;If it be so, farewell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8197"></td>
        <td id="LC8197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8198"></td>
        <td id="LC8198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;VAN HELSING.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8199"></td>
        <td id="LC8199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8200"></td>
        <td id="LC8200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8201"></td>
        <td id="LC8201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8202"></td>
        <td id="LC8202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8203"></td>
        <td id="LC8203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8204"></td>
        <td id="LC8204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_28 September._--It is wonderful what a good night&#39;s sleep will do for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8205"></td>
        <td id="LC8205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one. Yesterday I was almost willing to accept Van Helsing&#39;s monstrous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8206"></td>
        <td id="LC8206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ideas; but now they seem to start out lurid before me as outrages on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8207"></td>
        <td id="LC8207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">common sense. I have no doubt that he believes it all. I wonder if his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8208"></td>
        <td id="LC8208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind can have become in any way unhinged. Surely there must be _some_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8209"></td>
        <td id="LC8209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rational explanation of all these mysterious things. Is it possible that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8210"></td>
        <td id="LC8210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Professor can have done it himself? He is so abnormally clever that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8211"></td>
        <td id="LC8211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if he went off his head he would carry out his intent with regard to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8212"></td>
        <td id="LC8212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some fixed idea in a wonderful way. I am loath to think it, and indeed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8213"></td>
        <td id="LC8213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it would be almost as great a marvel as the other to find that Van</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8214"></td>
        <td id="LC8214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helsing was mad; but anyhow I shall watch him carefully. I may get some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8215"></td>
        <td id="LC8215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light on the mystery.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8216"></td>
        <td id="LC8216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8217"></td>
        <td id="LC8217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8218"></td>
        <td id="LC8218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8219"></td>
        <td id="LC8219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_29 September, morning._.... Last night, at a little before ten o&#39;clock,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8220"></td>
        <td id="LC8220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur and Quincey came into Van Helsing&#39;s room; he told us all that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8221"></td>
        <td id="LC8221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanted us to do, but especially addressing himself to Arthur, as if all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8222"></td>
        <td id="LC8222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our wills were centred in his. He began by saying that he hoped we would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8223"></td>
        <td id="LC8223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all come with him too, &quot;for,&quot; he said, &quot;there is a grave duty to be done</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8224"></td>
        <td id="LC8224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there. You were doubtless surprised at my letter?&quot; This query was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8225"></td>
        <td id="LC8225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">directly addressed to Lord Godalming.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8226"></td>
        <td id="LC8226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8227"></td>
        <td id="LC8227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I was. It rather upset me for a bit. There has been so much trouble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8228"></td>
        <td id="LC8228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">around my house of late that I could do without any more. I have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8229"></td>
        <td id="LC8229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curious, too, as to what you mean. Quincey and I talked it over; but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8230"></td>
        <td id="LC8230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more we talked, the more puzzled we got, till now I can say for myself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8231"></td>
        <td id="LC8231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I&#39;m about up a tree as to any meaning about anything.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8232"></td>
        <td id="LC8232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8233"></td>
        <td id="LC8233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Me too,&quot; said Quincey Morris laconically.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8234"></td>
        <td id="LC8234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8235"></td>
        <td id="LC8235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh,&quot; said the Professor, &quot;then you are nearer the beginning, both of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8236"></td>
        <td id="LC8236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, than friend John here, who has to go a long way back before he can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8237"></td>
        <td id="LC8237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even get so far as to begin.&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8238"></td>
