</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8239"></td>
        <td id="LC8239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was evident that he recognised my return to my old doubting frame of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8240"></td>
        <td id="LC8240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind without my saying a word. Then, turning to the other two, he said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8241"></td>
        <td id="LC8241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with intense gravity:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8242"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8243"></td>
        <td id="LC8243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I want your permission to do what I think good this night. It is, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8244"></td>
        <td id="LC8244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know, much to ask; and when you know what it is I propose to do you will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8245"></td>
        <td id="LC8245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know, and only then, how much. Therefore may I ask that you promise me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8246"></td>
        <td id="LC8246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the dark, so that afterwards, though you may be angry with me for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8247"></td>
        <td id="LC8247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time--I must not disguise from myself the possibility that such may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC8248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be--you shall not blame yourselves for anything.&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8249"></td>
        <td id="LC8249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8250"></td>
        <td id="LC8250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That&#39;s frank anyhow,&quot; broke in Quincey. &quot;I&#39;ll answer for the Professor.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8251"></td>
        <td id="LC8251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I don&#39;t quite see his drift, but I swear he&#39;s honest; and that&#39;s good</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8252"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8255"></td>
        <td id="LC8255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour of counting you one trusting friend, and such endorsement is dear</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8257"></td>
        <td id="LC8257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8258"></td>
        <td id="LC8258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then Arthur spoke out:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8259"></td>
        <td id="LC8259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8260"></td>
        <td id="LC8260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dr. Van Helsing, I don&#39;t quite like to &#39;buy a pig in a poke,&#39; as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8261"></td>
        <td id="LC8261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say in Scotland, and if it be anything in which my honour as a gentleman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8262"></td>
        <td id="LC8262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or my faith as a Christian is concerned, I cannot make such a promise.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8263"></td>
        <td id="LC8263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If you can assure me that what you intend does not violate either of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8264"></td>
        <td id="LC8264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these two, then I give my consent at once; though for the life of me, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8265"></td>
        <td id="LC8265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot understand what you are driving at.&quot;</td>

        <td id="L8266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8266"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8267"></td>
        <td id="LC8267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I accept your limitation,&quot; said Van Helsing, &quot;and all I ask of you is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8268"></td>
        <td id="LC8268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that if you feel it necessary to condemn any act of mine, you will first</td>

        <td id="LC8269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consider it well and be satisfied that it does not violate your</td>

</td>

        <td id="L8273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8273"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC8278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur&#39;s face fell as he said in an amazed sort of way:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8279"></td>
        <td id="LC8279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L8280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8280"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8284"></td>
        <td id="LC8284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8285"></td>
        <td id="LC8285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Professor, are you in earnest; or it is some monstrous joke? Pardon me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8286"></td>
        <td id="LC8286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I see that you are in earnest.&quot; He sat down again, but I could see that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8287"></td>
        <td id="LC8287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he sat firmly and proudly, as one who is on his dignity. There was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8288"></td>
        <td id="LC8288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silence until he asked again:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8289"></td>
        <td id="LC8289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8290"></td>
        <td id="LC8290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And when in the tomb?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8291"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8293"></td>
        <td id="LC8293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8294"></td>
        <td id="LC8294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;This is too much!&quot; he said, angrily rising again. &quot;I am willing to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8295"></td>
        <td id="LC8295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patient in all things that are reasonable; but in this--this desecration</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8296"></td>
        <td id="LC8296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the grave--of one who----&quot; He fairly choked with indignation. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8297"></td>
        <td id="LC8297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor looked pityingly at him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8298"></td>
        <td id="LC8298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8299"></td>
        <td id="LC8299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;If I could spare you one pang, my poor friend,&quot; he said, &quot;God knows I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8300"></td>
        <td id="LC8300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would. But this night our feet must tread in thorny paths; or later, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8301"></td>
        <td id="LC8301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for ever, the feet you love must walk in paths of flame!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8302"></td>
        <td id="LC8302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8303"></td>
        <td id="LC8303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur looked up with set white face and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8304"></td>
        <td id="LC8304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8306"></td>
        <td id="LC8306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8307"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8308"></td>
        <td id="LC8308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And then you will at least know the limit of my purpose. Shall I go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8309"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8310"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8311"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8312"></td>
        <td id="LC8312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8313"></td>
        <td id="LC8313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a pause Van Helsing went on, evidently with an effort:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8314"></td>
        <td id="LC8314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8315"></td>
        <td id="LC8315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Miss Lucy is dead; is it not so? Yes! Then there can be no wrong to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8316"></td>
        <td id="LC8316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her. But if she be not dead----&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8317"></td>
        <td id="LC8317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8318"></td>
        <td id="LC8318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur jumped to his feet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8319"></td>
        <td id="LC8319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8320"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC8362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to save you from sorrow. Just think. For why should I give myself so</td>

        <td id="LC8363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much of labour and so much of sorrow? I have come here from my own land</td>

        <td id="L8364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8364"></td>
        <td id="LC8364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do what I can of good; at the first to please my friend John, and</td>

        <td id="L8365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8365"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8385"></td>
        <td id="LC8385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was just a quarter before twelve o&#39;clock when we got into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8386"></td>
        <td id="LC8386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">churchyard over the low wall. The night was dark with occasional gleams</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8387"></td>
        <td id="LC8387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of moonlight between the rents of the heavy clouds that scudded across</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8388"></td>
        <td id="LC8388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sky. We all kept somehow close together, with Van Helsing slightly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8389"></td>
        <td id="LC8389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in front as he led the way. When we had come close to the tomb I looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8390"></td>
        <td id="LC8390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well at Arthur, for I feared that the proximity to a place laden with so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8391"></td>
        <td id="LC8391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sorrowful a memory would upset him; but he bore himself well. I took it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8392"></td>
        <td id="LC8392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the very mystery of the proceeding was in some way a counteractant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8393"></td>
        <td id="LC8393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to his grief. The Professor unlocked the door, and seeing a natural</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8394"></td>
        <td id="LC8394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hesitation amongst us for various reasons, solved the difficulty by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8395"></td>
        <td id="LC8395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entering first himself. The rest of us followed, and he closed the door.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8396"></td>
        <td id="LC8396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He then lit a dark lantern and pointed to the coffin. Arthur stepped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8397"></td>
        <td id="LC8397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forward hesitatingly; Van Helsing said to me:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8398"></td>
        <td id="LC8398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8399"></td>
        <td id="LC8399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You were with me here yesterday. Was the body of Miss Lucy in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8400"></td>
        <td id="LC8400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coffin?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8401"></td>
        <td id="LC8401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8402"></td>
        <td id="LC8402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It was.&quot; The Professor turned to the rest saying:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8403"></td>
        <td id="LC8403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8404"></td>
        <td id="LC8404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You hear; and yet there is no one who does not believe with me.&quot; He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8405"></td>
        <td id="LC8405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took his screwdriver and again took off the lid of the coffin. Arthur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8406"></td>
        <td id="LC8406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked on, very pale but silent; when the lid was removed he stepped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8407"></td>
        <td id="LC8407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forward. He evidently did not know that there was a leaden coffin, or,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8408"></td>
        <td id="LC8408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at any rate, had not thought of it. When he saw the rent in the lead,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8409"></td>
        <td id="LC8409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the blood rushed to his face for an instant, but as quickly fell away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8410"></td>
        <td id="LC8410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again, so that he remained of a ghastly whiteness; he was still silent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8411"></td>
        <td id="LC8411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing forced back the leaden flange, and we all looked in and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8412"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8503"></td>
        <td id="LC8503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We could not see the face, for it was bent down over what we saw to be a</td>

        <td id="L8504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8504"></td>

        <td id="L8592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8592"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8593"></td>
        <td id="LC8593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gate we shall remain. Then there is more to do; but not like this of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8594"></td>
        <td id="LC8594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to-night. As for this little one, he is not much harm, and by to-morrow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8595"></td>
        <td id="LC8595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night he shall be well. We shall leave him where the police will find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8596"></td>
        <td id="LC8596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, as on the other night; and then to home.&quot; Coming close to Arthur,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8597"></td>
        <td id="LC8597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8598"></td>
        <td id="LC8598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8599"></td>
        <td id="LC8599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My friend Arthur, you have had a sore trial; but after, when you look</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8600"></td>
        <td id="LC8600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back, you will see how it was necessary. You are now in the bitter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8601"></td>
        <td id="LC8601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waters, my child. By this time to-morrow you will, please God, have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8602"></td>
        <td id="LC8602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed them, and have drunk of the sweet waters; so do not mourn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8603"></td>
        <td id="LC8603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overmuch. Till then I shall not ask you to forgive me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8604"></td>
        <td id="LC8604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8605"></td>
        <td id="LC8605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur and Quincey came home with me, and we tried to cheer each other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8606"></td>
        <td id="LC8606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the way. We had left the child in safety, and were tired; so we all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8607"></td>
        <td id="LC8607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slept with more or less reality of sleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8608"></td>
        <td id="LC8608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8609"></td>
        <td id="LC8609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8610"></td>
        <td id="LC8610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8611"></td>
        <td id="LC8611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_29 September, night._--A little before twelve o&#39;clock we three--Arthur,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8612"></td>
        <td id="LC8612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quincey Morris, and myself--called for the Professor. It was odd to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8613"></td>
        <td id="LC8613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">notice that by common consent we had all put on black clothes. Of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8614"></td>
        <td id="LC8614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course, Arthur wore black, for he was in deep mourning, but the rest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8615"></td>
        <td id="LC8615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us wore it by instinct. We got to the churchyard by half-past one, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8616"></td>
        <td id="LC8616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strolled about, keeping out of official observation, so that when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8617"></td>
        <td id="LC8617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gravediggers had completed their task and the sexton under the belief</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8618"></td>
        <td id="LC8618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that every one had gone, had locked the gate, we had the place all to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8619"></td>
        <td id="LC8619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ourselves. Van Helsing, instead of his little black bag, had with him a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8620"></td>
        <td id="LC8620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long leather one, something like a cricketing bag; it was manifestly of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8621"></td>
        <td id="LC8621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fair weight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8622"></td>
        <td id="LC8622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8623"></td>
        <td id="LC8623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When we were alone and had heard the last of the footsteps die out up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8624"></td>
        <td id="LC8624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the road, we silently, and as if by ordered intention, followed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8625"></td>
        <td id="LC8625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor to the tomb. He unlocked the door, and we entered, closing it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8626"></td>
        <td id="LC8626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind us. Then he took from his bag the lantern, which he lit, and also</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8627"></td>
        <td id="LC8627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two wax candles, which, when lighted, he stuck, by melting their own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8628"></td>
        <td id="LC8628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ends, on other coffins, so that they might give light sufficient to work</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8629"></td>
        <td id="LC8629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by. When he again lifted the lid off Lucy&#39;s coffin we all looked--Arthur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8630"></td>
        <td id="LC8630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trembling like an aspen--and saw that the body lay there in all its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8631"></td>
        <td id="LC8631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death-beauty. But there was no love in my own heart, nothing but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8632"></td>
        <td id="LC8632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loathing for the foul Thing which had taken Lucy&#39;s shape without her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8633"></td>
        <td id="LC8633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soul. I could see even Arthur&#39;s face grow hard as he looked. Presently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8634"></td>
        <td id="LC8634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he said to Van Helsing:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8635"></td>
        <td id="LC8635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8636"></td>
        <td id="LC8636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Is this really Lucy&#39;s body, or only a demon in her shape?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8637"></td>
        <td id="LC8637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8638"></td>
        <td id="LC8638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It is her body, and yet not it. But wait a while, and you all see her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8639"></td>
        <td id="LC8639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as she was, and is.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8640"></td>
        <td id="LC8640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8641"></td>
        <td id="LC8641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She seemed like a nightmare of Lucy as she lay there; the pointed teeth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8642"></td>
        <td id="LC8642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bloodstained, voluptuous mouth--which it made one shudder to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8643"></td>
        <td id="LC8643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see--the whole carnal and unspiritual appearance, seeming like a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8644"></td>
        <td id="LC8644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">devilish mockery of Lucy&#39;s sweet purity. Van Helsing, with his usual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8645"></td>
        <td id="LC8645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">methodicalness, began taking the various contents from his bag and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8646"></td>
        <td id="LC8646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">placing them ready for use. First he took out a soldering iron and some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8647"></td>
        <td id="LC8647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plumbing solder, and then a small oil-lamp, which gave out, when lit in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8648"></td>
        <td id="LC8648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a corner of the tomb, gas which burned at fierce heat with a blue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8649"></td>
        <td id="LC8649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flame; then his operating knives, which he placed to hand; and last a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8650"></td>
        <td id="LC8650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round wooden stake, some two and a half or three inches thick and about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8651"></td>
        <td id="LC8651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three feet long. One end of it was hardened by charring in the fire, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8652"></td>
        <td id="LC8652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was sharpened to a fine point. With this stake came a heavy hammer, such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8653"></td>
        <td id="LC8653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as in households is used in the coal-cellar for breaking the lumps. To</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8654"></td>
        <td id="LC8654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, a doctor&#39;s preparations for work of any kind are stimulating and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8655"></td>
        <td id="LC8655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bracing, but the effect of these things on both Arthur and Quincey was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8656"></td>
        <td id="LC8656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to cause them a sort of consternation. They both, however, kept their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8657"></td>
        <td id="LC8657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courage, and remained silent and quiet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8658"></td>
        <td id="LC8658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8659"></td>
        <td id="LC8659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When all was ready, Van Helsing said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8660"></td>
        <td id="LC8660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8661"></td>
        <td id="LC8661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Before we do anything, let me tell you this; it is out of the lore and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8662"></td>
        <td id="LC8662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experience of the ancients and of all those who have studied the powers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8663"></td>
        <td id="LC8663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Un-Dead. When they become such, there comes with the change the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8664"></td>
        <td id="LC8664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curse of immortality; they cannot die, but must go on age after age</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8665"></td>
        <td id="LC8665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adding new victims and multiplying the evils of the world; for all that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8666"></td>
        <td id="LC8666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">die from the preying of the Un-Dead becomes themselves Un-Dead, and prey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8667"></td>
        <td id="LC8667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on their kind. And so the circle goes on ever widening, like as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8668"></td>
        <td id="LC8668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ripples from a stone thrown in the water. Friend Arthur, if you had met</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8669"></td>
        <td id="LC8669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that kiss which you know of before poor Lucy die; or again, last night</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8670"></td>
        <td id="LC8670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when you open your arms to her, you would in time, when you had died,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8671"></td>
        <td id="LC8671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have become _nosferatu_, as they call it in Eastern Europe, and would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8672"></td>
        <td id="LC8672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all time make more of those Un-Deads that so have fill us with horror.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8673"></td>
        <td id="LC8673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The career of this so unhappy dear lady is but just begun. Those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8674"></td>
        <td id="LC8674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children whose blood she suck are not as yet so much the worse; but if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8675"></td>
        <td id="LC8675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she live on, Un-Dead, more and more they lose their blood and by her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8676"></td>
        <td id="LC8676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power over them they come to her; and so she draw their blood with that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8677"></td>
        <td id="LC8677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so wicked mouth. But if she die in truth, then all cease; the tiny</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8678"></td>
        <td id="LC8678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wounds of the throats disappear, and they go back to their plays</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8679"></td>
        <td id="LC8679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unknowing ever of what has been. But of the most blessed of all, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8680"></td>
        <td id="LC8680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this now Un-Dead be made to rest as true dead, then the soul of the poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8681"></td>
        <td id="LC8681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lady whom we love shall again be free. Instead of working wickedness by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8682"></td>
        <td id="LC8682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night and growing more debased in the assimilating of it by day, she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8683"></td>
        <td id="LC8683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall take her place with the other Angels. So that, my friend, it will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8684"></td>
        <td id="LC8684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be a blessed hand for her that shall strike the blow that sets her free.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8685"></td>
        <td id="LC8685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To this I am willing; but is there none amongst us who has a better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8686"></td>
        <td id="LC8686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right? Will it be no joy to think of hereafter in the silence of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8687"></td>
        <td id="LC8687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night when sleep is not: &#39;It was my hand that sent her to the stars; it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8688"></td>
        <td id="LC8688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was the hand of him that loved her best; the hand that of all she would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8689"></td>
        <td id="LC8689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself have chosen, had it been to her to choose?&#39; Tell me if there be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8690"></td>
        <td id="LC8690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a one amongst us?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8691"></td>
        <td id="LC8691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8692"></td>
        <td id="LC8692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We all looked at Arthur. He saw, too, what we all did, the infinite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8693"></td>
        <td id="LC8693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kindness which suggested that his should be the hand which would restore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8694"></td>
        <td id="LC8694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucy to us as a holy, and not an unholy, memory; he stepped forward and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8695"></td>
        <td id="LC8695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said bravely, though his hand trembled, and his face was as pale as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8696"></td>
        <td id="LC8696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snow:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8697"></td>
        <td id="LC8697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8698"></td>
        <td id="LC8698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My true friend, from the bottom of my broken heart I thank you. Tell me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8699"></td>
        <td id="LC8699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what I am to do, and I shall not falter!&quot; Van Helsing laid a hand on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8700"></td>
        <td id="LC8700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shoulder, and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8701"></td>
        <td id="LC8701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8702"></td>
        <td id="LC8702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Brave lad! A moment&#39;s courage, and it is done. This stake must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8703"></td>
        <td id="LC8703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">driven through her. It will be a fearful ordeal--be not deceived in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8704"></td>
        <td id="LC8704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that--but it will be only a short time, and you will then rejoice more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8705"></td>
        <td id="LC8705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than your pain was great; from this grim tomb you will emerge as though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8706"></td>
        <td id="LC8706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you tread on air. But you must not falter when once you have begun. Only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8707"></td>
        <td id="LC8707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think that we, your true friends, are round you, and that we pray for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8708"></td>
        <td id="LC8708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you all the time.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8709"></td>
        <td id="LC8709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8710"></td>
        <td id="LC8710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Go on,&quot; said Arthur hoarsely. &quot;Tell me what I am to do.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8711"></td>
        <td id="LC8711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8712"></td>
        <td id="LC8712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Take this stake in your left hand, ready to place the point over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8713"></td>
        <td id="LC8713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart, and the hammer in your right. Then when we begin our prayer for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8714"></td>
        <td id="LC8714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dead--I shall read him, I have here the book, and the others shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8715"></td>
        <td id="LC8715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follow--strike in God&#39;s name, that so all may be well with the dead that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8716"></td>
        <td id="LC8716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we love and that the Un-Dead pass away.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8717"></td>
        <td id="LC8717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8718"></td>
        <td id="LC8718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur took the stake and the hammer, and when once his mind was set on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8719"></td>
        <td id="LC8719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">action his hands never trembled nor even quivered. Van Helsing opened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8720"></td>
        <td id="LC8720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his missal and began to read, and Quincey and I followed as well as we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8721"></td>
        <td id="LC8721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could. Arthur placed the point over the heart, and as I looked I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8722"></td>
        <td id="LC8722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see its dint in the white flesh. Then he struck with all his might.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8723"></td>
        <td id="LC8723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8724"></td>
        <td id="LC8724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Thing in the coffin writhed; and a hideous, blood-curdling screech</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8725"></td>
        <td id="LC8725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came from the opened red lips. The body shook and quivered and twisted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8726"></td>
        <td id="LC8726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in wild contortions; the sharp white teeth champed together till the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8727"></td>
        <td id="LC8727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lips were cut, and the mouth was smeared with a crimson foam. But Arthur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8728"></td>
        <td id="LC8728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never faltered. He looked like a figure of Thor as his untrembling arm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8729"></td>
        <td id="LC8729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rose and fell, driving deeper and deeper the mercy-bearing stake, whilst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8730"></td>
        <td id="LC8730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the blood from the pierced heart welled and spurted up around it. His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8731"></td>
        <td id="LC8731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face was set, and high duty seemed to shine through it; the sight of it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8732"></td>
        <td id="LC8732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave us courage so that our voices seemed to ring through the little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8733"></td>
        <td id="LC8733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vault.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8734"></td>
        <td id="LC8734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8735"></td>
        <td id="LC8735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And then the writhing and quivering of the body became less, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8736"></td>
        <td id="LC8736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">teeth seemed to champ, and the face to quiver. Finally it lay still. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8737"></td>
        <td id="LC8737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible task was over.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8738"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8739"></td>
        <td id="LC8739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The hammer fell from Arthur&#39;s hand. He reeled and would have fallen had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8740"></td>
