      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8741"></td>
        <td id="LC8741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and his breath came in broken gasps. It had indeed been an awful strain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8742"></td>
        <td id="LC8742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on him; and had he not been forced to his task by more than human</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8743"></td>
        <td id="LC8743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considerations he could never have gone through with it. For a few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8744"></td>
        <td id="LC8744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minutes we were so taken up with him that we did not look towards the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8745"></td>
        <td id="LC8745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coffin. When we did, however, a murmur of startled surprise ran from one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8746"></td>
        <td id="LC8746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the other of us. We gazed so eagerly that Arthur rose, for he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8747"></td>
        <td id="LC8747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been seated on the ground, and came and looked too; and then a glad,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8748"></td>
        <td id="LC8748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strange light broke over his face and dispelled altogether the gloom of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8749"></td>
        <td id="LC8749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horror that lay upon it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8750"></td>
        <td id="LC8750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8751"></td>
        <td id="LC8751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There, in the coffin lay no longer the foul Thing that we had so dreaded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8752"></td>
        <td id="LC8752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and grown to hate that the work of her destruction was yielded as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8753"></td>
        <td id="LC8753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">privilege to the one best entitled to it, but Lucy as we had seen her in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8754"></td>
        <td id="LC8754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her life, with her face of unequalled sweetness and purity. True that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8755"></td>
        <td id="LC8755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there were there, as we had seen them in life, the traces of care and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8756"></td>
        <td id="LC8756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pain and waste; but these were all dear to us, for they marked her truth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8757"></td>
        <td id="LC8757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to what we knew. One and all we felt that the holy calm that lay like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8758"></td>
        <td id="LC8758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sunshine over the wasted face and form was only an earthly token and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8759"></td>
        <td id="LC8759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">symbol of the calm that was to reign for ever.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8760"></td>
        <td id="LC8760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8761"></td>
        <td id="LC8761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing came and laid his hand on Arthur&#39;s shoulder, and said to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8762"></td>
        <td id="LC8762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8763"></td>
        <td id="LC8763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8764"></td>
        <td id="LC8764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And now, Arthur my friend, dear lad, am I not forgiven?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8765"></td>
        <td id="LC8765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8766"></td>
        <td id="LC8766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The reaction of the terrible strain came as he took the old man&#39;s hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8767"></td>
        <td id="LC8767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his, and raising it to his lips, pressed it, and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8768"></td>
        <td id="LC8768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8769"></td>
        <td id="LC8769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Forgiven! God bless you that you have given my dear one her soul again,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8770"></td>
        <td id="LC8770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and me peace.&quot; He put his hands on the Professor&#39;s shoulder, and laying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8771"></td>
        <td id="LC8771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his head on his breast, cried for a while silently, whilst we stood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8772"></td>
        <td id="LC8772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unmoving. When he raised his head Van Helsing said to him:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8773"></td>
        <td id="LC8773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8774"></td>
        <td id="LC8774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And now, my child, you may kiss her. Kiss her dead lips if you will, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8775"></td>
        <td id="LC8775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she would have you to, if for her to choose. For she is not a grinning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8776"></td>
        <td id="LC8776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">devil now--not any more a foul Thing for all eternity. No longer she is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8777"></td>
        <td id="LC8777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the devil&#39;s Un-Dead. She is God&#39;s true dead, whose soul is with Him!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8778"></td>
        <td id="LC8778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8779"></td>
        <td id="LC8779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur bent and kissed her, and then we sent him and Quincey out of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8780"></td>
        <td id="LC8780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tomb; the Professor and I sawed the top off the stake, leaving the point</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8781"></td>
        <td id="LC8781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it in the body. Then we cut off the head and filled the mouth with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8782"></td>
        <td id="LC8782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">garlic. We soldered up the leaden coffin, screwed on the coffin-lid,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8783"></td>
        <td id="LC8783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and gathering up our belongings, came away. When the Professor locked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8784"></td>
        <td id="LC8784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the door he gave the key to Arthur.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8785"></td>
        <td id="LC8785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8786"></td>
        <td id="LC8786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Outside the air was sweet, the sun shone, and the birds sang, and it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8787"></td>
        <td id="LC8787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed as if all nature were tuned to a different pitch. There was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8788"></td>
        <td id="LC8788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gladness and mirth and peace everywhere, for we were at rest ourselves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8789"></td>
        <td id="LC8789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on one account, and we were glad, though it was with a tempered joy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8790"></td>
        <td id="LC8790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8791"></td>
        <td id="LC8791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Before we moved away Van Helsing said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8792"></td>
        <td id="LC8792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8793"></td>
        <td id="LC8793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now, my friends, one step of our work is done, one the most harrowing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8794"></td>
        <td id="LC8794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to ourselves. But there remains a greater task: to find out the author</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8795"></td>
        <td id="LC8795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of all this our sorrow and to stamp him out. I have clues which we can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8796"></td>
        <td id="LC8796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follow; but it is a long task, and a difficult, and there is danger in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8797"></td>
        <td id="LC8797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, and pain. Shall you not all help me? We have learned to believe, all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8798"></td>
        <td id="LC8798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of us--is it not so? And since so, do we not see our duty? Yes! And do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8799"></td>
        <td id="LC8799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we not promise to go on to the bitter end?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8800"></td>
        <td id="LC8800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8801"></td>
        <td id="LC8801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Each in turn, we took his hand, and the promise was made. Then said the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8802"></td>
        <td id="LC8802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor as we moved off:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8803"></td>
        <td id="LC8803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8804"></td>
        <td id="LC8804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Two nights hence you shall meet with me and dine together at seven of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8805"></td>
        <td id="LC8805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the clock with friend John. I shall entreat two others, two that you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8806"></td>
        <td id="LC8806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know not as yet; and I shall be ready to all our work show and our plans</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8807"></td>
        <td id="LC8807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unfold. Friend John, you come with me home, for I have much to consult</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8808"></td>
        <td id="LC8808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about, and you can help me. To-night I leave for Amsterdam, but shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8809"></td>
        <td id="LC8809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">return to-morrow night. And then begins our great quest. But first I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8810"></td>
        <td id="LC8810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall have much to say, so that you may know what is to do and to dread.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8811"></td>
        <td id="LC8811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then our promise shall be made to each other anew; for there is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8812"></td>
        <td id="LC8812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible task before us, and once our feet are on the ploughshare we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8813"></td>
        <td id="LC8813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must not draw back.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8814"></td>
        <td id="LC8814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8815"></td>
        <td id="LC8815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8816"></td>
        <td id="LC8816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8817"></td>
        <td id="LC8817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8818"></td>
        <td id="LC8818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XVII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8819"></td>
        <td id="LC8819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8820"></td>
        <td id="LC8820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">DR. SEWARD&#39;S DIARY--_continued_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8821"></td>
        <td id="LC8821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8822"></td>
        <td id="LC8822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8823"></td>
        <td id="LC8823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When we arrived at the Berkeley Hotel, Van Helsing found a telegram</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8824"></td>
        <td id="LC8824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waiting for him:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8825"></td>
        <td id="LC8825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8826"></td>
        <td id="LC8826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     &quot;Am coming up by train. Jonathan at Whitby. Important news.--MINA</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8827"></td>
        <td id="LC8827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     HARKER.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8828"></td>
        <td id="LC8828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8829"></td>
        <td id="LC8829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Professor was delighted. &quot;Ah, that wonderful Madam Mina,&quot; he said,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8830"></td>
        <td id="LC8830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;pearl among women! She arrive, but I cannot stay. She must go to your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8831"></td>
        <td id="LC8831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house, friend John. You must meet her at the station. Telegraph her _en</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8832"></td>
        <td id="LC8832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">route_, so that she may be prepared.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8833"></td>
        <td id="LC8833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8834"></td>
        <td id="LC8834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the wire was despatched he had a cup of tea; over it he told me of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8835"></td>
        <td id="LC8835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a diary kept by Jonathan Harker when abroad, and gave me a typewritten</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8836"></td>
        <td id="LC8836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">copy of it, as also of Mrs. Harker&#39;s diary at Whitby. &quot;Take these,&quot; he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8837"></td>
        <td id="LC8837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, &quot;and study them well. When I have returned you will be master of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8838"></td>
        <td id="LC8838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the facts, and we can then better enter on our inquisition. Keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8839"></td>
        <td id="LC8839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them safe, for there is in them much of treasure. You will need all your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8840"></td>
        <td id="LC8840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faith, even you who have had such an experience as that of to-day. What</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8841"></td>
        <td id="LC8841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is here told,&quot; he laid his hand heavily and gravely on the packet of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8842"></td>
        <td id="LC8842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">papers as he spoke, &quot;may be the beginning of the end to you and me and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8843"></td>
        <td id="LC8843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many another; or it may sound the knell of the Un-Dead who walk the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8844"></td>
        <td id="LC8844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earth. Read all, I pray you, with the open mind; and if you can add in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8845"></td>
        <td id="LC8845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any way to the story here told do so, for it is all-important. You have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8846"></td>
        <td id="LC8846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kept diary of all these so strange things; is it not so? Yes! Then we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8847"></td>
        <td id="LC8847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall go through all these together when we meet.&quot; He then made ready</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8848"></td>
        <td id="LC8848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for his departure, and shortly after drove off to Liverpool Street. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8849"></td>
        <td id="LC8849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took my way to Paddington, where I arrived about fifteen minutes before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8850"></td>
        <td id="LC8850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the train came in.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8851"></td>
        <td id="LC8851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8852"></td>
        <td id="LC8852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The crowd melted away, after the bustling fashion common to arrival</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8853"></td>
        <td id="LC8853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">platforms; and I was beginning to feel uneasy, lest I might miss my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8854"></td>
        <td id="LC8854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guest, when a sweet-faced, dainty-looking girl stepped up to me, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8855"></td>
        <td id="LC8855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after a quick glance, said: &quot;Dr. Seward, is it not?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8856"></td>
        <td id="LC8856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8857"></td>
        <td id="LC8857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And you are Mrs. Harker!&quot; I answered at once; whereupon she held out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8858"></td>
        <td id="LC8858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her hand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8859"></td>
        <td id="LC8859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8860"></td>
        <td id="LC8860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I knew you from the description of poor dear Lucy; but----&quot; She stopped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8861"></td>
        <td id="LC8861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suddenly, and a quick blush overspread her face.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8862"></td>
        <td id="LC8862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8863"></td>
        <td id="LC8863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The blush that rose to my own cheeks somehow set us both at ease, for it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8864"></td>
        <td id="LC8864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a tacit answer to her own. I got her luggage, which included a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8865"></td>
        <td id="LC8865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">typewriter, and we took the Underground to Fenchurch Street, after I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8866"></td>
        <td id="LC8866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sent a wire to my housekeeper to have a sitting-room and bedroom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8867"></td>
        <td id="LC8867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prepared at once for Mrs. Harker.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8868"></td>
        <td id="LC8868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8869"></td>
        <td id="LC8869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In due time we arrived. She knew, of course, that the place was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8870"></td>

        <td id="L8957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8957"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8961"></td>
        <td id="LC8961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8962"></td>
        <td id="LC8962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You are quite right. I did not trust you because I did not know you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8963"></td>
        <td id="LC8963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But I know you now; and let me say that I should have known you long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8964"></td>
        <td id="LC8964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ago. I know that Lucy told you of me; she told me of you too. May I make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8965"></td>
        <td id="LC8965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the only atonement in my power? Take the cylinders and hear them--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8966"></td>
        <td id="LC8966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first half-dozen of them are personal to me, and they will not horrify</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8967"></td>
        <td id="LC8967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you; then you will know me better. Dinner will by then be ready. In the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8968"></td>
        <td id="LC8968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meantime I shall read over some of these documents, and shall be better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8969"></td>
        <td id="LC8969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to understand certain things.&quot; He carried the phonograph himself up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8970"></td>
        <td id="LC8970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to my sitting-room and adjusted it for me. Now I shall learn something</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8971"></td>
        <td id="LC8971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasant, I am sure; for it will tell me the other side of a true love</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8972"></td>
        <td id="LC8972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">episode of which I know one side already....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8973"></td>
        <td id="LC8973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8974"></td>
        <td id="LC8974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8975"></td>
        <td id="LC8975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8976"></td>
        <td id="LC8976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8977"></td>
        <td id="LC8977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_29 September._--I was so absorbed in that wonderful diary of Jonathan</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8978"></td>
        <td id="LC8978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harker and that other of his wife that I let the time run on without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8979"></td>
        <td id="LC8979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thinking. Mrs. Harker was not down when the maid came to announce</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8980"></td>
        <td id="LC8980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dinner, so I said: &quot;She is possibly tired; let dinner wait an hour,&quot; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8981"></td>
        <td id="LC8981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I went on with my work. I had just finished Mrs. Harker&#39;s diary, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8982"></td>
        <td id="LC8982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she came in. She looked sweetly pretty, but very sad, and her eyes were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8983"></td>
        <td id="LC8983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flushed with crying. This somehow moved me much. Of late I have had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8984"></td>
        <td id="LC8984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cause for tears, God knows! but the relief of them was denied me; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8985"></td>
        <td id="LC8985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now the sight of those sweet eyes, brightened with recent tears, went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8986"></td>
        <td id="LC8986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">straight to my heart. So I said as gently as I could:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8987"></td>
        <td id="LC8987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8988"></td>
        <td id="LC8988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I greatly fear I have distressed you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8989"></td>
        <td id="LC8989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8990"></td>
        <td id="LC8990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, no, not distressed me,&quot; she replied, &quot;but I have been more touched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8991"></td>
        <td id="LC8991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than I can say by your grief. That is a wonderful machine, but it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8992"></td>
        <td id="LC8992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cruelly true. It told me, in its very tones, the anguish of your heart.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8993"></td>
        <td id="LC8993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was like a soul crying out to Almighty God. No one must hear them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8994"></td>
        <td id="LC8994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoken ever again! See, I have tried to be useful. I have copied out the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8995"></td>
        <td id="LC8995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words on my typewriter, and none other need now hear your heart beat, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8996"></td>
        <td id="LC8996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I did.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8997"></td>
        <td id="LC8997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8998"></td>
        <td id="LC8998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No one need ever know, shall ever know,&quot; I said in a low voice. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8999"></td>
        <td id="LC8999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laid her hand on mine and said very gravely:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9000"></td>
        <td id="LC9000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9001"></td>
        <td id="LC9001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah, but they must!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9002"></td>
        <td id="LC9002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9003"></td>
        <td id="LC9003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Must! But why?&quot; I asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9004"></td>
        <td id="LC9004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9005"></td>
        <td id="LC9005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Because it is a part of the terrible story, a part of poor dear Lucy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9006"></td>
        <td id="LC9006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death and all that led to it; because in the struggle which we have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9007"></td>
        <td id="LC9007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before us to rid the earth of this terrible monster we must have all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9008"></td>
        <td id="LC9008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the knowledge and all the help which we can get. I think that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9009"></td>
        <td id="LC9009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cylinders which you gave me contained more than you intended me to know;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9010"></td>
        <td id="LC9010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but I can see that there are in your record many lights to this dark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9011"></td>
        <td id="LC9011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mystery. You will let me help, will you not? I know all up to a certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9012"></td>
        <td id="LC9012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">point; and I see already, though your diary only took me to 7 September,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9013"></td>
        <td id="LC9013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how poor Lucy was beset, and how her terrible doom was being wrought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9014"></td>
        <td id="LC9014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out. Jonathan and I have been working day and night since Professor Van</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9015"></td>
        <td id="LC9015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helsing saw us. He is gone to Whitby to get more information, and he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9016"></td>
        <td id="LC9016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be here to-morrow to help us. We need have no secrets amongst us;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9017"></td>
        <td id="LC9017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">working together and with absolute trust, we can surely be stronger than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9018"></td>
        <td id="LC9018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if some of us were in the dark.&quot; She looked at me so appealingly, and at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9019"></td>
        <td id="LC9019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same time manifested such courage and resolution in her bearing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9020"></td>
        <td id="LC9020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I gave in at once to her wishes. &quot;You shall,&quot; I said, &quot;do as you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9021"></td>
        <td id="LC9021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like in the matter. God forgive me if I do wrong! There are terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9022"></td>
        <td id="LC9022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things yet to learn of; but if you have so far travelled on the road to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9023"></td>
        <td id="LC9023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor Lucy&#39;s death, you will not be content, I know, to remain in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9024"></td>
        <td id="LC9024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dark. Nay, the end--the very end--may give you a gleam of peace. Come,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9025"></td>
        <td id="LC9025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is dinner. We must keep one another strong for what is before us;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9026"></td>
        <td id="LC9026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we have a cruel and dreadful task. When you have eaten you shall learn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9027"></td>
        <td id="LC9027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rest, and I shall answer any questions you ask--if there be anything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9028"></td>
        <td id="LC9028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which you do not understand, though it was apparent to us who were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9029"></td>
        <td id="LC9029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9030"></td>
        <td id="LC9030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9031"></td>
        <td id="LC9031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9032"></td>
        <td id="LC9032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Mina Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9033"></td>
        <td id="LC9033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9034"></td>
        <td id="LC9034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_29 September._--After dinner I came with Dr. Seward to his study. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9035"></td>
        <td id="LC9035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought back the phonograph from my room, and I took my typewriter. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9036"></td>
        <td id="LC9036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">placed me in a comfortable chair, and arranged the phonograph so that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9037"></td>
        <td id="LC9037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could touch it without getting up, and showed me how to stop it in case</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9038"></td>
        <td id="LC9038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should want to pause. Then he very thoughtfully took a chair, with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9039"></td>
        <td id="LC9039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back to me, so that I might be as free as possible, and began to read. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9040"></td>
        <td id="LC9040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put the forked metal to my ears and listened.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9041"></td>
        <td id="LC9041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9042"></td>
        <td id="LC9042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the terrible story of Lucy&#39;s death, and--and all that followed, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9043"></td>
        <td id="LC9043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done, I lay back in my chair powerless. Fortunately I am not of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9044"></td>
        <td id="LC9044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fainting disposition. When Dr. Seward saw me he jumped up with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9045"></td>
        <td id="LC9045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horrified exclamation, and hurriedly taking a case-bottle from a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9046"></td>
        <td id="LC9046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cupboard, gave me some brandy, which in a few minutes somewhat restored</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9047"></td>
        <td id="LC9047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. My brain was all in a whirl, and only that there came through all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9048"></td>
        <td id="LC9048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the multitude of horrors, the holy ray of light that my dear, dear Lucy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9049"></td>
        <td id="LC9049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was at last at peace, I do not think I could have borne it without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9050"></td>
        <td id="LC9050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">making a scene. It is all so wild, and mysterious, and strange that if I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9051"></td>
        <td id="LC9051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had not known Jonathan&#39;s experience in Transylvania I could not have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9052"></td>
        <td id="LC9052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believed. As it was, I didn&#39;t know what to believe, and so got out of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9053"></td>
        <td id="LC9053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficulty by attending to something else. I took the cover off my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9054"></td>
        <td id="LC9054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">typewriter, and said to Dr. Seward:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9055"></td>
        <td id="LC9055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9056"></td>
        <td id="LC9056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Let me write this all out now. We must be ready for Dr. Van Helsing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9057"></td>
        <td id="LC9057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he comes. I have sent a telegram to Jonathan to come on here when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9058"></td>
        <td id="LC9058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he arrives in London from Whitby. In this matter dates are everything,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9059"></td>
        <td id="LC9059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I think that if we get all our material ready, and have every item</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9060"></td>
        <td id="LC9060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put in chronological order, we shall have done much. You tell me that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9061"></td>
        <td id="LC9061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lord Godalming and Mr. Morris are coming too. Let us be able to tell him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9062"></td>
        <td id="LC9062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when they come.&quot; He accordingly set the phonograph at a slow pace, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9063"></td>
        <td id="LC9063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to typewrite from the beginning of the seventh cylinder. I used</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9064"></td>
        <td id="LC9064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manifold, and so took three copies of the diary, just as I had done with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9065"></td>
        <td id="LC9065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the rest. It was late when I got through, but Dr. Seward went about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9066"></td>
        <td id="LC9066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his work of going his round of the patients; when he had finished he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9067"></td>
        <td id="LC9067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came back and sat near me, reading, so that I did not feel too lonely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9068"></td>
        <td id="LC9068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whilst I worked. How good and thoughtful he is; the world seems full of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9069"></td>
        <td id="LC9069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good men--even if there _are_ monsters in it. Before I left him I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9070"></td>
        <td id="LC9070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remembered what Jonathan put in his diary of the Professor&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9071"></td>
        <td id="LC9071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perturbation at reading something in an evening paper at the station at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9072"></td>
        <td id="LC9072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Exeter; so, seeing that Dr. Seward keeps his newspapers, I borrowed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9073"></td>
        <td id="LC9073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">files of &quot;The Westminster Gazette&quot; and &quot;The Pall Mall Gazette,&quot; and took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9074"></td>
        <td id="LC9074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them to my room. I remember how much &quot;The Dailygraph&quot; and &quot;The Whitby</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9075"></td>
        <td id="LC9075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gazette,&quot; of which I had made cuttings, helped us to understand the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9076"></td>
        <td id="LC9076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible events at Whitby when Count Dracula landed, so I shall look</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9077"></td>
        <td id="LC9077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the evening papers since then, and perhaps I shall get some new</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9078"></td>
        <td id="LC9078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light. I am not sleepy, and the work will help to keep me quiet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9079"></td>
        <td id="LC9079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9080"></td>
        <td id="LC9080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9081"></td>
        <td id="LC9081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9082"></td>
        <td id="LC9082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9083"></td>
        <td id="LC9083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_30 September._--Mr. Harker arrived at nine o&#39;clock. He had got his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9084"></td>
        <td id="LC9084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wife&#39;s wire just before starting. He is uncommonly clever, if one can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9085"></td>
        <td id="LC9085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judge from his face, and full of energy. If this journal be true--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9086"></td>
        <td id="LC9086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judging by one&#39;s own wonderful experiences, it must be--he is also a man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9087"></td>
        <td id="LC9087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of great nerve. That going down to the vault a second time was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9088"></td>
        <td id="LC9088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remarkable piece of daring. After reading his account of it I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9089"></td>
        <td id="LC9089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prepared to meet a good specimen of manhood, but hardly the quiet,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9090"></td>
        <td id="LC9090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">business-like gentleman who came here to-day.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9091"></td>
        <td id="LC9091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9092"></td>
        <td id="LC9092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9093"></td>
        <td id="LC9093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9094"></td>
        <td id="LC9094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--After lunch Harker and his wife went back to their own room,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9095"></td>
        <td id="LC9095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and as I passed a while ago I heard the click of the typewriter. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9096"></td>
        <td id="LC9096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are hard at it. Mrs. Harker says that they are knitting together in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9097"></td>
        <td id="LC9097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chronological order every scrap of evidence they have. Harker has got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9098"></td>
        <td id="LC9098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the letters between the consignee of the boxes at Whitby and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9099"></td>
        <td id="LC9099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriers in London who took charge of them. He is now reading his wife&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9100"></td>
        <td id="LC9100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">typescript of my diary. I wonder what they make out of it. Here it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9101"></td>
        <td id="LC9101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9102"></td>
        <td id="LC9102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9103"></td>
        <td id="LC9103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     Strange that it never struck me that the very next house might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9104"></td>
        <td id="LC9104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     the Count&#39;s hiding-place! Goodness knows that we had enough clues</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9105"></td>
        <td id="LC9105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     from the conduct of the patient Renfield! The bundle of letters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9106"></td>
        <td id="LC9106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     relating to the purchase of the house were with the typescript. Oh,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9107"></td>
        <td id="LC9107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     if we had only had them earlier we might have saved poor Lucy!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9108"></td>
        <td id="LC9108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     Stop; that way madness lies! Harker has gone back, and is again</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9109"></td>
        <td id="LC9109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     collating his material. He says that by dinner-time they will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9110"></td>
        <td id="LC9110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     able to show a whole connected narrative. He thinks that in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9111"></td>
        <td id="LC9111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     meantime I should see Renfield, as hitherto he has been a sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9112"></td>
        <td id="LC9112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     index to the coming and going of the Count. I hardly see this yet,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9113"></td>
        <td id="LC9113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     but when I get at the dates I suppose I shall. What a good thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9114"></td>
        <td id="LC9114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     that Mrs. Harker put my cylinders into type! We never could have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9115"></td>
        <td id="LC9115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     found the dates otherwise....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9116"></td>
        <td id="LC9116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9117"></td>
        <td id="LC9117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     I found Renfield sitting placidly in his room with his hands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9118"></td>
        <td id="LC9118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     folded, smiling benignly. At the moment he seemed as sane as any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9119"></td>
        <td id="LC9119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     one I ever saw. I sat down and talked with him on a lot of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9120"></td>
        <td id="LC9120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     subjects, all of which he treated naturally. He then, of his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9121"></td>
        <td id="LC9121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     accord, spoke of going home, a subject he has never mentioned to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9122"></td>
        <td id="LC9122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     knowledge during his sojourn here. In fact, he spoke quite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9123"></td>
        <td id="LC9123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     confidently of getting his discharge at once. I believe that, had I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9124"></td>
        <td id="LC9124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     not had the chat with Harker and read the letters and the dates of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9125"></td>
        <td id="LC9125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     his outbursts, I should have been prepared to sign for him after a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9126"></td>
        <td id="LC9126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     brief time of observation. As it is, I am darkly suspicious. All</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9127"></td>
        <td id="LC9127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     those outbreaks were in some way linked with the proximity of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9128"></td>
        <td id="LC9128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     Count. What then does this absolute content mean? Can it be that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9129"></td>
        <td id="LC9129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     his instinct is satisfied as to the vampire&#39;s ultimate triumph?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9130"></td>
        <td id="LC9130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     Stay; he is himself zoöphagous, and in his wild ravings outside the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9131"></td>
        <td id="LC9131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     chapel door of the deserted house he always spoke of &quot;master.&quot; This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9132"></td>
        <td id="LC9132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     all seems confirmation of our idea. However, after a while I came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9133"></td>
        <td id="LC9133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     away; my friend is just a little too sane at present to make it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9134"></td>
        <td id="LC9134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     safe to probe him too deep with questions. He might begin to think,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9135"></td>
        <td id="LC9135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     and then--! So I came away. I mistrust these quiet moods of his; so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9136"></td>
        <td id="LC9136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     I have given the attendant a hint to look closely after him, and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9137"></td>
        <td id="LC9137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     have a strait-waistcoat ready in case of need.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9138"></td>
        <td id="LC9138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9139"></td>
        <td id="LC9139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9140"></td>
        <td id="LC9140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Jonathan Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9141"></td>
        <td id="LC9141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9142"></td>
        <td id="LC9142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_29 September, in train to London._--When I received Mr. Billington&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9143"></td>
        <td id="LC9143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courteous message that he would give me any information in his power I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9144"></td>
        <td id="LC9144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought it best to go down to Whitby and make, on the spot, such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9145"></td>
        <td id="LC9145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inquiries as I wanted. It was now my object to trace that horrid cargo</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9146"></td>
        <td id="LC9146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Count&#39;s to its place in London. Later, we may be able to deal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9147"></td>
        <td id="LC9147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with it. Billington junior, a nice lad, met me at the station, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9148"></td>
        <td id="LC9148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought me to his father&#39;s house, where they had decided that I must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9149"></td>
        <td id="LC9149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stay the night. They are hospitable, with true Yorkshire hospitality:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9150"></td>
        <td id="LC9150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give a guest everything, and leave him free to do as he likes. They all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9151"></td>
        <td id="LC9151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew that I was busy, and that my stay was short, and Mr. Billington had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9152"></td>
        <td id="LC9152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ready in his office all the papers concerning the consignment of boxes.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9153"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9154"></td>
        <td id="LC9154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen on the Count&#39;s table before I knew of his diabolical plans.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9155"></td>
        <td id="LC9155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Everything had been carefully thought out, and done systematically and</td>

        <td id="L9157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9157"></td>

        <td id="L9161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9161"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9231"></td>
        <td id="LC9231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Mina Harker&#39;s Journal_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9232"></td>
