</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9233"></td>
        <td id="LC9233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_30 September._--I am so glad that I hardly know how to contain myself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9234"></td>
        <td id="LC9234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is, I suppose, the reaction from the haunting fear which I have had:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9235"></td>
        <td id="LC9235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that this terrible affair and the reopening of his old wound might act</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9236"></td>
        <td id="LC9236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">detrimentally on Jonathan. I saw him leave for Whitby with as brave a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9237"></td>
        <td id="LC9237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face as I could, but I was sick with apprehension. The effort has,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9238"></td>
        <td id="LC9238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, done him good. He was never so resolute, never so strong, never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9239"></td>
        <td id="LC9239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so full of volcanic energy, as at present. It is just as that dear, good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9240"></td>
        <td id="LC9240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor Van Helsing said: he is true grit, and he improves under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9241"></td>
        <td id="LC9241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strain that would kill a weaker nature. He came back full of life and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9242"></td>
        <td id="LC9242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hope and determination; we have got everything in order for to-night. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9243"></td>
        <td id="LC9243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel myself quite wild with excitement. I suppose one ought to pity any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9244"></td>
        <td id="LC9244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing so hunted as is the Count. That is just it: this Thing is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9245"></td>
        <td id="LC9245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">human--not even beast. To read Dr. Seward&#39;s account of poor Lucy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9246"></td>
        <td id="LC9246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death, and what followed, is enough to dry up the springs of pity in</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9247"></td>
        <td id="LC9247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one&#39;s heart.</td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9251"></td>
        <td id="LC9251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--Lord Godalming and Mr. Morris arrived earlier than we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9252"></td>
        <td id="LC9252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expected. Dr. Seward was out on business, and had taken Jonathan with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9253"></td>
        <td id="LC9253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, so I had to see them. It was to me a painful meeting, for it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9254"></td>
        <td id="LC9254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought back all poor dear Lucy&#39;s hopes of only a few months ago. Of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9255"></td>
        <td id="LC9255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course they had heard Lucy speak of me, and it seemed that Dr. Van</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9256"></td>
        <td id="LC9256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helsing, too, has been quite &quot;blowing my trumpet,&quot; as Mr. Morris</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9257"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9258"></td>

        <td id="L9260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9260"></td>

        <td id="L9261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9261"></td>
        <td id="LC9261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came to the conclusion that the best thing I could do would be to post</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9262"></td>

        <td id="L9264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9264"></td>

        <td id="L9269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9269"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC9276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I can do is to accept your ideas blindfold and try to help you. I have</td>

        <td id="L9277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9277"></td>
        <td id="LC9277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had one lesson already in accepting facts that should make a man humble</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9279"></td>
        <td id="LC9279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here he turned away and covered his face with his hands. I could hear</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9280"></td>

        <td id="L9281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9281"></td>

        <td id="L9282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9282"></td>

        <td id="L9283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9283"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9285"></td>
        <td id="LC9285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lord Godalming found himself alone with me he sat down on the sofa and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9286"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9287"></td>

        <td id="L9290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9290"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9291"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9292"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9294"></td>
        <td id="LC9294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me be like a sister to you in your trouble? I know what sorrows you have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9295"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9296"></td>
        <td id="LC9296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">help in your affliction, won&#39;t you let me be of some little service--for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9297"></td>
        <td id="LC9297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucy&#39;s sake?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9298"></td>
        <td id="LC9298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9299"></td>
        <td id="LC9299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In an instant the poor dear fellow was overwhelmed with grief. It seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9300"></td>
        <td id="LC9300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me that all that he had of late been suffering in silence found a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9301"></td>
        <td id="LC9301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vent at once. He grew quite hysterical, and raising his open hands, beat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9302"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9303"></td>
        <td id="LC9303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down again, and the tears rained down his cheeks. I felt an infinite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9304"></td>
        <td id="LC9304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pity for him, and opened my arms unthinkingly. With a sob he laid his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9305"></td>
        <td id="LC9305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head on my shoulder and cried like a wearied child, whilst he shook with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9306"></td>
        <td id="LC9306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emotion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9307"></td>
        <td id="LC9307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9308"></td>
        <td id="LC9308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We women have something of the mother in us that makes us rise above</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9309"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9310"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9313"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9314"></td>
        <td id="LC9314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a little bit his sobs ceased, and he raised himself with an</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9315"></td>
        <td id="LC9315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apology, though he made no disguise of his emotion. He told me that for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9316"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9317"></td>
        <td id="LC9317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unable to speak with any one, as a man must speak in his time of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9318"></td>
        <td id="LC9318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sorrow. There was no woman whose sympathy could be given to him, or with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9319"></td>
        <td id="LC9319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom, owing to the terrible circumstance with which his sorrow was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9320"></td>
        <td id="LC9320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surrounded, he could speak freely. &quot;I know now how I suffered,&quot; he said,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9321"></td>
        <td id="LC9321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as he dried his eyes, &quot;but I do not know even yet--and none other can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9322"></td>
        <td id="LC9322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever know--how much your sweet sympathy has been to me to-day. I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9323"></td>
        <td id="LC9323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know better in time; and believe me that, though I am not ungrateful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9324"></td>
        <td id="LC9324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now, my gratitude will grow with my understanding. You will let me be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9325"></td>
        <td id="LC9325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like a brother, will you not, for all our lives--for dear Lucy&#39;s sake?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9326"></td>
        <td id="LC9326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9327"></td>
        <td id="LC9327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;For dear Lucy&#39;s sake,&quot; I said as we clasped hands. &quot;Ay, and for your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9328"></td>
        <td id="LC9328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own sake,&quot; he added, &quot;for if a man&#39;s esteem and gratitude are ever worth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9329"></td>
        <td id="LC9329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the winning, you have won mine to-day. If ever the future should bring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9330"></td>
        <td id="LC9330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to you a time when you need a man&#39;s help, believe me, you will not call</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9331"></td>
        <td id="LC9331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in vain. God grant that no such time may ever come to you to break the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9332"></td>
        <td id="LC9332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sunshine of your life; but if it should ever come, promise me that you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9333"></td>
        <td id="LC9333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will let me know.&quot; He was so earnest, and his sorrow was so fresh, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9334"></td>
        <td id="LC9334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I felt it would comfort him, so I said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9335"></td>
        <td id="LC9335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9336"></td>
        <td id="LC9336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I promise.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9337"></td>
        <td id="LC9337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9338"></td>
        <td id="LC9338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As I came along the corridor I saw Mr. Morris looking out of a window.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9339"></td>
        <td id="LC9339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He turned as he heard my footsteps. &quot;How is Art?&quot; he said. Then noticing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9340"></td>
        <td id="LC9340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my red eyes, he went on: &quot;Ah, I see you have been comforting him. Poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9341"></td>
        <td id="LC9341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">old fellow! he needs it. No one but a woman can help a man when he is in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9342"></td>
        <td id="LC9342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble of the heart; and he had no one to comfort him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9343"></td>
        <td id="LC9343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9344"></td>
        <td id="LC9344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He bore his own trouble so bravely that my heart bled for him. I saw the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9345"></td>
        <td id="LC9345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manuscript in his hand, and I knew that when he read it he would realise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9346"></td>
        <td id="LC9346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how much I knew; so I said to him:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9347"></td>
        <td id="LC9347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9348"></td>
        <td id="LC9348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I wish I could comfort all who suffer from the heart. Will you let me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9349"></td>
        <td id="LC9349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be your friend, and will you come to me for comfort if you need it? You</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9350"></td>
        <td id="LC9350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will know, later on, why I speak.&quot; He saw that I was in earnest, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9351"></td>
        <td id="LC9351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stooping, took my hand, and raising it to his lips, kissed it. It seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9352"></td>
        <td id="LC9352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but poor comfort to so brave and unselfish a soul, and impulsively I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9353"></td>
        <td id="LC9353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bent over and kissed him. The tears rose in his eyes, and there was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9354"></td>
        <td id="LC9354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">momentary choking in his throat; he said quite calmly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9355"></td>
        <td id="LC9355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9356"></td>
        <td id="LC9356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Little girl, you will never regret that true-hearted kindness, so long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC9357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as ever you live!&quot; Then he went into the study to his friend.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9358"></td>

</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9360"></td>

        <td id="L9361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9361"></td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9365"></td>
        <td id="LC9365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XVIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9366"></td>
        <td id="LC9366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9367"></td>
        <td id="LC9367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">DR. SEWARD&#39;S DIARY</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9368"></td>
        <td id="LC9368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9369"></td>
        <td id="LC9369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9370"></td>
        <td id="LC9370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_30 September._--I got home at five o&#39;clock, and found that Godalming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9371"></td>
        <td id="LC9371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Morris had not only arrived, but had already studied the transcript</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9372"></td>
        <td id="LC9372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the various diaries and letters which Harker and his wonderful wife</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9373"></td>
        <td id="LC9373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had made and arranged. Harker had not yet returned from his visit to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9374"></td>
        <td id="LC9374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriers&#39; men, of whom Dr. Hennessey had written to me. Mrs. Harker gave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9375"></td>
        <td id="LC9375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us a cup of tea, and I can honestly say that, for the first time since I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9376"></td>
        <td id="LC9376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have lived in it, this old house seemed like _home_. When we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9377"></td>
        <td id="LC9377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finished, Mrs. Harker said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9378"></td>
        <td id="LC9378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9379"></td>
        <td id="LC9379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dr. Seward, may I ask a favour? I want to see your patient, Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9380"></td>
        <td id="LC9380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Renfield. Do let me see him. What you have said of him in your diary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9381"></td>
        <td id="LC9381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interests me so much!&quot; She looked so appealing and so pretty that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9382"></td>
        <td id="LC9382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not refuse her, and there was no possible reason why I should; so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9383"></td>
        <td id="LC9383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I took her with me. When I went into the room, I told the man that a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9384"></td>
        <td id="LC9384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lady would like to see him; to which he simply answered: &quot;Why?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9385"></td>
        <td id="LC9385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9386"></td>
        <td id="LC9386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;She is going through the house, and wants to see every one in it,&quot; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9387"></td>
        <td id="LC9387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered. &quot;Oh, very well,&quot; he said; &quot;let her come in, by all means; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9388"></td>
        <td id="LC9388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just wait a minute till I tidy up the place.&quot; His method of tidying was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9389"></td>
        <td id="LC9389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peculiar: he simply swallowed all the flies and spiders in the boxes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9390"></td>
        <td id="LC9390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before I could stop him. It was quite evident that he feared, or was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9391"></td>
        <td id="LC9391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jealous of, some interference. When he had got through his disgusting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9392"></td>
        <td id="LC9392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">task, he said cheerfully: &quot;Let the lady come in,&quot; and sat down on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9393"></td>
        <td id="LC9393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">edge of his bed with his head down, but with his eyelids raised so that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9394"></td>
        <td id="LC9394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he could see her as she entered. For a moment I thought that he might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9395"></td>
        <td id="LC9395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have some homicidal intent; I remembered how quiet he had been just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9396"></td>
        <td id="LC9396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before he attacked me in my own study, and I took care to stand where I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9397"></td>
        <td id="LC9397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could seize him at once if he attempted to make a spring at her. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9398"></td>
        <td id="LC9398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came into the room with an easy gracefulness which would at once command</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9399"></td>
        <td id="LC9399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the respect of any lunatic--for easiness is one of the qualities mad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9400"></td>
        <td id="LC9400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people most respect. She walked over to him, smiling pleasantly, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9401"></td>
        <td id="LC9401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">held out her hand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9402"></td>
        <td id="LC9402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9403"></td>
        <td id="LC9403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good-evening, Mr. Renfield,&quot; said she. &quot;You see, I know you, for Dr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9404"></td>
        <td id="LC9404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Seward has told me of you.&quot; He made no immediate reply, but eyed her all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9405"></td>
        <td id="LC9405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over intently with a set frown on his face. This look gave way to one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9406"></td>
        <td id="LC9406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of wonder, which merged in doubt; then, to my intense astonishment, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9407"></td>
        <td id="LC9407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9408"></td>
        <td id="LC9408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9409"></td>
        <td id="LC9409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You&#39;re not the girl the doctor wanted to marry, are you? You can&#39;t be,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9410"></td>
        <td id="LC9410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you know, for she&#39;s dead.&quot; Mrs. Harker smiled sweetly as she replied:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9411"></td>
        <td id="LC9411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9412"></td>
        <td id="LC9412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh no! I have a husband of my own, to whom I was married before I ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9413"></td>
        <td id="LC9413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw Dr. Seward, or he me. I am Mrs. Harker.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9414"></td>
        <td id="LC9414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9415"></td>
        <td id="LC9415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then what are you doing here?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9416"></td>
        <td id="LC9416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9417"></td>
        <td id="LC9417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My husband and I are staying on a visit with Dr. Seward.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9418"></td>
        <td id="LC9418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9419"></td>
        <td id="LC9419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then don&#39;t stay.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9420"></td>
        <td id="LC9420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9421"></td>
        <td id="LC9421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But why not?&quot; I thought that this style of conversation might not be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9422"></td>
        <td id="LC9422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasant to Mrs. Harker, any more than it was to me, so I joined in:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9423"></td>
        <td id="LC9423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9424"></td>
        <td id="LC9424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How did you know I wanted to marry any one?&quot; His reply was simply</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9425"></td>
        <td id="LC9425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contemptuous, given in a pause in which he turned his eyes from Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9426"></td>
        <td id="LC9426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harker to me, instantly turning them back again:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9427"></td>
        <td id="LC9427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9428"></td>
        <td id="LC9428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What an asinine question!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9429"></td>
        <td id="LC9429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9430"></td>
        <td id="LC9430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I don&#39;t see that at all, Mr. Renfield,&quot; said Mrs. Harker, at once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9431"></td>
        <td id="LC9431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">championing me. He replied to her with as much courtesy and respect as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9432"></td>
        <td id="LC9432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he had shown contempt to me:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9433"></td>
        <td id="LC9433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9434"></td>
        <td id="LC9434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You will, of course, understand, Mrs. Harker, that when a man is so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9435"></td>
        <td id="LC9435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loved and honoured as our host is, everything regarding him is of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9436"></td>
        <td id="LC9436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest in our little community. Dr. Seward is loved not only by his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9437"></td>
        <td id="LC9437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">household and his friends, but even by his patients, who, being some of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9438"></td>
        <td id="LC9438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them hardly in mental equilibrium, are apt to distort causes and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9439"></td>
        <td id="LC9439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effects. Since I myself have been an inmate of a lunatic asylum, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9440"></td>
        <td id="LC9440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot but notice that the sophistic tendencies of some of its inmates</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9441"></td>
        <td id="LC9441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lean towards the errors of _non causa_ and _ignoratio elenchi_.&quot; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9442"></td>
        <td id="LC9442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">positively opened my eyes at this new development. Here was my own pet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9443"></td>
        <td id="LC9443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lunatic--the most pronounced of his type that I had ever met</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9444"></td>
        <td id="LC9444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with--talking elemental philosophy, and with the manner of a polished</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9445"></td>
        <td id="LC9445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentleman. I wonder if it was Mrs. Harker&#39;s presence which had touched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9446"></td>
        <td id="LC9446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some chord in his memory. If this new phase was spontaneous, or in any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9447"></td>
        <td id="LC9447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way due to her unconscious influence, she must have some rare gift or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9448"></td>
        <td id="LC9448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9449"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9450"></td>
        <td id="LC9450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We continued to talk for some time; and, seeing that he was seemingly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9451"></td>
        <td id="LC9451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite reasonable, she ventured, looking at me questioningly as she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9452"></td>
        <td id="LC9452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began, to lead him to his favourite topic. I was again astonished, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9453"></td>
        <td id="LC9453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he addressed himself to the question with the impartiality of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9454"></td>
        <td id="LC9454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">completest sanity; he even took himself as an example when he mentioned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9455"></td>
        <td id="LC9455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain things.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9456"></td>
        <td id="LC9456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9457"></td>
        <td id="LC9457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, I myself am an instance of a man who had a strange belief. Indeed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9458"></td>
        <td id="LC9458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was no wonder that my friends were alarmed, and insisted on my being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9459"></td>
        <td id="LC9459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put under control. I used to fancy that life was a positive and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9460"></td>
        <td id="LC9460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perpetual entity, and that by consuming a multitude of live things, no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9461"></td>
        <td id="LC9461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">matter how low in the scale of creation, one might indefinitely prolong</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9462"></td>
        <td id="LC9462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life. At times I held the belief so strongly that I actually tried to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9463"></td>
        <td id="LC9463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take human life. The doctor here will bear me out that on one occasion I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9464"></td>
        <td id="LC9464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tried to kill him for the purpose of strengthening my vital powers by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9465"></td>
        <td id="LC9465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the assimilation with my own body of his life through the medium of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9466"></td>
        <td id="LC9466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blood--relying, of course, upon the Scriptural phrase, &#39;For the blood is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9467"></td>
        <td id="LC9467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the life.&#39; Though, indeed, the vendor of a certain nostrum has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9468"></td>
        <td id="LC9468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vulgarised the truism to the very point of contempt. Isn&#39;t that true,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9469"></td>
        <td id="LC9469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doctor?&quot; I nodded assent, for I was so amazed that I hardly knew what to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9470"></td>
        <td id="LC9470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either think or say; it was hard to imagine that I had seen him eat up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9471"></td>
        <td id="LC9471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his spiders and flies not five minutes before. Looking at my watch, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9472"></td>
        <td id="LC9472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw that I should go to the station to meet Van Helsing, so I told Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9473"></td>
        <td id="LC9473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harker that it was time to leave. She came at once, after saying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9474"></td>
        <td id="LC9474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasantly to Mr. Renfield: &quot;Good-bye, and I hope I may see you often,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9475"></td>
        <td id="LC9475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under auspices pleasanter to yourself,&quot; to which, to my astonishment, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9476"></td>
        <td id="LC9476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">replied:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9477"></td>
        <td id="LC9477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9478"></td>
        <td id="LC9478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good-bye, my dear. I pray God I may never see your sweet face again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9479"></td>
        <td id="LC9479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">May He bless and keep you!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9480"></td>
        <td id="LC9480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9481"></td>
        <td id="LC9481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I went to the station to meet Van Helsing I left the boys behind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9482"></td>
        <td id="LC9482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. Poor Art seemed more cheerful than he has been since Lucy first took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9483"></td>
        <td id="LC9483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ill, and Quincey is more like his own bright self than he has been for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9484"></td>
        <td id="LC9484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many a long day.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9485"></td>
        <td id="LC9485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9486"></td>
        <td id="LC9486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing stepped from the carriage with the eager nimbleness of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9487"></td>
        <td id="LC9487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boy. He saw me at once, and rushed up to me, saying:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9488"></td>
        <td id="LC9488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9489"></td>
        <td id="LC9489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah, friend John, how goes all? Well? So! I have been busy, for I come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9490"></td>
        <td id="LC9490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here to stay if need be. All affairs are settled with me, and I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9491"></td>
