      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9492"></td>
        <td id="LC9492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arthur and my friend Quincey, they are with you, too? Good!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9493"></td>
        <td id="LC9493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9494"></td>
        <td id="LC9494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As I drove to the house I told him of what had passed, and of how my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9495"></td>
        <td id="LC9495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">diary had come to be of some use through Mrs. Harker&#39;s suggestion; at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9496"></td>
        <td id="LC9496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which the Professor interrupted me:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9497"></td>
        <td id="LC9497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9498"></td>
        <td id="LC9498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah, that wonderful Madam Mina! She has man&#39;s brain--a brain that a man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9499"></td>
        <td id="LC9499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should have were he much gifted--and a woman&#39;s heart. The good God</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9500"></td>
        <td id="LC9500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fashioned her for a purpose, believe me, when He made that so good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9501"></td>
        <td id="LC9501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">combination. Friend John, up to now fortune has made that woman of help</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9502"></td>
        <td id="LC9502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to us; after to-night she must not have to do with this so terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9503"></td>
        <td id="LC9503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affair. It is not good that she run a risk so great. We men are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9504"></td>
        <td id="LC9504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determined--nay, are we not pledged?--to destroy this monster; but it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9505"></td>
        <td id="LC9505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no part for a woman. Even if she be not harmed, her heart may fail her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9506"></td>
        <td id="LC9506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in so much and so many horrors; and hereafter she may suffer--both in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9507"></td>
        <td id="LC9507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waking, from her nerves, and in sleep, from her dreams. And, besides,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9508"></td>
        <td id="LC9508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she is young woman and not so long married; there may be other things to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9509"></td>
        <td id="LC9509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think of some time, if not now. You tell me she has wrote all, then she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9510"></td>
        <td id="LC9510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must consult with us; but to-morrow she say good-bye to this work, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9511"></td>
        <td id="LC9511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we go alone.&quot; I agreed heartily with him, and then I told him what we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9512"></td>
        <td id="LC9512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had found in his absence: that the house which Dracula had bought was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9513"></td>
        <td id="LC9513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the very next one to my own. He was amazed, and a great concern seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9514"></td>
        <td id="LC9514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to come on him. &quot;Oh that we had known it before!&quot; he said, &quot;for then we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9515"></td>
        <td id="LC9515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might have reached him in time to save poor Lucy. However, &#39;the milk</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9516"></td>
        <td id="LC9516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that is spilt cries not out afterwards,&#39; as you say. We shall not think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9517"></td>
        <td id="LC9517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of that, but go on our way to the end.&quot; Then he fell into a silence that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9518"></td>
        <td id="LC9518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lasted till we entered my own gateway. Before we went to prepare for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9519"></td>
        <td id="LC9519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dinner he said to Mrs. Harker:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9520"></td>
        <td id="LC9520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9521"></td>
        <td id="LC9521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am told, Madam Mina, by my friend John that you and your husband have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9522"></td>
        <td id="LC9522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put up in exact order all things that have been, up to this moment.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9523"></td>
        <td id="LC9523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9524"></td>
        <td id="LC9524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Not up to this moment, Professor,&quot; she said impulsively, &quot;but up to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9525"></td>
        <td id="LC9525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this morning.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9526"></td>
        <td id="LC9526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9527"></td>
        <td id="LC9527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But why not up to now? We have seen hitherto how good light all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9528"></td>
        <td id="LC9528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little things have made. We have told our secrets, and yet no one who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9529"></td>
        <td id="LC9529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has told is the worse for it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9530"></td>
        <td id="LC9530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9531"></td>
        <td id="LC9531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Harker began to blush, and taking a paper from her pockets, she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9532"></td>
        <td id="LC9532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9533"></td>
        <td id="LC9533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9534"></td>
        <td id="LC9534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dr. Van Helsing, will you read this, and tell me if it must go in. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9535"></td>
        <td id="LC9535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is my record of to-day. I too have seen the need of putting down at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9536"></td>
        <td id="LC9536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present everything, however trivial; but there is little in this except</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9537"></td>
        <td id="LC9537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what is personal. Must it go in?&quot; The Professor read it over gravely,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9538"></td>
        <td id="LC9538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and handed it back, saying:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9539"></td>
        <td id="LC9539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9540"></td>
        <td id="LC9540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It need not go in if you do not wish it; but I pray that it may. It can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9541"></td>
        <td id="LC9541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but make your husband love you the more, and all us, your friends, more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9542"></td>
        <td id="LC9542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour you--as well as more esteem and love.&quot; She took it back with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9543"></td>
        <td id="LC9543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another blush and a bright smile.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9544"></td>
        <td id="LC9544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9545"></td>
        <td id="LC9545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so now, up to this very hour, all the records we have are complete</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9546"></td>
        <td id="LC9546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in order. The Professor took away one copy to study after dinner,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9547"></td>
        <td id="LC9547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and before our meeting, which is fixed for nine o&#39;clock. The rest of us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9548"></td>
        <td id="LC9548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have already read everything; so when we meet in the study we shall all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9549"></td>
        <td id="LC9549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be informed as to facts, and can arrange our plan of battle with this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9550"></td>
        <td id="LC9550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible and mysterious enemy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9551"></td>
        <td id="LC9551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9552"></td>
        <td id="LC9552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9553"></td>
        <td id="LC9553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Mina Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9554"></td>
        <td id="LC9554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9555"></td>
        <td id="LC9555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_30 September._--When we met in Dr. Seward&#39;s study two hours after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9556"></td>
        <td id="LC9556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dinner, which had been at six o&#39;clock, we unconsciously formed a sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9557"></td>
        <td id="LC9557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">board or committee. Professor Van Helsing took the head of the table, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9558"></td>
        <td id="LC9558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which Dr. Seward motioned him as he came into the room. He made me sit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9559"></td>
        <td id="LC9559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">next to him on his right, and asked me to act as secretary; Jonathan sat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9560"></td>
        <td id="LC9560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">next to me. Opposite us were Lord Godalming, Dr. Seward, and Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9561"></td>
        <td id="LC9561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Morris--Lord Godalming being next the Professor, and Dr. Seward in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9562"></td>
        <td id="LC9562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">centre. The Professor said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9563"></td>
        <td id="LC9563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9564"></td>
        <td id="LC9564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I may, I suppose, take it that we are all acquainted with the facts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9565"></td>
        <td id="LC9565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that are in these papers.&quot; We all expressed assent, and he went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9566"></td>
        <td id="LC9566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9567"></td>
        <td id="LC9567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then it were, I think good that I tell you something of the kind of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9568"></td>
        <td id="LC9568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemy with which we have to deal. I shall then make known to you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9569"></td>
        <td id="LC9569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something of the history of this man, which has been ascertained for me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9570"></td>
        <td id="LC9570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So we then can discuss how we shall act, and can take our measure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9571"></td>
        <td id="LC9571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">according.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9572"></td>
        <td id="LC9572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9573"></td>
        <td id="LC9573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There are such beings as vampires; some of us have evidence that they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9574"></td>
        <td id="LC9574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exist. Even had we not the proof of our own unhappy experience, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9575"></td>
        <td id="LC9575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">teachings and the records of the past give proof enough for sane</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9576"></td>
        <td id="LC9576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peoples. I admit that at the first I was sceptic. Were it not that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9577"></td>
        <td id="LC9577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through long years I have train myself to keep an open mind, I could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9578"></td>
        <td id="LC9578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have believe until such time as that fact thunder on my ear. &#39;See! see!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9579"></td>
        <td id="LC9579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I prove; I prove.&#39; Alas! Had I known at the first what now I know--nay,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9580"></td>
        <td id="LC9580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had I even guess at him--one so precious life had been spared to many of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9581"></td>
        <td id="LC9581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us who did love her. But that is gone; and we must so work, that other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9582"></td>
        <td id="LC9582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor souls perish not, whilst we can save. The _nosferatu_ do not die</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9583"></td>
        <td id="LC9583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like the bee when he sting once. He is only stronger; and being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9584"></td>
        <td id="LC9584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stronger, have yet more power to work evil. This vampire which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9585"></td>
        <td id="LC9585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amongst us is of himself so strong in person as twenty men; he is of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9586"></td>
        <td id="LC9586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cunning more than mortal, for his cunning be the growth of ages; he have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9587"></td>
        <td id="LC9587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still the aids of necromancy, which is, as his etymology imply, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9588"></td>
        <td id="LC9588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">divination by the dead, and all the dead that he can come nigh to are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9589"></td>
        <td id="LC9589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for him at command; he is brute, and more than brute; he is devil in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9590"></td>
        <td id="LC9590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">callous, and the heart of him is not; he can, within limitations, appear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9591"></td>
        <td id="LC9591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at will when, and where, and in any of the forms that are to him; he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9592"></td>
        <td id="LC9592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can, within his range, direct the elements; the storm, the fog, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9593"></td>
        <td id="LC9593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thunder; he can command all the meaner things: the rat, and the owl, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9594"></td>
        <td id="LC9594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bat--the moth, and the fox, and the wolf; he can grow and become</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9595"></td>
        <td id="LC9595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">small; and he can at times vanish and come unknown. How then are we to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9596"></td>
        <td id="LC9596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begin our strike to destroy him? How shall we find his where; and having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9597"></td>
        <td id="LC9597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found it, how can we destroy? My friends, this is much; it is a terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9598"></td>
        <td id="LC9598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">task that we undertake, and there may be consequence to make the brave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9599"></td>
        <td id="LC9599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shudder. For if we fail in this our fight he must surely win; and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9600"></td>
        <td id="LC9600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where end we? Life is nothings; I heed him not. But to fail here, is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9601"></td>
        <td id="LC9601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mere life or death. It is that we become as him; that we henceforward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9602"></td>
        <td id="LC9602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">become foul things of the night like him--without heart or conscience,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9603"></td>
        <td id="LC9603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preying on the bodies and the souls of those we love best. To us for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9604"></td>
        <td id="LC9604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever are the gates of heaven shut; for who shall open them to us again?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9605"></td>
        <td id="LC9605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We go on for all time abhorred by all; a blot on the face of God&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9606"></td>
        <td id="LC9606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sunshine; an arrow in the side of Him who died for man. But we are face</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9607"></td>
        <td id="LC9607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to face with duty; and in such case must we shrink? For me, I say, no;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9608"></td>
        <td id="LC9608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but then I am old, and life, with his sunshine, his fair places, his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9609"></td>
        <td id="LC9609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">song of birds, his music and his love, lie far behind. You others are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9610"></td>
        <td id="LC9610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young. Some have seen sorrow; but there are fair days yet in store. What</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9611"></td>
        <td id="LC9611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say you?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9612"></td>
        <td id="LC9612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9613"></td>
        <td id="LC9613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whilst he was speaking, Jonathan had taken my hand. I feared, oh so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9614"></td>
        <td id="LC9614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much, that the appalling nature of our danger was overcoming him when I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9615"></td>
        <td id="LC9615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw his hand stretch out; but it was life to me to feel its touch--so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9616"></td>
        <td id="LC9616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strong, so self-reliant, so resolute. A brave man&#39;s hand can speak for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9617"></td>
        <td id="LC9617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">itself; it does not even need a woman&#39;s love to hear its music.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9618"></td>
        <td id="LC9618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9619"></td>
        <td id="LC9619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the Professor had done speaking my husband looked in my eyes, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9620"></td>
        <td id="LC9620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his; there was no need for speaking between us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9621"></td>
        <td id="LC9621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9622"></td>
        <td id="LC9622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I answer for Mina and myself,&quot; he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9623"></td>
        <td id="LC9623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9624"></td>
        <td id="LC9624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Count me in, Professor,&quot; said Mr. Quincey Morris, laconically as usual.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9625"></td>
        <td id="LC9625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9626"></td>
        <td id="LC9626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am with you,&quot; said Lord Godalming, &quot;for Lucy&#39;s sake, if for no other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9627"></td>
        <td id="LC9627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reason.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9628"></td>
        <td id="LC9628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9629"></td>
        <td id="LC9629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dr. Seward simply nodded. The Professor stood up and, after laying his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9630"></td>
        <td id="LC9630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">golden crucifix on the table, held out his hand on either side. I took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9631"></td>
        <td id="LC9631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his right hand, and Lord Godalming his left; Jonathan held my right with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9632"></td>
        <td id="LC9632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his left and stretched across to Mr. Morris. So as we all took hands our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9633"></td>
        <td id="LC9633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">solemn compact was made. I felt my heart icy cold, but it did not even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9634"></td>
        <td id="LC9634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occur to me to draw back. We resumed our places, and Dr. Van Helsing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9635"></td>
        <td id="LC9635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went on with a sort of cheerfulness which showed that the serious work</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9636"></td>
        <td id="LC9636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had begun. It was to be taken as gravely, and in as businesslike a way,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9637"></td>
        <td id="LC9637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as any other transaction of life:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9638"></td>
        <td id="LC9638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9639"></td>
        <td id="LC9639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, you know what we have to contend against; but we, too, are not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9640"></td>
        <td id="LC9640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without strength. We have on our side power of combination--a power</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9641"></td>
        <td id="LC9641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">denied to the vampire kind; we have sources of science; we are free to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9642"></td>
        <td id="LC9642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">act and think; and the hours of the day and the night are ours equally.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9643"></td>
        <td id="LC9643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In fact, so far as our powers extend, they are unfettered, and we are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9644"></td>
        <td id="LC9644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">free to use them. We have self-devotion in a cause, and an end to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9645"></td>
        <td id="LC9645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">achieve which is not a selfish one. These things are much.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9646"></td>
        <td id="LC9646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9647"></td>
        <td id="LC9647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now let us see how far the general powers arrayed against us are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9648"></td>
        <td id="LC9648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">restrict, and how the individual cannot. In fine, let us consider the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9649"></td>
        <td id="LC9649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">limitations of the vampire in general, and of this one in particular.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9650"></td>
        <td id="LC9650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9651"></td>
        <td id="LC9651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;All we have to go upon are traditions and superstitions. These do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9652"></td>
        <td id="LC9652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the first appear much, when the matter is one of life and death--nay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9653"></td>
        <td id="LC9653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of more than either life or death. Yet must we be satisfied; in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9654"></td>
        <td id="LC9654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first place because we have to be--no other means is at our control--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9655"></td>
        <td id="LC9655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secondly, because, after all, these things--tradition and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9656"></td>
        <td id="LC9656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">superstition--are everything. Does not the belief in vampires rest for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9657"></td>
        <td id="LC9657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others--though not, alas! for us--on them? A year ago which of us would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9658"></td>
        <td id="LC9658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have received such a possibility, in the midst of our scientific,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9659"></td>
        <td id="LC9659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sceptical, matter-of-fact nineteenth century? We even scouted a belief</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9660"></td>
        <td id="LC9660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that we saw justified under our very eyes. Take it, then, that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9661"></td>
        <td id="LC9661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vampire, and the belief in his limitations and his cure, rest for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9662"></td>
        <td id="LC9662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment on the same base. For, let me tell you, he is known everywhere</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9663"></td>
        <td id="LC9663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that men have been. In old Greece, in old Rome; he flourish in Germany</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9664"></td>
        <td id="LC9664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all over, in France, in India, even in the Chernosese; and in China, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9665"></td>
        <td id="LC9665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far from us in all ways, there even is he, and the peoples fear him at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9666"></td>
        <td id="LC9666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this day. He have follow the wake of the berserker Icelander, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9667"></td>
        <td id="LC9667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">devil-begotten Hun, the Slav, the Saxon, the Magyar. So far, then, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9668"></td>
        <td id="LC9668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have all we may act upon; and let me tell you that very much of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9669"></td>
        <td id="LC9669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beliefs are justified by what we have seen in our own so unhappy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9670"></td>
        <td id="LC9670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experience. The vampire live on, and cannot die by mere passing of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9671"></td>
        <td id="LC9671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time; he can flourish when that he can fatten on the blood of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9672"></td>
        <td id="LC9672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">living. Even more, we have seen amongst us that he can even grow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9673"></td>
        <td id="LC9673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">younger; that his vital faculties grow strenuous, and seem as though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9674"></td>
        <td id="LC9674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they refresh themselves when his special pabulum is plenty. But he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9675"></td>
        <td id="LC9675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot flourish without this diet; he eat not as others. Even friend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9676"></td>
        <td id="LC9676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan, who lived with him for weeks, did never see him to eat, never!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9677"></td>
        <td id="LC9677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He throws no shadow; he make in the mirror no reflect, as again</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9678"></td>
        <td id="LC9678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan observe. He has the strength of many of his hand--witness again</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9679"></td>
        <td id="LC9679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan when he shut the door against the wolfs, and when he help him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9680"></td>
        <td id="LC9680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the diligence too. He can transform himself to wolf, as we gather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9681"></td>
        <td id="LC9681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the ship arrival in Whitby, when he tear open the dog; he can be as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9682"></td>
        <td id="LC9682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bat, as Madam Mina saw him on the window at Whitby, and as friend John</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9683"></td>
        <td id="LC9683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw him fly from this so near house, and as my friend Quincey saw him at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9684"></td>
        <td id="LC9684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the window of Miss Lucy. He can come in mist which he create--that noble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9685"></td>
        <td id="LC9685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ship&#39;s captain proved him of this; but, from what we know, the distance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9686"></td>
        <td id="LC9686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he can make this mist is limited, and it can only be round himself. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9687"></td>
        <td id="LC9687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come on moonlight rays as elemental dust--as again Jonathan saw those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9688"></td>
        <td id="LC9688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sisters in the castle of Dracula. He become so small--we ourselves saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9689"></td>
        <td id="LC9689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Lucy, ere she was at peace, slip through a hairbreadth space at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9690"></td>
        <td id="LC9690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tomb door. He can, when once he find his way, come out from anything or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9691"></td>
        <td id="LC9691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into anything, no matter how close it be bound or even fused up with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9692"></td>
        <td id="LC9692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fire--solder you call it. He can see in the dark--no small power this,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9693"></td>
        <td id="LC9693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a world which is one half shut from the light. Ah, but hear me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9694"></td>
        <td id="LC9694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through. He can do all these things, yet he is not free. Nay; he is even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9695"></td>
        <td id="LC9695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more prisoner than the slave of the galley, than the madman in his cell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9696"></td>
        <td id="LC9696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He cannot go where he lists; he who is not of nature has yet to obey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9697"></td>
        <td id="LC9697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some of nature&#39;s laws--why we know not. He may not enter anywhere at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9698"></td>
        <td id="LC9698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first, unless there be some one of the household who bid him to come;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9699"></td>
        <td id="LC9699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though afterwards he can come as he please. His power ceases, as does</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9700"></td>
        <td id="LC9700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that of all evil things, at the coming of the day. Only at certain times</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9701"></td>
        <td id="LC9701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can he have limited freedom. If he be not at the place whither he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9702"></td>
        <td id="LC9702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bound, he can only change himself at noon or at exact sunrise or sunset.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9703"></td>
        <td id="LC9703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These things are we told, and in this record of ours we have proof by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9704"></td>
        <td id="LC9704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inference. Thus, whereas he can do as he will within his limit, when he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9705"></td>
        <td id="LC9705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have his earth-home, his coffin-home, his hell-home, the place</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9706"></td>
        <td id="LC9706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unhallowed, as we saw when he went to the grave of the suicide at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9707"></td>
        <td id="LC9707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whitby; still at other time he can only change when the time come. It is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9708"></td>
        <td id="LC9708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, too, that he can only pass running water at the slack or the flood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9709"></td>
        <td id="LC9709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the tide. Then there are things which so afflict him that he has no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9710"></td>
        <td id="LC9710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power, as the garlic that we know of; and as for things sacred, as this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9711"></td>
        <td id="LC9711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">symbol, my crucifix, that was amongst us even now when we resolve, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9712"></td>
        <td id="LC9712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them he is nothing, but in their presence he take his place far off and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9713"></td>
        <td id="LC9713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silent with respect. There are others, too, which I shall tell you of,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9714"></td>
        <td id="LC9714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lest in our seeking we may need them. The branch of wild rose on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9715"></td>
        <td id="LC9715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coffin keep him that he move not from it; a sacred bullet fired into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9716"></td>
        <td id="LC9716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coffin kill him so that he be true dead; and as for the stake through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9717"></td>
        <td id="LC9717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, we know already of its peace; or the cut-off head that giveth rest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9718"></td>
        <td id="LC9718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We have seen it with our eyes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9720"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9724"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9726"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9731"></td>
        <td id="LC9731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arminius, a great and noble race, though now and again were scions who</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9733"></td>
        <td id="LC9733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learned his secrets in the Scholomance, amongst the mountains over Lake</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9734"></td>
        <td id="LC9734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hermanstadt, where the devil claims the tenth scholar as his due. In the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9735"></td>
        <td id="LC9735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">records are such words as &#39;stregoica&#39;--witch, &#39;ordog,&#39; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9736"></td>
        <td id="LC9736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;pokol&#39;--Satan and hell; and in one manuscript this very Dracula is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9737"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9738"></td>
        <td id="LC9738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the loins of this very one great men and good women, and their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9739"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9743"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9755"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9756"></td>
        <td id="LC9756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here we were interrupted in a very startling way. Outside the house came</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9757"></td>

        <td id="L9763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9763"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9764"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9766"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9767"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9768"></td>
        <td id="LC9768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harker, most sincerely; I fear I must have frightened you terribly. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9769"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9770"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9771"></td>
        <td id="LC9771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brutes from recent events that I cannot stand them, and I went out to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9772"></td>
        <td id="LC9772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have a shot, as I have been doing of late of evenings, whenever I have</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9775"></td>
        <td id="LC9775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Did you hit it?&quot; asked Dr. Van Helsing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9776"></td>
        <td id="LC9776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9777"></td>
        <td id="LC9777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I don&#39;t know; I fancy not, for it flew away into the wood.&quot; Without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9778"></td>
        <td id="LC9778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying any more he took his seat, and the Professor began to resume his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9779"></td>
        <td id="LC9779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">statement:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9780"></td>
        <td id="LC9780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9781"></td>
        <td id="LC9781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We must trace each of these boxes; and when we are ready, we must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9782"></td>
        <td id="LC9782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either capture or kill this monster in his lair; or we must, so to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9783"></td>
        <td id="LC9783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speak, sterilise the earth, so that no more he can seek safety in it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9784"></td>
        <td id="LC9784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thus in the end we may find him in his form of man between the hours of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9785"></td>
        <td id="LC9785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noon and sunset, and so engage with him when he is at his most weak.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9786"></td>
        <td id="LC9786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9787"></td>
        <td id="LC9787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And now for you, Madam Mina, this night is the end until all be well.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9788"></td>
        <td id="LC9788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You are too precious to us to have such risk. When we part to-night, you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9789"></td>
        <td id="LC9789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no more must question. We shall tell you all in good time. We are men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9790"></td>
        <td id="LC9790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and are able to bear; but you must be our star and our hope, and we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9791"></td>
        <td id="LC9791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall act all the more free that you are not in the danger, such as we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9792"></td>
        <td id="LC9792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9793"></td>
        <td id="LC9793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9794"></td>
        <td id="LC9794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All the men, even Jonathan, seemed relieved; but it did not seem to me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9795"></td>
        <td id="LC9795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good that they should brave danger and, perhaps, lessen their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9796"></td>
        <td id="LC9796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">safety--strength being the best safety--through care of me; but their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9797"></td>
        <td id="LC9797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minds were made up, and, though it was a bitter pill for me to swallow,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9798"></td>
        <td id="LC9798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could say nothing, save to accept their chivalrous care of me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9799"></td>
        <td id="LC9799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9800"></td>
        <td id="LC9800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Morris resumed the discussion:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9801"></td>
        <td id="LC9801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9802"></td>
        <td id="LC9802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;As there is no time to lose, I vote we have a look at his house right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9803"></td>
        <td id="LC9803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now. Time is everything with him; and swift action on our part may save</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9804"></td>
        <td id="LC9804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another victim.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9805"></td>
        <td id="LC9805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9806"></td>
        <td id="LC9806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I own that my heart began to fail me when the time for action came so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9807"></td>
        <td id="LC9807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">close, but I did not say anything, for I had a greater fear that if I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9808"></td>
        <td id="LC9808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appeared as a drag or a hindrance to their work, they might even leave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9809"></td>
        <td id="LC9809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me out of their counsels altogether. They have now gone off to Carfax,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9810"></td>
        <td id="LC9810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with means to get into the house.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9811"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9812"></td>
        <td id="LC9812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Manlike, they had told me to go to bed and sleep; as if a woman can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9813"></td>
        <td id="LC9813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep when those she loves are in danger! I shall lie down and pretend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9814"></td>
        <td id="LC9814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to sleep, lest Jonathan have added anxiety about me when he returns.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9815"></td>
        <td id="LC9815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9816"></td>
