</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9817"></td>
        <td id="LC9817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9818"></td>
        <td id="LC9818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9819"></td>
        <td id="LC9819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_1 October, 4 a. m._--Just as we were about to leave the house, an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9820"></td>
        <td id="LC9820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">urgent message was brought to me from Renfield to know if I would see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9821"></td>
        <td id="LC9821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him at once, as he had something of the utmost importance to say to me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9822"></td>
        <td id="LC9822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I told the messenger to say that I would attend to his wishes in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9823"></td>
        <td id="LC9823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning; I was busy just at the moment. The attendant added:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9824"></td>
        <td id="LC9824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9825"></td>
        <td id="LC9825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;He seems very importunate, sir. I have never seen him so eager. I don&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9826"></td>
        <td id="LC9826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know but what, if you don&#39;t see him soon, he will have one of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9827"></td>
        <td id="LC9827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">violent fits.&quot; I knew the man would not have said this without some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9828"></td>
        <td id="LC9828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cause, so I said: &quot;All right; I&#39;ll go now&quot;; and I asked the others to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9829"></td>
        <td id="LC9829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wait a few minutes for me, as I had to go and see my &quot;patient.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9830"></td>
        <td id="LC9830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9831"></td>
        <td id="LC9831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Take me with you, friend John,&quot; said the Professor. &quot;His case in your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9832"></td>
        <td id="LC9832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">diary interest me much, and it had bearing, too, now and again on _our_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9833"></td>
        <td id="LC9833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">case. I should much like to see him, and especial when his mind is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9834"></td>
        <td id="LC9834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disturbed.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9835"></td>
        <td id="LC9835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9836"></td>
        <td id="LC9836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;May I come also?&quot; asked Lord Godalming.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9837"></td>
        <td id="LC9837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9838"></td>
        <td id="LC9838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Me too?&quot; said Quincey Morris. &quot;May I come?&quot; said Harker. I nodded, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9839"></td>
        <td id="LC9839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we all went down the passage together.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9840"></td>
        <td id="LC9840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9841"></td>
        <td id="LC9841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We found him in a state of considerable excitement, but far more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9842"></td>
        <td id="LC9842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rational in his speech and manner than I had ever seen him. There was an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9843"></td>
        <td id="LC9843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unusual understanding of himself, which was unlike anything I had ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9844"></td>
        <td id="LC9844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">met with in a lunatic; and he took it for granted that his reasons would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9845"></td>
        <td id="LC9845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prevail with others entirely sane. We all four went into the room, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9846"></td>
        <td id="LC9846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">none of the others at first said anything. His request was that I would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9847"></td>
        <td id="LC9847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at once release him from the asylum and send him home. This he backed up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9848"></td>
        <td id="LC9848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with arguments regarding his complete recovery, and adduced his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9849"></td>
        <td id="LC9849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">existing sanity. &quot;I appeal to your friends,&quot; he said, &quot;they will,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9850"></td>
        <td id="LC9850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perhaps, not mind sitting in judgment on my case. By the way, you have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9851"></td>
        <td id="LC9851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not introduced me.&quot; I was so much astonished, that the oddness of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9852"></td>
        <td id="LC9852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">introducing a madman in an asylum did not strike me at the moment; and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9853"></td>
        <td id="LC9853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">besides, there was a certain dignity in the man&#39;s manner, so much of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9854"></td>
        <td id="LC9854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the habit of equality, that I at once made the introduction: &quot;Lord</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9855"></td>
        <td id="LC9855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Godalming; Professor Van Helsing; Mr. Quincey Morris, of Texas; Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9856"></td>
        <td id="LC9856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Renfield.&quot; He shook hands with each of them, saying in turn:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9857"></td>
        <td id="LC9857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9858"></td>
        <td id="LC9858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Lord Godalming, I had the honour of seconding your father at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9859"></td>
        <td id="LC9859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Windham; I grieve to know, by your holding the title, that he is no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9860"></td>
        <td id="LC9860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more. He was a man loved and honoured by all who knew him; and in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9861"></td>
        <td id="LC9861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">youth was, I have heard, the inventor of a burnt rum punch, much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9862"></td>
        <td id="LC9862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patronised on Derby night. Mr. Morris, you should be proud of your great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9863"></td>
        <td id="LC9863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">state. Its reception into the Union was a precedent which may have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9864"></td>
        <td id="LC9864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far-reaching effects hereafter, when the Pole and the Tropics may hold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9865"></td>
        <td id="LC9865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alliance to the Stars and Stripes. The power of Treaty may yet prove a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9866"></td>
        <td id="LC9866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vast engine of enlargement, when the Monroe doctrine takes its true</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9867"></td>
        <td id="LC9867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place as a political fable. What shall any man say of his pleasure at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9868"></td>
        <td id="LC9868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meeting Van Helsing? Sir, I make no apology for dropping all forms of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9869"></td>
        <td id="LC9869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conventional prefix. When an individual has revolutionised therapeutics</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9870"></td>
        <td id="LC9870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by his discovery of the continuous evolution of brain-matter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9871"></td>
        <td id="LC9871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conventional forms are unfitting, since they would seem to limit him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9872"></td>
        <td id="LC9872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one of a class. You, gentlemen, who by nationality, by heredity, or by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9873"></td>
        <td id="LC9873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the possession of natural gifts, are fitted to hold your respective</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9874"></td>
        <td id="LC9874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">places in the moving world, I take to witness that I am as sane as at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9875"></td>
        <td id="LC9875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">least the majority of men who are in full possession of their liberties.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9876"></td>
        <td id="LC9876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And I am sure that you, Dr. Seward, humanitarian and medico-jurist as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9877"></td>
        <td id="LC9877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well as scientist, will deem it a moral duty to deal with me as one to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9878"></td>
        <td id="LC9878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be considered as under exceptional circumstances.&quot; He made this last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9879"></td>
        <td id="LC9879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appeal with a courtly air of conviction which was not without its own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9880"></td>
        <td id="LC9880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charm.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9881"></td>
        <td id="LC9881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9882"></td>
        <td id="LC9882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I think we were all staggered. For my own part, I was under the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9883"></td>
        <td id="LC9883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conviction, despite my knowledge of the man&#39;s character and history,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9884"></td>
        <td id="LC9884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that his reason had been restored; and I felt under a strong impulse to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9885"></td>
        <td id="LC9885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tell him that I was satisfied as to his sanity, and would see about the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9886"></td>
        <td id="LC9886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessary formalities for his release in the morning. I thought it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9887"></td>
        <td id="LC9887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better to wait, however, before making so grave a statement, for of old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9888"></td>
        <td id="LC9888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I knew the sudden changes to which this particular patient was liable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9889"></td>
        <td id="LC9889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So I contented myself with making a general statement that he appeared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9890"></td>
        <td id="LC9890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be improving very rapidly; that I would have a longer chat with him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9891"></td>
        <td id="LC9891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the morning, and would then see what I could do in the direction of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9892"></td>
        <td id="LC9892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meeting his wishes. This did not at all satisfy him, for he said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9893"></td>
        <td id="LC9893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quickly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9894"></td>
        <td id="LC9894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9895"></td>
        <td id="LC9895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But I fear, Dr. Seward, that you hardly apprehend my wish. I desire to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9896"></td>
        <td id="LC9896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go at once--here--now--this very hour--this very moment, if I may. Time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9897"></td>
        <td id="LC9897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presses, and in our implied agreement with the old scytheman it is of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9898"></td>
        <td id="LC9898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the essence of the contract. I am sure it is only necessary to put</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9899"></td>
        <td id="LC9899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before so admirable a practitioner as Dr. Seward so simple, yet so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9900"></td>
        <td id="LC9900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">momentous a wish, to ensure its fulfilment.&quot; He looked at me keenly, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9901"></td>
        <td id="LC9901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seeing the negative in my face, turned to the others, and scrutinised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9902"></td>
        <td id="LC9902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them closely. Not meeting any sufficient response, he went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9903"></td>
        <td id="LC9903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9904"></td>
        <td id="LC9904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Is it possible that I have erred in my supposition?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9905"></td>
        <td id="LC9905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9906"></td>
        <td id="LC9906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You have,&quot; I said frankly, but at the same time, as I felt, brutally.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9907"></td>
        <td id="LC9907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a considerable pause, and then he said slowly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9908"></td>
        <td id="LC9908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9909"></td>
        <td id="LC9909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then I suppose I must only shift my ground of request. Let me ask for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9910"></td>
        <td id="LC9910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this concession--boon, privilege, what you will. I am content to implore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9911"></td>
        <td id="LC9911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in such a case, not on personal grounds, but for the sake of others. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9912"></td>
        <td id="LC9912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am not at liberty to give you the whole of my reasons; but you may, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9913"></td>
        <td id="LC9913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assure you, take it from me that they are good ones, sound and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9914"></td>
        <td id="LC9914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unselfish, and spring from the highest sense of duty. Could you look,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9915"></td>
        <td id="LC9915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sir, into my heart, you would approve to the full the sentiments which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9916"></td>
        <td id="LC9916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animate me. Nay, more, you would count me amongst the best and truest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9917"></td>
        <td id="LC9917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your friends.&quot; Again he looked at us all keenly. I had a growing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9918"></td>
        <td id="LC9918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conviction that this sudden change of his entire intellectual method was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9919"></td>
        <td id="LC9919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but yet another form or phase of his madness, and so determined to let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9920"></td>
        <td id="LC9920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him go on a little longer, knowing from experience that he would, like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9921"></td>
        <td id="LC9921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all lunatics, give himself away in the end. Van Helsing was gazing at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9922"></td>
        <td id="LC9922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him with a look of utmost intensity, his bushy eyebrows almost meeting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9923"></td>
        <td id="LC9923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the fixed concentration of his look. He said to Renfield in a tone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9924"></td>
        <td id="LC9924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which did not surprise me at the time, but only when I thought of it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9925"></td>
        <td id="LC9925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afterwards--for it was as of one addressing an equal:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9926"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9927"></td>
        <td id="LC9927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Can you not tell frankly your real reason for wishing to be free</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9928"></td>
        <td id="LC9928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to-night? I will undertake that if you will satisfy even me--a stranger,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9929"></td>
        <td id="LC9929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without prejudice, and with the habit of keeping an open mind--Dr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9930"></td>
        <td id="LC9930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Seward will give you, at his own risk and on his own responsibility, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9931"></td>
        <td id="LC9931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">privilege you seek.&quot; He shook his head sadly, and with a look of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9932"></td>
        <td id="LC9932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poignant regret on his face. The Professor went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9933"></td>
        <td id="LC9933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9934"></td>
        <td id="LC9934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Come, sir, bethink yourself. You claim the privilege of reason in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9935"></td>
        <td id="LC9935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highest degree, since you seek to impress us with your complete</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9936"></td>
        <td id="LC9936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reasonableness. You do this, whose sanity we have reason to doubt, since</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9937"></td>
        <td id="LC9937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you are not yet released from medical treatment for this very defect. If</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9938"></td>
        <td id="LC9938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you will not help us in our effort to choose the wisest course, how can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9939"></td>
        <td id="LC9939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we perform the duty which you yourself put upon us? Be wise, and help</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9940"></td>
        <td id="LC9940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us; and if we can we shall aid you to achieve your wish.&quot; He still shook</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9941"></td>
        <td id="LC9941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his head as he said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9942"></td>
        <td id="LC9942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9943"></td>
        <td id="LC9943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dr. Van Helsing, I have nothing to say. Your argument is complete, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9944"></td>
        <td id="LC9944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if I were free to speak I should not hesitate a moment; but I am not my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9945"></td>
        <td id="LC9945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own master in the matter. I can only ask you to trust me. If I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9946"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9947"></td>
        <td id="LC9947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time to end the scene, which was becoming too comically grave, so I went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9948"></td>
        <td id="LC9948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards the door, simply saying:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9949"></td>
        <td id="LC9949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9950"></td>
        <td id="LC9950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Come, my friends, we have work to do. Good-night.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9951"></td>
        <td id="LC9951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9952"></td>
        <td id="LC9952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As, however, I got near the door, a new change came over the patient. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9953"></td>
        <td id="LC9953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moved towards me so quickly that for the moment I feared that he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9954"></td>
        <td id="LC9954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about to make another homicidal attack. My fears, however, were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9955"></td>
        <td id="LC9955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">groundless, for he held up his two hands imploringly, and made his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9956"></td>
        <td id="LC9956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">petition in a moving manner. As he saw that the very excess of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9957"></td>
        <td id="LC9957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emotion was militating against him, by restoring us more to our old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9958"></td>
        <td id="LC9958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relations, he became still more demonstrative. I glanced at Van Helsing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9959"></td>
        <td id="LC9959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and saw my conviction reflected in his eyes; so I became a little more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9960"></td>
        <td id="LC9960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fixed in my manner, if not more stern, and motioned to him that his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9961"></td>
        <td id="LC9961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">efforts were unavailing. I had previously seen something of the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9962"></td>
        <td id="LC9962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constantly growing excitement in him when he had to make some request of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9963"></td>
        <td id="LC9963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which at the time he had thought much, such, for instance, as when he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10011"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10013"></td>

        <td id="L10014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10014"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10048"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10049"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10053"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10054"></td>
        <td id="LC10054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10145"></td>

        <td id="LC10235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">call, just as from his castle top he summon the wolves to your going and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10236"></td>
        <td id="LC10236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to that poor mother&#39;s cry, though they come to him, they run pell-mell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10237"></td>
        <td id="LC10237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the so little dogs of my friend Arthur. We have other matters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10238"></td>
        <td id="LC10238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before us, other dangers, other fears; and that monster--he has not used</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10239"></td>
        <td id="LC10239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his power over the brute world for the only or the last time to-night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10240"></td>
        <td id="LC10240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So be it that he has gone elsewhere. Good! It has given us opportunity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10241"></td>
        <td id="LC10241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to cry &#39;check&#39; in some ways in this chess game, which we play for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10242"></td>
        <td id="LC10242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stake of human souls. And now let us go home. The dawn is close at hand,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10243"></td>
        <td id="LC10243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and we have reason to be content with our first night&#39;s work. It may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10244"></td>
        <td id="LC10244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ordained that we have many nights and days to follow, if full of peril;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10245"></td>
        <td id="LC10245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but we must go on, and from no danger shall we shrink.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10246"></td>
        <td id="LC10246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10247"></td>
        <td id="LC10247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The house was silent when we got back, save for some poor creature who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10248"></td>
        <td id="LC10248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was screaming away in one of the distant wards, and a low, moaning sound</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10249"></td>
        <td id="LC10249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from Renfield&#39;s room. The poor wretch was doubtless torturing himself,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10250"></td>
        <td id="LC10250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after the manner of the insane, with needless thoughts of pain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10251"></td>
        <td id="LC10251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10252"></td>
        <td id="LC10252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I came tiptoe into our own room, and found Mina asleep, breathing so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10253"></td>
        <td id="LC10253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">softly that I had to put my ear down to hear it. She looks paler than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10254"></td>
        <td id="LC10254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">usual. I hope the meeting to-night has not upset her. I am truly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10255"></td>
        <td id="LC10255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thankful that she is to be left out of our future work, and even of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10256"></td>
        <td id="LC10256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deliberations. It is too great a strain for a woman to bear. I did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10257"></td>
        <td id="LC10257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think so at first, but I know better now. Therefore I am glad that it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10258"></td>
        <td id="LC10258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">settled. There may be things which would frighten her to hear; and yet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10259"></td>
        <td id="LC10259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to conceal them from her might be worse than to tell her if once she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10260"></td>
        <td id="LC10260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspected that there was any concealment. Henceforth our work is to be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10261"></td>
        <td id="LC10261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sealed book to her, till at least such time as we can tell her that all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10262"></td>
        <td id="LC10262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is finished, and the earth free from a monster of the nether world. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10263"></td>
        <td id="LC10263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daresay it will be difficult to begin to keep silence after such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10264"></td>
        <td id="LC10264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confidence as ours; but I must be resolute, and to-morrow I shall keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10265"></td>
        <td id="LC10265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dark over to-night&#39;s doings, and shall refuse to speak of anything that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10266"></td>
        <td id="LC10266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has happened. I rest on the sofa, so as not to disturb her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10267"></td>
        <td id="LC10267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10268"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10270"></td>
        <td id="LC10270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_1 October, later._--I suppose it was natural that we should have all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10271"></td>
        <td id="LC10271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overslept ourselves, for the day was a busy one, and the night had no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10272"></td>
        <td id="LC10272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest at all. Even Mina must have felt its exhaustion, for though I slept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10273"></td>
        <td id="LC10273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till the sun was high, I was awake before her, and had to call two or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10274"></td>
        <td id="LC10274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three times before she awoke. Indeed, she was so sound asleep that for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10275"></td>
        <td id="LC10275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">few seconds she did not recognize me, but looked at me with a sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10276"></td>
        <td id="LC10276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blank terror, as one looks who has been waked out of a bad dream. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10277"></td>
        <td id="LC10277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complained a little of being tired, and I let her rest till later in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10278"></td>
        <td id="LC10278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">day. We now know of twenty-one boxes having been removed, and if it be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10279"></td>
        <td id="LC10279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that several were taken in any of these removals we may be able to trace</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10280"></td>
        <td id="LC10280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them all. Such will, of course, immensely simplify our labour, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10281"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10282"></td>
        <td id="LC10282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Snelling to-day.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10283"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10284"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10285"></td>
        <td id="LC10285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10286"></td>
        <td id="LC10286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10287"></td>
        <td id="LC10287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_1 October._--It was towards noon when I was awakened by the Professor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10288"></td>
        <td id="LC10288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">walking into my room. He was more jolly and cheerful than usual, and it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10289"></td>
        <td id="LC10289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is quite evident that last night&#39;s work has helped to take some of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10290"></td>
        <td id="LC10290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brooding weight off his mind. After going over the adventure of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10291"></td>
        <td id="LC10291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night he suddenly said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10292"></td>
        <td id="LC10292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10293"></td>
        <td id="LC10293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Your patient interests me much. May it be that with you I visit him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10294"></td>
        <td id="LC10294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this morning? Or if that you are too occupy, I can go alone if it may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10295"></td>
        <td id="LC10295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be. It is a new experience to me to find a lunatic who talk philosophy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10296"></td>
        <td id="LC10296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and reason so sound.&quot; I had some work to do which pressed, so I told him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10297"></td>
        <td id="LC10297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that if he would go alone I would be glad, as then I should not have to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10298"></td>
        <td id="LC10298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keep him waiting; so I called an attendant and gave him the necessary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10299"></td>
        <td id="LC10299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instructions. Before the Professor left the room I cautioned him against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10300"></td>
        <td id="LC10300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">getting any false impression from my patient. &quot;But,&quot; he answered, &quot;I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10301"></td>
        <td id="LC10301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">want him to talk of himself and of his delusion as to consuming live</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10302"></td>
        <td id="LC10302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things. He said to Madam Mina, as I see in your diary of yesterday, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10303"></td>
        <td id="LC10303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he had once had such a belief. Why do you smile, friend John?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10304"></td>
        <td id="LC10304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10305"></td>
        <td id="LC10305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Excuse me,&quot; I said, &quot;but the answer is here.&quot; I laid my hand on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10306"></td>
        <td id="LC10306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">type-written matter. &quot;When our sane and learned lunatic made that very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10307"></td>
        <td id="LC10307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">statement of how he _used_ to consume life, his mouth was actually</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10308"></td>
        <td id="LC10308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nauseous with the flies and spiders which he had eaten just before Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10309"></td>
        <td id="LC10309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harker entered the room.&quot; Van Helsing smiled in turn. &quot;Good!&quot; he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10310"></td>
        <td id="LC10310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Your memory is true, friend John. I should have remembered. And yet it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10311"></td>
        <td id="LC10311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is this very obliquity of thought and memory which makes mental disease</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10312"></td>
        <td id="LC10312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a fascinating study. Perhaps I may gain more knowledge out of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10313"></td>
        <td id="LC10313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">folly of this madman than I shall from the teaching of the most wise.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10314"></td>
        <td id="LC10314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Who knows?&quot; I went on with my work, and before long was through that in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10315"></td>
        <td id="LC10315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand. It seemed that the time had been very short indeed, but there was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10316"></td>
        <td id="LC10316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing back in the study. &quot;Do I interrupt?&quot; he asked politely as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10317"></td>
        <td id="LC10317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stood at the door.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10318"></td>
        <td id="LC10318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10319"></td>
        <td id="LC10319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Not at all,&quot; I answered. &quot;Come in. My work is finished, and I am free.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10320"></td>
        <td id="LC10320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I can go with you now, if you like.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10321"></td>
        <td id="LC10321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10322"></td>
        <td id="LC10322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It is needless; I have seen him!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10323"></td>
        <td id="LC10323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10324"></td>
        <td id="LC10324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10325"></td>
        <td id="LC10325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10326"></td>
        <td id="LC10326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I fear that he does not appraise me at much. Our interview was short.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10327"></td>
        <td id="LC10327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I entered his room he was sitting on a stool in the centre, with</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10415"></td>
        <td id="LC10415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could in some way recognise in his tones some passionate entreaty on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10416"></td>
        <td id="LC10416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his part. Then there was the sound of a struggle, and I knew that the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10417"></td>
        <td id="LC10417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attendants were dealing with him. I was so frightened that I crept into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10418"></td>
        <td id="LC10418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed, and pulled the clothes over my head, putting my fingers in my ears.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10419"></td>
        <td id="LC10419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was not then a bit sleepy, at least so I thought; but I must have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10420"></td>
        <td id="LC10420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fallen asleep, for, except dreams, I do not remember anything until the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10421"></td>
        <td id="LC10421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning, when Jonathan woke me. I think that it took me an effort and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10422"></td>
        <td id="LC10422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little time to realise where I was, and that it was Jonathan who was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10423"></td>
        <td id="LC10423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bending over me. My dream was very peculiar, and was almost typical of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10424"></td>
        <td id="LC10424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the way that waking thoughts become merged in, or continued in, dreams.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10425"></td>
        <td id="LC10425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10426"></td>
        <td id="LC10426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I thought that I was asleep, and waiting for Jonathan to come back. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10427"></td>
        <td id="LC10427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was very anxious about him, and I was powerless to act; my feet, and my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10428"></td>
        <td id="LC10428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands, and my brain were weighted, so that nothing could proceed at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10429"></td>
        <td id="LC10429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">usual pace. And so I slept uneasily and thought. Then it began to dawn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10430"></td>
        <td id="LC10430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon me that the air was heavy, and dank, and cold. I put back the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10431"></td>
        <td id="LC10431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clothes from my face, and found, to my surprise, that all was dim</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10432"></td>
        <td id="LC10432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">around. The gaslight which I had left lit for Jonathan, but turned down,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10433"></td>
        <td id="LC10433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came only like a tiny red spark through the fog, which had evidently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10434"></td>
        <td id="LC10434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grown thicker and poured into the room. Then it occurred to me that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10435"></td>
        <td id="LC10435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had shut the window before I had come to bed. I would have got out to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10436"></td>
        <td id="LC10436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make certain on the point, but some leaden lethargy seemed to chain my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10437"></td>
        <td id="LC10437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">limbs and even my will. I lay still and endured; that was all. I closed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10438"></td>
        <td id="LC10438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my eyes, but could still see through my eyelids. (It is wonderful what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10439"></td>
        <td id="LC10439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tricks our dreams play us, and how conveniently we can imagine.) The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10440"></td>
        <td id="LC10440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mist grew thicker and thicker and I could see now how it came in, for I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10441"></td>
        <td id="LC10441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could see it like smoke--or with the white energy of boiling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10442"></td>
        <td id="LC10442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water--pouring in, not through the window, but through the joinings of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10443"></td>
        <td id="LC10443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the door. It got thicker and thicker, till it seemed as if it became</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10444"></td>
        <td id="LC10444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concentrated into a sort of pillar of cloud in the room, through the top</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10445"></td>
        <td id="LC10445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of which I could see the light of the gas shining like a red eye. Things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10446"></td>
        <td id="LC10446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to whirl through my brain just as the cloudy column was now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10447"></td>
        <td id="LC10447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whirling in the room, and through it all came the scriptural words &quot;a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10448"></td>
        <td id="LC10448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pillar of cloud by day and of fire by night.&quot; Was it indeed some such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10449"></td>
        <td id="LC10449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spiritual guidance that was coming to me in my sleep? But the pillar was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10450"></td>
        <td id="LC10450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">composed of both the day and the night-guiding, for the fire was in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10451"></td>
        <td id="LC10451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">red eye, which at the thought got a new fascination for me; till, as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10452"></td>
        <td id="LC10452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked, the fire divided, and seemed to shine on me through the fog like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10453"></td>
        <td id="LC10453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two red eyes, such as Lucy told me of in her momentary mental wandering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10454"></td>
        <td id="LC10454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when, on the cliff, the dying sunlight struck the windows of St. Mary&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10455"></td>
        <td id="LC10455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Church. Suddenly the horror burst upon me that it was thus that Jonathan</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10456"></td>
        <td id="LC10456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had seen those awful women growing into reality through the whirling mist</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10457"></td>
        <td id="LC10457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the moonlight, and in my dream I must have fainted, for all became</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10458"></td>
        <td id="LC10458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">black darkness. The last conscious effort which imagination made was to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10459"></td>
        <td id="LC10459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">show me a livid white face bending over me out of the mist. I must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10460"></td>
        <td id="LC10460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">careful of such dreams, for they would unseat one&#39;s reason if there were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10461"></td>
        <td id="LC10461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too much of them. I would get Dr. Van Helsing or Dr. Seward to prescribe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10462"></td>
        <td id="LC10462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something for me which would make me sleep, only that I fear to alarm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10463"></td>
        <td id="LC10463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them. Such a dream at the present time would become woven into their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10464"></td>
        <td id="LC10464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fears for me. To-night I shall strive hard to sleep naturally. If I do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10465"></td>
        <td id="LC10465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not, I shall to-morrow night get them to give me a dose of chloral; that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10466"></td>
        <td id="LC10466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot hurt me for once, and it will give me a good night&#39;s sleep. Last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10467"></td>
        <td id="LC10467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night tired me more than if I had not slept at all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10468"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10471"></td>
        <td id="LC10471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_2 October 10 p. m._--Last night I slept, but did not dream. I must have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10472"></td>
        <td id="LC10472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slept soundly, for I was not waked by Jonathan coming to bed; but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10473"></td>
        <td id="LC10473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep has not refreshed me, for to-day I feel terribly weak and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10474"></td>
        <td id="LC10474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spiritless. I spent all yesterday trying to read, or lying down dozing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10475"></td>
        <td id="LC10475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the afternoon Mr. Renfield asked if he might see me. Poor man, he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10476"></td>
        <td id="LC10476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very gentle, and when I came away he kissed my hand and bade God bless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10477"></td>
        <td id="LC10477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. Some way it affected me much; I am crying when I think of him. This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10478"></td>
        <td id="LC10478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a new weakness, of which I must be careful. Jonathan would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10479"></td>
        <td id="LC10479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">miserable if he knew I had been crying. He and the others were out till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10480"></td>
        <td id="LC10480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dinner-time, and they all came in tired. I did what I could to brighten</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10481"></td>
        <td id="LC10481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them up, and I suppose that the effort did me good, for I forgot how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10482"></td>
        <td id="LC10482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tired I was. After dinner they sent me to bed, and all went off to smoke</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10483"></td>
        <td id="LC10483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together, as they said, but I knew that they wanted to tell each other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10484"></td>
        <td id="LC10484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of what had occurred to each during the day; I could see from Jonathan&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10485"></td>
        <td id="LC10485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner that he had something important to communicate. I was not so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10486"></td>
        <td id="LC10486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleepy as I should have been; so before they went I asked Dr. Seward to</td>

        <td id="L10487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10487"></td>
        <td id="LC10487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give me a little opiate of some kind, as I had not slept well the night</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10488"></td>
        <td id="LC10488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before. He very kindly made me up a sleeping draught, which he gave to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10489"></td>
        <td id="LC10489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, telling me that it would do me no harm, as it was very mild.... I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10490"></td>
        <td id="LC10490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have taken it, and am waiting for sleep, which still keeps aloof. I hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10491"></td>
        <td id="LC10491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have not done wrong, for as sleep begins to flirt with me, a new fear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10492"></td>
        <td id="LC10492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comes: that I may have been foolish in thus depriving myself of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10493"></td>
        <td id="LC10493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power of waking. I might want it. Here comes sleep. Good-night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10494"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC10498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10499"></td>

</td>
