      <tr>
        <td id="L10500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10500"></td>
        <td id="LC10500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">JONATHAN HARKER&#39;S JOURNAL</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10501"></td>
        <td id="LC10501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10502"></td>
        <td id="LC10502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10503"></td>
        <td id="LC10503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_1 October, evening._--I found Thomas Snelling in his house at Bethnal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10504"></td>
        <td id="LC10504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Green, but unhappily he was not in a condition to remember anything. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10505"></td>
        <td id="LC10505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very prospect of beer which my expected coming had opened to him had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10506"></td>
        <td id="LC10506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proved too much, and he had begun too early on his expected debauch. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10507"></td>
        <td id="LC10507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learned, however, from his wife, who seemed a decent, poor soul, that he</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10508"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10510"></td>

        <td id="LC10512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">type of workman, and with a headpiece of his own. He remembered all</td>

        <td id="L10513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10513"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10777"></td>

        <td id="L10819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10819"></td>
        <td id="LC10819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_1 October._--I am puzzled afresh about Renfield. His moods change so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10820"></td>
        <td id="LC10820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rapidly that I find it difficult to keep touch of them, and as they</td>

        <td id="L10821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10821"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L10862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10862"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L10864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10864"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10865"></td>
        <td id="LC10865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Because he walked with God.&quot; I could not see the analogy, but did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10866"></td>
        <td id="LC10866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like to admit it; so I harked back to what he had denied:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10867"></td>
        <td id="LC10867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10868"></td>
        <td id="LC10868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;So you don&#39;t care about life and you don&#39;t want souls. Why not?&quot; I put</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10869"></td>
        <td id="LC10869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my question quickly and somewhat sternly, on purpose to disconcert him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10870"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11055"></td>
        <td id="LC11055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;MITCHELL, SONS &amp; CANDY.&quot;</td>

        <td id="L11056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11056"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11057"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11058"></td>
        <td id="LC11058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11059"></td>
        <td id="LC11059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11060"></td>
        <td id="LC11060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_2 October._--I placed a man in the corridor last night, and told him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11061"></td>
        <td id="LC11061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make an accurate note of any sound he might hear from Renfield&#39;s room,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11062"></td>
        <td id="LC11062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and gave him instructions that if there should be anything strange he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11063"></td>
        <td id="LC11063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was to call me. After dinner, when we had all gathered round the fire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11064"></td>
        <td id="LC11064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the study--Mrs. Harker having gone to bed--we discussed the attempts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11065"></td>
        <td id="LC11065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and discoveries of the day. Harker was the only one who had any result,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11066"></td>
        <td id="LC11066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and we are in great hopes that his clue may be an important one.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11067"></td>
        <td id="LC11067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11068"></td>
        <td id="LC11068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Before going to bed I went round to the patient&#39;s room and looked in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11069"></td>
        <td id="LC11069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the observation trap. He was sleeping soundly, and his heart</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11070"></td>
        <td id="LC11070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rose and fell with regular respiration.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11071"></td>
        <td id="LC11071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11072"></td>
        <td id="LC11072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This morning the man on duty reported to me that a little after midnight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11073"></td>
        <td id="LC11073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was restless and kept saying his prayers somewhat loudly. I asked him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11074"></td>
        <td id="LC11074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if that was all; he replied that it was all he heard. There was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11075"></td>
        <td id="LC11075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something about his manner so suspicious that I asked him point blank if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11076"></td>
        <td id="LC11076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he had been asleep. He denied sleep, but admitted to having &quot;dozed&quot; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11077"></td>
        <td id="LC11077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a while. It is too bad that men cannot be trusted unless they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11078"></td>
        <td id="LC11078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watched.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11079"></td>
        <td id="LC11079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11080"></td>
        <td id="LC11080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To-day Harker is out following up his clue, and Art and Quincey are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11081"></td>
        <td id="LC11081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking after horses. Godalming thinks that it will be well to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11082"></td>
        <td id="LC11082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses always in readiness, for when we get the information which we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11083"></td>
        <td id="LC11083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seek there will be no time to lose. We must sterilise all the imported</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11084"></td>
        <td id="LC11084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earth between sunrise and sunset; we shall thus catch the Count at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11085"></td>
        <td id="LC11085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weakest, and without a refuge to fly to. Van Helsing is off to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11086"></td>
        <td id="LC11086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">British Museum looking up some authorities on ancient medicine. The old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11087"></td>
        <td id="LC11087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">physicians took account of things which their followers do not accept,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11088"></td>
        <td id="LC11088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the Professor is searching for witch and demon cures which may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11089"></td>
        <td id="LC11089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">useful to us later.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11090"></td>
        <td id="LC11090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11091"></td>
        <td id="LC11091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I sometimes think we must be all mad and that we shall wake to sanity in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11092"></td>
        <td id="LC11092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strait-waistcoats.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11093"></td>
        <td id="LC11093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11094"></td>
        <td id="LC11094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11095"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11096"></td>
        <td id="LC11096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--We have met again. We seem at last to be on the track, and our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11097"></td>
        <td id="LC11097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work of to-morrow may be the beginning of the end. I wonder if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11098"></td>
        <td id="LC11098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Renfield&#39;s quiet has anything to do with this. His moods have so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11099"></td>
        <td id="LC11099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">followed the doings of the Count, that the coming destruction of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11100"></td>
        <td id="LC11100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">monster may be carried to him in some subtle way. If we could only get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11101"></td>
        <td id="LC11101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some hint as to what passed in his mind, between the time of my argument</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11102"></td>
        <td id="LC11102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with him to-day and his resumption of fly-catching, it might afford us a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11103"></td>
        <td id="LC11103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">valuable clue. He is now seemingly quiet for a spell.... Is he?---- That</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11104"></td>
        <td id="LC11104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wild yell seemed to come from his room....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11105"></td>
        <td id="LC11105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11106"></td>
        <td id="LC11106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11107"></td>
        <td id="LC11107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11108"></td>
        <td id="LC11108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The attendant came bursting into my room and told me that Renfield had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11109"></td>
        <td id="LC11109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">somehow met with some accident. He had heard him yell; and when he went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11110"></td>
        <td id="LC11110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him found him lying on his face on the floor, all covered with blood.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11111"></td>
        <td id="LC11111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I must go at once....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11112"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11116"></td>
        <td id="LC11116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXI</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11117"></td>
        <td id="LC11117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11118"></td>
        <td id="LC11118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">DR. SEWARD&#39;S DIARY</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11119"></td>
        <td id="LC11119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11120"></td>
        <td id="LC11120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11121"></td>
        <td id="LC11121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_3 October._--Let me put down with exactness all that happened, as well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11122"></td>
        <td id="LC11122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as I can remember it, since last I made an entry. Not a detail that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11123"></td>
        <td id="LC11123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can recall must be forgotten; in all calmness I must proceed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11124"></td>
        <td id="LC11124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11125"></td>
        <td id="LC11125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I came to Renfield&#39;s room I found him lying on the floor on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11126"></td>
        <td id="LC11126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left side in a glittering pool of blood. When I went to move him, it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11127"></td>
        <td id="LC11127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">became at once apparent that he had received some terrible injuries;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11128"></td>
        <td id="LC11128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there seemed none of that unity of purpose between the parts of the body</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11129"></td>
        <td id="LC11129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which marks even lethargic sanity. As the face was exposed I could see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11130"></td>
        <td id="LC11130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that it was horribly bruised, as though it had been beaten against the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11131"></td>
        <td id="LC11131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">floor--indeed it was from the face wounds that the pool of blood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11132"></td>
        <td id="LC11132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">originated. The attendant who was kneeling beside the body said to me as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11133"></td>
        <td id="LC11133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we turned him over:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11134"></td>
        <td id="LC11134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11135"></td>
        <td id="LC11135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I think, sir, his back is broken. See, both his right arm and leg and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11136"></td>
        <td id="LC11136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the whole side of his face are paralysed.&quot; How such a thing could have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11137"></td>
        <td id="LC11137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened puzzled the attendant beyond measure. He seemed quite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11138"></td>
        <td id="LC11138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bewildered, and his brows were gathered in as he said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11139"></td>
        <td id="LC11139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11140"></td>
        <td id="LC11140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I can&#39;t understand the two things. He could mark his face like that by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11141"></td>
        <td id="LC11141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beating his own head on the floor. I saw a young woman do it once at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11142"></td>
        <td id="LC11142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Eversfield Asylum before anyone could lay hands on her. And I suppose he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11143"></td>
        <td id="LC11143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might have broke his neck by falling out of bed, if he got in an awkward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11144"></td>
        <td id="LC11144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kink. But for the life of me I can&#39;t imagine how the two things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11145"></td>
        <td id="LC11145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occurred. If his back was broke, he couldn&#39;t beat his head; and if his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11146"></td>
        <td id="LC11146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face was like that before the fall out of bed, there would be marks of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11147"></td>
        <td id="LC11147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it.&quot; I said to him:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11148"></td>
        <td id="LC11148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11149"></td>
        <td id="LC11149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Go to Dr. Van Helsing, and ask him to kindly come here at once. I want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11150"></td>
        <td id="LC11150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him without an instant&#39;s delay.&quot; The man ran off, and within a few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11151"></td>
        <td id="LC11151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minutes the Professor, in his dressing gown and slippers, appeared. When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11152"></td>
        <td id="LC11152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he saw Renfield on the ground, he looked keenly at him a moment, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11153"></td>
        <td id="LC11153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then turned to me. I think he recognised my thought in my eyes, for he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11154"></td>
        <td id="LC11154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said very quietly, manifestly for the ears of the attendant:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11155"></td>
        <td id="LC11155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11156"></td>
        <td id="LC11156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah, a sad accident! He will need very careful watching, and much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11157"></td>
        <td id="LC11157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attention. I shall stay with you myself; but I shall first dress myself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11158"></td>
        <td id="LC11158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If you will remain I shall in a few minutes join you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11159"></td>
        <td id="LC11159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11160"></td>
        <td id="LC11160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The patient was now breathing stertorously and it was easy to see that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11161"></td>
        <td id="LC11161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he had suffered some terrible injury. Van Helsing returned with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11162"></td>
        <td id="LC11162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extraordinary celerity, bearing with him a surgical case. He had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11163"></td>
        <td id="LC11163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidently been thinking and had his mind made up; for, almost before he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11164"></td>
        <td id="LC11164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked at the patient, he whispered to me:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11165"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11166"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11167"></td>
        <td id="LC11167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conscious, after the operation.&quot; So I said:--</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11168"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11169"></td>
        <td id="LC11169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I think that will do now, Simmons. We have done all that we can at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC11170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present. You had better go your round, and Dr. Van Helsing will operate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11171"></td>
        <td id="LC11171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let me know instantly if there be anything unusual anywhere.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11172"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11173"></td>
        <td id="LC11173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The man withdrew, and we went into a strict examination of the patient.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11174"></td>
        <td id="LC11174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wounds of the face was superficial; the real injury was a depressed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11175"></td>
        <td id="LC11175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fracture of the skull, extending right up through the motor area. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11176"></td>
        <td id="LC11176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor thought a moment and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11177"></td>
        <td id="LC11177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11178"></td>
        <td id="LC11178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We must reduce the pressure and get back to normal conditions, as far</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11179"></td>
        <td id="LC11179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as can be; the rapidity of the suffusion shows the terrible nature of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11180"></td>
        <td id="LC11180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his injury. The whole motor area seems affected. The suffusion of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11181"></td>
        <td id="LC11181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brain will increase quickly, so we must trephine at once or it may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC11182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too late.&quot; As he was speaking there was a soft tapping at the door. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11183"></td>
        <td id="LC11183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went over and opened it and found in the corridor without, Arthur and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11184"></td>
        <td id="LC11184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quincey in pajamas and slippers: the former spoke:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11185"></td>
        <td id="LC11185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11186"></td>
        <td id="LC11186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I heard your man call up Dr. Van Helsing and tell him of an accident.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11187"></td>
        <td id="LC11187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So I woke Quincey or rather called for him as he was not asleep. Things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11188"></td>
        <td id="LC11188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are moving too quickly and too strangely for sound sleep for any of us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11189"></td>
        <td id="LC11189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these times. I&#39;ve been thinking that to-morrow night will not see things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11190"></td>
        <td id="LC11190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as they have been. We&#39;ll have to look back--and forward a little more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11191"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11192"></td>
        <td id="LC11192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till they had entered; then I closed it again. When Quincey saw the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11193"></td>
        <td id="LC11193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attitude and state of the patient, and noted the horrible pool on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11194"></td>
        <td id="LC11194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">floor, he said softly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11195"></td>
        <td id="LC11195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11196"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11200"></td>
        <td id="LC11200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in patience.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11201"></td>
        <td id="LC11201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11202"></td>
        <td id="LC11202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We shall wait,&quot; said Van Helsing, &quot;just long enough to fix the best</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11204"></td>
        <td id="LC11204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the blood clot; for it is evident that the hæmorrhage is increasing.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11205"></td>
        <td id="LC11205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11206"></td>
        <td id="LC11206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The minutes during which we waited passed with fearful slowness. I had a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11207"></td>
        <td id="LC11207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horrible sinking in my heart, and from Van Helsing&#39;s face I gathered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11208"></td>
        <td id="LC11208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he felt some fear or apprehension as to what was to come. I dreaded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11209"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC11210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but the conviction of what was coming was on me, as I have read of men</td>

        <td id="L11211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11211"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11213"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11214"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11216"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11218"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11219"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11220"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11223"></td>
        <td id="LC11223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11224"></td>
        <td id="LC11224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At last there came a time when it was evident that the patient was</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11227"></td>

        <td id="L11228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11228"></td>
        <td id="LC11228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11229"></td>
        <td id="LC11229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There is no time to lose. His words may be worth many lives; I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11230"></td>
        <td id="LC11230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been thinking so, as I stood here. It may be there is a soul at stake!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11231"></td>
        <td id="LC11231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We shall operate just above the ear.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11232"></td>
        <td id="LC11232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11233"></td>
        <td id="LC11233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Without another word he made the operation. For a few moments the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11234"></td>
        <td id="LC11234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breathing continued to be stertorous. Then there came a breath so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11235"></td>
        <td id="LC11235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prolonged that it seemed as though it would tear open his chest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11236"></td>
        <td id="LC11236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suddenly his eyes opened, and became fixed in a wild, helpless stare.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11237"></td>
        <td id="LC11237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This was continued for a few moments; then it softened into a glad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11238"></td>
        <td id="LC11238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surprise, and from the lips came a sigh of relief. He moved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11239"></td>
        <td id="LC11239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">convulsively, and as he did so, said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11240"></td>
        <td id="LC11240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11241"></td>
        <td id="LC11241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;ll be quiet, Doctor. Tell them to take off the strait-waistcoat. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11242"></td>
        <td id="LC11242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have had a terrible dream, and it has left me so weak that I cannot</td>

</td>

        <td id="L11300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11300"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11330"></td>
        <td id="LC11330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11331"></td>

        <td id="L11511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11511"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11602"></td>
        <td id="LC11602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed as if it was he who had taken the sleeping draught, and not I. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11603"></td>
        <td id="LC11603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tried, but I could not wake him. This caused me a great fear, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11604"></td>
        <td id="LC11604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked around terrified. Then indeed, my heart sank within me: beside</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11605"></td>
        <td id="LC11605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bed, as if he had stepped out of the mist--or rather as if the mist</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11606"></td>
        <td id="LC11606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had turned into his figure, for it had entirely disappeared--stood a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11607"></td>
        <td id="LC11607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tall, thin man, all in black. I knew him at once from the description of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11608"></td>
        <td id="LC11608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the others. The waxen face; the high aquiline nose, on which the light</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11609"></td>
        <td id="LC11609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fell in a thin white line; the parted red lips, with the sharp white</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11610"></td>
        <td id="LC11610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">teeth showing between; and the red eyes that I had seemed to see in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11611"></td>
        <td id="LC11611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sunset on the windows of St. Mary&#39;s Church at Whitby. I knew, too, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11612"></td>
        <td id="LC11612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">red scar on his forehead where Jonathan had struck him. For an instant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11613"></td>
        <td id="LC11613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my heart stood still, and I would have screamed out, only that I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11614"></td>
        <td id="LC11614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">paralysed. In the pause he spoke in a sort of keen, cutting whisper,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11615"></td>
        <td id="LC11615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pointing as he spoke to Jonathan:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11616"></td>
        <td id="LC11616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11617"></td>
        <td id="LC11617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;&#39;Silence! If you make a sound I shall take him and dash his brains out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11618"></td>
        <td id="LC11618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before your very eyes.&#39; I was appalled and was too bewildered to do or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11619"></td>
        <td id="LC11619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say anything. With a mocking smile, he placed one hand upon my shoulder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11620"></td>
        <td id="LC11620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, holding me tight, bared my throat with the other, saying as he did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11621"></td>
        <td id="LC11621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so, &#39;First, a little refreshment to reward my exertions. You may as well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11622"></td>
        <td id="LC11622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be quiet; it is not the first time, or the second, that your veins have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11623"></td>
        <td id="LC11623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appeased my thirst!&#39; I was bewildered, and, strangely enough, I did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11624"></td>
        <td id="LC11624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">want to hinder him. I suppose it is a part of the horrible curse that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11625"></td>
        <td id="LC11625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such is, when his touch is on his victim. And oh, my God, my God, pity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11626"></td>
        <td id="LC11626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me! He placed his reeking lips upon my throat!&quot; Her husband groaned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11627"></td>
        <td id="LC11627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again. She clasped his hand harder, and looked at him pityingly, as if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11628"></td>
        <td id="LC11628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he were the injured one, and went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11629"></td>
        <td id="LC11629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11630"></td>
        <td id="LC11630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I felt my strength fading away, and I was in a half swoon. How long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11631"></td>
        <td id="LC11631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this horrible thing lasted I know not; but it seemed that a long time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11632"></td>
        <td id="LC11632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must have passed before he took his foul, awful, sneering mouth away. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11633"></td>
        <td id="LC11633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw it drip with the fresh blood!&quot; The remembrance seemed for a while to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11634"></td>
        <td id="LC11634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overpower her, and she drooped and would have sunk down but for her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11635"></td>
        <td id="LC11635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husband&#39;s sustaining arm. With a great effort she recovered herself and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11636"></td>
        <td id="LC11636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11637"></td>
        <td id="LC11637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11638"></td>
        <td id="LC11638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then he spoke to me mockingly, &#39;And so you, like the others, would play</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11639"></td>
        <td id="LC11639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your brains against mine. You would help these men to hunt me and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11640"></td>
        <td id="LC11640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frustrate me in my designs! You know now, and they know in part already,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11641"></td>
        <td id="LC11641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and will know in full before long, what it is to cross my path. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11642"></td>
        <td id="LC11642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should have kept their energies for use closer to home. Whilst they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11643"></td>
        <td id="LC11643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">played wits against me--against me who commanded nations, and intrigued</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11644"></td>
        <td id="LC11644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for them, and fought for them, hundreds of years before they were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11645"></td>
        <td id="LC11645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">born--I was countermining them. And you, their best beloved one, are now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11646"></td>
        <td id="LC11646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me, flesh of my flesh; blood of my blood; kin of my kin; my bountiful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11647"></td>
        <td id="LC11647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wine-press for a while; and shall be later on my companion and my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11648"></td>
        <td id="LC11648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">helper. You shall be avenged in turn; for not one of them but shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11649"></td>
        <td id="LC11649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minister to your needs. But as yet you are to be punished for what you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11650"></td>
        <td id="LC11650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have done. You have aided in thwarting me; now you shall come to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11651"></td>
        <td id="LC11651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">call. When my brain says &quot;Come!&quot; to you, you shall cross land or sea to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11652"></td>
        <td id="LC11652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do my bidding; and to that end this!&#39; With that he pulled open his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11653"></td>
        <td id="LC11653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shirt, and with his long sharp nails opened a vein in his breast. When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11654"></td>
        <td id="LC11654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the blood began to spurt out, he took my hands in one of his, holding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11655"></td>
        <td id="LC11655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them tight, and with the other seized my neck and pressed my mouth to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11656"></td>
        <td id="LC11656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wound, so that I must either suffocate or swallow some of the---- Oh</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11657"></td>
        <td id="LC11657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my God! my God! what have I done? What have I done to deserve such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11658"></td>
        <td id="LC11658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fate, I who have tried to walk in meekness and righteousness all my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11659"></td>
        <td id="LC11659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">days. God pity me! Look down on a poor soul in worse than mortal peril;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11660"></td>
        <td id="LC11660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in mercy pity those to whom she is dear!&quot; Then she began to rub her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11661"></td>
        <td id="LC11661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lips as though to cleanse them from pollution.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11662"></td>
        <td id="LC11662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11663"></td>
        <td id="LC11663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As she was telling her terrible story, the eastern sky began to quicken,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11664"></td>
        <td id="LC11664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and everything became more and more clear. Harker was still and quiet;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11665"></td>
        <td id="LC11665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but over his face, as the awful narrative went on, came a grey look</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11666"></td>
        <td id="LC11666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which deepened and deepened in the morning light, till when the first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11667"></td>
        <td id="LC11667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">red streak of the coming dawn shot up, the flesh stood darkly out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11668"></td>
        <td id="LC11668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the whitening hair.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11669"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11670"></td>
        <td id="LC11670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We have arranged that one of us is to stay within call of the unhappy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11671"></td>
        <td id="LC11671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pair till we can meet together and arrange about taking action.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11672"></td>
        <td id="LC11672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11673"></td>
        <td id="LC11673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of this I am sure: the sun rises to-day on no more miserable house in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11674"></td>
        <td id="LC11674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the great round of its daily course.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11675"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11679"></td>
        <td id="LC11679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11680"></td>
        <td id="LC11680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11681"></td>
        <td id="LC11681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">JONATHAN HARKER&#39;S JOURNAL</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11682"></td>
        <td id="LC11682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11683"></td>
        <td id="LC11683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11684"></td>
        <td id="LC11684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_3 October._--As I must do something or go mad, I write this diary. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11685"></td>
        <td id="LC11685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is now six o&#39;clock, and we are to meet in the study in half an hour and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11686"></td>
        <td id="LC11686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take something to eat; for Dr. Van Helsing and Dr. Seward are agreed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11687"></td>
        <td id="LC11687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that if we do not eat we cannot work our best. Our best will be, God</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11688"></td>
        <td id="LC11688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knows, required to-day. I must keep writing at every chance, for I dare</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11689"></td>
        <td id="LC11689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not stop to think. All, big and little, must go down; perhaps at the end</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11690"></td>
        <td id="LC11690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the little things may teach us most. The teaching, big or little, could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11691"></td>
        <td id="LC11691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not have landed Mina or me anywhere worse than we are to-day. However,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11692"></td>
        <td id="LC11692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we must trust and hope. Poor Mina told me just now, with the tears</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11693"></td>
        <td id="LC11693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">running down her dear cheeks, that it is in trouble and trial that our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11694"></td>
        <td id="LC11694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faith is tested--that we must keep on trusting; and that God will aid us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11695"></td>
        <td id="LC11695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up to the end. The end! oh my God! what end?... To work! To work!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11696"></td>
        <td id="LC11696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11697"></td>
        <td id="LC11697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When Dr. Van Helsing and Dr. Seward had come back from seeing poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11698"></td>
        <td id="LC11698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Renfield, we went gravely into what was to be done. First, Dr. Seward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11699"></td>
        <td id="LC11699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told us that when he and Dr. Van Helsing had gone down to the room below</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11700"></td>
        <td id="LC11700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they had found Renfield lying on the floor, all in a heap. His face was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11701"></td>
        <td id="LC11701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all bruised and crushed in, and the bones of the neck were broken.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11702"></td>
        <td id="LC11702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11703"></td>
        <td id="LC11703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dr. Seward asked the attendant who was on duty in the passage if he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11704"></td>
        <td id="LC11704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard anything. He said that he had been sitting down--he confessed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11705"></td>
        <td id="LC11705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half dozing--when he heard loud voices in the room, and then Renfield</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11706"></td>
        <td id="LC11706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had called out loudly several times, &quot;God! God! God!&quot; after that there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11707"></td>
        <td id="LC11707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a sound of falling, and when he entered the room he found him lying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11708"></td>
        <td id="LC11708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the floor, face down, just as the doctors had seen him. Van Helsing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11709"></td>
        <td id="LC11709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asked if he had heard &quot;voices&quot; or &quot;a voice,&quot; and he said he could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11710"></td>
        <td id="LC11710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say; that at first it had seemed to him as if there were two, but as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11711"></td>
        <td id="LC11711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was no one in the room it could have been only one. He could swear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11712"></td>
        <td id="LC11712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to it, if required, that the word &quot;God&quot; was spoken by the patient. Dr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11713"></td>
        <td id="LC11713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Seward said to us, when we were alone, that he did not wish to go into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11714"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11715"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11716"></td>

        <td id="L11717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11717"></td>

        <td id="L11719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11719"></td>
        <td id="LC11719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the same result.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11720"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11721"></td>
        <td id="LC11721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the question began to be discussed as to what should be our next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11722"></td>
        <td id="LC11722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">step, the very first thing we decided was that Mina should be in full</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11723"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC11728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give me more pain than I have already endured--than I suffer now!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11729"></td>
        <td id="LC11729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whatever may happen, it must be of new hope or of new courage to me!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11730"></td>
        <td id="LC11730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing was looking at her fixedly as she spoke, and said, suddenly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11731"></td>

        <td id="L11732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11732"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11736"></td>
        <td id="LC11736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11737"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11739"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11741"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11742"></td>
        <td id="LC11742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came with direct simplicity, as though she were simply stating a fact:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11743"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11744"></td>
        <td id="LC11744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Because if I find in myself--and I shall watch keenly for it--a sign of</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11746"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11747"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11748"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11749"></td>

      <tr>
