      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11751"></td>
        <td id="LC11751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoke. He was sitting down; but now he rose and came close to her and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11752"></td>
        <td id="LC11752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put his hand on her head as he said solemnly:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11753"></td>
        <td id="LC11753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11754"></td>
        <td id="LC11754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My child, there is such an one if it were for your good. For myself I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11755"></td>
        <td id="LC11755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could hold it in my account with God to find such an euthanasia for you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11756"></td>
        <td id="LC11756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even at this moment if it were best. Nay, were it safe! But my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11757"></td>
        <td id="LC11757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">child----&quot; For a moment he seemed choked, and a great sob rose in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11758"></td>
        <td id="LC11758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throat; he gulped it down and went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11759"></td>
        <td id="LC11759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11760"></td>
        <td id="LC11760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There are here some who would stand between you and death. You must not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11761"></td>
        <td id="LC11761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">die. You must not die by any hand; but least of all by your own. Until</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11762"></td>
        <td id="LC11762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other, who has fouled your sweet life, is true dead you must not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11763"></td>
        <td id="LC11763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">die; for if he is still with the quick Un-Dead, your death would make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11764"></td>
        <td id="LC11764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you even as he is. No, you must live! You must struggle and strive to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11765"></td>
        <td id="LC11765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">live, though death would seem a boon unspeakable. You must fight Death</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11766"></td>
        <td id="LC11766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself, though he come to you in pain or in joy; by the day, or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11767"></td>
        <td id="LC11767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night; in safety or in peril! On your living soul I charge you that you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11768"></td>
        <td id="LC11768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do not die--nay, nor think of death--till this great evil be past.&quot; The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11769"></td>
        <td id="LC11769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor dear grew white as death, and shock and shivered, as I have seen a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11770"></td>
        <td id="LC11770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quicksand shake and shiver at the incoming of the tide. We were all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11771"></td>
        <td id="LC11771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silent; we could do nothing. At length she grew more calm and turning to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11772"></td>
        <td id="LC11772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him said, sweetly, but oh! so sorrowfully, as she held out her hand:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11773"></td>
        <td id="LC11773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11774"></td>
        <td id="LC11774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I promise you, my dear friend, that if God will let me live, I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11775"></td>
        <td id="LC11775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strive to do so; till, if it may be in His good time, this horror may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11776"></td>
        <td id="LC11776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have passed away from me.&quot; She was so good and brave that we all felt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11777"></td>
        <td id="LC11777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that our hearts were strengthened to work and endure for her, and we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11778"></td>
        <td id="LC11778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to discuss what we were to do. I told her that she was to have all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11779"></td>
        <td id="LC11779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the papers in the safe, and all the papers or diaries and phonographs we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11780"></td>
        <td id="LC11780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might hereafter use; and was to keep the record as she had done before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11781"></td>
        <td id="LC11781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She was pleased with the prospect of anything to do--if &quot;pleased&quot; could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11782"></td>
        <td id="LC11782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be used in connection with so grim an interest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11783"></td>
        <td id="LC11783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11966"></td>
        <td id="LC11966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, I shall not forget, for it is well that I remember; and with it I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11967"></td>
        <td id="LC11967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have so much in memory of you that is sweet, that I take it all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11968"></td>
        <td id="LC11968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together. Now, you must all be going soon. Breakfast is ready, and we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11969"></td>
        <td id="LC11969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must all eat that we may be strong.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11970"></td>
        <td id="LC11970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11971"></td>
        <td id="LC11971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Breakfast was a strange meal to us all. We tried to be cheerful and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11972"></td>
        <td id="LC11972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">encourage each other, and Mina was the brightest and most cheerful of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11973"></td>
        <td id="LC11973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us. When it was over, Van Helsing stood up and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11974"></td>
        <td id="LC11974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11975"></td>
        <td id="LC11975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now, my dear friends, we go forth to our terrible enterprise. Are we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11976"></td>
        <td id="LC11976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all armed, as we were on that night when first we visited our enemy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11977"></td>
        <td id="LC11977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lair; armed against ghostly as well as carnal attack?&quot; We all assured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11978"></td>
        <td id="LC11978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. &quot;Then it is well. Now, Madam Mina, you are in any case _quite_ safe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11979"></td>
        <td id="LC11979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here until the sunset; and before then we shall return--if---- We shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11980"></td>
        <td id="LC11980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">return! But before we go let me see you armed against personal attack. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11981"></td>
        <td id="LC11981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have myself, since you came down, prepared your chamber by the placing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11982"></td>
        <td id="LC11982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of things of which we know, so that He may not enter. Now let me guard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11983"></td>
        <td id="LC11983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yourself. On your forehead I touch this piece of Sacred Wafer in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11984"></td>
        <td id="LC11984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">name of the Father, the Son, and----&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11985"></td>
        <td id="LC11985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11986"></td>
        <td id="LC11986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a fearful scream which almost froze our hearts to hear. As he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11987"></td>
        <td id="LC11987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had placed the Wafer on Mina&#39;s forehead, it had seared it--had burned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11988"></td>
        <td id="LC11988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the flesh as though it had been a piece of white-hot metal. My poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11989"></td>
        <td id="LC11989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darling&#39;s brain had told her the significance of the fact as quickly as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11990"></td>
        <td id="LC11990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her nerves received the pain of it; and the two so overwhelmed her that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11991"></td>
        <td id="LC11991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her overwrought nature had its voice in that dreadful scream. But the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11992"></td>
        <td id="LC11992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words to her thought came quickly; the echo of the scream had not ceased</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11993"></td>
        <td id="LC11993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to ring on the air when there came the reaction, and she sank on her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11994"></td>
        <td id="LC11994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knees on the floor in an agony of abasement. Pulling her beautiful hair</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11995"></td>
        <td id="LC11995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over her face, as the leper of old his mantle, she wailed out:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11996"></td>
        <td id="LC11996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11997"></td>
        <td id="LC11997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Unclean! Unclean! Even the Almighty shuns my polluted flesh! I must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11998"></td>
        <td id="LC11998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bear this mark of shame upon my forehead until the Judgment Day.&quot; They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11999"></td>
        <td id="LC11999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all paused. I had thrown myself beside her in an agony of helpless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12000"></td>
        <td id="LC12000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grief, and putting my arms around held her tight. For a few minutes our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12001"></td>
        <td id="LC12001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sorrowful hearts beat together, whilst the friends around us turned away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12002"></td>
        <td id="LC12002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their eyes that ran tears silently. Then Van Helsing turned and said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12003"></td>
        <td id="LC12003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gravely; so gravely that I could not help feeling that he was in some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12004"></td>
        <td id="LC12004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way inspired, and was stating things outside himself:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12005"></td>
        <td id="LC12005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12006"></td>
        <td id="LC12006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It may be that you may have to bear that mark till God himself see fit,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12007"></td>
        <td id="LC12007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as He most surely shall, on the Judgment Day, to redress all wrongs of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12008"></td>
        <td id="LC12008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the earth and of His children that He has placed thereon. And oh, Madam</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12009"></td>
        <td id="LC12009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mina, my dear, my dear, may we who love you be there to see, when that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12010"></td>
        <td id="LC12010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">red scar, the sign of God&#39;s knowledge of what has been, shall pass away,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12011"></td>
        <td id="LC12011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and leave your forehead as pure as the heart we know. For so surely as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12012"></td>
        <td id="LC12012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we live, that scar shall pass away when God sees right to lift the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12013"></td>
        <td id="LC12013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burden that is hard upon us. Till then we bear our Cross, as His Son did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12014"></td>
        <td id="LC12014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in obedience to His Will. It may be that we are chosen instruments of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12015"></td>
        <td id="LC12015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His good pleasure, and that we ascend to His bidding as that other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12016"></td>
        <td id="LC12016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through stripes and shame; through tears and blood; through doubts and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12017"></td>
        <td id="LC12017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fears, and all that makes the difference between God and man.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12018"></td>
        <td id="LC12018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12019"></td>
        <td id="LC12019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was hope in his words, and comfort; and they made for resignation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12020"></td>
        <td id="LC12020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mina and I both felt so, and simultaneously we each took one of the old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12021"></td>
        <td id="LC12021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man&#39;s hands and bent over and kissed it. Then without a word we all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12022"></td>
        <td id="LC12022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knelt down together, and, all holding hands, swore to be true to each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12023"></td>
        <td id="LC12023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other. We men pledged ourselves to raise the veil of sorrow from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12024"></td>
        <td id="LC12024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head of her whom, each in his own way, we loved; and we prayed for help</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12025"></td>
        <td id="LC12025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and guidance in the terrible task which lay before us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12026"></td>
        <td id="LC12026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12027"></td>
        <td id="LC12027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was then time to start. So I said farewell to Mina, a parting which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12028"></td>
        <td id="LC12028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neither of us shall forget to our dying day; and we set out.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12029"></td>
        <td id="LC12029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12030"></td>
        <td id="LC12030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To one thing I have made up my mind: if we find out that Mina must be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12031"></td>
        <td id="LC12031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vampire in the end, then she shall not go into that unknown and terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12032"></td>
        <td id="LC12032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">land alone. I suppose it is thus that in old times one vampire meant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12033"></td>
        <td id="LC12033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many; just as their hideous bodies could only rest in sacred earth, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12034"></td>
        <td id="LC12034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the holiest love was the recruiting sergeant for their ghastly ranks.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12035"></td>
        <td id="LC12035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12036"></td>
        <td id="LC12036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We entered Carfax without trouble and found all things the same as on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12037"></td>
        <td id="LC12037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the first occasion. It was hard to believe that amongst so prosaic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12038"></td>
        <td id="LC12038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surroundings of neglect and dust and decay there was any ground for such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12039"></td>
        <td id="LC12039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear as already we knew. Had not our minds been made up, and had there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12040"></td>
        <td id="LC12040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not been terrible memories to spur us on, we could hardly have proceeded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12041"></td>
        <td id="LC12041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with our task. We found no papers, or any sign of use in the house; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12042"></td>
        <td id="LC12042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the old chapel the great boxes looked just as we had seen them last.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12043"></td>
        <td id="LC12043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dr. Van Helsing said to us solemnly as we stood before them:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12044"></td>
        <td id="LC12044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12045"></td>
        <td id="LC12045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And now, my friends, we have a duty here to do. We must sterilise this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12046"></td>
        <td id="LC12046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earth, so sacred of holy memories, that he has brought from a far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12047"></td>
        <td id="LC12047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distant land for such fell use. He has chosen this earth because it has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12048"></td>
        <td id="LC12048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been holy. Thus we defeat him with his own weapon, for we make it more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12049"></td>
        <td id="LC12049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">holy still. It was sanctified to such use of man, now we sanctify it to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12050"></td>
        <td id="LC12050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">God.&quot; As he spoke he took from his bag a screwdriver and a wrench, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12051"></td>
        <td id="LC12051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very soon the top of one of the cases was thrown open. The earth smelled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12052"></td>
        <td id="LC12052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">musty and close; but we did not somehow seem to mind, for our attention</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12053"></td>
        <td id="LC12053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was concentrated on the Professor. Taking from his box a piece of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12054"></td>
        <td id="LC12054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sacred Wafer he laid it reverently on the earth, and then shutting down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12055"></td>
        <td id="LC12055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lid began to screw it home, we aiding him as he worked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12056"></td>
        <td id="LC12056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12057"></td>
        <td id="LC12057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One by one we treated in the same way each of the great boxes, and left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12058"></td>
        <td id="LC12058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them as we had found them to all appearance; but in each was a portion</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12059"></td>
        <td id="LC12059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Host.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12061"></td>

        <td id="L12062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12062"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12063"></td>

        <td id="L12081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12081"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L12135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12135"></td>

        <td id="L12138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12138"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L12139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12139"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12140"></td>
        <td id="LC12140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with, and as yet we did not know whether the Count might not be in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12141"></td>
        <td id="LC12141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house. In the dining-room, which lay at the back of the hall, we found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12142"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12143"></td>
        <td id="LC12143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Our work was not over, and would never be until we should have found the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12144"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12145"></td>
        <td id="LC12145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">across a narrow stone-flagged yard at the blank face of a stable,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12146"></td>
        <td id="LC12146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pointed to look like the front of a miniature house. There were no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12147"></td>
        <td id="LC12147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">windows in it, so we were not afraid of being over-looked. We did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12148"></td>
        <td id="LC12148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lose any time in examining the chests. With the tools which we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12149"></td>
        <td id="LC12149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought with us we opened them, one by one, and treated them as we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12150"></td>
        <td id="LC12150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treated those others in the old chapel. It was evident to us that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12151"></td>
        <td id="LC12151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Count was not at present in the house, and we proceeded to search for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12152"></td>
        <td id="LC12152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any of his effects.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12153"></td>
        <td id="LC12153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12154"></td>
        <td id="LC12154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a cursory glance at the rest of the rooms, from basement to attic,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12155"></td>
        <td id="LC12155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we came to the conclusion that the dining-room contained any effects</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12156"></td>
        <td id="LC12156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which might belong to the Count; and so we proceeded to minutely examine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12157"></td>
        <td id="LC12157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them. They lay in a sort of orderly disorder on the great dining-room</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12158"></td>
        <td id="LC12158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">table. There were title deeds of the Piccadilly house in a great bundle;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12159"></td>
        <td id="LC12159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deeds of the purchase of the houses at Mile End and Bermondsey;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12160"></td>
        <td id="LC12160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">note-paper, envelopes, and pens and ink. All were covered up in thin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12161"></td>
        <td id="LC12161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrapping paper to keep them from the dust. There were also a clothes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12162"></td>
        <td id="LC12162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brush, a brush and comb, and a jug and basin--the latter containing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12163"></td>
        <td id="LC12163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dirty water which was reddened as if with blood. Last of all was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12164"></td>
        <td id="LC12164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little heap of keys of all sorts and sizes, probably those belonging to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12165"></td>
        <td id="LC12165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other houses. When we had examined this last find, Lord Godalming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12166"></td>
        <td id="LC12166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Quincey Morris taking accurate notes of the various addresses of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12167"></td>
        <td id="LC12167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">houses in the East and the South, took with them the keys in a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12168"></td>
        <td id="LC12168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bunch, and set out to destroy the boxes in these places. The rest of us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12169"></td>
        <td id="LC12169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are, with what patience we can, waiting their return--or the coming of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12170"></td>
        <td id="LC12170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Count.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12171"></td>
        <td id="LC12171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12172"></td>
        <td id="LC12172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12173"></td>
        <td id="LC12173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12174"></td>
        <td id="LC12174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12175"></td>
        <td id="LC12175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12176"></td>
        <td id="LC12176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12177"></td>
        <td id="LC12177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">DR. SEWARD&#39;S DIARY</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12178"></td>
        <td id="LC12178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12179"></td>
        <td id="LC12179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12180"></td>
        <td id="LC12180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_3 October._--The time seemed terrible long whilst we were waiting for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12181"></td>
        <td id="LC12181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the coming of Godalming and Quincey Morris. The Professor tried to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12182"></td>
        <td id="LC12182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our minds active by using them all the time. I could see his beneficent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12183"></td>
        <td id="LC12183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purpose, by the side glances which he threw from time to time at Harker.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12184"></td>
        <td id="LC12184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The poor fellow is overwhelmed in a misery that is appalling to see.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12185"></td>
        <td id="LC12185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Last night he was a frank, happy-looking man, with strong, youthful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12186"></td>
        <td id="LC12186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face, full of energy, and with dark brown hair. To-day he is a drawn,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12187"></td>
        <td id="LC12187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">haggard old man, whose white hair matches well with the hollow burning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12188"></td>
        <td id="LC12188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes and grief-written lines of his face. His energy is still intact; in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12189"></td>
        <td id="LC12189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fact, he is like a living flame. This may yet be his salvation, for, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12190"></td>
        <td id="LC12190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all go well, it will tide him over the despairing period; he will then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12191"></td>
        <td id="LC12191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a kind of way, wake again to the realities of life. Poor fellow, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12192"></td>
        <td id="LC12192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought my own trouble was bad enough, but his----! The Professor knows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12193"></td>
        <td id="LC12193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this well enough, and is doing his best to keep his mind active. What he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12194"></td>
        <td id="LC12194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has been saying was, under the circumstances, of absorbing interest. So</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12195"></td>
        <td id="LC12195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well as I can remember, here it is:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12196"></td>
        <td id="LC12196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12197"></td>
        <td id="LC12197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have studied, over and over again since they came into my hands, all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12198"></td>
        <td id="LC12198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the papers relating to this monster; and the more I have studied, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12199"></td>
        <td id="LC12199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greater seems the necessity to utterly stamp him out. All through there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12200"></td>
        <td id="LC12200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are signs of his advance; not only of his power, but of his knowledge of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12201"></td>
        <td id="LC12201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. As I learned from the researches of my friend Arminus of Buda-Pesth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12202"></td>
        <td id="LC12202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was in life a most wonderful man. Soldier, statesman, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12203"></td>
        <td id="LC12203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alchemist--which latter was the highest development of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12204"></td>
        <td id="LC12204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">science-knowledge of his time. He had a mighty brain, a learning beyond</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12205"></td>
        <td id="LC12205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compare, and a heart that knew no fear and no remorse. He dared even to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12206"></td>
        <td id="LC12206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attend the Scholomance, and there was no branch of knowledge of his time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12207"></td>
        <td id="LC12207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he did not essay. Well, in him the brain powers survived the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12208"></td>
        <td id="LC12208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">physical death; though it would seem that memory was not all complete.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12209"></td>
        <td id="LC12209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In some faculties of mind he has been, and is, only a child; but he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12210"></td>
        <td id="LC12210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">growing, and some things that were childish at the first are now of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12211"></td>
        <td id="LC12211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man&#39;s stature. He is experimenting, and doing it well; and if it had not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12212"></td>
        <td id="LC12212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been that we have crossed his path he would be yet--he may be yet if we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12213"></td>
        <td id="LC12213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fail--the father or furtherer of a new order of beings, whose road must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12214"></td>
        <td id="LC12214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lead through Death, not Life.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12215"></td>
        <td id="LC12215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12216"></td>
        <td id="LC12216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harker groaned and said, &quot;And this is all arrayed against my darling!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12217"></td>
        <td id="LC12217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But how is he experimenting? The knowledge may help us to defeat him!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12218"></td>
        <td id="LC12218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12219"></td>
        <td id="LC12219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;He has all along, since his coming, been trying his power, slowly but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12220"></td>
        <td id="LC12220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surely; that big child-brain of his is working. Well for us, it is, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12221"></td>
        <td id="LC12221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet, a child-brain; for had he dared, at the first, to attempt certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12222"></td>
        <td id="LC12222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things he would long ago have been beyond our power. However, he means</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12223"></td>
        <td id="LC12223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to succeed, and a man who has centuries before him can afford to wait</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12224"></td>
        <td id="LC12224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to go slow. _Festina lente_ may well be his motto.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12225"></td>
        <td id="LC12225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12226"></td>
        <td id="LC12226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I fail to understand,&quot; said Harker wearily. &quot;Oh, do be more plain to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12227"></td>
        <td id="LC12227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me! Perhaps grief and trouble are dulling my brain.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12228"></td>
        <td id="LC12228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12229"></td>
        <td id="LC12229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Professor laid his hand tenderly on his shoulder as he spoke:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12230"></td>
        <td id="LC12230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12231"></td>
        <td id="LC12231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah, my child, I will be plain. Do you not see how, of late, this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12232"></td>
        <td id="LC12232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">monster has been creeping into knowledge experimentally. How he has been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12233"></td>
        <td id="LC12233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">making use of the zoöphagous patient to effect his entry into friend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12234"></td>
        <td id="LC12234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">John&#39;s home; for your Vampire, though in all afterwards he can come when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12235"></td>
        <td id="LC12235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and how he will, must at the first make entry only when asked thereto by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12236"></td>
        <td id="LC12236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an inmate. But these are not his most important experiments. Do we not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12237"></td>
        <td id="LC12237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see how at the first all these so great boxes were moved by others. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12238"></td>
        <td id="LC12238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew not then but that must be so. But all the time that so great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12239"></td>
        <td id="LC12239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">child-brain of his was growing, and he began to consider whether he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12240"></td>
        <td id="LC12240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might not himself move the box. So he began to help; and then, when he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12241"></td>
        <td id="LC12241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found that this be all-right, he try to move them all alone. And so he</td>

        <td id="L12242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12242"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12332"></td>
        <td id="LC12332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been the one to arrange the plan of action, and Arthur and I had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12333"></td>
        <td id="LC12333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accustomed to obey him implicitly. Now, the old habit seemed to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12334"></td>
        <td id="LC12334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">renewed instinctively. With a swift glance around the room, he at once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12335"></td>
        <td id="LC12335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laid out our plan of attack, and, without speaking a word, with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12336"></td>
        <td id="LC12336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gesture, placed us each in position. Van Helsing, Harker, and I were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12337"></td>
        <td id="LC12337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just behind the door, so that when it was opened the Professor could</td>

        <td id="L12338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12338"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12339"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12345"></td>
        <td id="LC12345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suddenly with a single bound he leaped into the room, winning a way past</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12346"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12381"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12385"></td>
        <td id="LC12385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You think to baffle me, you--with your pale faces all in a row, like</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC12388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just begun! I spread it over centuries, and time is on my side. Your</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12389"></td>
        <td id="LC12389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girls that you all love are mine already; and through them you and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12390"></td>
        <td id="LC12390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others shall yet be mine--my creatures, to do my bidding and to be my</td>

        <td id="L12396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12396"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12397"></td>

        <td id="L12399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12399"></td>

        <td id="L12406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12406"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12413"></td>
        <td id="LC12413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was now late in the afternoon, and sunset was not far off. We had to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12414"></td>
        <td id="LC12414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recognise that our game was up; with heavy hearts we agreed with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12415"></td>
        <td id="LC12415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor when he said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12416"></td>
        <td id="LC12416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12417"></td>
        <td id="LC12417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Let us go back to Madam Mina--poor, poor dear Madam Mina. All we can do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12418"></td>
        <td id="LC12418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just now is done; and we can there, at least, protect her. But we need</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12419"></td>
        <td id="LC12419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not despair. There is but one more earth-box, and we must try to find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12420"></td>
        <td id="LC12420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it; when that is done all may yet be well.&quot; I could see that he spoke as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12421"></td>
        <td id="LC12421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bravely as he could to comfort Harker. The poor fellow was quite broken</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12422"></td>
