      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12513"></td>
        <td id="LC12513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to bed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12514"></td>
        <td id="LC12514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12515"></td>
        <td id="LC12515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12516"></td>
        <td id="LC12516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Jonathan Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12517"></td>
        <td id="LC12517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12518"></td>
        <td id="LC12518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_3-4 October, close to midnight._--I thought yesterday would never end.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12519"></td>
        <td id="LC12519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was over me a yearning for sleep, in some sort of blind belief</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12520"></td>
        <td id="LC12520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that to wake would be to find things changed, and that any change must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12521"></td>
        <td id="LC12521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now be for the better. Before we parted, we discussed what our next step</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12522"></td>
        <td id="LC12522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was to be, but we could arrive at no result. All we knew was that one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12523"></td>
        <td id="LC12523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earth-box remained, and that the Count alone knew where it was. If he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12524"></td>
        <td id="LC12524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chooses to lie hidden, he may baffle us for years; and in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12525"></td>
        <td id="LC12525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meantime!--the thought is too horrible, I dare not think of it even now.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12526"></td>
        <td id="LC12526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This I know: that if ever there was a woman who was all perfection, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12527"></td>
        <td id="LC12527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one is my poor wronged darling. I love her a thousand times more for her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12528"></td>
        <td id="LC12528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sweet pity of last night, a pity that made my own hate of the monster</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12529"></td>
        <td id="LC12529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seem despicable. Surely God will not permit the world to be the poorer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12530"></td>
        <td id="LC12530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by the loss of such a creature. This is hope to me. We are all drifting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12531"></td>
        <td id="LC12531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reefwards now, and faith is our only anchor. Thank God! Mina is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12532"></td>
        <td id="LC12532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleeping, and sleeping without dreams. I fear what her dreams might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12533"></td>
        <td id="LC12533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like, with such terrible memories to ground them in. She has not been so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12534"></td>
        <td id="LC12534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">calm, within my seeing, since the sunset. Then, for a while, there came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12535"></td>
        <td id="LC12535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over her face a repose which was like spring after the blasts of March.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12536"></td>
        <td id="LC12536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I thought at the time that it was the softness of the red sunset on her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12537"></td>
        <td id="LC12537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face, but somehow now I think it has a deeper meaning. I am not sleepy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12538"></td>
        <td id="LC12538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself, though I am weary--weary to death. However, I must try to sleep;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12539"></td>
        <td id="LC12539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for there is to-morrow to think of, and there is no rest for me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12540"></td>
        <td id="LC12540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">until....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12541"></td>
        <td id="LC12541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12542"></td>
        <td id="LC12542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12543"></td>
        <td id="LC12543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12544"></td>
        <td id="LC12544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--I must have fallen asleep, for I was awaked by Mina, who was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12545"></td>
        <td id="LC12545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sitting up in bed, with a startled look on her face. I could see easily,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12546"></td>
        <td id="LC12546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for we did not leave the room in darkness; she had placed a warning hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12547"></td>
        <td id="LC12547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over my mouth, and now she whispered in my ear:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12548"></td>
        <td id="LC12548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12549"></td>
        <td id="LC12549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hush! there is someone in the corridor!&quot; I got up softly, and crossing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12550"></td>
        <td id="LC12550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the room, gently opened the door.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12551"></td>
        <td id="LC12551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12552"></td>
        <td id="LC12552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just outside, stretched on a mattress, lay Mr. Morris, wide awake. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12553"></td>
        <td id="LC12553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">raised a warning hand for silence as he whispered to me:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12554"></td>
        <td id="LC12554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12555"></td>
        <td id="LC12555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hush! go back to bed; it is all right. One of us will be here all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12556"></td>
        <td id="LC12556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night. We don&#39;t mean to take any chances!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12557"></td>
        <td id="LC12557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12558"></td>
        <td id="LC12558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His look and gesture forbade discussion, so I came back and told Mina.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12559"></td>
        <td id="LC12559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She sighed and positively a shadow of a smile stole over her poor, pale</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12560"></td>
        <td id="LC12560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face as she put her arms round me and said softly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12561"></td>
        <td id="LC12561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12562"></td>
        <td id="LC12562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, thank God for good brave men!&quot; With a sigh she sank back again to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12563"></td>
        <td id="LC12563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep. I write this now as I am not sleepy, though I must try again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12564"></td>
        <td id="LC12564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12565"></td>
        <td id="LC12565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12566"></td>
        <td id="LC12566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12567"></td>
        <td id="LC12567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_4 October, morning._--Once again during the night I was wakened by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12568"></td>
        <td id="LC12568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mina. This time we had all had a good sleep, for the grey of the coming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12569"></td>
        <td id="LC12569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dawn was making the windows into sharp oblongs, and the gas flame was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12570"></td>
        <td id="LC12570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like a speck rather than a disc of light. She said to me hurriedly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12571"></td>
        <td id="LC12571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12572"></td>
        <td id="LC12572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Go, call the Professor. I want to see him at once.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12573"></td>
        <td id="LC12573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12574"></td>
        <td id="LC12574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why?&quot; I asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12575"></td>
        <td id="LC12575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12576"></td>
        <td id="LC12576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have an idea. I suppose it must have come in the night, and matured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12577"></td>
        <td id="LC12577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without my knowing it. He must hypnotise me before the dawn, and then I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12578"></td>
        <td id="LC12578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall be able to speak. Go quick, dearest; the time is getting close.&quot; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12579"></td>
        <td id="LC12579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went to the door. Dr. Seward was resting on the mattress, and, seeing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12580"></td>
        <td id="LC12580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, he sprang to his feet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12581"></td>
        <td id="LC12581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12582"></td>
        <td id="LC12582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Is anything wrong?&quot; he asked, in alarm.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12583"></td>
        <td id="LC12583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12584"></td>
        <td id="LC12584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No,&quot; I replied; &quot;but Mina wants to see Dr. Van Helsing at once.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12585"></td>
        <td id="LC12585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12586"></td>
        <td id="LC12586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I will go,&quot; he said, and hurried into the Professor&#39;s room.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12587"></td>
        <td id="LC12587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12588"></td>
        <td id="LC12588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In two or three minutes later Van Helsing was in the room in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12589"></td>
        <td id="LC12589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dressing-gown, and Mr. Morris and Lord Godalming were with Dr. Seward at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12590"></td>
        <td id="LC12590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the door asking questions. When the Professor saw Mina a smile--a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12591"></td>
        <td id="LC12591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">positive smile ousted the anxiety of his face; he rubbed his hands as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12592"></td>
        <td id="LC12592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12593"></td>
        <td id="LC12593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12594"></td>
        <td id="LC12594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, my dear Madam Mina, this is indeed a change. See! friend Jonathan,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12595"></td>
        <td id="LC12595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we have got our dear Madam Mina, as of old, back to us to-day!&quot; Then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12596"></td>
        <td id="LC12596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turning to her, he said, cheerfully: &quot;And what am I do for you? For at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12597"></td>
        <td id="LC12597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this hour you do not want me for nothings.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12598"></td>
        <td id="LC12598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12599"></td>
        <td id="LC12599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I want you to hypnotise me!&quot; she said. &quot;Do it before the dawn, for I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12600"></td>
        <td id="LC12600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel that then I can speak, and speak freely. Be quick, for the time is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12601"></td>
        <td id="LC12601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">short!&quot; Without a word he motioned her to sit up in bed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12602"></td>
        <td id="LC12602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12603"></td>
        <td id="LC12603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Looking fixedly at her, he commenced to make passes in front of her,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12604"></td>
        <td id="LC12604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from over the top of her head downward, with each hand in turn. Mina</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12605"></td>
        <td id="LC12605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gazed at him fixedly for a few minutes, during which my own heart beat</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12697"></td>
        <td id="LC12697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us.&quot; Mina looked at him appealingly as she asked:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12698"></td>
        <td id="LC12698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12699"></td>
        <td id="LC12699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But why need we seek him further, when he is gone away from us?&quot; He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12700"></td>
        <td id="LC12700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took her hand and patted it as he replied:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12701"></td>
        <td id="LC12701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12702"></td>
        <td id="LC12702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ask me nothings as yet. When we have breakfast, then I answer all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12703"></td>
        <td id="LC12703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">questions.&quot; He would say no more, and we separated to dress.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12704"></td>
        <td id="LC12704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12705"></td>
        <td id="LC12705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After breakfast Mina repeated her question. He looked at her gravely for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12706"></td>
        <td id="LC12706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a minute and then said sorrowfully:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12707"></td>
        <td id="LC12707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12708"></td>
        <td id="LC12708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Because my dear, dear Madam Mina, now more than ever must we find him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12709"></td>
        <td id="LC12709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even if we have to follow him to the jaws of Hell!&quot; She grew paler as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12710"></td>
        <td id="LC12710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she asked faintly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12711"></td>
        <td id="LC12711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12712"></td>
        <td id="LC12712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12713"></td>
        <td id="LC12713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12714"></td>
        <td id="LC12714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Because,&quot; he answered solemnly, &quot;he can live for centuries, and you are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12715"></td>
        <td id="LC12715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but mortal woman. Time is now to be dreaded--since once he put that mark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12716"></td>
        <td id="LC12716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon your throat.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12717"></td>
        <td id="LC12717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12718"></td>
        <td id="LC12718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was just in time to catch her as she fell forward in a faint.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12719"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L12723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12723"></td>
        <td id="LC12723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXIV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12724"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12725"></td>
        <td id="LC12725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">DR. SEWARD&#39;S PHONOGRAPH DIARY, SPOKEN BY VAN HELSING</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12726"></td>
        <td id="LC12726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12727"></td>
        <td id="LC12727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12728"></td>
        <td id="LC12728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This to Jonathan Harker.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12729"></td>
        <td id="LC12729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12730"></td>
        <td id="LC12730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You are to stay with your dear Madam Mina. We shall go to make our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12731"></td>
        <td id="LC12731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">search--if I can call it so, for it is not search but knowing, and we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12732"></td>
        <td id="LC12732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seek confirmation only. But do you stay and take care of her to-day.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12733"></td>
        <td id="LC12733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This is your best and most holiest office. This day nothing can find him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12734"></td>
        <td id="LC12734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here. Let me tell you that so you will know what we four know already,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12735"></td>
        <td id="LC12735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for I have tell them. He, our enemy, have gone away; he have gone back</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12736"></td>
        <td id="LC12736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to his Castle in Transylvania. I know it so well, as if a great hand of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12737"></td>
        <td id="LC12737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fire wrote it on the wall. He have prepare for this in some way, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12738"></td>
        <td id="LC12738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that last earth-box was ready to ship somewheres. For this he took the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12739"></td>
        <td id="LC12739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">money; for this he hurry at the last, lest we catch him before the sun</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12740"></td>
        <td id="LC12740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go down. It was his last hope, save that he might hide in the tomb that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12741"></td>
        <td id="LC12741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he think poor Miss Lucy, being as he thought like him, keep open to him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12742"></td>
        <td id="LC12742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But there was not of time. When that fail he make straight for his last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12743"></td>
        <td id="LC12743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resource--his last earth-work I might say did I wish _double entente_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12744"></td>
        <td id="LC12744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He is clever, oh, so clever! he know that his game here was finish; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12745"></td>
        <td id="LC12745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so he decide he go back home. He find ship going by the route he came,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12746"></td>
        <td id="LC12746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he go in it. We go off now to find what ship, and whither bound;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12747"></td>
        <td id="LC12747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when we have discover that, we come back and tell you all. Then we will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12748"></td>
        <td id="LC12748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comfort you and poor dear Madam Mina with new hope. For it will be hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12749"></td>
        <td id="LC12749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when you think it over: that all is not lost. This very creature that we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12750"></td>
        <td id="LC12750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pursue, he take hundreds of years to get so far as London; and yet in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12751"></td>
        <td id="LC12751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one day, when we know of the disposal of him we drive him out. He is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12752"></td>
        <td id="LC12752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finite, though he is powerful to do much harm and suffers not as we do.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12753"></td>
        <td id="LC12753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But we are strong, each in our purpose; and we are all more strong</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12754"></td>
        <td id="LC12754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together. Take heart afresh, dear husband of Madam Mina. This battle is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12755"></td>
        <td id="LC12755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but begun, and in the end we shall win--so sure as that God sits on high</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12756"></td>
        <td id="LC12756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to watch over His children. Therefore be of much comfort till we return.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12757"></td>
        <td id="LC12757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12758"></td>
        <td id="LC12758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">VAN HELSING.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12759"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12760"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12761"></td>
        <td id="LC12761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Jonathan Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12762"></td>
        <td id="LC12762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12763"></td>
        <td id="LC12763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_4 October._--When I read to Mina, Van Helsing&#39;s message in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12764"></td>
        <td id="LC12764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">phonograph, the poor girl brightened up considerably. Already the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12765"></td>
        <td id="LC12765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainty that the Count is out of the country has given her comfort;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12766"></td>
        <td id="LC12766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and comfort is strength to her. For my own part, now that his horrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12767"></td>
        <td id="LC12767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">danger is not face to face with us, it seems almost impossible to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12768"></td>
        <td id="LC12768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believe in it. Even my own terrible experiences in Castle Dracula seem</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12769"></td>
        <td id="LC12769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like a long-forgotten dream. Here in the crisp autumn air in the bright</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12770"></td>
        <td id="LC12770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sunlight----</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12771"></td>
        <td id="LC12771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12772"></td>
        <td id="LC12772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Alas! how can I disbelieve! In the midst of my thought my eye fell on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12773"></td>
        <td id="LC12773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the red scar on my poor darling&#39;s white forehead. Whilst that lasts,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12774"></td>
        <td id="LC12774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there can be no disbelief. And afterwards the very memory of it will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12775"></td>
        <td id="LC12775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keep faith crystal clear. Mina and I fear to be idle, so we have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12776"></td>
        <td id="LC12776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over all the diaries again and again. Somehow, although the reality</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12777"></td>
        <td id="LC12777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seems greater each time, the pain and the fear seem less. There is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12778"></td>
        <td id="LC12778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something of a guiding purpose manifest throughout, which is comforting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12779"></td>
        <td id="LC12779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mina says that perhaps we are the instruments of ultimate good. It may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12780"></td>
        <td id="LC12780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be! I shall try to think as she does. We have never spoken to each other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12781"></td>
        <td id="LC12781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet of the future. It is better to wait till we see the Professor and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12782"></td>
        <td id="LC12782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the others after their investigations.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12783"></td>
        <td id="LC12783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12784"></td>
        <td id="LC12784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The day is running by more quickly than I ever thought a day could run</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12785"></td>
        <td id="LC12785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for me again. It is now three o&#39;clock.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12786"></td>
        <td id="LC12786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12787"></td>
        <td id="LC12787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12788"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12789"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12790"></td>
        <td id="LC12790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_5 October, 5 p. m._--Our meeting for report. Present: Professor Van</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12791"></td>
        <td id="LC12791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helsing, Lord Godalming, Dr. Seward, Mr. Quincey Morris, Jonathan</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12792"></td>
        <td id="LC12792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harker, Mina Harker.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12793"></td>
        <td id="LC12793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12794"></td>
        <td id="LC12794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dr. Van Helsing described what steps were taken during the day to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12795"></td>
        <td id="LC12795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discover on what boat and whither bound Count Dracula made his escape:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12796"></td>
        <td id="LC12796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12797"></td>
        <td id="LC12797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;As I knew that he wanted to get back to Transylvania, I felt sure that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12798"></td>
        <td id="LC12798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he must go by the Danube mouth; or by somewhere in the Black Sea, since</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12799"></td>
        <td id="LC12799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by that way he come. It was a dreary blank that was before us. _Omne</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12800"></td>
        <td id="LC12800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ignotum pro magnifico_; and so with heavy hearts we start to find what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12801"></td>
        <td id="LC12801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ships leave for the Black Sea last night. He was in sailing ship, since</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12802"></td>
        <td id="LC12802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madam Mina tell of sails being set. These not so important as to go in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12803"></td>
        <td id="LC12803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your list of the shipping in the _Times_, and so we go, by suggestion of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12804"></td>
        <td id="LC12804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lord Godalming, to your Lloyd&#39;s, where are note of all ships that sail,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12805"></td>
        <td id="LC12805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however so small. There we find that only one Black-Sea-bound ship go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12806"></td>
        <td id="LC12806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out with the tide. She is the _Czarina Catherine_, and she sail from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12807"></td>
        <td id="LC12807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Doolittle&#39;s Wharf for Varna, and thence on to other parts and up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12808"></td>
        <td id="LC12808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Danube. &#39;Soh!&#39; said I, &#39;this is the ship whereon is the Count.&#39; So off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12809"></td>
        <td id="LC12809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we go to Doolittle&#39;s Wharf, and there we find a man in an office of wood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12810"></td>
        <td id="LC12810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so small that the man look bigger than the office. From him we inquire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12811"></td>
        <td id="LC12811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the goings of the _Czarina Catherine_. He swear much, and he red face</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12812"></td>
        <td id="LC12812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and loud of voice, but he good fellow all the same; and when Quincey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12813"></td>
        <td id="LC12813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give him something from his pocket which crackle as he roll it up, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12814"></td>
        <td id="LC12814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put it in a so small bag which he have hid deep in his clothing, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12815"></td>
        <td id="LC12815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still better fellow and humble servant to us. He come with us, and ask</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12816"></td>
        <td id="LC12816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many men who are rough and hot; these be better fellows too when they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12817"></td>
        <td id="LC12817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been no more thirsty. They say much of blood and bloom, and of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12818"></td>
        <td id="LC12818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others which I comprehend not, though I guess what they mean; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12819"></td>
        <td id="LC12819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nevertheless they tell us all things which we want to know.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12820"></td>
        <td id="LC12820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12821"></td>
        <td id="LC12821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;They make known to us among them, how last afternoon at about five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12822"></td>
        <td id="LC12822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">o&#39;clock comes a man so hurry. A tall man, thin and pale, with high nose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12823"></td>
        <td id="LC12823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and teeth so white, and eyes that seem to be burning. That he be all in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12824"></td>
        <td id="LC12824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">black, except that he have a hat of straw which suit not him or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12825"></td>
        <td id="LC12825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time. That he scatter his money in making quick inquiry as to what ship</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12826"></td>
        <td id="LC12826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sails for the Black Sea and for where. Some took him to the office and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12827"></td>
        <td id="LC12827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then to the ship, where he will not go aboard but halt at shore end of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12828"></td>
        <td id="LC12828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gang-plank, and ask that the captain come to him. The captain come, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12829"></td>
        <td id="LC12829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told that he will be pay well; and though he swear much at the first he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12830"></td>
        <td id="LC12830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agree to term. Then the thin man go and some one tell him where horse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12831"></td>
        <td id="LC12831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and cart can be hired. He go there and soon he come again, himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12832"></td>
        <td id="LC12832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">driving cart on which a great box; this he himself lift down, though it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12833"></td>
        <td id="LC12833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take several to put it on truck for the ship. He give much talk to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12834"></td>
        <td id="LC12834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">captain as to how and where his box is to be place; but the captain like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12835"></td>
        <td id="LC12835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it not and swear at him in many tongues, and tell him that if he like he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12836"></td>
        <td id="LC12836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can come and see where it shall be. But he say &#39;no&#39;; that he come not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12837"></td>
        <td id="LC12837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet, for that he have much to do. Whereupon the captain tell him that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12838"></td>
        <td id="LC12838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had better be quick--with blood--for that his ship will leave the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12839"></td>
        <td id="LC12839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place--of blood--before the turn of the tide--with blood. Then the thin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12840"></td>
        <td id="LC12840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man smile and say that of course he must go when he think fit; but he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12841"></td>
        <td id="LC12841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be surprise if he go quite so soon. The captain swear again,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12842"></td>
        <td id="LC12842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">polyglot, and the thin man make him bow, and thank him, and say that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12843"></td>
        <td id="LC12843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will so far intrude on his kindness as to come aboard before the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12844"></td>
        <td id="LC12844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sailing. Final the captain, more red than ever, and in more tongues tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12845"></td>
        <td id="LC12845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him that he doesn&#39;t want no Frenchmen--with bloom upon them and also</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12846"></td>
        <td id="LC12846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with blood--in his ship--with blood on her also. And so, after asking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12847"></td>
        <td id="LC12847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where there might be close at hand a ship where he might purchase ship</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12848"></td>
        <td id="LC12848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forms, he departed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12849"></td>
        <td id="LC12849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12850"></td>
        <td id="LC12850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No one knew where he went &#39;or bloomin&#39; well cared,&#39; as they said, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12851"></td>
        <td id="LC12851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they had something else to think of--well with blood again; for it soon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12852"></td>
        <td id="LC12852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">became apparent to all that the _Czarina Catherine_ would not sail as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12853"></td>
        <td id="LC12853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was expected. A thin mist began to creep up from the river, and it grew,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12854"></td>
        <td id="LC12854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and grew; till soon a dense fog enveloped the ship and all around her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12855"></td>
        <td id="LC12855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The captain swore polyglot--very polyglot--polyglot with bloom and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12856"></td>
        <td id="LC12856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blood; but he could do nothing. The water rose and rose; and he began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12857"></td>
        <td id="LC12857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear that he would lose the tide altogether. He was in no friendly mood,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12858"></td>
        <td id="LC12858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when just at full tide, the thin man came up the gang-plank again and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12859"></td>
        <td id="LC12859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asked to see where his box had been stowed. Then the captain replied</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12860"></td>
        <td id="LC12860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he wished that he and his box--old and with much bloom and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12861"></td>
        <td id="LC12861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blood--were in hell. But the thin man did not be offend, and went down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12862"></td>
        <td id="LC12862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the mate and saw where it was place, and came up and stood awhile</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12863"></td>
        <td id="LC12863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on deck in fog. He must have come off by himself, for none notice him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12864"></td>
        <td id="LC12864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Indeed they thought not of him; for soon the fog begin to melt away, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12865"></td>
        <td id="LC12865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all was clear again. My friends of the thirst and the language that was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12866"></td>
        <td id="LC12866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of bloom and blood laughed, as they told how the captain&#39;s swears</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12867"></td>
        <td id="LC12867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exceeded even his usual polyglot, and was more than ever full of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12868"></td>
        <td id="LC12868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">picturesque, when on questioning other mariners who were on movement up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12869"></td>
        <td id="LC12869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and down on the river that hour, he found that few of them had seen any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12870"></td>
        <td id="LC12870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of fog at all, except where it lay round the wharf. However, the ship</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12871"></td>
        <td id="LC12871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went out on the ebb tide; and was doubtless by morning far down the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12872"></td>
        <td id="LC12872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">river mouth. She was by then, when they told us, well out to sea.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12873"></td>
        <td id="LC12873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12874"></td>
        <td id="LC12874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And so, my dear Madam Mina, it is that we have to rest for a time, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12875"></td>
        <td id="LC12875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our enemy is on the sea, with the fog at his command, on his way to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12876"></td>
        <td id="LC12876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Danube mouth. To sail a ship takes time, go she never so quick; and when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12877"></td>
        <td id="LC12877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we start we go on land more quick, and we meet him there. Our best hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12878"></td>
        <td id="LC12878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is to come on him when in the box between sunrise and sunset; for then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12879"></td>
        <td id="LC12879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he can make no struggle, and we may deal with him as we should. There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12880"></td>
        <td id="LC12880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are days for us, in which we can make ready our plan. We know all about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12881"></td>
        <td id="LC12881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where he go; for we have seen the owner of the ship, who have shown us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12882"></td>
        <td id="LC12882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invoices and all papers that can be. The box we seek is to be landed in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12883"></td>
        <td id="LC12883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Varna, and to be given to an agent, one Ristics who will there present</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12884"></td>
        <td id="LC12884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his credentials; and so our merchant friend will have done his part.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12885"></td>
        <td id="LC12885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When he ask if there be any wrong, for that so, he can telegraph and</td>

        <td id="L12887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12887"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12890"></td>

        <td id="L12891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12891"></td>

        <td id="L12895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12895"></td>
        <td id="LC12895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he would surely go if the others went. He answered in growing passion,</td>

        <td id="L12896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12896"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12901"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L12940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12940"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L12944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12944"></td>

        <td id="L12964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12964"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12965"></td>
        <td id="LC12965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him; who can flourish in the midst of diseases that kill off whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12966"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12967"></td>
