      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12968"></td>
        <td id="LC12968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are pledged to set the world free. Our toil must be in silence, and our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12969"></td>
        <td id="LC12969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">efforts all in secret; for in this enlightened age, when men believe not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12970"></td>
        <td id="LC12970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even what they see, the doubting of wise men would be his greatest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12971"></td>
        <td id="LC12971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strength. It would be at once his sheath and his armour, and his weapons</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12972"></td>
        <td id="LC12972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to destroy us, his enemies, who are willing to peril even our own souls</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12973"></td>
        <td id="LC12973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the safety of one we love--for the good of mankind, and for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12974"></td>
        <td id="LC12974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour and glory of God.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12975"></td>
        <td id="LC12975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12976"></td>
        <td id="LC12976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a general discussion it was determined that for to-night nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12977"></td>
        <td id="LC12977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be definitely settled; that we should all sleep on the facts, and try to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12978"></td>
        <td id="LC12978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think out the proper conclusions. To-morrow, at breakfast, we are to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12979"></td>
        <td id="LC12979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meet again, and, after making our conclusions known to one another, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12980"></td>
        <td id="LC12980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall decide on some definite cause of action.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12981"></td>
        <td id="LC12981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12982"></td>
        <td id="LC12982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12983"></td>
        <td id="LC12983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12984"></td>
        <td id="LC12984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I feel a wonderful peace and rest to-night. It is as if some haunting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12985"></td>
        <td id="LC12985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presence were removed from me. Perhaps ...</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12986"></td>
        <td id="LC12986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12987"></td>
        <td id="LC12987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My surmise was not finished, could not be; for I caught sight in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12988"></td>
        <td id="LC12988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mirror of the red mark upon my forehead; and I knew that I was still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12989"></td>
        <td id="LC12989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unclean.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12990"></td>
        <td id="LC12990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12991"></td>
        <td id="LC12991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12992"></td>
        <td id="LC12992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12993"></td>
        <td id="LC12993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12994"></td>
        <td id="LC12994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_5 October._--We all rose early, and I think that sleep did much for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12995"></td>
        <td id="LC12995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">each and all of us. When we met at early breakfast there was more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12996"></td>
        <td id="LC12996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">general cheerfulness than any of us had ever expected to experience</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12997"></td>
        <td id="LC12997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12998"></td>
        <td id="LC12998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12999"></td>
        <td id="LC12999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is really wonderful how much resilience there is in human nature. Let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13000"></td>
        <td id="LC13000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any obstructing cause, no matter what, be removed in any way--even by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13001"></td>
        <td id="LC13001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death--and we fly back to first principles of hope and enjoyment. More</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13002"></td>
        <td id="LC13002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than once as we sat around the table, my eyes opened in wonder whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13003"></td>
        <td id="LC13003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the whole of the past days had not been a dream. It was only when I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13004"></td>
        <td id="LC13004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">caught sight of the red blotch on Mrs. Harker&#39;s forehead that I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13005"></td>
        <td id="LC13005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought back to reality. Even now, when I am gravely revolving the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13006"></td>
        <td id="LC13006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">matter, it is almost impossible to realise that the cause of all our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13007"></td>
        <td id="LC13007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble is still existent. Even Mrs. Harker seems to lose sight of her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13008"></td>
        <td id="LC13008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble for whole spells; it is only now and again, when something</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13009"></td>
        <td id="LC13009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recalls it to her mind, that she thinks of her terrible scar. We are to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13010"></td>
        <td id="LC13010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meet here in my study in half an hour and decide on our course of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13011"></td>
        <td id="LC13011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">action. I see only one immediate difficulty, I know it by instinct</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13012"></td>
        <td id="LC13012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rather than reason: we shall all have to speak frankly; and yet I fear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13013"></td>
        <td id="LC13013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that in some mysterious way poor Mrs. Harker&#39;s tongue is tied. I _know_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13014"></td>
        <td id="LC13014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that she forms conclusions of her own, and from all that has been I can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13015"></td>
        <td id="LC13015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guess how brilliant and how true they must be; but she will not, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13016"></td>
        <td id="LC13016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot, give them utterance. I have mentioned this to Van Helsing, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13017"></td>
        <td id="LC13017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he and I are to talk it over when we are alone. I suppose it is some of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13018"></td>
        <td id="LC13018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that horrid poison which has got into her veins beginning to work. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13019"></td>
        <td id="LC13019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Count had his own purposes when he gave her what Van Helsing called &quot;the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13020"></td>
        <td id="LC13020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Vampire&#39;s baptism of blood.&quot; Well, there may be a poison that distils</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13021"></td>
        <td id="LC13021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">itself out of good things; in an age when the existence of ptomaines is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13022"></td>
        <td id="LC13022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a mystery we should not wonder at anything! One thing I know: that if my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13023"></td>
        <td id="LC13023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instinct be true regarding poor Mrs. Harker&#39;s silences, then there is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13024"></td>
        <td id="LC13024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible difficulty--an unknown danger--in the work before us. The same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13025"></td>
        <td id="LC13025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power that compels her silence may compel her speech. I dare not think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13026"></td>
        <td id="LC13026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">further; for so I should in my thoughts dishonour a noble woman!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13027"></td>
        <td id="LC13027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13028"></td>
        <td id="LC13028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing is coming to my study a little before the others. I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13029"></td>
        <td id="LC13029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">try to open the subject with him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13030"></td>
        <td id="LC13030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13031"></td>
        <td id="LC13031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13032"></td>
        <td id="LC13032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13033"></td>
        <td id="LC13033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--When the Professor came in, we talked over the state of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13034"></td>
        <td id="LC13034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things. I could see that he had something on his mind which he wanted to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13035"></td>
        <td id="LC13035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say, but felt some hesitancy about broaching the subject. After beating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13036"></td>
        <td id="LC13036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about the bush a little, he said suddenly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13037"></td>
        <td id="LC13037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13038"></td>
        <td id="LC13038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Friend John, there is something that you and I must talk of alone, just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13039"></td>
        <td id="LC13039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the first at any rate. Later, we may have to take the others into our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13040"></td>
        <td id="LC13040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confidence&quot;; then he stopped, so I waited; he went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13041"></td>
        <td id="LC13041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13042"></td>
        <td id="LC13042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Madam Mina, our poor, dear Madam Mina is changing.&quot; A cold shiver ran</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13043"></td>
        <td id="LC13043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through me to find my worst fears thus endorsed. Van Helsing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13044"></td>
        <td id="LC13044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continued:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13045"></td>
        <td id="LC13045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13046"></td>
        <td id="LC13046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;With the sad experience of Miss Lucy, we must this time be warned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13047"></td>
        <td id="LC13047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before things go too far. Our task is now in reality more difficult than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13048"></td>
        <td id="LC13048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever, and this new trouble makes every hour of the direst importance. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13049"></td>
        <td id="LC13049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can see the characteristics of the vampire coming in her face. It is now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13050"></td>
        <td id="LC13050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but very, very slight; but it is to be seen if we have eyes to notice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13051"></td>
        <td id="LC13051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without to prejudge. Her teeth are some sharper, and at times her eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13052"></td>
        <td id="LC13052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are more hard. But these are not all, there is to her the silence now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13053"></td>
        <td id="LC13053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">often; as so it was with Miss Lucy. She did not speak, even when she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13054"></td>
        <td id="LC13054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrote that which she wished to be known later. Now my fear is this. If</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13055"></td>
        <td id="LC13055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it be that she can, by our hypnotic trance, tell what the Count see and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13056"></td>
        <td id="LC13056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hear, is it not more true that he who have hypnotise her first, and who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13057"></td>
        <td id="LC13057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have drink of her very blood and make her drink of his, should, if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13058"></td>
        <td id="LC13058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will, compel her mind to disclose to him that which she know?&quot; I nodded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13059"></td>
        <td id="LC13059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquiescence; he went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13060"></td>
        <td id="LC13060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13061"></td>
        <td id="LC13061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then, what we must do is to prevent this; we must keep her ignorant of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13062"></td>
        <td id="LC13062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our intent, and so she cannot tell what she know not. This is a painful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13063"></td>
        <td id="LC13063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">task! Oh, so painful that it heart-break me to think of; but it must be.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13064"></td>
        <td id="LC13064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When to-day we meet, I must tell her that for reason which we will not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13065"></td>
        <td id="LC13065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to speak she must not more be of our council, but be simply guarded by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13066"></td>
        <td id="LC13066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us.&quot; He wiped his forehead, which had broken out in profuse perspiration</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13067"></td>
        <td id="LC13067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the thought of the pain which he might have to inflict upon the poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13068"></td>
        <td id="LC13068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soul already so tortured. I knew that it would be some sort of comfort</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13069"></td>
        <td id="LC13069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him if I told him that I also had come to the same conclusion; for at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13070"></td>
        <td id="LC13070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any rate it would take away the pain of doubt. I told him, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13071"></td>
        <td id="LC13071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effect was as I expected.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13072"></td>
        <td id="LC13072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13073"></td>
        <td id="LC13073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is now close to the time of our general gathering. Van Helsing has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13074"></td>
        <td id="LC13074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gone away to prepare for the meeting, and his painful part of it. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13075"></td>
        <td id="LC13075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">really believe his purpose is to be able to pray alone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13076"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13077"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13078"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13079"></td>
        <td id="LC13079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--At the very outset of our meeting a great personal relief was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13080"></td>
        <td id="LC13080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experienced by both Van Helsing and myself. Mrs. Harker had sent a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13081"></td>
        <td id="LC13081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">message by her husband to say that she would not join us at present, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13082"></td>
        <td id="LC13082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she thought it better that we should be free to discuss our movements</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13083"></td>
        <td id="LC13083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without her presence to embarrass us. The Professor and I looked at each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13084"></td>
        <td id="LC13084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other for an instant, and somehow we both seemed relieved. For my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13085"></td>
        <td id="LC13085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part, I thought that if Mrs. Harker realised the danger herself, it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13086"></td>
        <td id="LC13086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much pain as well as much danger averted. Under the circumstances we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13087"></td>
        <td id="LC13087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agreed, by a questioning look and answer, with finger on lip, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13088"></td>
        <td id="LC13088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preserve silence in our suspicions, until we should have been able to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13089"></td>
        <td id="LC13089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confer alone again. We went at once into our Plan of Campaign. Van</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13090"></td>
        <td id="LC13090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Helsing roughly put the facts before us first:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13091"></td>
        <td id="LC13091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13092"></td>
        <td id="LC13092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The _Czarina Catherine_ left the Thames yesterday morning. It will take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13093"></td>
        <td id="LC13093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her at the quickest speed she has ever made at least three weeks to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13094"></td>
        <td id="LC13094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reach Varna; but we can travel overland to the same place in three days.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13095"></td>
        <td id="LC13095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, if we allow for two days less for the ship&#39;s voyage, owing to such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13096"></td>
        <td id="LC13096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weather influences as we know that the Count can bring to bear; and if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13097"></td>
        <td id="LC13097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we allow a whole day and night for any delays which may occur to us,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13098"></td>
        <td id="LC13098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then we have a margin of nearly two weeks. Thus, in order to be quite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13099"></td>
        <td id="LC13099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">safe, we must leave here on 17th at latest. Then we shall at any rate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13100"></td>
        <td id="LC13100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be in Varna a day before the ship arrives, and able to make such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13101"></td>
        <td id="LC13101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preparations as may be necessary. Of course we shall all go armed--armed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13102"></td>
        <td id="LC13102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against evil things, spiritual as well as physical.&quot; Here Quincey Morris</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13103"></td>
        <td id="LC13103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">added:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13104"></td>
        <td id="LC13104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13105"></td>
        <td id="LC13105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I understand that the Count comes from a wolf country, and it may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13106"></td>
        <td id="LC13106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he shall get there before us. I propose that we add Winchesters to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13107"></td>
        <td id="LC13107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our armament. I have a kind of belief in a Winchester when there is any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13108"></td>
        <td id="LC13108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble of that sort around. Do you remember, Art, when we had the pack</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13109"></td>
        <td id="LC13109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after us at Tobolsk? What wouldn&#39;t we have given then for a repeater</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13110"></td>
        <td id="LC13110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apiece!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13111"></td>
        <td id="LC13111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13112"></td>
        <td id="LC13112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good!&quot; said Van Helsing, &quot;Winchesters it shall be. Quincey&#39;s head is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13113"></td>
        <td id="LC13113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">level at all times, but most so when there is to hunt, metaphor be more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13114"></td>
        <td id="LC13114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dishonour to science than wolves be of danger to man. In the meantime we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13115"></td>
        <td id="LC13115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can do nothing here; and as I think that Varna is not familiar to any of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13116"></td>
        <td id="LC13116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us, why not go there more soon? It is as long to wait here as there.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13117"></td>
        <td id="LC13117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To-night and to-morrow we can get ready, and then, if all be well, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13118"></td>
        <td id="LC13118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">four can set out on our journey.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13119"></td>
        <td id="LC13119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13120"></td>
        <td id="LC13120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We four?&quot; said Harker interrogatively, looking from one to another of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13121"></td>
        <td id="LC13121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13122"></td>
        <td id="LC13122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13123"></td>
        <td id="LC13123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Of course!&quot; answered the Professor quickly, &quot;you must remain to take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13124"></td>
        <td id="LC13124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">care of your so sweet wife!&quot; Harker was silent for awhile and then said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13125"></td>
        <td id="LC13125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a hollow voice:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13126"></td>
        <td id="LC13126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13127"></td>
        <td id="LC13127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Let us talk of that part of it in the morning. I want to consult with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13128"></td>
        <td id="LC13128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mina.&quot; I thought that now was the time for Van Helsing to warn him not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13129"></td>
        <td id="LC13129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to disclose our plans to her; but he took no notice. I looked at him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13130"></td>
        <td id="LC13130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">significantly and coughed. For answer he put his finger on his lips and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13131"></td>
        <td id="LC13131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13132"></td>
        <td id="LC13132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13133"></td>
        <td id="LC13133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13134"></td>
        <td id="LC13134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Jonathan Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13135"></td>
        <td id="LC13135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13136"></td>
        <td id="LC13136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_5 October, afternoon._--For some time after our meeting this morning I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13137"></td>
        <td id="LC13137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not think. The new phases of things leave my mind in a state of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13138"></td>
        <td id="LC13138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonder which allows no room for active thought. Mina&#39;s determination not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13139"></td>
        <td id="LC13139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to take any part in the discussion set me thinking; and as I could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13140"></td>
        <td id="LC13140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">argue the matter with her, I could only guess. I am as far as ever from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13141"></td>
        <td id="LC13141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a solution now. The way the others received it, too, puzzled me; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13142"></td>
        <td id="LC13142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last time we talked of the subject we agreed that there was to be no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13143"></td>
        <td id="LC13143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more concealment of anything amongst us. Mina is sleeping now, calmly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13144"></td>
        <td id="LC13144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and sweetly like a little child. Her lips are curved and her face beams</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13145"></td>
        <td id="LC13145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with happiness. Thank God, there are such moments still for her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13146"></td>
        <td id="LC13146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13147"></td>
        <td id="LC13147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13148"></td>
        <td id="LC13148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13149"></td>
        <td id="LC13149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--How strange it all is. I sat watching Mina&#39;s happy sleep, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13150"></td>
        <td id="LC13150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came as near to being happy myself as I suppose I shall ever be. As the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13151"></td>
        <td id="LC13151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evening drew on, and the earth took its shadows from the sun sinking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13152"></td>
        <td id="LC13152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lower, the silence of the room grew more and more solemn to me. All at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13153"></td>
        <td id="LC13153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once Mina opened her eyes, and looking at me tenderly, said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13154"></td>
        <td id="LC13154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13155"></td>
        <td id="LC13155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Jonathan, I want you to promise me something on your word of honour. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13156"></td>
        <td id="LC13156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">promise made to me, but made holily in God&#39;s hearing, and not to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13157"></td>
        <td id="LC13157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broken though I should go down on my knees and implore you with bitter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13158"></td>
        <td id="LC13158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tears. Quick, you must make it to me at once.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13159"></td>
        <td id="LC13159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13160"></td>
        <td id="LC13160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Mina,&quot; I said, &quot;a promise like that, I cannot make at once. I may have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13161"></td>
        <td id="LC13161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no right to make it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13162"></td>
        <td id="LC13162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13163"></td>
        <td id="LC13163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But, dear one,&quot; she said, with such spiritual intensity that her eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13164"></td>
        <td id="LC13164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were like pole stars, &quot;it is I who wish it; and it is not for myself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13165"></td>
        <td id="LC13165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You can ask Dr. Van Helsing if I am not right; if he disagrees you may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13166"></td>
        <td id="LC13166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do as you will. Nay, more, if you all agree, later, you are absolved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13167"></td>
        <td id="LC13167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the promise.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13168"></td>
        <td id="LC13168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13169"></td>
        <td id="LC13169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I promise!&quot; I said, and for a moment she looked supremely happy; though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13170"></td>
        <td id="LC13170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me all happiness for her was denied by the red scar on her forehead.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13171"></td>
        <td id="LC13171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13172"></td>
        <td id="LC13172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13173"></td>
        <td id="LC13173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Promise me that you will not tell me anything of the plans formed for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13174"></td>
        <td id="LC13174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the campaign against the Count. Not by word, or inference, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13175"></td>
        <td id="LC13175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">implication; not at any time whilst this remains to me!&quot; and she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13176"></td>
        <td id="LC13176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">solemnly pointed to the scar. I saw that she was in earnest, and said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13177"></td>
        <td id="LC13177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">solemnly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13178"></td>
        <td id="LC13178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13179"></td>
        <td id="LC13179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I promise!&quot; and as I said it I felt that from that instant a door had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13180"></td>
        <td id="LC13180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been shut between us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13181"></td>
        <td id="LC13181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13182"></td>
        <td id="LC13182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13183"></td>
        <td id="LC13183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13184"></td>
        <td id="LC13184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later, midnight._--Mina has been bright and cheerful all the evening.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13185"></td>
        <td id="LC13185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So much so that all the rest seemed to take courage, as if infected</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13186"></td>
        <td id="LC13186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">somewhat with her gaiety; as a result even I myself felt as if the pall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13187"></td>
        <td id="LC13187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of gloom which weighs us down were somewhat lifted. We all retired</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13188"></td>
        <td id="LC13188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">early. Mina is now sleeping like a little child; it is a wonderful thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13189"></td>
        <td id="LC13189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that her faculty of sleep remains to her in the midst of her terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13190"></td>
        <td id="LC13190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble. Thank God for it, for then at least she can forget her care.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13191"></td>
        <td id="LC13191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Perhaps her example may affect me as her gaiety did to-night. I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13192"></td>
        <td id="LC13192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">try it. Oh! for a dreamless sleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13193"></td>
        <td id="LC13193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13194"></td>
        <td id="LC13194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13195"></td>
        <td id="LC13195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13196"></td>
        <td id="LC13196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_6 October, morning._--Another surprise. Mina woke me early, about the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13197"></td>
        <td id="LC13197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same time as yesterday, and asked me to bring Dr. Van Helsing. I thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13198"></td>
        <td id="LC13198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that it was another occasion for hypnotism, and without question went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13199"></td>
        <td id="LC13199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the Professor. He had evidently expected some such call, for I found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13200"></td>
        <td id="LC13200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him dressed in his room. His door was ajar, so that he could hear the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13201"></td>
        <td id="LC13201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opening of the door of our room. He came at once; as he passed into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13202"></td>
        <td id="LC13202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room, he asked Mina if the others might come, too.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13203"></td>
        <td id="LC13203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13204"></td>
        <td id="LC13204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No,&quot; she said quite simply, &quot;it will not be necessary. You can tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13205"></td>
        <td id="LC13205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them just as well. I must go with you on your journey.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13206"></td>
        <td id="LC13206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13207"></td>
        <td id="LC13207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dr. Van Helsing was as startled as I was. After a moment&#39;s pause he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13208"></td>
        <td id="LC13208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asked:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13209"></td>
        <td id="LC13209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13210"></td>
        <td id="LC13210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But why?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13211"></td>
        <td id="LC13211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13212"></td>
        <td id="LC13212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You must take me with you. I am safer with you, and you shall be safer,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13213"></td>
        <td id="LC13213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13214"></td>
        <td id="LC13214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13215"></td>
        <td id="LC13215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But why, dear Madam Mina? You know that your safety is our solemnest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13216"></td>
        <td id="LC13216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">duty. We go into danger, to which you are, or may be, more liable than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13217"></td>
        <td id="LC13217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any of us from--from circumstances--things that have been.&quot; He paused,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13218"></td>
        <td id="LC13218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">embarrassed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13219"></td>
        <td id="LC13219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13220"></td>
        <td id="LC13220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As she replied, she raised her finger and pointed to her forehead:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13221"></td>
        <td id="LC13221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13222"></td>
        <td id="LC13222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I know. That is why I must go. I can tell you now, whilst the sun is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13223"></td>
        <td id="LC13223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming up; I may not be able again. I know that when the Count wills me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13224"></td>
        <td id="LC13224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I must go. I know that if he tells me to come in secret, I must come by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13225"></td>
        <td id="LC13225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wile; by any device to hoodwink--even Jonathan.&quot; God saw the look that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13226"></td>
        <td id="LC13226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she turned on me as she spoke, and if there be indeed a Recording Angel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13227"></td>
        <td id="LC13227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that look is noted to her everlasting honour. I could only clasp her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13228"></td>
        <td id="LC13228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand. I could not speak; my emotion was too great for even the relief of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13229"></td>
        <td id="LC13229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tears. She went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13230"></td>
        <td id="LC13230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13231"></td>
        <td id="LC13231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You men are brave and strong. You are strong in your numbers, for you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13232"></td>
        <td id="LC13232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can defy that which would break down the human endurance of one who had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13233"></td>
        <td id="LC13233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to guard alone. Besides, I may be of service, since you can hypnotise me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13234"></td>
        <td id="LC13234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and so learn that which even I myself do not know.&quot; Dr. Van Helsing said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13235"></td>
        <td id="LC13235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very gravely:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13236"></td>
        <td id="LC13236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13237"></td>
        <td id="LC13237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Madam Mina, you are, as always, most wise. You shall with us come; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13238"></td>
        <td id="LC13238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together we shall do that which we go forth to achieve.&quot; When he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13239"></td>
        <td id="LC13239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoken, Mina&#39;s long spell of silence made me look at her. She had fallen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13240"></td>
        <td id="LC13240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back on her pillow asleep; she did not even wake when I had pulled up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13241"></td>
        <td id="LC13241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the blind and let in the sunlight which flooded the room. Van Helsing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13242"></td>
        <td id="LC13242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">motioned to me to come with him quietly. We went to his room, and within</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13243"></td>
        <td id="LC13243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a minute Lord Godalming, Dr. Seward, and Mr. Morris were with us also.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13244"></td>
        <td id="LC13244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He told them what Mina had said, and went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13245"></td>
        <td id="LC13245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13246"></td>
        <td id="LC13246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;In the morning we shall leave for Varna. We have now to deal with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13247"></td>
        <td id="LC13247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">new factor: Madam Mina. Oh, but her soul is true. It is to her an agony</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13248"></td>
        <td id="LC13248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to tell us so much as she has done; but it is most right, and we are</td>

        <td id="L13249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13249"></td>

        <td id="L13250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13250"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13253"></td>

</td>

</td>
