</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13311"></td>
        <td id="LC13311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_11 October, Evening._--Jonathan Harker has asked me to note this, as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13312"></td>
        <td id="LC13312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says he is hardly equal to the task, and he wants an exact record kept.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13313"></td>
        <td id="LC13313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13314"></td>
        <td id="LC13314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I think that none of us were surprised when we were asked to see Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13315"></td>
        <td id="LC13315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harker a little before the time of sunset. We have of late come to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13316"></td>
        <td id="LC13316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understand that sunrise and sunset are to her times of peculiar freedom;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13317"></td>
        <td id="LC13317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when her old self can be manifest without any controlling force subduing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13318"></td>
        <td id="LC13318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or restraining her, or inciting her to action. This mood or condition</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13319"></td>
        <td id="LC13319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begins some half hour or more before actual sunrise or sunset, and lasts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13320"></td>
        <td id="LC13320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till either the sun is high, or whilst the clouds are still aglow with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13321"></td>
        <td id="LC13321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rays streaming above the horizon. At first there is a sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13322"></td>
        <td id="LC13322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">negative condition, as if some tie were loosened, and then the absolute</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13323"></td>
        <td id="LC13323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freedom quickly follows; when, however, the freedom ceases the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13324"></td>
        <td id="LC13324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">change-back or relapse comes quickly, preceded only by a spell of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13325"></td>
        <td id="LC13325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warning silence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13326"></td>
        <td id="LC13326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13327"></td>
        <td id="LC13327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To-night, when we met, she was somewhat constrained, and bore all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13328"></td>
        <td id="LC13328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">signs of an internal struggle. I put it down myself to her making a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13329"></td>
        <td id="LC13329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">violent effort at the earliest instant she could do so. A very few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13330"></td>
        <td id="LC13330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minutes, however, gave her complete control of herself; then, motioning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13331"></td>
        <td id="LC13331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her husband to sit beside her on the sofa where she was half reclining,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13332"></td>
        <td id="LC13332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she made the rest of us bring chairs up close. Taking her husband&#39;s hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13333"></td>
        <td id="LC13333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in hers began:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13334"></td>
        <td id="LC13334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13335"></td>
        <td id="LC13335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We are all here together in freedom, for perhaps the last time! I know,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13336"></td>
        <td id="LC13336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear; I know that you will always be with me to the end.&quot; This was to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13337"></td>
        <td id="LC13337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her husband whose hand had, as we could see, tightened upon hers. &quot;In</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13338"></td>
        <td id="LC13338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the morning we go out upon our task, and God alone knows what may be in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13339"></td>
        <td id="LC13339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">store for any of us. You are going to be so good to me as to take me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13340"></td>
        <td id="LC13340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with you. I know that all that brave earnest men can do for a poor weak</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13341"></td>
        <td id="LC13341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woman, whose soul perhaps is lost--no, no, not yet, but is at any rate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13342"></td>
        <td id="LC13342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at stake--you will do. But you must remember that I am not as you are.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13343"></td>
        <td id="LC13343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is a poison in my blood, in my soul, which may destroy me; which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13344"></td>
        <td id="LC13344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must destroy me, unless some relief comes to us. Oh, my friends, you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13345"></td>
        <td id="LC13345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know as well as I do, that my soul is at stake; and though I know there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13346"></td>
        <td id="LC13346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is one way out for me, you must not and I must not take it!&quot; She looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13347"></td>
        <td id="LC13347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appealingly to us all in turn, beginning and ending with her husband.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13348"></td>
        <td id="LC13348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13349"></td>
        <td id="LC13349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What is that way?&quot; asked Van Helsing in a hoarse voice. &quot;What is that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13350"></td>
        <td id="LC13350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way, which we must not--may not--take?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13351"></td>
        <td id="LC13351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13352"></td>
        <td id="LC13352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That I may die now, either by my own hand or that of another, before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13353"></td>
        <td id="LC13353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the greater evil is entirely wrought. I know, and you know, that were I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13354"></td>
        <td id="LC13354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once dead you could and would set free my immortal spirit, even as you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13355"></td>
        <td id="LC13355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did my poor Lucy&#39;s. Were death, or the fear of death, the only thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13356"></td>
        <td id="LC13356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that stood in the way I would not shrink to die here, now, amidst the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13357"></td>
        <td id="LC13357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends who love me. But death is not all. I cannot believe that to die</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13358"></td>
        <td id="LC13358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in such a case, when there is hope before us and a bitter task to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13359"></td>
        <td id="LC13359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done, is God&#39;s will. Therefore, I, on my part, give up here the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13360"></td>
        <td id="LC13360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainty of eternal rest, and go out into the dark where may be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13361"></td>
        <td id="LC13361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blackest things that the world or the nether world holds!&quot; We were all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13362"></td>
        <td id="LC13362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silent, for we knew instinctively that this was only a prelude. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13363"></td>
        <td id="LC13363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faces of the others were set and Harker&#39;s grew ashen grey; perhaps he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13364"></td>
        <td id="LC13364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guessed better than any of us what was coming. She continued:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13365"></td>
        <td id="LC13365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13366"></td>
        <td id="LC13366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;This is what I can give into the hotch-pot.&quot; I could not but note the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13367"></td>
        <td id="LC13367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quaint legal phrase which she used in such a place, and with all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13368"></td>
        <td id="LC13368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seriousness. &quot;What will each of you give? Your lives I know,&quot; she went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13369"></td>
        <td id="LC13369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on quickly, &quot;that is easy for brave men. Your lives are God&#39;s, and you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13370"></td>
        <td id="LC13370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can give them back to Him; but what will you give to me?&quot; She looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13371"></td>
        <td id="LC13371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again questioningly, but this time avoided her husband&#39;s face. Quincey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13372"></td>
        <td id="LC13372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed to understand; he nodded, and her face lit up. &quot;Then I shall tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13373"></td>
        <td id="LC13373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you plainly what I want, for there must be no doubtful matter in this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13374"></td>
        <td id="LC13374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">connection between us now. You must promise me, one and all--even you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13375"></td>
        <td id="LC13375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my beloved husband--that, should the time come, you will kill me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13376"></td>
        <td id="LC13376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13377"></td>
        <td id="LC13377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What is that time?&quot; The voice was Quincey&#39;s, but it was low and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13378"></td>
        <td id="LC13378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strained.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13379"></td>
        <td id="LC13379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13380"></td>
        <td id="LC13380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;When you shall be convinced that I am so changed that it is better that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13381"></td>
        <td id="LC13381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I die that I may live. When I am thus dead in the flesh, then you will,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13382"></td>
        <td id="LC13382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without a moment&#39;s delay, drive a stake through me and cut off my head;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13383"></td>
        <td id="LC13383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or do whatever else may be wanting to give me rest!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13384"></td>
        <td id="LC13384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13385"></td>
        <td id="LC13385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quincey was the first to rise after the pause. He knelt down before her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13386"></td>
        <td id="LC13386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and taking her hand in his said solemnly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13387"></td>
        <td id="LC13387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13388"></td>
        <td id="LC13388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;m only a rough fellow, who hasn&#39;t, perhaps, lived as a man should to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13389"></td>
        <td id="LC13389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">win such a distinction, but I swear to you by all that I hold sacred and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13390"></td>
        <td id="LC13390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear that, should the time ever come, I shall not flinch from the duty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13391"></td>
        <td id="LC13391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that you have set us. And I promise you, too, that I shall make all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13392"></td>
        <td id="LC13392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain, for if I am only doubtful I shall take it that the time has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13393"></td>
        <td id="LC13393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13394"></td>
        <td id="LC13394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13395"></td>
        <td id="LC13395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My true friend!&quot; was all she could say amid her fast-falling tears, as,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13396"></td>
        <td id="LC13396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bending over, she kissed his hand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13397"></td>
        <td id="LC13397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13398"></td>
        <td id="LC13398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I swear the same, my dear Madam Mina!&quot; said Van Helsing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13399"></td>
        <td id="LC13399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13400"></td>
        <td id="LC13400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And I!&quot; said Lord Godalming, each of them in turn kneeling to her to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13401"></td>
        <td id="LC13401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take the oath. I followed, myself. Then her husband turned to her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13402"></td>
        <td id="LC13402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wan-eyed and with a greenish pallor which subdued the snowy whiteness of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13403"></td>
        <td id="LC13403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his hair, and asked:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13404"></td>
        <td id="LC13404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13405"></td>
        <td id="LC13405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And must I, too, make such a promise, oh, my wife?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13406"></td>
        <td id="LC13406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13407"></td>
        <td id="LC13407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You too, my dearest,&quot; she said, with infinite yearning of pity in her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13408"></td>
        <td id="LC13408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voice and eyes. &quot;You must not shrink. You are nearest and dearest and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13409"></td>
        <td id="LC13409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the world to me; our souls are knit into one, for all life and all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13410"></td>
        <td id="LC13410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time. Think, dear, that there have been times when brave men have killed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13411"></td>
        <td id="LC13411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their wives and their womenkind, to keep them from falling into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13412"></td>
        <td id="LC13412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands of the enemy. Their hands did not falter any the more because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13413"></td>
        <td id="LC13413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those that they loved implored them to slay them. It is men&#39;s duty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13414"></td>
        <td id="LC13414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards those whom they love, in such times of sore trial! And oh, my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13415"></td>
        <td id="LC13415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear, if it is to be that I must meet death at any hand, let it be at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13416"></td>
        <td id="LC13416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hand of him that loves me best. Dr. Van Helsing, I have not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13417"></td>
        <td id="LC13417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forgotten your mercy in poor Lucy&#39;s case to him who loved&quot;--she stopped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13418"></td>
        <td id="LC13418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a flying blush, and changed her phrase--&quot;to him who had best right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13419"></td>
        <td id="LC13419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to give her peace. If that time shall come again, I look to you to make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13420"></td>
        <td id="LC13420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it a happy memory of my husband&#39;s life that it was his loving hand which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13421"></td>
        <td id="LC13421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">set me free from the awful thrall upon me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13422"></td>
        <td id="LC13422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13423"></td>
        <td id="LC13423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Again I swear!&quot; came the Professor&#39;s resonant voice. Mrs. Harker</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13424"></td>
        <td id="LC13424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smiled, positively smiled, as with a sigh of relief she leaned back and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13425"></td>
        <td id="LC13425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13426"></td>
        <td id="LC13426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13427"></td>
        <td id="LC13427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And now one word of warning, a warning which you must never forget:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13428"></td>
        <td id="LC13428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this time, if it ever come, may come quickly and unexpectedly, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13429"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L13476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13476"></td>
        <td id="LC13476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_15 October, Varna._--We left Charing Cross on the morning of the 12th,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13477"></td>
        <td id="LC13477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got to Paris the same night, and took the places secured for us in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13478"></td>
        <td id="LC13478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Orient Express. We travelled night and day, arriving here at about five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13479"></td>
        <td id="LC13479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">o&#39;clock. Lord Godalming went to the Consulate to see if any telegram had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13480"></td>
        <td id="LC13480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrived for him, whilst the rest of us came on to this hotel--&quot;the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13481"></td>
        <td id="LC13481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Odessus.&quot; The journey may have had incidents; I was, however, too eager</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13482"></td>
        <td id="LC13482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to get on, to care for them. Until the _Czarina Catherine_ comes into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13483"></td>
        <td id="LC13483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">port there will be no interest for me in anything in the wide world.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13484"></td>
        <td id="LC13484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thank God! Mina is well, and looks to be getting stronger; her colour is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13485"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13486"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13488"></td>
        <td id="LC13488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hypnotise her at such times. At first, some effort was needed, and he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13489"></td>
        <td id="LC13489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had to make many passes; but now, she seems to yield at once, as if by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13491"></td>
        <td id="LC13491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these particular moments to simply will, and her thoughts obey him. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13492"></td>
        <td id="LC13492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always asks her what she can see and hear. She answers to the first:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13493"></td>
        <td id="LC13493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13494"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13495"></td>
        <td id="LC13495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13496"></td>
        <td id="LC13496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I can hear the waves lapping against the ship, and the water rushing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13497"></td>
        <td id="LC13497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by. Canvas and cordage strain and masts and yards creak. The wind is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13498"></td>
        <td id="LC13498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">high--I can hear it in the shrouds, and the bow throws back the foam.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13499"></td>
        <td id="LC13499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is evident that the _Czarina Catherine_ is still at sea, hastening on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13500"></td>
        <td id="LC13500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her way to Varna. Lord Godalming has just returned. He had four</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13501"></td>
        <td id="LC13501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">telegrams, one each day since we started, and all to the same effect:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13502"></td>
        <td id="LC13502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the _Czarina Catherine_ had not been reported to Lloyd&#39;s from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13503"></td>
        <td id="LC13503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anywhere. He had arranged before leaving London that his agent should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13504"></td>
        <td id="LC13504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">send him every day a telegram saying if the ship had been reported. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13505"></td>
        <td id="LC13505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was to have a message even if she were not reported, so that he might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13506"></td>
        <td id="LC13506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sure that there was a watch being kept at the other end of the wire.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13507"></td>
        <td id="LC13507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13508"></td>
        <td id="LC13508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We had dinner and went to bed early. To-morrow we are to see the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13509"></td>
        <td id="LC13509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Vice-Consul, and to arrange, if we can, about getting on board the ship</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13510"></td>
        <td id="LC13510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as soon as she arrives. Van Helsing says that our chance will be to get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13511"></td>
        <td id="LC13511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the boat between sunrise and sunset. The Count, even if he takes the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13512"></td>
        <td id="LC13512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">form of a bat, cannot cross the running water of his own volition, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13513"></td>
        <td id="LC13513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so cannot leave the ship. As he dare not change to man&#39;s form without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13514"></td>
        <td id="LC13514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspicion--which he evidently wishes to avoid--he must remain in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13515"></td>
        <td id="LC13515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">box. If, then, we can come on board after sunrise, he is at our mercy;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13516"></td>
        <td id="LC13516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for we can open the box and make sure of him, as we did of poor Lucy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13517"></td>
        <td id="LC13517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before he wakes. What mercy he shall get from us will not count for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13518"></td>
        <td id="LC13518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much. We think that we shall not have much trouble with officials or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13519"></td>
        <td id="LC13519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seamen. Thank God! this is the country where bribery can do anything,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13520"></td>
        <td id="LC13520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and we are well supplied with money. We have only to make sure that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13521"></td>
        <td id="LC13521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ship cannot come into port between sunset and sunrise without our being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13522"></td>
        <td id="LC13522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warned, and we shall be safe. Judge Moneybag will settle this case, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13523"></td>
        <td id="LC13523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13524"></td>
        <td id="LC13524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13525"></td>
        <td id="LC13525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13526"></td>
        <td id="LC13526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13527"></td>
        <td id="LC13527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_16 October._--Mina&#39;s report still the same: lapping waves and rushing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13528"></td>
        <td id="LC13528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water, darkness and favouring winds. We are evidently in good time, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13529"></td>
        <td id="LC13529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when we hear of the _Czarina Catherine_ we shall be ready. As she must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13530"></td>
        <td id="LC13530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pass the Dardanelles we are sure to have some report.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13531"></td>
        <td id="LC13531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13532"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13533"></td>
        <td id="LC13533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13534"></td>
        <td id="LC13534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_17 October._--Everything is pretty well fixed now, I think, to welcome</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13535"></td>
        <td id="LC13535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Count on his return from his tour. Godalming told the shippers that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13536"></td>
        <td id="LC13536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he fancied that the box sent aboard might contain something stolen from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13537"></td>
        <td id="LC13537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a friend of his, and got a half consent that he might open it at his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13538"></td>
        <td id="LC13538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">risk. The owner gave him a paper telling the Captain to give him every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13539"></td>
        <td id="LC13539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">facility in doing whatever he chose on board the ship, and also a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13540"></td>
        <td id="LC13540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">similar authorisation to his agent at Varna. We have seen the agent, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13541"></td>
        <td id="LC13541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was much impressed with Godalming&#39;s kindly manner to him, and we are all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13542"></td>
        <td id="LC13542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfied that whatever he can do to aid our wishes will be done. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13543"></td>
        <td id="LC13543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have already arranged what to do in case we get the box open. If the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13544"></td>
        <td id="LC13544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Count is there, Van Helsing and Seward will cut off his head at once and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13545"></td>
        <td id="LC13545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drive a stake through his heart. Morris and Godalming and I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13546"></td>
        <td id="LC13546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prevent interference, even if we have to use the arms which we shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13547"></td>
        <td id="LC13547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have ready. The Professor says that if we can so treat the Count&#39;s body,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13548"></td>
        <td id="LC13548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it will soon after fall into dust. In such case there would be no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13549"></td>
        <td id="LC13549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidence against us, in case any suspicion of murder were aroused. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13550"></td>
        <td id="LC13550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even if it were not, we should stand or fall by our act, and perhaps</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13551"></td>
        <td id="LC13551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some day this very script may be evidence to come between some of us and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13552"></td>
        <td id="LC13552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a rope. For myself, I should take the chance only too thankfully if it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13553"></td>
        <td id="LC13553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were to come. We mean to leave no stone unturned to carry out our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13554"></td>
        <td id="LC13554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intent. We have arranged with certain officials that the instant the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13555"></td>
        <td id="LC13555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Czarina Catherine_ is seen, we are to be informed by a special</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13556"></td>
        <td id="LC13556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">messenger.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13557"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13558"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13559"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13560"></td>
        <td id="LC13560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_24 October._--A whole week of waiting. Daily telegrams to Godalming,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13561"></td>
        <td id="LC13561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but only the same story: &quot;Not yet reported.&quot; Mina&#39;s morning and evening</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13562"></td>
        <td id="LC13562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hypnotic answer is unvaried: lapping waves, rushing water, and creaking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13563"></td>
        <td id="LC13563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">masts.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13564"></td>
        <td id="LC13564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13565"></td>

        <td id="L13566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13566"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L13568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13568"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC13570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_Czarina Catherine_ reported this morning from Dardanelles.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13571"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L13572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13572"></td>
