</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13573"></td>
        <td id="LC13573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13574"></td>
        <td id="LC13574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13575"></td>
        <td id="LC13575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_25 October._--How I miss my phonograph! To write diary with a pen is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13576"></td>
        <td id="LC13576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">irksome to me; but Van Helsing says I must. We were all wild with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13577"></td>
        <td id="LC13577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excitement yesterday when Godalming got his telegram from Lloyd&#39;s. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13578"></td>
        <td id="LC13578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know now what men feel in battle when the call to action is heard. Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13579"></td>
        <td id="LC13579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harker, alone of our party, did not show any signs of emotion. After</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13580"></td>
        <td id="LC13580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all, it is not strange that she did not; for we took special care not to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13581"></td>
        <td id="LC13581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">let her know anything about it, and we all tried not to show any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13582"></td>
        <td id="LC13582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excitement when we were in her presence. In old days she would, I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13583"></td>
        <td id="LC13583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sure, have noticed, no matter how we might have tried to conceal it; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13584"></td>
        <td id="LC13584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in this way she is greatly changed during the past three weeks. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13585"></td>
        <td id="LC13585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lethargy grows upon her, and though she seems strong and well, and is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13586"></td>
        <td id="LC13586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">getting back some of her colour, Van Helsing and I are not satisfied. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13587"></td>
        <td id="LC13587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talk of her often; we have not, however, said a word to the others. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13588"></td>
        <td id="LC13588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would break poor Harker&#39;s heart--certainly his nerve--if he knew that we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13589"></td>
        <td id="LC13589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had even a suspicion on the subject. Van Helsing examines, he tells me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13590"></td>
        <td id="LC13590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her teeth very carefully, whilst she is in the hypnotic condition, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13591"></td>
        <td id="LC13591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he says that so long as they do not begin to sharpen there is no active</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13592"></td>
        <td id="LC13592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">danger of a change in her. If this change should come, it would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13593"></td>
        <td id="LC13593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessary to take steps!... We both know what those steps would have to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13594"></td>
        <td id="LC13594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be, though we do not mention our thoughts to each other. We should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13595"></td>
        <td id="LC13595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neither of us shrink from the task--awful though it be to contemplate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13596"></td>
        <td id="LC13596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Euthanasia&quot; is an excellent and a comforting word! I am grateful to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13597"></td>
        <td id="LC13597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whoever invented it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13598"></td>
        <td id="LC13598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13599"></td>
        <td id="LC13599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is only about 24 hours&#39; sail from the Dardanelles to here, at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13600"></td>
        <td id="LC13600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rate the _Czarina Catherine_ has come from London. She should therefore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13601"></td>
        <td id="LC13601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrive some time in the morning; but as she cannot possibly get in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13602"></td>
        <td id="LC13602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before then, we are all about to retire early. We shall get up at one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13603"></td>
        <td id="LC13603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">o&#39;clock, so as to be ready.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13604"></td>
        <td id="LC13604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13605"></td>
        <td id="LC13605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13606"></td>
        <td id="LC13606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13607"></td>
        <td id="LC13607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_25 October, Noon_.--No news yet of the ship&#39;s arrival. Mrs. Harker&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13608"></td>
        <td id="LC13608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hypnotic report this morning was the same as usual, so it is possible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13609"></td>
        <td id="LC13609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that we may get news at any moment. We men are all in a fever of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13610"></td>
        <td id="LC13610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excitement, except Harker, who is calm; his hands are cold as ice, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13611"></td>
        <td id="LC13611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an hour ago I found him whetting the edge of the great Ghoorka knife</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13612"></td>
        <td id="LC13612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he now always carries with him. It will be a bad lookout for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13613"></td>
        <td id="LC13613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Count if the edge of that &quot;Kukri&quot; ever touches his throat, driven by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13614"></td>
        <td id="LC13614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that stern, ice-cold hand!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13615"></td>
        <td id="LC13615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13616"></td>
        <td id="LC13616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing and I were a little alarmed about Mrs. Harker to-day. About</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13617"></td>
        <td id="LC13617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noon she got into a sort of lethargy which we did not like; although we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13618"></td>
        <td id="LC13618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kept silence to the others, we were neither of us happy about it. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13619"></td>
        <td id="LC13619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been restless all the morning, so that we were at first glad to know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13620"></td>
        <td id="LC13620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that she was sleeping. When, however, her husband mentioned casually</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13621"></td>
        <td id="LC13621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that she was sleeping so soundly that he could not wake her, we went to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13622"></td>
        <td id="LC13622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her room to see for ourselves. She was breathing naturally and looked so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13623"></td>
        <td id="LC13623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well and peaceful that we agreed that the sleep was better for her than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13624"></td>
        <td id="LC13624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything else. Poor girl, she has so much to forget that it is no wonder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13625"></td>
        <td id="LC13625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that sleep, if it brings oblivion to her, does her good.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13626"></td>
        <td id="LC13626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13627"></td>
        <td id="LC13627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13628"></td>
        <td id="LC13628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13629"></td>
        <td id="LC13629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--Our opinion was justified, for when after a refreshing sleep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13630"></td>
        <td id="LC13630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of some hours she woke up, she seemed brighter and better than she had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13631"></td>
        <td id="LC13631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been for days. At sunset she made the usual hypnotic report. Wherever he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13632"></td>
        <td id="LC13632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be in the Black Sea, the Count is hurrying to his destination. To</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13633"></td>
        <td id="LC13633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his doom, I trust!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13634"></td>
        <td id="LC13634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13635"></td>
        <td id="LC13635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13636"></td>
        <td id="LC13636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13637"></td>
        <td id="LC13637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_26 October._--Another day and no tidings of the _Czarina Catherine_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13638"></td>
        <td id="LC13638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She ought to be here by now. That she is still journeying _somewhere_ is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13639"></td>
        <td id="LC13639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apparent, for Mrs. Harker&#39;s hypnotic report at sunrise was still the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13640"></td>
        <td id="LC13640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same. It is possible that the vessel may be lying by, at times, for fog;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13641"></td>
        <td id="LC13641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some of the steamers which came in last evening reported patches of fog</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13642"></td>
        <td id="LC13642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both to north and south of the port. We must continue our watching, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13643"></td>
        <td id="LC13643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ship may now be signalled any moment.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13644"></td>
        <td id="LC13644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13645"></td>
        <td id="LC13645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13646"></td>
        <td id="LC13646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13647"></td>
        <td id="LC13647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_27 October, Noon._--Most strange; no news yet of the ship we wait for.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13648"></td>
        <td id="LC13648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Harker reported last night and this morning as usual: &quot;lapping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13649"></td>
        <td id="LC13649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waves and rushing water,&quot; though she added that &quot;the waves were very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13650"></td>
        <td id="LC13650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faint.&quot; The telegrams from London have been the same: &quot;no further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13651"></td>
        <td id="LC13651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">report.&quot; Van Helsing is terribly anxious, and told me just now that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13652"></td>
        <td id="LC13652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fears the Count is escaping us. He added significantly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13653"></td>
        <td id="LC13653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13654"></td>
        <td id="LC13654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I did not like that lethargy of Madam Mina&#39;s. Souls and memories can do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13655"></td>
        <td id="LC13655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strange things during trance.&quot; I was about to ask him more, but Harker</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13656"></td>
        <td id="LC13656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just then came in, and he held up a warning hand. We must try to-night</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13657"></td>
        <td id="LC13657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at sunset to make her speak more fully when in her hypnotic state.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13658"></td>
        <td id="LC13658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13659"></td>
        <td id="LC13659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13660"></td>
        <td id="LC13660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13661"></td>
        <td id="LC13661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     _28 October._--Telegram. _Rufus Smith, London, to Lord Godalming,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13662"></td>
        <td id="LC13662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     care H. B. M. Vice Consul, Varna._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13663"></td>
        <td id="LC13663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13664"></td>
        <td id="LC13664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     &quot;_Czarina Catherine_ reported entering Galatz at one o&#39;clock</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13665"></td>
        <td id="LC13665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     to-day.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13666"></td>
        <td id="LC13666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13667"></td>
        <td id="LC13667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13668"></td>
        <td id="LC13668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13669"></td>
        <td id="LC13669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13670"></td>
        <td id="LC13670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_28 October._--When the telegram came announcing the arrival in Galatz I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13671"></td>
        <td id="LC13671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do not think it was such a shock to any of us as might have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13672"></td>
        <td id="LC13672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expected. True, we did not know whence, or how, or when, the bolt would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13673"></td>
        <td id="LC13673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come; but I think we all expected that something strange would happen.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13674"></td>
        <td id="LC13674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The delay of arrival at Varna made us individually satisfied that things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13675"></td>
        <td id="LC13675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would not be just as we had expected; we only waited to learn where the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13676"></td>
        <td id="LC13676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">change would occur. None the less, however, was it a surprise. I suppose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13677"></td>
        <td id="LC13677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that nature works on such a hopeful basis that we believe against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13678"></td>
        <td id="LC13678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ourselves that things will be as they ought to be, not as we should know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13679"></td>
        <td id="LC13679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they will be. Transcendentalism is a beacon to the angels, even if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13680"></td>
        <td id="LC13680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it be a will-o&#39;-the-wisp to man. It was an odd experience and we all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13681"></td>
        <td id="LC13681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took it differently. Van Helsing raised his hand over his head for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13682"></td>
        <td id="LC13682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment, as though in remonstrance with the Almighty; but he said not a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13683"></td>
        <td id="LC13683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word, and in a few seconds stood up with his face sternly set. Lord</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13684"></td>
        <td id="LC13684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Godalming grew very pale, and sat breathing heavily. I was myself half</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13685"></td>
        <td id="LC13685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stunned and looked in wonder at one after another. Quincey Morris</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13686"></td>
        <td id="LC13686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tightened his belt with that quick movement which I knew so well; in our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13687"></td>
        <td id="LC13687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">old wandering days it meant &quot;action.&quot; Mrs. Harker grew ghastly white, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13688"></td>
        <td id="LC13688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the scar on her forehead seemed to burn, but she folded her hands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13689"></td>
        <td id="LC13689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meekly and looked up in prayer. Harker smiled--actually smiled--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13690"></td>
        <td id="LC13690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dark, bitter smile of one who is without hope; but at the same time his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13691"></td>
        <td id="LC13691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">action belied his words, for his hands instinctively sought the hilt of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13692"></td>
        <td id="LC13692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the great Kukri knife and rested there. &quot;When does the next train start</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13693"></td>
        <td id="LC13693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for Galatz?&quot; said Van Helsing to us generally.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13694"></td>
        <td id="LC13694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13695"></td>
        <td id="LC13695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;At 6:30 to-morrow morning!&quot; We all started, for the answer came from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13696"></td>
        <td id="LC13696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Harker.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13697"></td>
        <td id="LC13697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13698"></td>
        <td id="LC13698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How on earth do you know?&quot; said Art.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13699"></td>
        <td id="LC13699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13700"></td>
        <td id="LC13700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You forget--or perhaps you do not know, though Jonathan does and so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13701"></td>
        <td id="LC13701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">does Dr. Van Helsing--that I am the train fiend. At home in Exeter I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13702"></td>
        <td id="LC13702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always used to make up the time-tables, so as to be helpful to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13703"></td>
        <td id="LC13703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husband. I found it so useful sometimes, that I always make a study of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13704"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13795"></td>
        <td id="LC13795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That other of his race who, in a later age, again and again, brought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13796"></td>
        <td id="LC13796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his forces over The Great River into Turkey Land; who, when he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13797"></td>
        <td id="LC13797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beaten back, came again, and again, and again, though he had to come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13798"></td>
        <td id="LC13798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alone from the bloody field where his troops were being slaughtered,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13799"></td>
        <td id="LC13799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since he knew that he alone could ultimately triumph.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13800"></td>
        <td id="LC13800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13801"></td>
        <td id="LC13801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What does this tell us? Not much? no! The Count&#39;s child-thought see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13802"></td>
        <td id="LC13802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing; therefore he speak so free. Your man-thought see nothing; my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13803"></td>
        <td id="LC13803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man-thought see nothing, till just now. No! But there comes another word</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13804"></td>
        <td id="LC13804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from some one who speak without thought because she, too, know not what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13805"></td>
        <td id="LC13805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it mean--what it _might_ mean. Just as there are elements which rest,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13806"></td>
        <td id="LC13806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet when in nature&#39;s course they move on their way and they touch--then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13807"></td>
        <td id="LC13807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pouf! and there comes a flash of light, heaven wide, that blind and kill</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13808"></td>
        <td id="LC13808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and destroy some; but that show up all earth below for leagues and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13809"></td>
        <td id="LC13809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leagues. Is it not so? Well, I shall explain. To begin, have you ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13810"></td>
        <td id="LC13810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">study the philosophy of crime? &#39;Yes&#39; and &#39;No.&#39; You, John, yes; for it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13811"></td>
        <td id="LC13811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a study of insanity. You, no, Madam Mina; for crime touch you not--not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13812"></td>
        <td id="LC13812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but once. Still, your mind works true, and argues not _a particulari ad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13813"></td>
        <td id="LC13813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">universale_. There is this peculiarity in criminals. It is so constant,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13814"></td>
        <td id="LC13814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in all countries and at all times, that even police, who know not much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13815"></td>
        <td id="LC13815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from philosophy, come to know it empirically, that _it is_. That is to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13816"></td>
        <td id="LC13816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be empiric. The criminal always work at one crime--that is the true</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13817"></td>
        <td id="LC13817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">criminal who seems predestinate to crime, and who will of none other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13818"></td>
        <td id="LC13818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This criminal has not full man-brain. He is clever and cunning and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13819"></td>
        <td id="LC13819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resourceful; but he be not of man-stature as to brain. He be of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13820"></td>
        <td id="LC13820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">child-brain in much. Now this criminal of ours is predestinate to crime</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13821"></td>
        <td id="LC13821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also; he, too, have child-brain, and it is of the child to do what he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13822"></td>
        <td id="LC13822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have done. The little bird, the little fish, the little animal learn not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13823"></td>
        <td id="LC13823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by principle, but empirically; and when he learn to do, then there is to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13824"></td>
        <td id="LC13824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him the ground to start from to do more. &#39;_Dos pou sto_,&#39; said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13825"></td>
        <td id="LC13825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Archimedes. &#39;Give me a fulcrum, and I shall move the world!&#39; To do once,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13826"></td>
        <td id="LC13826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the fulcrum whereby child-brain become man-brain; and until he have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13827"></td>
        <td id="LC13827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the purpose to do more, he continue to do the same again every time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13828"></td>
        <td id="LC13828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just as he have done before! Oh, my dear, I see that your eyes are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13829"></td>
        <td id="LC13829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opened, and that to you the lightning flash show all the leagues,&quot; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13830"></td>
        <td id="LC13830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Harker began to clap her hands and her eyes sparkled. He went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13831"></td>
        <td id="LC13831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13832"></td>
        <td id="LC13832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now you shall speak. Tell us two dry men of science what you see with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13833"></td>
        <td id="LC13833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those so bright eyes.&quot; He took her hand and held it whilst she spoke.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13834"></td>
        <td id="LC13834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His finger and thumb closed on her pulse, as I thought instinctively and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13835"></td>
        <td id="LC13835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unconsciously, as she spoke:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13836"></td>
        <td id="LC13836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13837"></td>
        <td id="LC13837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The Count is a criminal and of criminal type. Nordau and Lombroso would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13838"></td>
        <td id="LC13838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so classify him, and _quâ_ criminal he is of imperfectly formed mind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13839"></td>
        <td id="LC13839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thus, in a difficulty he has to seek resource in habit. His past is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13840"></td>
        <td id="LC13840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clue, and the one page of it that we know--and that from his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13841"></td>
        <td id="LC13841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lips--tells that once before, when in what Mr. Morris would call a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13842"></td>
        <td id="LC13842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;tight place,&#39; he went back to his own country from the land he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13843"></td>
        <td id="LC13843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tried to invade, and thence, without losing purpose, prepared himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13844"></td>
        <td id="LC13844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for a new effort. He came again better equipped for his work; and won.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13845"></td>
        <td id="LC13845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So he came to London to invade a new land. He was beaten, and when all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13846"></td>
        <td id="LC13846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hope of success was lost, and his existence in danger, he fled back over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13847"></td>
        <td id="LC13847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sea to his home; just as formerly he had fled back over the Danube</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13848"></td>
        <td id="LC13848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from Turkey Land.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13849"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13850"></td>
        <td id="LC13850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good, good! oh, you so clever lady!&quot; said Van Helsing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13851"></td>
        <td id="LC13851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enthusiastically, as he stooped and kissed her hand. A moment later he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13852"></td>
        <td id="LC13852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said to me, as calmly as though we had been having a sick-room</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13853"></td>
        <td id="LC13853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consultation:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13854"></td>
        <td id="LC13854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13855"></td>
        <td id="LC13855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Seventy-two only; and in all this excitement. I have hope.&quot; Turning to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13856"></td>
        <td id="LC13856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her again, he said with keen expectation:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13857"></td>
        <td id="LC13857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13858"></td>
        <td id="LC13858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But go on. Go on! there is more to tell if you will. Be not afraid;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13859"></td>
        <td id="LC13859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">John and I know. I do in any case, and shall tell you if you are right.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13860"></td>
        <td id="LC13860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Speak, without fear!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13861"></td>
        <td id="LC13861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13862"></td>
        <td id="LC13862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I will try to; but you will forgive me if I seem egotistical.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13863"></td>
        <td id="LC13863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13864"></td>
        <td id="LC13864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Nay! fear not, you must be egotist, for it is of you that we think.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13865"></td>
        <td id="LC13865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13866"></td>
        <td id="LC13866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Then, as he is criminal he is selfish; and as his intellect is small</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13867"></td>
        <td id="LC13867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and his action is based on selfishness, he confines himself to one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13868"></td>
        <td id="LC13868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purpose. That purpose is remorseless. As he fled back over the Danube,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13869"></td>
        <td id="LC13869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leaving his forces to be cut to pieces, so now he is intent on being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13870"></td>
        <td id="LC13870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">safe, careless of all. So his own selfishness frees my soul somewhat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13871"></td>
        <td id="LC13871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the terrible power which he acquired over me on that dreadful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13872"></td>
        <td id="LC13872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night. I felt it! Oh, I felt it! Thank God, for His great mercy! My soul</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13873"></td>
        <td id="LC13873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is freer than it has been since that awful hour; and all that haunts me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13874"></td>
        <td id="LC13874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a fear lest in some trance or dream he may have used my knowledge for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13875"></td>
        <td id="LC13875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his ends.&quot; The Professor stood up:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13876"></td>
        <td id="LC13876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13877"></td>
        <td id="LC13877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;He has so used your mind; and by it he has left us here in Varna,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13878"></td>
        <td id="LC13878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whilst the ship that carried him rushed through enveloping fog up to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13879"></td>
        <td id="LC13879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Galatz, where, doubtless, he had made preparation for escaping from us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13880"></td>
        <td id="LC13880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But his child-mind only saw so far; and it may be that, as ever is in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13881"></td>
        <td id="LC13881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">God&#39;s Providence, the very thing that the evil-doer most reckoned on for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13882"></td>
        <td id="LC13882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his selfish good, turns out to be his chiefest harm. The hunter is taken</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13883"></td>
        <td id="LC13883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his own snare, as the great Psalmist says. For now that he think he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13884"></td>
        <td id="LC13884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is free from every trace of us all, and that he has escaped us with so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13885"></td>
        <td id="LC13885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many hours to him, then his selfish child-brain will whisper him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13886"></td>
        <td id="LC13886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep. He think, too, that as he cut himself off from knowing your mind,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13887"></td>
        <td id="LC13887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there can be no knowledge of him to you; there is where he fail! That</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13888"></td>
        <td id="LC13888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible baptism of blood which he give you makes you free to go to him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13889"></td>
        <td id="LC13889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in spirit, as you have as yet done in your times of freedom, when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13890"></td>
        <td id="LC13890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sun rise and set. At such times you go by my volition and not by his;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13891"></td>
        <td id="LC13891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and this power to good of you and others, as you have won from your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13892"></td>
        <td id="LC13892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suffering at his hands. This is now all the more precious that he know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13893"></td>
        <td id="LC13893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it not, and to guard himself have even cut himself off from his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13894"></td>
        <td id="LC13894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge of our where. We, however, are not selfish, and we believe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13895"></td>
        <td id="LC13895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that God is with us through all this blackness, and these many dark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13896"></td>
        <td id="LC13896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hours. We shall follow him; and we shall not flinch; even if we peril</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13897"></td>
        <td id="LC13897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ourselves that we become like him. Friend John, this has been a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13898"></td>
        <td id="LC13898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hour; and it have done much to advance us on our way. You must be scribe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13899"></td>
        <td id="LC13899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and write him all down, so that when the others return from their work</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13900"></td>
        <td id="LC13900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you can give it to them; then they shall know as we do.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13901"></td>
        <td id="LC13901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13902"></td>
        <td id="LC13902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so I have written it whilst we wait their return, and Mrs. Harker</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13903"></td>
        <td id="LC13903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has written with her typewriter all since she brought the MS. to us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13904"></td>
        <td id="LC13904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13905"></td>
        <td id="LC13905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13906"></td>
        <td id="LC13906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13907"></td>
        <td id="LC13907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13908"></td>
        <td id="LC13908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXVI</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13909"></td>
        <td id="LC13909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13910"></td>
        <td id="LC13910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">DR. SEWARD&#39;S DIARY</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13911"></td>
        <td id="LC13911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13912"></td>
        <td id="LC13912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13913"></td>
        <td id="LC13913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_29 October._--This is written in the train from Varna to Galatz. Last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13914"></td>
        <td id="LC13914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night we all assembled a little before the time of sunset. Each of us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13915"></td>
        <td id="LC13915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had done his work as well as he could; so far as thought, and endeavour,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13916"></td>
        <td id="LC13916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and opportunity go, we are prepared for the whole of our journey, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13917"></td>
        <td id="LC13917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for our work when we get to Galatz. When the usual time came round Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13918"></td>
        <td id="LC13918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harker prepared herself for her hypnotic effort; and after a longer and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13919"></td>
        <td id="LC13919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more serious effort on the part of Van Helsing than has been usually</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13920"></td>
        <td id="LC13920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessary, she sank into the trance. Usually she speaks on a hint; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13921"></td>
        <td id="LC13921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this time the Professor had to ask her questions, and to ask them pretty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13922"></td>
        <td id="LC13922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolutely, before we could learn anything; at last her answer came:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13923"></td>
        <td id="LC13923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13924"></td>
        <td id="LC13924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I can see nothing; we are still; there are no waves lapping, but only a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13925"></td>
        <td id="LC13925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steady swirl of water softly running against the hawser. I can hear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13926"></td>
        <td id="LC13926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men&#39;s voices calling, near and far, and the roll and creak of oars in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13927"></td>
        <td id="LC13927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rowlocks. A gun is fired somewhere; the echo of it seems far away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13928"></td>
        <td id="LC13928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is tramping of feet overhead, and ropes and chains are dragged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13929"></td>
        <td id="LC13929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along. What is this? There is a gleam of light; I can feel the air</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13930"></td>
        <td id="LC13930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blowing upon me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13931"></td>
        <td id="LC13931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13932"></td>
        <td id="LC13932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here she stopped. She had risen, as if impulsively, from where she lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13933"></td>
        <td id="LC13933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the sofa, and raised both her hands, palms upwards, as if lifting a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13934"></td>
        <td id="LC13934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weight. Van Helsing and I looked at each other with understanding.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13935"></td>
        <td id="LC13935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quincey raised his eyebrows slightly and looked at her intently, whilst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13936"></td>
        <td id="LC13936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harker&#39;s hand instinctively closed round the hilt of his Kukri. There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13937"></td>
        <td id="LC13937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a long pause. We all knew that the time when she could speak was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13938"></td>
        <td id="LC13938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passing; but we felt that it was useless to say anything. Suddenly she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13939"></td>
        <td id="LC13939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sat up, and, as she opened her eyes, said sweetly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13940"></td>
        <td id="LC13940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13941"></td>
        <td id="LC13941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Would none of you like a cup of tea? You must all be so tired!&quot; We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13942"></td>
        <td id="LC13942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could only make her happy, and so acquiesced. She bustled off to get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13943"></td>
        <td id="LC13943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tea; when she had gone Van Helsing said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13944"></td>
        <td id="LC13944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13945"></td>
        <td id="LC13945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You see, my friends. _He_ is close to land: he has left his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13946"></td>
        <td id="LC13946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earth-chest. But he has yet to get on shore. In the night he may lie</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13947"></td>
        <td id="LC13947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hidden somewhere; but if he be not carried on shore, or if the ship do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13948"></td>
        <td id="LC13948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not touch it, he cannot achieve the land. In such case he can, if it be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13949"></td>
        <td id="LC13949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the night, change his form and can jump or fly on shore, as he did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13950"></td>
        <td id="LC13950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at Whitby. But if the day come before he get on shore, then, unless he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13951"></td>
        <td id="LC13951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be carried he cannot escape. And if he be carried, then the customs men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13952"></td>
        <td id="LC13952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may discover what the box contain. Thus, in fine, if he escape not on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13953"></td>
        <td id="LC13953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shore to-night, or before dawn, there will be the whole day lost to him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13954"></td>
        <td id="LC13954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We may then arrive in time; for if he escape not at night we shall come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13955"></td>
        <td id="LC13955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on him in daytime, boxed up and at our mercy; for he dare not be his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13956"></td>
        <td id="LC13956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">true self, awake and visible, lest he be discovered.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13957"></td>
        <td id="LC13957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13958"></td>
        <td id="LC13958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was no more to be said, so we waited in patience until the dawn;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13959"></td>
        <td id="LC13959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at which time we might learn more from Mrs. Harker.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13960"></td>
        <td id="LC13960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13961"></td>
        <td id="LC13961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Early this morning we listened, with breathless anxiety, for her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13962"></td>
        <td id="LC13962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">response in her trance. The hypnotic stage was even longer in coming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13963"></td>
        <td id="LC13963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than before; and when it came the time remaining until full sunrise was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13964"></td>
        <td id="LC13964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so short that we began to despair. Van Helsing seemed to throw his whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13965"></td>
        <td id="LC13965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soul into the effort; at last, in obedience to his will she made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13966"></td>
        <td id="LC13966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reply:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13967"></td>
        <td id="LC13967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13968"></td>
        <td id="LC13968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;All is dark. I hear lapping water, level with me, and some creaking as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13969"></td>
        <td id="LC13969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of wood on wood.&quot; She paused, and the red sun shot up. We must wait till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13970"></td>
        <td id="LC13970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to-night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13971"></td>
        <td id="LC13971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13972"></td>
        <td id="LC13972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so it is that we are travelling towards Galatz in an agony of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13973"></td>
        <td id="LC13973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expectation. We are due to arrive between two and three in the morning;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13974"></td>
        <td id="LC13974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but already, at Bucharest, we are three hours late, so we cannot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13975"></td>
        <td id="LC13975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possibly get in till well after sun-up. Thus we shall have two more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13976"></td>
        <td id="LC13976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hypnotic messages from Mrs. Harker; either or both may possibly throw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13977"></td>
        <td id="LC13977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more light on what is happening.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13978"></td>
        <td id="LC13978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13979"></td>
