      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13980"></td>
        <td id="LC13980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13981"></td>
        <td id="LC13981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--Sunset has come and gone. Fortunately it came at a time when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13982"></td>
        <td id="LC13982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was no distraction; for had it occurred whilst we were at a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13983"></td>
        <td id="LC13983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">station, we might not have secured the necessary calm and isolation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13984"></td>
        <td id="LC13984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Harker yielded to the hypnotic influence even less readily than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13985"></td>
        <td id="LC13985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this morning. I am in fear that her power of reading the Count&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13986"></td>
        <td id="LC13986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sensations may die away, just when we want it most. It seems to me that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13987"></td>
        <td id="LC13987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her imagination is beginning to work. Whilst she has been in the trance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13988"></td>
        <td id="LC13988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hitherto she has confined herself to the simplest of facts. If this goes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13989"></td>
        <td id="LC13989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on it may ultimately mislead us. If I thought that the Count&#39;s power</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13990"></td>
        <td id="LC13990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over her would die away equally with her power of knowledge it would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13991"></td>
        <td id="LC13991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a happy thought; but I am afraid that it may not be so. When she did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13992"></td>
        <td id="LC13992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speak, her words were enigmatical:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13993"></td>
        <td id="LC13993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13994"></td>
        <td id="LC13994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Something is going out; I can feel it pass me like a cold wind. I can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13995"></td>
        <td id="LC13995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hear, far off, confused sounds--as of men talking in strange tongues,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13996"></td>
        <td id="LC13996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fierce-falling water, and the howling of wolves.&quot; She stopped and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13997"></td>
        <td id="LC13997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shudder ran through her, increasing in intensity for a few seconds,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13998"></td>
        <td id="LC13998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till, at the end, she shook as though in a palsy. She said no more, even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13999"></td>
        <td id="LC13999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in answer to the Professor&#39;s imperative questioning. When she woke from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14000"></td>
        <td id="LC14000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the trance, she was cold, and exhausted, and languid; but her mind was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14001"></td>
        <td id="LC14001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all alert. She could not remember anything, but asked what she had said;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14002"></td>
        <td id="LC14002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when she was told, she pondered over it deeply for a long time and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14003"></td>
        <td id="LC14003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14004"></td>
        <td id="LC14004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14005"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14007"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14008"></td>
        <td id="LC14008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to write later. Sunrise this morning was anxiously looked for by us all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14009"></td>
        <td id="LC14009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Knowing of the increasing difficulty of procuring the hypnotic trance,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14010"></td>
        <td id="LC14010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing began his passes earlier than usual. They produced no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14011"></td>
        <td id="LC14011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effect, however, until the regular time, when she yielded with a still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14012"></td>
        <td id="LC14012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greater difficulty, only a minute before the sun rose. The Professor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14013"></td>
        <td id="LC14013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lost no time in his questioning; her answer came with equal quickness:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14014"></td>
        <td id="LC14014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14015"></td>
        <td id="LC14015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;All is dark. I hear water swirling by, level with my ears, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14016"></td>
        <td id="LC14016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creaking of wood on wood. Cattle low far off. There is another sound, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14017"></td>
        <td id="LC14017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">queer one like----&quot; She stopped and grew white, and whiter still.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14018"></td>
        <td id="LC14018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14019"></td>
        <td id="LC14019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Go on; go on! Speak, I command you!&quot; said Van Helsing in an agonised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14020"></td>
        <td id="LC14020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voice. At the same time there was despair in his eyes, for the risen sun</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14021"></td>
        <td id="LC14021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was reddening even Mrs. Harker&#39;s pale face. She opened her eyes, and we</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14022"></td>
        <td id="LC14022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all started as she said, sweetly and seemingly with the utmost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14023"></td>
        <td id="LC14023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unconcern:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14024"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14025"></td>
        <td id="LC14025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, Professor, why ask me to do what you know I can&#39;t? I don&#39;t remember</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14028"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14029"></td>
        <td id="LC14029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What have I said? What have I done? I know nothing, only that I was</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L14030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14030"></td>
        <td id="LC14030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lying here, half asleep, and heard you say go on! speak, I command you!&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14031"></td>
        <td id="LC14031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It seemed so funny to hear you order me about, as if I were a bad</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC14032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">child!&quot;</td>

        <td id="L14033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14033"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14034"></td>
        <td id="LC14034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, Madam Mina,&quot; he said, sadly, &quot;it is proof, if proof be needed, of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14035"></td>
        <td id="LC14035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how I love and honour you, when a word for your good, spoken more</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC14036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earnest than ever, can seem so strange because it is to order her whom I</td>

        <td id="L14038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14038"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14039"></td>
        <td id="LC14039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The whistles are sounding; we are nearing Galatz. We are on fire with</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC14040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anxiety and eagerness.</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L14045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14045"></td>
        <td id="LC14045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_30 October._--Mr. Morris took me to the hotel where our rooms had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14046"></td>
        <td id="LC14046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ordered by telegraph, he being the one who could best be spared, since</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14047"></td>
        <td id="LC14047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he does not speak any foreign language. The forces were distributed</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14048"></td>

        <td id="L14049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14049"></td>
        <td id="LC14049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Vice-Consul, as his rank might serve as an immediate guarantee of some</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14050"></td>
        <td id="LC14050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sort to the official, we being in extreme hurry. Jonathan and the two</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14051"></td>
        <td id="LC14051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doctors went to the shipping agent to learn particulars of the arrival</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14052"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L14056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14056"></td>
        <td id="LC14056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--Lord Godalming has returned. The Consul is away, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14057"></td>
        <td id="LC14057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Vice-Consul sick; so the routine work has been attended to by a clerk.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14058"></td>
        <td id="LC14058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was very obliging, and offered to do anything in his power.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14059"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14060"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14061"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14062"></td>
        <td id="LC14062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14063"></td>
        <td id="LC14063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_30 October._--At nine o&#39;clock Dr. Van Helsing, Dr. Seward, and I called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14064"></td>
        <td id="LC14064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on Messrs. Mackenzie &amp; Steinkoff, the agents of the London firm of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14065"></td>
        <td id="LC14065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hapgood. They had received a wire from London, in answer to Lord</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14066"></td>
        <td id="LC14066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Godalming&#39;s telegraphed request, asking us to show them any civility in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14067"></td>
        <td id="LC14067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their power. They were more than kind and courteous, and took us at once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14068"></td>
        <td id="LC14068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on board the _Czarina Catherine_, which lay at anchor out in the river</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14069"></td>
        <td id="LC14069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harbour. There we saw the Captain, Donelson by name, who told us of his</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14157"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L14212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14212"></td>
        <td id="LC14212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Ground of inquiry._--Count Dracula&#39;s problem is to get back to his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14213"></td>
        <td id="LC14213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14214"></td>
        <td id="LC14214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14215"></td>
        <td id="LC14215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(_a_) He must be _brought back_ by some one. This is evident; for had he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14216"></td>
        <td id="LC14216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power to move himself as he wished he could go either as man, or wolf,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14217"></td>
        <td id="LC14217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or bat, or in some other way. He evidently fears discovery or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14218"></td>
        <td id="LC14218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interference, in the state of helplessness in which he must be--confined</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14219"></td>
        <td id="LC14219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as he is between dawn and sunset in his wooden box.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14220"></td>
        <td id="LC14220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14221"></td>
        <td id="LC14221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(_b_) _How is he to be taken?_--Here a process of exclusions may help</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14222"></td>
        <td id="LC14222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us. By road, by rail, by water?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14223"></td>
        <td id="LC14223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14224"></td>
        <td id="LC14224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">1. _By Road._--There are endless difficulties, especially in leaving the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14225"></td>
        <td id="LC14225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">city.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14226"></td>
        <td id="LC14226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14227"></td>
        <td id="LC14227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(_x_) There are people; and people are curious, and investigate. A hint,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14228"></td>
        <td id="LC14228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a surmise, a doubt as to what might be in the box, would destroy him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14229"></td>
        <td id="LC14229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14230"></td>
        <td id="LC14230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(_y_) There are, or there may be, customs and octroi officers to pass.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14231"></td>
        <td id="LC14231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14232"></td>
        <td id="LC14232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(_z_) His pursuers might follow. This is his highest fear; and in order</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14233"></td>
        <td id="LC14233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to prevent his being betrayed he has repelled, so far as he can, even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14234"></td>
        <td id="LC14234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his victim--me!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14235"></td>
        <td id="LC14235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14236"></td>
        <td id="LC14236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">2. _By Rail._--There is no one in charge of the box. It would have to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14237"></td>
        <td id="LC14237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take its chance of being delayed; and delay would be fatal, with enemies</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14238"></td>
        <td id="LC14238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the track. True, he might escape at night; but what would he be, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14239"></td>
        <td id="LC14239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left in a strange place with no refuge that he could fly to? This is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14240"></td>
        <td id="LC14240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what he intends; and he does not mean to risk it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14241"></td>
        <td id="LC14241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14242"></td>
        <td id="LC14242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">3. _By Water._--Here is the safest way, in one respect, but with most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14243"></td>
        <td id="LC14243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">danger in another. On the water he is powerless except at night; even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14244"></td>
        <td id="LC14244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then he can only summon fog and storm and snow and his wolves. But were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14245"></td>
        <td id="LC14245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he wrecked, the living water would engulf him, helpless; and he would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14246"></td>
        <td id="LC14246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indeed be lost. He could have the vessel drive to land; but if it were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14247"></td>
        <td id="LC14247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unfriendly land, wherein he was not free to move, his position would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14248"></td>
        <td id="LC14248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still be desperate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14249"></td>
        <td id="LC14249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14250"></td>
        <td id="LC14250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We know from the record that he was on the water; so what we have to do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14251"></td>
        <td id="LC14251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is to ascertain _what_ water.</td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14340"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14343"></td>
        <td id="LC14343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14344"></td>
        <td id="LC14344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have brought some Winchesters; they are pretty handy in a crowd, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14345"></td>
        <td id="LC14345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there may be wolves. The Count, if you remember, took some other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14346"></td>
        <td id="LC14346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">precautions; he made some requisitions on others that Mrs. Harker could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14347"></td>
        <td id="LC14347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not quite hear or understand. We must be ready at all points.&quot; Dr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14348"></td>
        <td id="LC14348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Seward said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14349"></td>
        <td id="LC14349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14350"></td>
        <td id="LC14350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I think I had better go with Quincey. We have been accustomed to hunt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14351"></td>
        <td id="LC14351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together, and we two, well armed, will be a match for whatever may come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14352"></td>
        <td id="LC14352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along. You must not be alone, Art. It may be necessary to fight the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14353"></td>
        <td id="LC14353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Slovaks, and a chance thrust--for I don&#39;t suppose these fellows carry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14354"></td>
        <td id="LC14354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guns--would undo all our plans. There must be no chances, this time; we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14355"></td>
        <td id="LC14355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall, not rest until the Count&#39;s head and body have been separated, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14356"></td>
        <td id="LC14356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we are sure that he cannot re-incarnate.&quot; He looked at Jonathan as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14357"></td>
        <td id="LC14357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoke, and Jonathan looked at me. I could see that the poor dear was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14358"></td>
        <td id="LC14358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">torn about in his mind. Of course he wanted to be with me; but then the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14359"></td>
        <td id="LC14359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boat service would, most likely, be the one which would destroy the ...</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14360"></td>
        <td id="LC14360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ... the ... Vampire. (Why did I hesitate to write the word?) He was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14361"></td>
        <td id="LC14361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silent awhile, and during his silence Dr. Van Helsing spoke:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14362"></td>
        <td id="LC14362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14363"></td>
        <td id="LC14363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Friend Jonathan, this is to you for twice reasons. First, because you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14364"></td>
        <td id="LC14364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are young and brave and can fight, and all energies may be needed at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14365"></td>
        <td id="LC14365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last; and again that it is your right to destroy him--that--which has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14366"></td>
        <td id="LC14366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrought such woe to you and yours. Be not afraid for Madam Mina; she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14367"></td>
        <td id="LC14367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be my care, if I may. I am old. My legs are not so quick to run as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14368"></td>
        <td id="LC14368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once; and I am not used to ride so long or to pursue as need be, or to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14369"></td>
        <td id="LC14369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fight with lethal weapons. But I can be of other service; I can fight in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14370"></td>
        <td id="LC14370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other way. And I can die, if need be, as well as younger men. Now let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14371"></td>
        <td id="LC14371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me say that what I would is this: while you, my Lord Godalming and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14372"></td>
        <td id="LC14372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friend Jonathan go in your so swift little steamboat up the river, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14373"></td>
        <td id="LC14373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whilst John and Quincey guard the bank where perchance he might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14374"></td>
        <td id="LC14374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">landed, I will take Madam Mina right into the heart of the enemy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14375"></td>
        <td id="LC14375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country. Whilst the old fox is tied in his box, floating on the running</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14376"></td>
        <td id="LC14376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stream whence he cannot escape to land--where he dares not raise the lid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14377"></td>
        <td id="LC14377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his coffin-box lest his Slovak carriers should in fear leave him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14378"></td>
        <td id="LC14378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perish--we shall go in the track where Jonathan went,--from Bistritz</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14379"></td>
        <td id="LC14379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over the Borgo, and find our way to the Castle of Dracula. Here, Madam</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14380"></td>
        <td id="LC14380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mina&#39;s hypnotic power will surely help, and we shall find our way--all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14381"></td>
        <td id="LC14381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dark and unknown otherwise--after the first sunrise when we are near</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14382"></td>
        <td id="LC14382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that fateful place. There is much to be done, and other places to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14383"></td>
        <td id="LC14383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made sanctify, so that that nest of vipers be obliterated.&quot; Here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14384"></td>
        <td id="LC14384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan interrupted him hotly:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14385"></td>
        <td id="LC14385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14386"></td>
        <td id="LC14386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do you mean to say, Professor Van Helsing, that you would bring Mina,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14387"></td>
        <td id="LC14387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in her sad case and tainted as she is with that devil&#39;s illness, right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14388"></td>
        <td id="LC14388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the jaws of his death-trap? Not for the world! Not for Heaven or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14389"></td>
        <td id="LC14389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hell!&quot; He became almost speechless for a minute, and then went on:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14390"></td>
        <td id="LC14390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14391"></td>
        <td id="LC14391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do you know what the place is? Have you seen that awful den of hellish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14392"></td>
        <td id="LC14392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">infamy--with the very moonlight alive with grisly shapes, and every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14393"></td>
        <td id="LC14393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speck of dust that whirls in the wind a devouring monster in embryo?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14394"></td>
        <td id="LC14394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Have you felt the Vampire&#39;s lips upon your throat?&quot; Here he turned to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14395"></td>
        <td id="LC14395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, and as his eyes lit on my forehead he threw up his arms with a cry:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14396"></td>
        <td id="LC14396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, my God, what have we done to have this terror upon us!&quot; and he sank</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14397"></td>
        <td id="LC14397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down on the sofa in a collapse of misery. The Professor&#39;s voice, as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14398"></td>
        <td id="LC14398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoke in clear, sweet tones, which seemed to vibrate in the air, calmed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14399"></td>
        <td id="LC14399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us all:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14400"></td>
        <td id="LC14400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14401"></td>
        <td id="LC14401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, my friend, it is because I would save Madam Mina from that awful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14402"></td>
        <td id="LC14402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place that I would go. God forbid that I should take her into that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14403"></td>
        <td id="LC14403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place. There is work--wild work--to be done there, that her eyes may not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14404"></td>
        <td id="LC14404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see. We men here, all save Jonathan, have seen with their own eyes what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14405"></td>
        <td id="LC14405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is to be done before that place can be purify. Remember that we are in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14406"></td>
        <td id="LC14406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible straits. If the Count escape us this time--and he is strong and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14407"></td>
        <td id="LC14407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subtle and cunning--he may choose to sleep him for a century, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14408"></td>
        <td id="LC14408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in time our dear one&quot;--he took my hand--&quot;would come to him to keep him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14409"></td>
        <td id="LC14409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">company, and would be as those others that you, Jonathan, saw. You have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14410"></td>
        <td id="LC14410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told us of their gloating lips; you heard their ribald laugh as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14411"></td>
        <td id="LC14411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clutched the moving bag that the Count threw to them. You shudder; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14412"></td>
        <td id="LC14412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well may it be. Forgive me that I make you so much pain, but it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14413"></td>
        <td id="LC14413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessary. My friend, is it not a dire need for the which I am giving,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14414"></td>
        <td id="LC14414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possibly my life? If it were that any one went into that place to stay,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14415"></td>
        <td id="LC14415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is I who would have to go to keep them company.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14416"></td>
        <td id="LC14416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14417"></td>
        <td id="LC14417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do as you will,&quot; said Jonathan, with a sob that shook him all over, &quot;we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14418"></td>
        <td id="LC14418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are in the hands of God!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14419"></td>
        <td id="LC14419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14420"></td>
        <td id="LC14420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14421"></td>
        <td id="LC14421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14422"></td>
        <td id="LC14422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--Oh, it did me good to see the way that these brave men worked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14423"></td>
        <td id="LC14423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How can women help loving men when they are so earnest, and so true, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14424"></td>
        <td id="LC14424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so brave! And, too, it made me think of the wonderful power of money!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14425"></td>
        <td id="LC14425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What can it not do when it is properly applied; and what might it do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14426"></td>
        <td id="LC14426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when basely used. I felt so thankful that Lord Godalming is rich, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14427"></td>
        <td id="LC14427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that both he and Mr. Morris, who also has plenty of money, are willing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14428"></td>
        <td id="LC14428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to spend it so freely. For if they did not, our little expedition could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14429"></td>
        <td id="LC14429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not start, either so promptly or so well equipped, as it will within</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14430"></td>
        <td id="LC14430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another hour. It is not three hours since it was arranged what part each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14431"></td>
        <td id="LC14431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of us was to do; and now Lord Godalming and Jonathan have a lovely steam</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14432"></td>
        <td id="LC14432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">launch, with steam up ready to start at a moment&#39;s notice. Dr. Seward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14433"></td>
        <td id="LC14433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Mr. Morris have half a dozen good horses, well appointed. We have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14434"></td>
        <td id="LC14434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the maps and appliances of various kinds that can be had. Professor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14435"></td>
        <td id="LC14435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing and I are to leave by the 11:40 train to-night for Veresti,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14436"></td>
        <td id="LC14436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where we are to get a carriage to drive to the Borgo Pass. We are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14437"></td>
        <td id="LC14437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bringing a good deal of ready money, as we are to buy a carriage and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14438"></td>
        <td id="LC14438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses. We shall drive ourselves, for we have no one whom we can trust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14439"></td>
        <td id="LC14439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the matter. The Professor knows something of a great many languages,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14440"></td>
        <td id="LC14440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so we shall get on all right. We have all got arms, even for me a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14441"></td>
        <td id="LC14441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">large-bore revolver; Jonathan would not be happy unless I was armed like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14442"></td>
        <td id="LC14442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rest. Alas! I cannot carry one arm that the rest do; the scar on my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14443"></td>
        <td id="LC14443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forehead forbids that. Dear Dr. Van Helsing comforts me by telling me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14444"></td>
        <td id="LC14444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I am fully armed as there may be wolves; the weather is getting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14445"></td>
        <td id="LC14445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">colder every hour, and there are snow-flurries which come and go as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14446"></td>
        <td id="LC14446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warnings.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14447"></td>
        <td id="LC14447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14448"></td>
        <td id="LC14448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14449"></td>
        <td id="LC14449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14450"></td>
        <td id="LC14450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--It took all my courage to say good-bye to my darling. We may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14451"></td>
        <td id="LC14451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never meet again. Courage, Mina! the Professor is looking at you keenly;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14452"></td>
        <td id="LC14452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his look is a warning. There must be no tears now--unless it may be that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14453"></td>
        <td id="LC14453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">God will let them fall in gladness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14454"></td>
        <td id="LC14454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14455"></td>
        <td id="LC14455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14456"></td>
        <td id="LC14456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Jonathan Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14457"></td>
        <td id="LC14457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14458"></td>
        <td id="LC14458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_October 30. Night._--I am writing this in the light from the furnace</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14459"></td>
        <td id="LC14459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door of the steam launch: Lord Godalming is firing up. He is an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14460"></td>
        <td id="LC14460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experienced hand at the work, as he has had for years a launch of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14461"></td>
        <td id="LC14461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own on the Thames, and another on the Norfolk Broads. Regarding our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14462"></td>
        <td id="LC14462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plans, we finally decided that Mina&#39;s guess was correct, and that if any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14463"></td>
        <td id="LC14463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waterway was chosen for the Count&#39;s escape back to his Castle, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14464"></td>
        <td id="LC14464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sereth and then the Bistritza at its junction, would be the one. We took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14465"></td>
        <td id="LC14465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, that somewhere about the 47th degree, north latitude, would be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14466"></td>
        <td id="LC14466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place chosen for the crossing the country between the river and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14467"></td>
        <td id="LC14467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Carpathians. We have no fear in running at good speed up the river at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14468"></td>
        <td id="LC14468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night; there is plenty of water, and the banks are wide enough apart to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14469"></td>
        <td id="LC14469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make steaming, even in the dark, easy enough. Lord Godalming tells me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14470"></td>
        <td id="LC14470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep for a while, as it is enough for the present for one to be on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14471"></td>
        <td id="LC14471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watch. But I cannot sleep--how can I with the terrible danger hanging</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14472"></td>
        <td id="LC14472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over my darling, and her going out into that awful place.... My only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14473"></td>
        <td id="LC14473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comfort is that we are in the hands of God. Only for that faith it would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14474"></td>
        <td id="LC14474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be easier to die than to live, and so be quit of all the trouble. Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14475"></td>
        <td id="LC14475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Morris and Dr. Seward were off on their long ride before we started;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14476"></td>
        <td id="LC14476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they are to keep up the right bank, far enough off to get on higher</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14477"></td>
        <td id="LC14477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lands where they can see a good stretch of river and avoid the following</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14478"></td>
        <td id="LC14478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of its curves. They have, for the first stages, two men to ride and lead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14479"></td>
        <td id="LC14479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their spare horses--four in all, so as not to excite curiosity. When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14480"></td>
        <td id="LC14480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they dismiss the men, which shall be shortly, they shall themselves look</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14481"></td>
        <td id="LC14481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after the horses. It may be necessary for us to join forces; if so they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14482"></td>
        <td id="LC14482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can mount our whole party. One of the saddles has a movable horn, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14483"></td>
        <td id="LC14483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can be easily adapted for Mina, if required.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14484"></td>
        <td id="LC14484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14485"></td>
        <td id="LC14485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is a wild adventure we are on. Here, as we are rushing along through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14486"></td>
        <td id="LC14486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the darkness, with the cold from the river seeming to rise up and strike</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14487"></td>
        <td id="LC14487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us; with all the mysterious voices of the night around us, it all comes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14488"></td>
        <td id="LC14488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">home. We seem to be drifting into unknown places and unknown ways; into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14489"></td>
        <td id="LC14489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a whole world of dark and dreadful things. Godalming is shutting the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14490"></td>
        <td id="LC14490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">furnace door....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14491"></td>
        <td id="LC14491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14492"></td>
        <td id="LC14492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14493"></td>
        <td id="LC14493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14494"></td>
        <td id="LC14494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_31 October._--Still hurrying along. The day has come, and Godalming is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14495"></td>
        <td id="LC14495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleeping. I am on watch. The morning is bitterly cold; the furnace heat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14496"></td>
        <td id="LC14496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is grateful, though we have heavy fur coats. As yet we have passed only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14497"></td>
        <td id="LC14497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a few open boats, but none of them had on board any box or package of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14498"></td>
        <td id="LC14498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything like the size of the one we seek. The men were scared every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14499"></td>
        <td id="LC14499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time we turned our electric lamp on them, and fell on their knees and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14500"></td>
        <td id="LC14500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prayed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14501"></td>
        <td id="LC14501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14502"></td>
        <td id="LC14502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14503"></td>
        <td id="LC14503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14504"></td>
        <td id="LC14504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_1 November, evening._--No news all day; we have found nothing of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14505"></td>
        <td id="LC14505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind we seek. We have now passed into the Bistritza; and if we are wrong</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14506"></td>
        <td id="LC14506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in our surmise our chance is gone. We have over-hauled every boat, big</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14507"></td>
        <td id="LC14507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and little. Early this morning, one crew took us for a Government boat,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14508"></td>
        <td id="LC14508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and treated us accordingly. We saw in this a way of smoothing matters,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14509"></td>
        <td id="LC14509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so at Fundu, where the Bistritza runs into the Sereth, we got a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14510"></td>
        <td id="LC14510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Roumanian flag which we now fly conspicuously. With every boat which we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14511"></td>
        <td id="LC14511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have over-hauled since then this trick has succeeded; we have had every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14512"></td>
        <td id="LC14512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deference shown to us, and not once any objection to whatever we chose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14513"></td>
        <td id="LC14513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to ask or do. Some of the Slovaks tell us that a big boat passed them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14514"></td>
        <td id="LC14514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going at more than usual speed as she had a double crew on board. This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14515"></td>
        <td id="LC14515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was before they came to Fundu, so they could not tell us whether the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14516"></td>
        <td id="LC14516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boat turned into the Bistritza or continued on up the Sereth. At Fundu</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14517"></td>
        <td id="LC14517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we could not hear of any such boat, so she must have passed there in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14518"></td>
        <td id="LC14518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night. I am feeling very sleepy; the cold is perhaps beginning to tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14519"></td>
        <td id="LC14519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon me, and nature must have rest some time. Godalming insists that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14520"></td>
        <td id="LC14520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall keep the first watch. God bless him for all his goodness to poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14521"></td>
        <td id="LC14521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear Mina and me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14522"></td>
        <td id="LC14522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14523"></td>
        <td id="LC14523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14524"></td>
        <td id="LC14524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14525"></td>
        <td id="LC14525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_2 November, morning._--It is broad daylight. That good fellow would not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14526"></td>
        <td id="LC14526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wake me. He says it would have been a sin to, for I slept peacefully and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14527"></td>
        <td id="LC14527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was forgetting my trouble. It seems brutally selfish to me to have slept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14528"></td>
        <td id="LC14528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so long, and let him watch all night; but he was quite right. I am a new</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14529"></td>
        <td id="LC14529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man this morning; and, as I sit here and watch him sleeping, I can do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14530"></td>
        <td id="LC14530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all that is necessary both as to minding the engine, steering, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14531"></td>
        <td id="LC14531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keeping watch. I can feel that my strength and energy are coming back to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14532"></td>
        <td id="LC14532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. I wonder where Mina is now, and Van Helsing. They should have got to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14533"></td>
        <td id="LC14533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Veresti about noon on Wednesday. It would take them some time to get the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14534"></td>
        <td id="LC14534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriage and horses; so if they had started and travelled hard, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14535"></td>
        <td id="LC14535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be about now at the Borgo Pass. God guide and help them! I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14536"></td>
        <td id="LC14536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afraid to think what may happen. If we could only go faster! but we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14537"></td>
        <td id="LC14537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot; the engines are throbbing and doing their utmost. I wonder how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14538"></td>
        <td id="LC14538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dr. Seward and Mr. Morris are getting on. There seem to be endless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14539"></td>
        <td id="LC14539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">streams running down the mountains into this river, but as none of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14540"></td>
        <td id="LC14540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are very large--at present, at all events, though they are terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14541"></td>
        <td id="LC14541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubtless in winter and when the snow melts--the horsemen may not have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14542"></td>
        <td id="LC14542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">met much obstruction. I hope that before we get to Strasba we may see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14543"></td>
        <td id="LC14543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them; for if by that time we have not overtaken the Count, it may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14544"></td>
        <td id="LC14544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessary to take counsel together what to do next.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14545"></td>
        <td id="LC14545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14546"></td>
        <td id="LC14546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14547"></td>
        <td id="LC14547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14548"></td>
        <td id="LC14548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14549"></td>
        <td id="LC14549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_2 November._--Three days on the road. No news, and no time to write it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14550"></td>
        <td id="LC14550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if there had been, for every moment is precious. We have had only the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14551"></td>
        <td id="LC14551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest needful for the horses; but we are both bearing it wonderfully.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14552"></td>
        <td id="LC14552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Those adventurous days of ours are turning up useful. We must push on;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14553"></td>
        <td id="LC14553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we shall never feel happy till we get the launch in sight again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14554"></td>
        <td id="LC14554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14555"></td>
        <td id="LC14555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14556"></td>
        <td id="LC14556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
