        <td id="L14557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14557"></td>
        <td id="LC14557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_3 November._--We heard at Fundu that the launch had gone up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14558"></td>
        <td id="LC14558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bistritza. I wish it wasn&#39;t so cold. There are signs of snow coming; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14559"></td>
        <td id="LC14559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if it falls heavy it will stop us. In such case we must get a sledge and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14560"></td>
        <td id="LC14560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go on, Russian fashion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14561"></td>
        <td id="LC14561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14562"></td>
        <td id="LC14562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14563"></td>
        <td id="LC14563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14564"></td>
        <td id="LC14564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_4 November._--To-day we heard of the launch having been detained by an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14565"></td>
        <td id="LC14565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accident when trying to force a way up the rapids. The Slovak boats get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14566"></td>
        <td id="LC14566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up all right, by aid of a rope and steering with knowledge. Some went up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14567"></td>
        <td id="LC14567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only a few hours before. Godalming is an amateur fitter himself, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14568"></td>
        <td id="LC14568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidently it was he who put the launch in trim again. Finally, they got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14569"></td>
        <td id="LC14569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up the rapids all right, with local help, and are off on the chase</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14570"></td>
        <td id="LC14570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afresh. I fear that the boat is not any better for the accident; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14571"></td>
        <td id="LC14571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peasantry tell us that after she got upon smooth water again, she kept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14572"></td>
        <td id="LC14572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stopping every now and again so long as she was in sight. We must push</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14573"></td>
        <td id="LC14573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on harder than ever; our help may be wanted soon.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14574"></td>
        <td id="LC14574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14575"></td>
        <td id="LC14575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14576"></td>
        <td id="LC14576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Mina Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14577"></td>
        <td id="LC14577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14578"></td>
        <td id="LC14578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_31 October._--Arrived at Veresti at noon. The Professor tells me that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14579"></td>
        <td id="LC14579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this morning at dawn he could hardly hypnotise me at all, and that all I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14580"></td>
        <td id="LC14580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could say was: &quot;dark and quiet.&quot; He is off now buying a carriage and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14581"></td>
        <td id="LC14581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses. He says that he will later on try to buy additional horses, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14582"></td>
        <td id="LC14582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that we may be able to change them on the way. We have something more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14583"></td>
        <td id="LC14583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than 70 miles before us. The country is lovely, and most interesting; if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14584"></td>
        <td id="LC14584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only we were under different conditions, how delightful it would be to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14585"></td>
        <td id="LC14585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see it all. If Jonathan and I were driving through it alone what a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14586"></td>
        <td id="LC14586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasure it would be. To stop and see people, and learn something of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14587"></td>
        <td id="LC14587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their life, and to fill our minds and memories with all the colour and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14588"></td>
        <td id="LC14588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">picturesqueness of the whole wild, beautiful country and the quaint</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14589"></td>
        <td id="LC14589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people! But, alas!--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14590"></td>
        <td id="LC14590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14591"></td>
        <td id="LC14591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14592"></td>
        <td id="LC14592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14593"></td>
        <td id="LC14593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Later._--Dr. Van Helsing has returned. He has got the carriage and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14594"></td>
        <td id="LC14594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses; we are to have some dinner, and to start in an hour. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14595"></td>
        <td id="LC14595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">landlady is putting us up a huge basket of provisions; it seems enough</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14596"></td>
        <td id="LC14596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for a company of soldiers. The Professor encourages her, and whispers to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14597"></td>
        <td id="LC14597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me that it may be a week before we can get any good food again. He has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14598"></td>
        <td id="LC14598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been shopping too, and has sent home such a wonderful lot of fur coats</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14599"></td>
        <td id="LC14599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and wraps, and all sorts of warm things. There will not be any chance of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14600"></td>
        <td id="LC14600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our being cold.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14601"></td>
        <td id="LC14601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14602"></td>
        <td id="LC14602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14603"></td>
        <td id="LC14603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14604"></td>
        <td id="LC14604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We shall soon be off. I am afraid to think what may happen to us. We are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14605"></td>
        <td id="LC14605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truly in the hands of God. He alone knows what may be, and I pray Him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14606"></td>
        <td id="LC14606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with all the strength of my sad and humble soul, that He will watch over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14607"></td>
        <td id="LC14607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my beloved husband; that whatever may happen, Jonathan may know that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14608"></td>
        <td id="LC14608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loved him and honoured him more than I can say, and that my latest and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14609"></td>
        <td id="LC14609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truest thought will be always for him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14610"></td>
        <td id="LC14610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14611"></td>
        <td id="LC14611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14612"></td>
        <td id="LC14612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14613"></td>
        <td id="LC14613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14614"></td>
        <td id="LC14614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXVII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14615"></td>
        <td id="LC14615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14616"></td>
        <td id="LC14616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">MINA HARKER&#39;S JOURNAL</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14617"></td>
        <td id="LC14617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14618"></td>
        <td id="LC14618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14619"></td>
        <td id="LC14619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_1 November._--All day long we have travelled, and at a good speed. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14620"></td>
        <td id="LC14620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses seem to know that they are being kindly treated, for they go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14621"></td>
        <td id="LC14621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">willingly their full stage at best speed. We have now had so many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14622"></td>
        <td id="LC14622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">changes and find the same thing so constantly that we are encouraged to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14623"></td>
        <td id="LC14623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think that the journey will be an easy one. Dr. Van Helsing is laconic;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14624"></td>
        <td id="LC14624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he tells the farmers that he is hurrying to Bistritz, and pays them well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14625"></td>
        <td id="LC14625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to make the exchange of horses. We get hot soup, or coffee, or tea; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14626"></td>
        <td id="LC14626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off we go. It is a lovely country; full of beauties of all imaginable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14627"></td>
        <td id="LC14627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kinds, and the people are brave, and strong, and simple, and seem full</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14628"></td>
        <td id="LC14628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of nice qualities. They are _very, very_ superstitious. In the first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14629"></td>
        <td id="LC14629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house where we stopped, when the woman who served us saw the scar on my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14630"></td>
        <td id="LC14630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forehead, she crossed herself and put out two fingers towards me, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14631"></td>
        <td id="LC14631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keep off the evil eye. I believe they went to the trouble of putting an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14632"></td>
        <td id="LC14632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extra amount of garlic into our food; and I can&#39;t abide garlic. Ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14633"></td>
        <td id="LC14633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since then I have taken care not to take off my hat or veil, and so have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14634"></td>
        <td id="LC14634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">escaped their suspicions. We are travelling fast, and as we have no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14635"></td>
        <td id="LC14635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">driver with us to carry tales, we go ahead of scandal; but I daresay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14636"></td>
        <td id="LC14636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that fear of the evil eye will follow hard behind us all the way. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14637"></td>
        <td id="LC14637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor seems tireless; all day he would not take any rest, though he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14638"></td>
        <td id="LC14638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made me sleep for a long spell. At sunset time he hypnotised me, and he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14639"></td>
        <td id="LC14639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says that I answered as usual &quot;darkness, lapping water and creaking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14640"></td>
        <td id="LC14640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wood&quot;; so our enemy is still on the river. I am afraid to think of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14641"></td>
        <td id="LC14641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan, but somehow I have now no fear for him, or for myself. I write</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14642"></td>
        <td id="LC14642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this whilst we wait in a farmhouse for the horses to be got ready. Dr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14643"></td>
        <td id="LC14643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing is sleeping, Poor dear, he looks very tired and old and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14644"></td>
        <td id="LC14644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grey, but his mouth is set as firmly as a conqueror&#39;s; even in his sleep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14645"></td>
        <td id="LC14645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is instinct with resolution. When we have well started I must make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14646"></td>
        <td id="LC14646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him rest whilst I drive. I shall tell him that we have days before us,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14647"></td>
        <td id="LC14647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and we must not break down when most of all his strength will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14648"></td>
        <td id="LC14648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">needed.... All is ready; we are off shortly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14649"></td>
        <td id="LC14649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14650"></td>
        <td id="LC14650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14651"></td>
        <td id="LC14651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14652"></td>
        <td id="LC14652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_2 November, morning._--I was successful, and we took turns driving all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14653"></td>
        <td id="LC14653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night; now the day is on us, bright though cold. There is a strange</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14654"></td>
        <td id="LC14654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heaviness in the air--I say heaviness for want of a better word; I mean</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14655"></td>
        <td id="LC14655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that it oppresses us both. It is very cold, and only our warm furs keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14656"></td>
        <td id="LC14656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us comfortable. At dawn Van Helsing hypnotised me; he says I answered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14657"></td>
        <td id="LC14657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;darkness, creaking wood and roaring water,&quot; so the river is changing as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14658"></td>
        <td id="LC14658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they ascend. I do hope that my darling will not run any chance of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14659"></td>
        <td id="LC14659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">danger--more than need be; but we are in God&#39;s hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14660"></td>
        <td id="LC14660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14661"></td>
        <td id="LC14661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14662"></td>
        <td id="LC14662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14663"></td>
        <td id="LC14663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_2 November, night._--All day long driving. The country gets wilder as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14664"></td>
        <td id="LC14664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we go, and the great spurs of the Carpathians, which at Veresti seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14665"></td>
        <td id="LC14665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so far from us and so low on the horizon, now seem to gather round us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14666"></td>
        <td id="LC14666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and tower in front. We both seem in good spirits; I think we make an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14667"></td>
        <td id="LC14667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effort each to cheer the other; in the doing so we cheer ourselves. Dr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14668"></td>
        <td id="LC14668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Van Helsing says that by morning we shall reach the Borgo Pass. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14669"></td>
        <td id="LC14669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">houses are very few here now, and the Professor says that the last horse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14670"></td>
        <td id="LC14670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we got will have to go on with us, as we may not be able to change. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14671"></td>
        <td id="LC14671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got two in addition to the two we changed, so that now we have a rude</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14672"></td>
        <td id="LC14672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">four-in-hand. The dear horses are patient and good, and they give us no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14673"></td>
        <td id="LC14673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble. We are not worried with other travellers, and so even I can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14674"></td>
        <td id="LC14674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drive. We shall get to the Pass in daylight; we do not want to arrive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14675"></td>
        <td id="LC14675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before. So we take it easy, and have each a long rest in turn. Oh, what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14676"></td>
        <td id="LC14676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will to-morrow bring to us? We go to seek the place where my poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14677"></td>
        <td id="LC14677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darling suffered so much. God grant that we may be guided aright, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14678"></td>
        <td id="LC14678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that He will deign to watch over my husband and those dear to us both,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14679"></td>
        <td id="LC14679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and who are in such deadly peril. As for me, I am not worthy in His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14680"></td>
        <td id="LC14680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sight. Alas! I am unclean to His eyes, and shall be until He may deign</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14681"></td>
        <td id="LC14681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to let me stand forth in His sight as one of those who have not incurred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14682"></td>
        <td id="LC14682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His wrath.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14683"></td>
        <td id="LC14683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14684"></td>
        <td id="LC14684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14685"></td>
        <td id="LC14685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Memorandum by Abraham Van Helsing._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14686"></td>
        <td id="LC14686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14687"></td>
        <td id="LC14687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_4 November._--This to my old and true friend John Seward, M.D., of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14688"></td>
        <td id="LC14688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Purfleet, London, in case I may not see him. It may explain. It is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14689"></td>
        <td id="LC14689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning, and I write by a fire which all the night I have kept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14690"></td>
        <td id="LC14690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alive--Madam Mina aiding me. It is cold, cold; so cold that the grey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14691"></td>
        <td id="LC14691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heavy sky is full of snow, which when it falls will settle for all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14692"></td>
        <td id="LC14692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">winter as the ground is hardening to receive it. It seems to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14693"></td>
        <td id="LC14693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affected Madam Mina; she has been so heavy of head all day that she was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14694"></td>
        <td id="LC14694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not like herself. She sleeps, and sleeps, and sleeps! She who is usual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14695"></td>
        <td id="LC14695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so alert, have done literally nothing all the day; she even have lost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14696"></td>
        <td id="LC14696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her appetite. She make no entry into her little diary, she who write so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14697"></td>
        <td id="LC14697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faithful at every pause. Something whisper to me that all is not well.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14698"></td>
        <td id="LC14698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">However, to-night she is more _vif_. Her long sleep all day have refresh</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14699"></td>
        <td id="LC14699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and restore her, for now she is all sweet and bright as ever. At sunset</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14700"></td>
        <td id="LC14700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I try to hypnotise her, but alas! with no effect; the power has grown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14701"></td>
        <td id="LC14701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">less and less with each day, and to-night it fail me altogether. Well,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14702"></td>
        <td id="LC14702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">God&#39;s will be done--whatever it may be, and whithersoever it may lead!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14703"></td>
        <td id="LC14703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14704"></td>
        <td id="LC14704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now to the historical, for as Madam Mina write not in her stenography, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14705"></td>
        <td id="LC14705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must, in my cumbrous old fashion, that so each day of us may not go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14706"></td>
        <td id="LC14706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unrecorded.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14707"></td>
        <td id="LC14707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14708"></td>
        <td id="LC14708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We got to the Borgo Pass just after sunrise yesterday morning. When I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14709"></td>
        <td id="LC14709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw the signs of the dawn I got ready for the hypnotism. We stopped our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14710"></td>
        <td id="LC14710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriage, and got down so that there might be no disturbance. I made a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14711"></td>
        <td id="LC14711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">couch with furs, and Madam Mina, lying down, yield herself as usual, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14712"></td>
        <td id="LC14712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more slow and more short time than ever, to the hypnotic sleep. As</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14713"></td>
        <td id="LC14713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before, came the answer: &quot;darkness and the swirling of water.&quot; Then she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14714"></td>
        <td id="LC14714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woke, bright and radiant and we go on our way and soon reach the Pass.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14715"></td>
        <td id="LC14715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At this time and place, she become all on fire with zeal; some new</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14716"></td>
        <td id="LC14716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guiding power be in her manifested, for she point to a road and say:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14717"></td>
        <td id="LC14717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14718"></td>
        <td id="LC14718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;This is the way.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14719"></td>
        <td id="LC14719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14720"></td>
        <td id="LC14720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How know you it?&quot; I ask.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14721"></td>
        <td id="LC14721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14722"></td>
        <td id="LC14722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Of course I know it,&quot; she answer, and with a pause, add: &quot;Have not my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14723"></td>
        <td id="LC14723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jonathan travelled it and wrote of his travel?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14724"></td>
        <td id="LC14724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14725"></td>
        <td id="LC14725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At first I think somewhat strange, but soon I see that there be only one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14726"></td>
        <td id="LC14726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such by-road. It is used but little, and very different from the coach</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14727"></td>
        <td id="LC14727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">road from the Bukovina to Bistritz, which is more wide and hard, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14728"></td>
        <td id="LC14728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more of use.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14729"></td>
        <td id="LC14729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14730"></td>
        <td id="LC14730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So we came down this road; when we meet other ways--not always were we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14731"></td>
        <td id="LC14731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sure that they were roads at all, for they be neglect and light snow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14732"></td>
        <td id="LC14732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have fallen--the horses know and they only. I give rein to them, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14733"></td>
        <td id="LC14733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they go on so patient. By-and-by we find all the things which Jonathan</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14734"></td>
        <td id="LC14734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have note in that wonderful diary of him. Then we go on for long, long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14735"></td>
        <td id="LC14735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hours and hours. At the first, I tell Madam Mina to sleep; she try, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14736"></td>
        <td id="LC14736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she succeed. She sleep all the time; till at the last, I feel myself to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14737"></td>
        <td id="LC14737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspicious grow, and attempt to wake her. But she sleep on, and I may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14738"></td>
        <td id="LC14738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not wake her though I try. I do not wish to try too hard lest I harm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14739"></td>
        <td id="LC14739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her; for I know that she have suffer much, and sleep at times be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14740"></td>
        <td id="LC14740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all-in-all to her. I think I drowse myself, for all of sudden I feel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14741"></td>
        <td id="LC14741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guilt, as though I have done something; I find myself bolt up, with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14742"></td>
        <td id="LC14742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reins in my hand, and the good horses go along jog, jog, just as ever. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14743"></td>
        <td id="LC14743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">look down and find Madam Mina still sleep. It is now not far off sunset</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14744"></td>
        <td id="LC14744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, and over the snow the light of the sun flow in big yellow flood,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14745"></td>
        <td id="LC14745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so that we throw great long shadow on where the mountain rise so steep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14746"></td>
        <td id="LC14746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For we are going up, and up; and all is oh! so wild and rocky, as though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14747"></td>
        <td id="LC14747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it were the end of the world.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14748"></td>
        <td id="LC14748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14749"></td>
        <td id="LC14749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then I arouse Madam Mina. This time she wake with not much trouble, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14750"></td>
        <td id="LC14750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then I try to put her to hypnotic sleep. But she sleep not, being as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14751"></td>
        <td id="LC14751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though I were not. Still I try and try, till all at once I find her and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14752"></td>
        <td id="LC14752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself in dark; so I look round, and find that the sun have gone down.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14753"></td>
        <td id="LC14753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madam Mina laugh, and I turn and look at her. She is now quite awake,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14754"></td>
        <td id="LC14754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and look so well as I never saw her since that night at Carfax when we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14755"></td>
        <td id="LC14755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first enter the Count&#39;s house. I am amaze, and not at ease then; but she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14756"></td>
        <td id="LC14756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is so bright and tender and thoughtful for me that I forget all fear. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14757"></td>
        <td id="LC14757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light a fire, for we have brought supply of wood with us, and she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14758"></td>
        <td id="LC14758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prepare food while I undo the horses and set them, tethered in shelter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14759"></td>
        <td id="LC14759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to feed. Then when I return to the fire she have my supper ready. I go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14760"></td>
        <td id="LC14760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to help her; but she smile, and tell me that she have eat already--that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14761"></td>
        <td id="LC14761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she was so hungry that she would not wait. I like it not, and I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14762"></td>
        <td id="LC14762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grave doubts; but I fear to affright her, and so I am silent of it. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14763"></td>
        <td id="LC14763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">help me and I eat alone; and then we wrap in fur and lie beside the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14764"></td>
        <td id="LC14764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fire, and I tell her to sleep while I watch. But presently I forget all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14765"></td>
        <td id="LC14765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of watching; and when I sudden remember that I watch, I find her lying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14766"></td>
        <td id="LC14766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quiet, but awake, and looking at me with so bright eyes. Once, twice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14767"></td>
        <td id="LC14767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more the same occur, and I get much sleep till before morning. When I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14768"></td>
        <td id="LC14768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wake I try to hypnotise her; but alas! though she shut her eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14769"></td>
        <td id="LC14769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">obedient, she may not sleep. The sun rise up, and up, and up; and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14770"></td>
        <td id="LC14770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep come to her too late, but so heavy that she will not wake. I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14771"></td>
        <td id="LC14771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to lift her up, and place her sleeping in the carriage when I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14772"></td>
        <td id="LC14772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harnessed the horses and made all ready. Madam still sleep, and she look</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14773"></td>
        <td id="LC14773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in her sleep more healthy and more redder than before. And I like it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14774"></td>
        <td id="LC14774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not. And I am afraid, afraid, afraid!--I am afraid of all things--even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14775"></td>
        <td id="LC14775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to think but I must go on my way. The stake we play for is life and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14776"></td>
        <td id="LC14776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death, or more than these, and we must not flinch.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14777"></td>
        <td id="LC14777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14778"></td>
        <td id="LC14778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">       *       *       *       *       *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14779"></td>
        <td id="LC14779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14780"></td>
        <td id="LC14780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_5 November, morning._--Let me be accurate in everything, for though you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14781"></td>
        <td id="LC14781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I have seen some strange things together, you may at the first think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14782"></td>
        <td id="LC14782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I, Van Helsing, am mad--that the many horrors and the so long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14783"></td>
        <td id="LC14783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strain on nerves has at the last turn my brain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14784"></td>
        <td id="LC14784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14785"></td>
        <td id="LC14785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All yesterday we travel, ever getting closer to the mountains, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14786"></td>
        <td id="LC14786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moving into a more and more wild and desert land. There are great,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14787"></td>
        <td id="LC14787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frowning precipices and much falling water, and Nature seem to have held</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14788"></td>
        <td id="LC14788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sometime her carnival. Madam Mina still sleep and sleep; and though I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14789"></td>
        <td id="LC14789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did have hunger and appeased it, I could not waken her--even for food. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14790"></td>
        <td id="LC14790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to fear that the fatal spell of the place was upon her, tainted as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14791"></td>
        <td id="LC14791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she is with that Vampire baptism. &quot;Well,&quot; said I to myself, &quot;if it be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14792"></td>
        <td id="LC14792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that she sleep all the day, it shall also be that I do not sleep at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14793"></td>
        <td id="LC14793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night.&quot; As we travel on the rough road, for a road of an ancient and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14794"></td>
        <td id="LC14794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imperfect kind there was, I held down my head and slept. Again I waked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14795"></td>
        <td id="LC14795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a sense of guilt and of time passed, and found Madam Mina still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14796"></td>
        <td id="LC14796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleeping, and the sun low down. But all was indeed changed; the frowning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14797"></td>
        <td id="LC14797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mountains seemed further away, and we were near the top of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14798"></td>
        <td id="LC14798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steep-rising hill, on summit of which was such a castle as Jonathan tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14799"></td>
        <td id="LC14799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of in his diary. At once I exulted and feared; for now, for good or ill,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14800"></td>
        <td id="LC14800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the end was near.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14801"></td>
        <td id="LC14801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14802"></td>
        <td id="LC14802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I woke Madam Mina, and again tried to hypnotise her; but alas!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14803"></td>
        <td id="LC14803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unavailing till too late. Then, ere the great dark came upon us--for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14804"></td>
        <td id="LC14804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even after down-sun the heavens reflected the gone sun on the snow, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14805"></td>
        <td id="LC14805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all was for a time in a great twilight--I took out the horses and fed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14806"></td>
        <td id="LC14806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them in what shelter I could. Then I make a fire; and near it I make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14807"></td>
        <td id="LC14807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madam Mina, now awake and more charming than ever, sit comfortable amid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14808"></td>
        <td id="LC14808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her rugs. I got ready food: but she would not eat, simply saying that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14809"></td>
        <td id="LC14809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she had not hunger. I did not press her, knowing her unavailingness. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14810"></td>
        <td id="LC14810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I myself eat, for I must needs now be strong for all. Then, with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14811"></td>
        <td id="LC14811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear on me of what might be, I drew a ring so big for her comfort, round</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14812"></td>
        <td id="LC14812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where Madam Mina sat; and over the ring I passed some of the wafer, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14813"></td>
        <td id="LC14813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I broke it fine so that all was well guarded. She sat still all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14814"></td>
        <td id="LC14814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time--so still as one dead; and she grew whiter and ever whiter till the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14815"></td>
        <td id="LC14815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snow was not more pale; and no word she said. But when I drew near, she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14816"></td>
        <td id="LC14816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clung to me, and I could know that the poor soul shook her from head to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14817"></td>
        <td id="LC14817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feet with a tremor that was pain to feel. I said to her presently, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14818"></td>
        <td id="LC14818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she had grown more quiet:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14819"></td>
        <td id="LC14819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14820"></td>
        <td id="LC14820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Will you not come over to the fire?&quot; for I wished to make a test of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14821"></td>
        <td id="LC14821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what she could. She rose obedient, but when she have made a step she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14822"></td>
        <td id="LC14822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stopped, and stood as one stricken.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14823"></td>
        <td id="LC14823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14824"></td>
        <td id="LC14824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why not go on?&quot; I asked. She shook her head, and, coming back, sat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14825"></td>
        <td id="LC14825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down in her place. Then, looking at me with open eyes, as of one waked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14826"></td>
        <td id="LC14826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from sleep, she said simply:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14827"></td>
        <td id="LC14827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14828"></td>
        <td id="LC14828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I cannot!&quot; and remained silent. I rejoiced, for I knew that what she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14829"></td>
        <td id="LC14829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not, none of those that we dreaded could. Though there might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14830"></td>
        <td id="LC14830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">danger to her body, yet her soul was safe!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14831"></td>
        <td id="LC14831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14832"></td>
        <td id="LC14832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently the horses began to scream, and tore at their tethers till I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14833"></td>
        <td id="LC14833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came to them and quieted them. When they did feel my hands on them, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14834"></td>
        <td id="LC14834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whinnied low as in joy, and licked at my hands and were quiet for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14835"></td>
        <td id="LC14835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time. Many times through the night did I come to them, till it arrive to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14836"></td>
        <td id="LC14836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the cold hour when all nature is at lowest; and every time my coming was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14837"></td>
        <td id="LC14837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with quiet of them. In the cold hour the fire began to die, and I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14838"></td>
        <td id="LC14838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about stepping forth to replenish it, for now the snow came in flying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14839"></td>
        <td id="LC14839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sweeps and with it a chill mist. Even in the dark there was a light of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14840"></td>
        <td id="LC14840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some kind, as there ever is over snow; and it seemed as though the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14841"></td>
        <td id="LC14841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snow-flurries and the wreaths of mist took shape as of women with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14842"></td>
        <td id="LC14842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trailing garments. All was in dead, grim silence only that the horses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14843"></td>
        <td id="LC14843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whinnied and cowered, as if in terror of the worst. I began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14844"></td>
        <td id="LC14844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear--horrible fears; but then came to me the sense of safety in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14845"></td>
        <td id="LC14845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ring wherein I stood. I began, too, to think that my imaginings were of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14846"></td>
        <td id="LC14846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the night, and the gloom, and the unrest that I have gone through, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14847"></td>
        <td id="LC14847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the terrible anxiety. It was as though my memories of all Jonathan&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14848"></td>
        <td id="LC14848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horrid experience were befooling me; for the snow flakes and the mist</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14849"></td>
        <td id="LC14849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to wheel and circle round, till I could get as though a shadowy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14850"></td>
        <td id="LC14850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glimpse of those women that would have kissed him. And then the horses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14851"></td>
        <td id="LC14851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cowered lower and lower, and moaned in terror as men do in pain. Even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14852"></td>
        <td id="LC14852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the madness of fright was not to them, so that they could break away. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14853"></td>
        <td id="LC14853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feared for my dear Madam Mina when these weird figures drew near and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14854"></td>
        <td id="LC14854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circled round. I looked at her, but she sat calm, and smiled at me; when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14855"></td>
        <td id="LC14855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I would have stepped to the fire to replenish it, she caught me and held</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14856"></td>
        <td id="LC14856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me back, and whispered, like a voice that one hears in a dream, so low</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14857"></td>
        <td id="LC14857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14858"></td>
        <td id="LC14858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14859"></td>
        <td id="LC14859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No! No! Do not go without. Here you are safe!&quot; I turned to her, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14860"></td>
        <td id="LC14860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking in her eyes, said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14861"></td>
        <td id="LC14861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14862"></td>
        <td id="LC14862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But you? It is for you that I fear!&quot; whereat she laughed--a laugh, low</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14863"></td>
        <td id="LC14863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and unreal, and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14864"></td>
        <td id="LC14864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14865"></td>
        <td id="LC14865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Fear for _me_! Why fear for me? None safer in all the world from them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14866"></td>
        <td id="LC14866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than I am,&quot; and as I wondered at the meaning of her words, a puff of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14867"></td>
        <td id="LC14867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wind made the flame leap up, and I see the red scar on her forehead.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14868"></td>
        <td id="LC14868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, alas! I knew. Did I not, I would soon have learned, for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14869"></td>
        <td id="LC14869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wheeling figures of mist and snow came closer, but keeping ever without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14870"></td>
        <td id="LC14870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Holy circle. Then they began to materialise till--if God have not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14871"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14872"></td>
        <td id="LC14872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in actual flesh the same three women that Jonathan saw in the room, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14873"></td>
        <td id="LC14873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would have kissed his throat. I knew the swaying round forms, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14874"></td>
        <td id="LC14874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bright hard eyes, the white teeth, the ruddy colour, the voluptuous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14875"></td>
        <td id="LC14875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lips. They smiled ever at poor dear Madam Mina; and as their laugh came</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14876"></td>
