        <td id="LC14877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her, and said in those so sweet tingling tones that Jonathan said were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14878"></td>
        <td id="LC14878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the intolerable sweetness of the water-glasses:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14879"></td>
        <td id="LC14879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14880"></td>
        <td id="LC14880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Come, sister. Come to us. Come! Come!&quot; In fear I turned to my poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14881"></td>
        <td id="LC14881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madam Mina, and my heart with gladness leapt like flame; for oh! the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14882"></td>
        <td id="LC14882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terror in her sweet eyes, the repulsion, the horror, told a story to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14883"></td>
        <td id="LC14883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart that was all of hope. God be thanked she was not, yet, of them. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14884"></td>
        <td id="LC14884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seized some of the firewood which was by me, and holding out some of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14885"></td>
        <td id="LC14885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wafer, advanced on them towards the fire. They drew back before me, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14886"></td>
        <td id="LC14886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughed their low horrid laugh. I fed the fire, and feared them not; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14887"></td>
        <td id="LC14887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I knew that we were safe within our protections. They could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14888"></td>
        <td id="LC14888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">approach, me, whilst so armed, nor Madam Mina whilst she remained within</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14889"></td>
        <td id="LC14889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ring, which she could not leave no more than they could enter. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14890"></td>
        <td id="LC14890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses had ceased to moan, and lay still on the ground; the snow fell on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14891"></td>
        <td id="LC14891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them softly, and they grew whiter. I knew that there was for the poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14892"></td>
        <td id="LC14892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beasts no more of terror.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14893"></td>
        <td id="LC14893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14894"></td>
        <td id="LC14894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so we remained till the red of the dawn to fall through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14895"></td>
        <td id="LC14895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snow-gloom. I was desolate and afraid, and full of woe and terror; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14896"></td>
        <td id="LC14896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when that beautiful sun began to climb the horizon life was to me again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14897"></td>
        <td id="LC14897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At the first coming of the dawn the horrid figures melted in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14898"></td>
        <td id="LC14898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whirling mist and snow; the wreaths of transparent gloom moved away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14899"></td>
        <td id="LC14899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards the castle, and were lost.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14900"></td>
        <td id="LC14900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14901"></td>
        <td id="LC14901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Instinctively, with the dawn coming, I turned to Madam Mina, intending</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14902"></td>
        <td id="LC14902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to hypnotise her; but she lay in a deep and sudden sleep, from which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14903"></td>
        <td id="LC14903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not wake her. I tried to hypnotise through her sleep, but she made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14904"></td>
        <td id="LC14904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no response, none at all; and the day broke. I fear yet to stir. I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14905"></td>
        <td id="LC14905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made my fire and have seen the horses, they are all dead. To-day I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14906"></td>
        <td id="LC14906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much to do here, and I keep waiting till the sun is up high; for there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14907"></td>
        <td id="LC14907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be places where I must go, where that sunlight, though snow and mist</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14908"></td>
        <td id="LC14908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">obscure it, will be to me a safety.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14909"></td>
        <td id="LC14909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14910"></td>
        <td id="LC14910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will strengthen me with breakfast, and then I will to my terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14911"></td>
        <td id="LC14911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work. Madam Mina still sleeps; and, God be thanked! she is calm in her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14912"></td>
        <td id="LC14912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14913"></td>
        <td id="LC14913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14914"></td>
        <td id="LC14914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14915"></td>
        <td id="LC14915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Jonathan Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14916"></td>
        <td id="LC14916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14917"></td>
        <td id="LC14917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_4 November, evening._--The accident to the launch has been a terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14918"></td>
        <td id="LC14918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing for us. Only for it we should have overtaken the boat long ago;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14919"></td>
        <td id="LC14919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and by now my dear Mina would have been free. I fear to think of her,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14920"></td>
        <td id="LC14920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off on the wolds near that horrid place. We have got horses, and we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14921"></td>
        <td id="LC14921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follow on the track. I note this whilst Godalming is getting ready. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14922"></td>
        <td id="LC14922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have our arms. The Szgany must look out if they mean fight. Oh, if only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14923"></td>
        <td id="LC14923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Morris and Seward were with us. We must only hope! If I write no more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14924"></td>
        <td id="LC14924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Good-bye, Mina! God bless and keep you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14925"></td>
        <td id="LC14925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14926"></td>
        <td id="LC14926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14927"></td>
        <td id="LC14927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Seward&#39;s Diary._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14928"></td>
        <td id="LC14928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14929"></td>
        <td id="LC14929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_5 November._--With the dawn we saw the body of Szgany before us dashing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14930"></td>
        <td id="LC14930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away from the river with their leiter-wagon. They surrounded it in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14931"></td>
        <td id="LC14931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cluster, and hurried along as though beset. The snow is falling lightly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14932"></td>
        <td id="LC14932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and there is a strange excitement in the air. It may be our own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14933"></td>
        <td id="LC14933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feelings, but the depression is strange. Far off I hear the howling of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14934"></td>
        <td id="LC14934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wolves; the snow brings them down from the mountains, and there are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14935"></td>
        <td id="LC14935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dangers to all of us, and from all sides. The horses are nearly ready,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14936"></td>
        <td id="LC14936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and we are soon off. We ride to death of some one. God alone knows who,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14937"></td>
        <td id="LC14937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or where, or what, or when, or how it may be....</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14938"></td>
        <td id="LC14938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14939"></td>
        <td id="LC14939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14940"></td>
        <td id="LC14940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Dr. Van Helsing&#39;s Memorandum._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14941"></td>
        <td id="LC14941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14942"></td>
        <td id="LC14942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_5 November, afternoon._--I am at least sane. Thank God for that mercy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14943"></td>
        <td id="LC14943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at all events, though the proving it has been dreadful. When I left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14944"></td>
        <td id="LC14944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madam Mina sleeping within the Holy circle, I took my way to the castle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14945"></td>
        <td id="LC14945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The blacksmith hammer which I took in the carriage from Veresti was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14946"></td>
        <td id="LC14946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">useful; though the doors were all open I broke them off the rusty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14947"></td>
        <td id="LC14947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hinges, lest some ill-intent or ill-chance should close them, so that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14948"></td>
        <td id="LC14948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being entered I might not get out. Jonathan&#39;s bitter experience served</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14949"></td>
        <td id="LC14949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me here. By memory of his diary I found my way to the old chapel, for I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14950"></td>
        <td id="LC14950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew that here my work lay. The air was oppressive; it seemed as if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14951"></td>
        <td id="LC14951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was some sulphurous fume, which at times made me dizzy. Either</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14952"></td>
        <td id="LC14952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was a roaring in my ears or I heard afar off the howl of wolves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14953"></td>
        <td id="LC14953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then I bethought me of my dear Madam Mina, and I was in terrible plight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14954"></td>
        <td id="LC14954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The dilemma had me between his horns.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14955"></td>
        <td id="LC14955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14956"></td>
        <td id="LC14956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her, I had not dare to take into this place, but left safe from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14957"></td>
        <td id="LC14957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Vampire in that Holy circle; and yet even there would be the wolf! I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14958"></td>
        <td id="LC14958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolve me that my work lay here, and that as to the wolves we must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14959"></td>
        <td id="LC14959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">submit, if it were God&#39;s will. At any rate it was only death and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14960"></td>
        <td id="LC14960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freedom beyond. So did I choose for her. Had it but been for myself the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14961"></td>
        <td id="LC14961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">choice had been easy, the maw of the wolf were better to rest in than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14962"></td>
        <td id="LC14962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the grave of the Vampire! So I make my choice to go on with my work.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14963"></td>
        <td id="LC14963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14964"></td>
        <td id="LC14964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I knew that there were at least three graves to find--graves that are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14965"></td>
        <td id="LC14965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inhabit; so I search, and search, and I find one of them. She lay in her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14966"></td>
        <td id="LC14966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Vampire sleep, so full of life and voluptuous beauty that I shudder as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14967"></td>
        <td id="LC14967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though I have come to do murder. Ah, I doubt not that in old time, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14968"></td>
        <td id="LC14968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such things were, many a man who set forth to do such a task as mine,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14969"></td>
        <td id="LC14969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found at the last his heart fail him, and then his nerve. So he delay,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14970"></td>
        <td id="LC14970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and delay, and delay, till the mere beauty and the fascination of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14971"></td>
        <td id="LC14971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanton Un-Dead have hypnotise him; and he remain on and on, till sunset</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14972"></td>
        <td id="LC14972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come, and the Vampire sleep be over. Then the beautiful eyes of the fair</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14973"></td>
        <td id="LC14973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woman open and look love, and the voluptuous mouth present to a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14974"></td>
        <td id="LC14974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kiss--and man is weak. And there remain one more victim in the Vampire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14975"></td>
        <td id="LC14975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fold; one more to swell the grim and grisly ranks of the Un-Dead!...</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14976"></td>
        <td id="LC14976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14977"></td>
        <td id="LC14977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is some fascination, surely, when I am moved by the mere presence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14978"></td>
        <td id="LC14978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of such an one, even lying as she lay in a tomb fretted with age and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14979"></td>
        <td id="LC14979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heavy with the dust of centuries, though there be that horrid odour such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14980"></td>
        <td id="LC14980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as the lairs of the Count have had. Yes, I was moved--I, Van Helsing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14981"></td>
        <td id="LC14981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with all my purpose and with my motive for hate--I was moved to a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14982"></td>
        <td id="LC14982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yearning for delay which seemed to paralyse my faculties and to clog my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14983"></td>
        <td id="LC14983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very soul. It may have been that the need of natural sleep, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14984"></td>
        <td id="LC14984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strange oppression of the air were beginning to overcome me. Certain it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14985"></td>
        <td id="LC14985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was that I was lapsing into sleep, the open-eyed sleep of one who yields</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14986"></td>
        <td id="LC14986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to a sweet fascination, when there came through the snow-stilled air a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14987"></td>
        <td id="LC14987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long, low wail, so full of woe and pity that it woke me like the sound</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14988"></td>
        <td id="LC14988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a clarion. For it was the voice of my dear Madam Mina that I heard.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14989"></td>
        <td id="LC14989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14990"></td>
        <td id="LC14990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then I braced myself again to my horrid task, and found by wrenching</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14991"></td>
        <td id="LC14991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away tomb-tops one other of the sisters, the other dark one. I dared not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14992"></td>
        <td id="LC14992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pause to look on her as I had on her sister, lest once more I should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14993"></td>
        <td id="LC14993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begin to be enthrall; but I go on searching until, presently, I find in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14994"></td>
        <td id="LC14994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a high great tomb as if made to one much beloved that other fair sister</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14995"></td>
        <td id="LC14995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, like Jonathan I had seen to gather herself out of the atoms of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14996"></td>
        <td id="LC14996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the mist. She was so fair to look on, so radiantly beautiful, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14997"></td>
        <td id="LC14997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exquisitely voluptuous, that the very instinct of man in me, which calls</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L14998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14998"></td>
        <td id="LC14998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some of my sex to love and to protect one of hers, made my head whirl</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14999"></td>
        <td id="LC14999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with new emotion. But God be thanked, that soul-wail of my dear Madam</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15000"></td>
        <td id="LC15000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mina had not died out of my ears; and, before the spell could be wrought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15001"></td>
        <td id="LC15001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">further upon me, I had nerved myself to my wild work. By this time I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15002"></td>
        <td id="LC15002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">searched all the tombs in the chapel, so far as I could tell; and as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15003"></td>
        <td id="LC15003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there had been only three of these Un-Dead phantoms around us in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15004"></td>
        <td id="LC15004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night, I took it that there were no more of active Un-Dead existent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15005"></td>
        <td id="LC15005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was one great tomb more lordly than all the rest; huge it was, and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15006"></td>
        <td id="LC15006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nobly proportioned. On it was but one word</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15007"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15008"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15009"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15010"></td>
        <td id="LC15010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This then was the Un-Dead home of the King-Vampire, to whom so many more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15011"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15012"></td>
        <td id="LC15012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Before I began to restore these women to their dead selves through my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15013"></td>
        <td id="LC15013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awful work, I laid in Dracula&#39;s tomb some of the Wafer, and so banished</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15014"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15015"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15016"></td>
        <td id="LC15016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then began my terrible task, and I dreaded it. Had it been but one, it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15017"></td>
        <td id="LC15017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been easy, comparative. But three! To begin twice more after I had</td>

        <td id="L15018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15018"></td>
        <td id="LC15018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been through a deed of horror; for if it was terrible with the sweet</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15019"></td>
        <td id="LC15019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Lucy, what would it not be with these strange ones who had survived</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15020"></td>

        <td id="L15021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15021"></td>
        <td id="LC15021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years; who would, if they could, have fought for their foul lives....</td>

        <td id="L15022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15022"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15023"></td>
        <td id="LC15023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Oh, my friend John, but it was butcher work; had I not been nerved by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15024"></td>
        <td id="LC15024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thoughts of other dead, and of the living over whom hung such a pall of</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15025"></td>
        <td id="LC15025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear, I could not have gone on. I tremble and tremble even yet, though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15026"></td>
        <td id="LC15026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till all was over, God be thanked, my nerve did stand. Had I not seen</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15027"></td>
        <td id="LC15027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the repose in the first place, and the gladness that stole over it just</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15028"></td>
        <td id="LC15028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ere the final dissolution came, as realisation that the soul had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15029"></td>
        <td id="LC15029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">won, I could not have gone further with my butchery. I could not have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15030"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15034"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15040"></td>
        <td id="LC15040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Before I left the castle I so fixed its entrances that never more can</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L15041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15041"></td>
        <td id="LC15041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Count enter there Un-Dead.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15043"></td>
        <td id="LC15043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I stepped into the circle where Madam Mina slept, she woke from her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15044"></td>
        <td id="LC15044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep, and, seeing, me, cried out in pain that I had endured too much.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15045"></td>
        <td id="LC15045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15046"></td>
        <td id="LC15046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Come!&quot; she said, &quot;come away from this awful place! Let us go to meet my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15047"></td>
        <td id="LC15047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husband who is, I know, coming towards us.&quot; She was looking thin and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15048"></td>
        <td id="LC15048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pale and weak; but her eyes were pure and glowed with fervour. I was</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15049"></td>
        <td id="LC15049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glad to see her paleness and her illness, for my mind was full of the</td>

        <td id="LC15050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fresh horror of that ruddy vampire sleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15051"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L15057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15057"></td>
        <td id="LC15057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Mina Harker&#39;s Journal._</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15058"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15059"></td>
        <td id="LC15059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_6 November._--It was late in the afternoon when the Professor and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15060"></td>
        <td id="LC15060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took our way towards the east whence I knew Jonathan was coming. We did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15061"></td>
        <td id="LC15061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not go fast, though the way was steeply downhill, for we had to take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15062"></td>
        <td id="LC15062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heavy rugs and wraps with us; we dared not face the possibility of being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15063"></td>
        <td id="LC15063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left without warmth in the cold and the snow. We had to take some of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15064"></td>
        <td id="LC15064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">provisions, too, for we were in a perfect desolation, and, so far as we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15065"></td>
        <td id="LC15065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could see through the snowfall, there was not even the sign of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15066"></td>
        <td id="LC15066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">habitation. When we had gone about a mile, I was tired with the heavy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15067"></td>
        <td id="LC15067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">walking and sat down to rest. Then we looked back and saw where the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15068"></td>
        <td id="LC15068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clear line of Dracula&#39;s castle cut the sky; for we were so deep under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15069"></td>
        <td id="LC15069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hill whereon it was set that the angle of perspective of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15070"></td>
        <td id="LC15070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Carpathian mountains was far below it. We saw it in all its grandeur,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15071"></td>
        <td id="LC15071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perched a thousand feet on the summit of a sheer precipice, and with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15072"></td>
        <td id="LC15072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemingly a great gap between it and the steep of the adjacent mountain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15073"></td>
        <td id="LC15073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on any side. There was something wild and uncanny about the place. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15074"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15081"></td>

        <td id="L15083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15083"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L15116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15116"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L15127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15127"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15128"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15149"></td>
        <td id="LC15149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every instant seemed an age whilst we waited. The wind came now in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15150"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15151"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15152"></td>

        <td id="L15153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15153"></td>
        <td id="LC15153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clear the air-space around us so that we could see afar off. We had of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15154"></td>
        <td id="LC15154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">late been so accustomed to watch for sunrise and sunset, that we knew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15155"></td>
        <td id="LC15155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with fair accuracy when it would be; and we knew that before long the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15156"></td>
        <td id="LC15156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sun would set. It was hard to believe that by our watches it was less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15157"></td>
        <td id="LC15157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than an hour that we waited in that rocky shelter before the various</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15158"></td>
        <td id="LC15158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bodies began to converge close upon us. The wind came now with fiercer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15159"></td>
        <td id="LC15159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and more bitter sweeps, and more steadily from the north. It seemingly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15160"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15252"></td>
        <td id="LC15252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Castle of Dracula now stood out against the red sky, and every stone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15253"></td>
        <td id="LC15253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of its broken battlements was articulated against the light of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15254"></td>
        <td id="LC15254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">setting sun.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15255"></td>
        <td id="LC15255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15256"></td>
        <td id="LC15256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The gypsies, taking us as in some way the cause of the extraordinary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15257"></td>
        <td id="LC15257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disappearance of the dead man, turned, without a word, and rode away as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15258"></td>
        <td id="LC15258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if for their lives. Those who were unmounted jumped upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15259"></td>
        <td id="LC15259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leiter-wagon and shouted to the horsemen not to desert them. The wolves,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15260"></td>
        <td id="LC15260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which had withdrawn to a safe distance, followed in their wake, leaving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15261"></td>
        <td id="LC15261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us alone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15262"></td>
        <td id="LC15262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15263"></td>
        <td id="LC15263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Morris, who had sunk to the ground, leaned on his elbow, holding his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15264"></td>
        <td id="LC15264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand pressed to his side; the blood still gushed through his fingers. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15265"></td>
        <td id="LC15265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flew to him, for the Holy circle did not now keep me back; so did the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15266"></td>
        <td id="LC15266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two doctors. Jonathan knelt behind him and the wounded man laid back his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15267"></td>
        <td id="LC15267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head on his shoulder. With a sigh he took, with a feeble effort, my hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15268"></td>
        <td id="LC15268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in that of his own which was unstained. He must have seen the anguish of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15269"></td>
        <td id="LC15269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my heart in my face, for he smiled at me and said:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15270"></td>
        <td id="LC15270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15275"></td>
        <td id="LC15275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The sun was now right down upon the mountain top, and the red gleams</td>

</td>

</td>
